31a2(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag rnams de ltar bslab par bya'o// de bzhin du khyim bdag rnams rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid blang bar mi bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o// de bas ma khyim bdag rnams
31a3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs blang bar mi bya'o/ / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos blang bar mi bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o// khyim bdag rnams gzugs kyi phung po blang bar mi bya/ tshor ba'i phung po
31a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'du shes kyi phung po dang / 'du byed kyi phung po dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po blang bar mi bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o// de bas na khyim bdag rnams sa'i khams blang bar mi bya/ chu'i kham
31a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams blang bar mi bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o// de bas na khyim bdag rnams rnam par shes pa'i khams blang bar mi bya'o zhes de ltar bslang
31a6(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ / de bas na khyim bdag rnams 'jig rje 'di blang bar mi bya/ 'jig rten pha rol blang bar mi bya'o zhes/ khyim bdag rnams de ltar bslab par bya'o// khyim bdag khyed rnams nam mig mi len cing /
31a7(dkon brtsegs): napa dang / sA dang / s+ye dang / lus dang / yid mi len pa der/ khyim bdag rnams mi gnas yid kyi bar la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag byed rnams nam gzugs mi len cing / sgra dang/
31b1(dkon brtsegs): dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams mi len pa de na/ khyim bdag rnams chos thams cad la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag khyed rnams nam gzugs kyi phung po mi len cing / tshor ba'i
31b2(dkon brtsegs): phung po dang / 'du shes kyi phung po dang / 'du byed kyi phung po mi len pa de na/ khyed rnams phung po rnams la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag khyed rnams nam rnam par shes pa'i phung po mi len pa de
31b3(dkon brtsegs): na/ khyed rnams rnam par shes pa'i phung po la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag khyed rnams nam sa'i khams mi len cing / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i
31b4(dkon brtsegs): khams mi len pa de na/ khyed rnams khams la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag khyed rnams nas rnam par shes pa'i khams mi len pa de na/ khyed rnams rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas
31b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ / khyim bdag khyed rnams nam 'jig rten 'di mi len cing / 'jig rten pha rol mi len pa de na/ khyed rnams 'jig rten thams cad la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag khyed rnams
31b6(dkon brtsegs): nam chos thams cad mi len pa de na/ khyed rnams chos thams cad la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag khyed rnams nam chos thams cad la mi gnas pa de na/ khyed rnams mi 'byung mi 'jig go//
31b7(dkon brtsegs): khyed rnams nam mi 'byung mi 'jig pa de na/ khyed rnams skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi 'de ba dang / 'jug pa
32a1(dkon brtsegs): las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan
32a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// skye ba dang ni 'chi ba yis// 'jig rten 'di kun kun nas 'bar// byis pa skyabs med gtse ba ste// de dag 'phags pa'i lam las nyams
32a3(dkon brtsegs): brgya lam 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur// dal ba chud zos ma byed par// brtson 'grus brtan par rtsom byos shig/ gang la gnas te rnam sgom pa/
32a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi ni de yang ltos// shes rab kyi ni de mthong ste// rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// gang la gnas te sems sgom pa// thams cad stong par shes par bya// chos rnams stong par rig
32a5(dkon brtsegs): nas ni/ / byang chub nyid kyang stong pa yin// 'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug dang // me gsum de dag shin tu mi bzad pa// des ni 'jig rten 'di kun rab 'bar yang // byis pa ring nas
32a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyid log khong mi chud/ / skye dang rga dang na dang 'chi ba dang // smre sngags 'don dang sdug bsngal yid mi bdes// 'jig rten 'di dag gtses par rig nas ni// chos rnams kun la gnas par ma byed
32a7(dkon brtsegs): cig de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das las rab tu
32b1(dkon brtsegs): byung ba rnyed par gyur cig/ bdag cag rnams kyis bde bar gshegs pa las bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag chur shog ces gsu
32b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu zung bar gyur te/ de nyid kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / de nyid kyis dge slong gi dngos por gyur to// 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/
32b3(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya'o// de dag gis ni ngur smig bgos// de dag gis ni sgra yang bregs// kun kyang lhung bzed thogs gyur nas// de nyid du ni dgra bcom gyur// ston pas dgra bcom rab mkhyen nas//
32b4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi ni dge 'dun dang // lha rnams mdun du mngon sum du// ched du brjod pa ched du brjod// 'jig rten gyi ni mgon po la// sngan chad sbyin pa byin pas na// gang na bde ba mang ba der// shin tu
32b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing 'ongs par gyur/ / de dag gis ning mthong nas// dad pa rab tu bskyed par gyur// de dag sems ni dang ba la// chos rnams kyi ni mchog bstan to// dgra bcom gyi ni gsung thos nas// bdag
32b6(dkon brtsegs): tulta ba rnam par bshig/ stong nyid mngon du byas nas ni// de dag skye ba kun nas grol// khyim bdag gi le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lam gyi bar du khyim
32b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag lnga brgya tsam po mi g.yo ba'i gnas la bkod nas kun nas mdzes pas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs so// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi lha rnams dang / gnod sbyin
33a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas 'jig rten na shin tu dkon pa'i bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms dbul lo snyam mo// de
33a2(dkon brtsegs): nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyis bsod snyoms kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa/ reg pa phun sum tshogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/
33a3(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin ci 'jigs la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms de bzhes so// bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyis bsod snyoms phul ma thag tu de nas
33a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe/ steng gi bar snang las ci 'jigs kyi 'khor mang po gnod sbyin drug khri brgyad stong gis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rjes su yid rang ba'i sgra phyung ngo // de nas de'i phyir gnod sbyin ci 'jigs
33a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ rang gi 'khor rnams la bos te/ bdag gis ni da gzod de bzhin gshegs pa la bsod snyoms phul gyis/ khyed kyis ni dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul cig/ de ni khyed rnams kyi yun
33a6(dkon brtsegs): ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin rnams kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsod snyoms phul nas/ gnod sbyin de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ dge slong gi dge 'dun
33a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis kyang bsod snyoms blangs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs pa las/ des bsod snyoms blangs par mkhyen nas/ sa phyogs de nas
33b1(dkon brtsegs): slar log go/ / de ltar de'i tshe lha stong phrag du ma dang / klu stong phrag du ma dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po stong phrag dum
33b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa stong phrag du ma dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dum rnams/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i zham ring du dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs yangs
33b3(dkon brtsegs): shing rgya che ba zhig tu gshegs te/ byon nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs 'khor dang bcas pas/ lha'i me tog ma rad ra ba dang / ut+pal dang /
33b4(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par tu gtor
33b5(dkon brtsegs): to/ / gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
33b6(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bsam pa'ang mkhyen/ de'i 'khor gnod sbyin mang po'i bsam pa'ang mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
33b7(dkon brtsegs): nam 'dzum pa mdzad pa de na/ zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta
34a1(dkon brtsegs): bu byung ste/ des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bas khyab par byas nas/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzir brjid med par byas te/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can nas/
34a2(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te slar log nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// kha cig ni phrag par nub
34a3(dkon brtsegs): bo/ kha cig ni pus mor nub bo// chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams la lung ston pa de na/ 'od zer zhabs gnyis kyi 'og tu nub
34a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ / nam dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams la lung ston pa de na/ 'od zer snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro// nam gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la lung
34a5(dkon brtsegs): ston pa de na/ 'od zer mdun du nub par 'gyur ro// nam mi rnams la lung ston pa de na/ 'od zer g.yon du nub par 'gyur ro// nam lha rnams la lung ston pa de na/ 'od zer g.yas su nub par
34a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / nam nyan thos rnams la lung ston pa de na/ 'od zer pus mor nub par 'gyur ro// nam rang sangs rgyas rnams la lung ston pa de na/ 'od zer phrag par nub par 'gyur ro// nam sangs
34a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa de na/ 'od zer steng gi dbu'i gtsug gi mtshams su nub par 'gyur ro//
34b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong ste/ mthong nas chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs nas
34b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// ci rgyus 'jig rten snang mdzad pa// 'jig rten kun la smad pa'i
34b3(dkon brtsegs): slad/ 'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa// ci zhig slad du mdzum pa bstan// sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/ de ring su yis sa bon btab// de ring su la lung yang ston// gang zhig thar phyir rab tu
34b4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs/ / dpa' bo rnam par 'dren pa rnams// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad// thub pa ci yi slad du bstan// 'od zer don ni bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
34b5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar gsungs pa/ 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la// ci 'jig rab tu dang sems kyis// bsod snyoms dag gi phul bas na// de ltar de
34b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'dzum pa mdzad/ / gnod sbyin 'di las shi 'phos nas// sum cu rtsa gsum 'gro bar 'gyur// sum cu gsum nas shi 'phos nas// 'thab bral du yang 'gro bar 'gyur// 'thab thal
34b7(dkon brtsegs): nas ni dga' ldan 'gro/ / 'dod la 'dod pas dgar byas nas// mi yi nang du skye 'gyur te// rgyal po rdzu 'phrul ldan par 'gyur// 'khor los sgyur ba mi yi dbang // gling bzhi dag gi dbang po
35a1(dkon brtsegs): ste/ mi mi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'gro bar 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba nyi shur ni// rtag tu bsti stang byas par 'gyur// lha mi nang dang
35a2(dkon brtsegs): minang du/ / yang dang yang ni kun tu 'gro// phyis de rgyal srid bor nas ni// khyim med par yang rab tu 'byung // rkyen gyi byang chub thob 'gyur te// der ni mthar yang thug par 'gyur// gnod sbyin
35a3(dkon brtsegs): dag ni sum khri rnams/ / gnod sbyin skye gnas 'phos gyur nas// sum cu rtsa gsum skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas la ni gus byas nas// sangs rgyas byams pa mthong gyur cing // de na mthar ni
35a4(dkon brtsegs): thug 'gyur te/ / dgra bcom pa yang thob 'gyur na// ston pa la ni su mi mchod// gnod sbyin stong du tshang ba rnams// byang chub mchog la rab zhugs pas// de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des// nam du'ang ngan
35a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/ / kha cig srog chags kun phan phyir// byang chub dam pa rab tshol zhing // sangs rgyas 'dren pa stong rnams la// bkur sti dag ni byed par 'gyur// kha cig sangs rgyas byang
35a6(dkon brtsegs): chub phyir/ / stong phrag gnyis sam gsum dag kyang // me tog 'phreng ba dri rnams kyis// mchod pa dag ni byed par 'gyur// dag pa bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can// 'dren pa bye ba phrag stong la//
35a7(dkon brtsegs): kha cig bkur sti byed 'gyur te// 'di dag phyis ni byang chu reg de nas ci 'jigs de yi bu// ri bo zhes bya rdzu 'phrul che// 'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur ces// des kyang sems
35b1(dkon brtsegs): ni bskyed par gyur/ / des ni sangs rgyas bsti stang byas// thams cad du yang smon lam btab// nga mthong nas ni mchod byas te// byang chub phyir ni sems 'dud do// des ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des// ngan 'gro
35b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad spangs gyur nas/ / sangs rgyas byams pa mthong nas ni// gdugs rnams bye ba 'bul bar 'gyur// gdugs rnams bye ba phul nas ni// na bza' bye ba 'bul bar 'gyur// na bza' bye ba phul
35b3(dkon brtsegs): nas ni/ / de nyid du yang rab tu 'byung // srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// byang chub dam pa rab tshol zhing // lo yang lnga brgya tshang bar ni// tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur// 'di lta bu yi rnam grangs kyis//
35b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang tshul khrims yang dag spyod// gang+gA'i bye ma ji snyed pa// de snyed bskal par spyod par 'gyur// dper gsungs pa ni de snyed du// de dag khyed kyis shes par gyis// de dag dper yang shes nas ni//
35b5(dkon brtsegs): de bas lhag par spyad par gyis// sngar ni dpe rnams gang brjod pa// gang+gA yi ni bye snyed kyi// de snyed sangs rgyas mthong gyur nas// de dag kun la bsti stang byed// e ma'o ye shes e ma'o shes// e ma'o/
35b6(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa'i sems// sems can kun gyi 'dren pa ni// de ltar zhum par mi 'gyur ro// de phyis sems can kun gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas su yang de 'gyur te// de na de yi mtshan btags pa// sman pa'i
35b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po rnam par grags/ / lo ni bye ba bdun cur yang // srog chags rnams la chos bstan te// phyis gdod rkang gnyis gtso bo ni// de nas mya ngan 'das par 'gyur// rab tu dul ba'i sems rnams
36a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'dus pa dag ni nyi shur gyur/ / de la tha ma gcig pu ni// dge slong bye ba nyi shur 'gyur// 'dus pa rnams ni gang brjod pa// nyan thos dpag tu med pa ste// de mi
36a2(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos ji snyed pa/ / byang chub zhugs pa'ang de snyed do// sems can rnams kyi don mdzad nas// de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das// lo ni brgya phrag stong dag tu// de yi dam chos gnas par 'gyur/
36a3(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa lnga brgya tshang bar ni// sangs rgyas mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// bskal pa gcig la'ang 'byung ba ni// de na stong rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// mi rnams mkhas pa gang dag ni// sangs
36a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas chos rnams bsnyen 'dod pa/ / tshul bzhin mang du thos pa dang // rab tu 'dun pa nyid du bya// tshul bzhin ma yin rnam par spongs// tshul bzhin la ni rtag tu sgoms// mang du thos par rab
36a5(dkon brtsegs): tu bya/ / des ni shes rab rnam par 'phel// byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yi// rtsa ba'i don ni chos bzhi ste// sbyin dang tshul khrims thos dang gtong // byang chub kyi ni lam la bzang // bla na med pa'i
36a6(dkon brtsegs): theg pa mchog/ byang chub kyi ni lam yang bstan// the tsom gcod pa bzang po yi// nyan thos kyi ni lam bstan to// sems can gang dag 'di 'dod pa// de la ngas ni skabs dbye'o// chos rnams kyi ni
36a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog ston pa/ / 'jig rten snang mdzad rnyed par dka'/ de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bo 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung
36b1(dkon brtsegs): po'i ri la gshegs nas grags gis/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la dge ba'i rtsa brgya chen po zhig bskyed do snyam mo// de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi phur bos rang gi 'khor la smras pa/ grogs po /
36b2(dkon brtsegs): shes par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gshegs kyis/ de la grobs po dag mthu ci yod pa dang ci nus kyis bcom ldan
36b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la mchod pa'i las la spro ba skyed cig/ de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bo g.yog dang bcas pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas gzung ste/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i bar gyi lam
36b4(dkon brtsegs): de thams cad gseg ma dang / gyo mo dang / sdong dum dang / tsher ma rnams med par byas so// me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar dag par byas so// lam de dag thams cad bsal nas/ spos kyi chus kun tu chag
36b5(dkon brtsegs): chag btab bo/ / lam der gos mtshams med par bting ngo // lam der mi gang tsam du me tog gis chal par bkang ngo // lam de dag gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis shin tu brgyan to//
36b6(dkon brtsegs): lam de bdug spos dam pa'i snying po rab kyi snod nas bdugs so// steng gi bar snang las dar gyi lda ldi sbyangs te shin tu brgyan to// lam der sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra 'khrol bar byas so// lam de nas ma'
36b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyang gang tshun chad tsam me tog ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos khebs shing ngur pa sgra 'byin par byas so// lam de gser glebs pas rab tu g.yogs so// lam de gser gyi dra ba dang /
37a1(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi dra bas rab tu g.yogs so// de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi du ri bos lam du de lta bu'i bkod pa byas nas lus chen po mngon par sprul
37a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang bcas pa dga' mgu rangs rab tu dga' ste/ mos shing yid bde ba skyes nas/ dga' ba'i sems dang / bde ba'i sems dang / mnyen pa'i sems dang / rnam par dang ba'i sems dang
37a3(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang / rab tu tshim pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas la gzhol ba'i sems dang / chos la gzhol ba'i sems dang / dge 'dun la gzhol ba'i sems dang / byang chub las mi
37a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba'i sems dang / mi bskyod pa'i sems dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems dang / sems can thams
37a5(dkon brtsegs): cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems dang / snying po'i sems
37a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / brtan pa'i sems dang / mi phyed pa'i sems dang / ma zhigs pa'i sems dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad sgrub pa'i
37a7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug
37b1(dkon brtsegs): go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams kyi mchog/ chos rnams
37b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi ni dam pa ston/ / 'jig rten mgon la bdag gis ni// bla na ma mchis mchod pa bgyis// 'dren pa ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin// stobs bcu dang ni rab ldan te// mi 'jigs pa la rab gnas nas//
37b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can don rnams bgyid par shog/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams dang // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ldan// 'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa// 'jig rten snang bar byed par shog/ srog
37b4(dkon brtsegs): chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ / snyan pa'i chos ni rab ston cing // rnam pa bcu gnyis dam pa yi// chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar shog/ rgyal ba ji ltar de bzhin du// cho 'phrul rnams ni rab ston cing /
37b5(dkon brtsegs): srog chags bye ba du ma yi// sems can rnams kyi don bgyid shog/ dpa' chen gang rnams ma byon pa// 'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad ltar// byang chub dam pa rab rtogs nas// lam de rab tu ston
37b6(dkon brtsegs): par shog/ sems can ldongs pa kun gyi phyir// mig dang ldan pa nyid gyur te// gnas dang rten dang skyabs dag dang // de bzhin dpung gnyen 'gyur bar shog/ ji ltar 'dren pa grol mdzad bzhin// 'gro
37b7(dkon brtsegs): lngar ni skyes pa yi/ / srog chags rnams kyi mgon du shog/ bdag gi sdug bsngal kun las grol// 'jig rten na ni mtshungs pa yong min pa// lha dbang lha ma yin dang klus mchod pa// gzi brjid dag ni mtha'
38a1(dkon brtsegs): / las 'od mdzad pa// rkang gnyis mchog la bdag gis mchod pa bgyis// bdag ni las mchog dam pa 'di dag gis// mi dbangs steng mchog tu gyur pa bzhin// bsod
38a2(dkon brtsegs): nams rab mchog sum cu gnyis mtshan ldan/ / chos kyi bdag po de dang 'dra bar shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bo la tshigs su bcad pa dag
38a3(dkon brtsegs): gis gsungs pa/ chos kyi dam pa rnams kyi phyir// ston pa'i rim gro gang byed pa// sems can rnams kyi mchog yin te// de dag byang chub rnyed mi dka'// 'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa//
38a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten snang mdzad mchog la ni// lha dang klu dang mi rnams kyis// mchod par bya bar 'os par 'gyur// byang chub mchog tu sangs rgyas nas// shing mchog drung du rab 'dug ste// sdig can 'dud
38a5(dkon brtsegs): las rgyal nas su/ / srog chags rnams la chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha stong phrag du ma dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po stong phrag du ma dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang /
38a6(dkon brtsegs): lto 'phye chen po stong phrag du ma dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa stong phrag du ma dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas
38a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen pos 'od zer ni rab tu 'gyed/ zhing ni rab tu g.yo
38b1(dkon brtsegs): bar byas/ me tog kI char ni rab tu 'bebs/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig ni rab tu 'khrol bar byas te/ gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bos lam du bkod pa ji ltar mngon par byas pa bzhin du/
38b2(dkon brtsegs): shing rta'i pang mo tsam gyi pad+mal zhabs gnag ste/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la kun dga' bo khyod kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
38b3(dkon brtsegs): gdan mchog chos kyi gdan/ gdan dam pa/ gdan bzang po 'jig rten gsum po kun las khyad par du 'phags pa'i gdan/ sangs rgyas kyi gdan shoms shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang na
38b4(dkon brtsegs): la bzhugs te/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten rnams la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya
38b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mdo sde/ sems can thams cad la phan par rab tu bsngags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa 'chad par 'gyur te/ de'ang sems can thams cad the tsom du gyur pa la rab tu
38b6(dkon brtsegs): ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi the tsom skye ba gcod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde 'di 'chad par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan
38b7(dkon brtsegs): pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te/ de na lha bye ba drug cu rtsa brgyad kyis ras bcos ma re re de bzhin gshegs pa la phul te/ de dag kyang der gdan du bting bar gyur nas/ bcom
39a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gdan bshams pa de la bzhugs so/ / bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu de rnams la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis gsungs pa/
39a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon gyi gdan du ni// lha yi gos rab dam pa mchog/ lha yis rab tu bting ba la// de la rnam par 'dren pa bzhugs// thams cad chos kyi pha rol phyin// sangs rgyas bzhugs par gyur ma
39a3(dkon brtsegs): thag/ 'jig rten rnam pa drug g.yos shing // skye bo rab tu dga' bar gyur// sangs rgyas zhing ni ri dang bcas// de na rab tu snang bar gyur// de na chos 'dod rnams la ni// skyob pas sangs rgyas rdza
39a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul ston/ / lha dang klu dang mi rnams dang // grul bum yi dgas srul po rnams// de dag gcig gis gcig mthong ste// sgrib pa dag ni med par gyur// lha rnams bye ba phrag stong dang // khrag khrig
39a5(dkon brtsegs): phrag ni brgya rnams dag/ rnyed dka' yi ni tshig gsungs pa// sangs rgyas la ni dga' bas lha// rgyal po gzugs can snying po yang // de tshe blon pos yongs bskor cing // 'jig rten gyi ni mgon po mchog
39a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas drung du 'ongs par gyur/ / ston pas lha dang klu rnams dang // mi rnams 'dus par khyen pa dang // srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// phyogs bzhi dag tu rab gzigs nas// 'jig rten
39a7(dkon brtsegs): the tshom gang yod pa/ / rkang gnyis mchog la dris shig dang // the tshom dag ni dris pa rnams// rnam par 'dren pangs gcad do// de ltar de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
39b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems can 'i snyed 'dus nas chos nyan pa de dag thams cad kyis dal bar shes nas/ sems can thams cad kyis bsams te/ phyag 'tshal nas chos nyan pa'i phyir rnab thags te 'jug par
39b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dge slong ma 'dus pa rnams la soms la/ ma lhags
39b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyang tshol te/ rgyang ring po na gnas pa rnams kyang sdus shig/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po ri'i rgyal po kha ba can gyi lho phyogs kyi ngos la gnas so// de nas tshe dang ldan
39b4(dkon brtsegs): pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsams te/ bsams nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// /
39b5(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa 'od srungs chen po longs shig/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu
39b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'khor gyi mdun du chos ston te/ ston pas bka' stsal gyi/ btsun pa 'od srungs bdag cag gnyis kyi chos kyi bar chad du 'gyur du 'ong gis
39b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dong ngo / / de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod song zhig
40a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / kho bo'ang khyod song ba'i rjes bzhin du 'ong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos stan de la 'phrul pa sprul te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
40a2(dkon brtsegs): chen por zhugs so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po 'khor bzhis bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
40a3(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor gyi nang du ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos sprul pa de mthong nas/
40a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig/
40a5(dkon brtsegs): shu 'khor gyi nang na phyogs gcig tu 'jug pa mthong ste/ mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa 'od srungs khyod stan gal ba de nas sprul te/ sprul nas mgyogs par bcom ldan 'das kyi drungs
40a6(dkon brtsegs): byin te/ spyan sngar ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'khor gyi nang na phyogs gcig tu lug sprums brten pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan no// de skad ces spras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/ tshe dang
40a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu gsungs na/ 'di la kho bo'i rdza
40b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul rnams par sprul pa ltas ci zhig tu 'gyur/ gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// bam po gsum pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA
40b2(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la
40b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / gal te zhus nas zhub lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
40b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bul 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu khyod
40b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal
40b6(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos bu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dag lags/
40b7(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dang / lus kyi las yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pa dang / lus
41a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi las ma g.yos pa dang / ngag gi las ma g.yos pa dang / yid kyi las ma g.yos pa rnams lags/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bdud dang bdud kyi ris
41a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi lha rnams kyis spyod mi nus pa rnams lags/ sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa rnams lags/ sems can thams cad kyi 'dren par gyur pa dang / rnam par 'dren par gyur pa dang
41a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dren par gyur pa dang / sgron mar gyur pa dang / stegs su gyur pa dang / zam par gyur pa dang / grur gyur pa dang / sgrol ba po dang / pha rol tu 'gro bar gyur pa dang / gnas dang /
41a4(dkon brtsegs): mgon dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen du gyur pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las zlog par mi nus pa rnams lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang
41a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis don 'di nyid kun nus pa/ gang gis byang chub rab zhugs pa// dpa' bo de yi don ci lags// gang gis dam pa 'tshang rgyab// yon tan chos
41a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams brjod du gsol/ / srog chags kun la sman slad du// dpa' bo de dag ji ltar spyod// ji lta bu yi chos bsgoms pas// mi yi dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// byang chub snying por rab gnas nas// sdig can
41a7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni ji ltar 'dul/ / bye ba dag gi zhing bskyod nas// ji ltar byang chub mchog 'tshang rgya// byang chub sems dpa' gang gi don// 'di 'dra'i tshig ni ci zhig lags// sangs rgyas chos ni mchog rnams dang //
41b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dag ni 'dir brjod 'asol// srog chags kun la sman slad du// pad+ma bzhin du ma chags shing // sems can bye ba grol mdzad par// 'jigs rten 'di na ji ltar spyod// mkhas
41b2(dkon brtsegs): pa lha dang klu dag dang / / mi dang mi ma lags rnams kyis// ji lta bur ni mchod 'gyur ba// zhus pa de dag bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang
41b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag dang gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yongs su
41b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin to/ / chos gcig pu gang zhes na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos gcig pu de dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
41b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag dang gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yongs su 'dzin to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsam pa ji lta bu/
41b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems ji lta bu/ de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu bsam pa zhes bya ni mi phyed pa'i phyir snying po'o// /
41b7(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa'i phyir mi phyed pa'o// mi g.yo ba'i phyir brtan pa'o// ma 'khrul ba'i phyir mi g.yo ba'o// shin tu gnas pa'i phyir ma 'khrul ba'o// mi zlogs pa'i phyir shin tu gnas pa'o//
42a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can la lta ba'i phyir mi zlogs pa'o// snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i phyir sems can la lta ba'o// yongs su mi skyo ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba'o// sems
42a2(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa'i phyir yongs su mi skyo ba'o/ / bdag la bde ba ma yin pa'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa'o// lan du phan 'dogs par re ba med pa'i
42a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir bdag bde ba ma yin pa'o/ / zang zing med pa'i phyir lan du phan 'dogs par re ba med pa'o// sems can gyi phyir 'brang bas zang zing med pa'o// mthu chung ba'i sems can la lta ba'i phyir sems
42a4(dkon brtsegs): can gyi phyir 'brang ba'o/ / mgon du gyur pa'i phyir mthu chung ba'i sems can la lta ba'o// skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyi phyir mgon du gyur pa'o// ma 'khrugs pa'i phyir skyabs dang dpung gnyen no//
42a5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu yang dag par brtags pa'i phyir ma 'khrugs pa'o// rtsod pa med pa'i phyir shin tu yang dag par brtags pa'o// bsam pa dge ba'i phyir rtsod pa med pa'o// ci'ang med pa'i phyir bsam pa
42a6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'o/ / shin tu yongs su dag pa'i phyir ci'ang med pa'o// rab tu byung bar byas pa'i phyir shin tu yongs su dag pa'o// nang dri ma med pa'i phyir rab tu byang bar byas pa'o// phyi shin tu yongs su dag
42a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir nang dri ma med pa'o/ / de ltar shA ri'i bu mi phyed pas snying po zhes bya ba nas/ phyi shin tu yongs su dag pa'i phyir nang dri ma meng pa'i bar du ste/ bsam pa ni de lta bu'o//
42b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems ji lta bu zhe na/ sems de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba'o// sems de ni thegs pa gzhan mi 'dod pa'i phyir brel ba med pa'o// sems de ni pha rol rgol ba thams cad
42b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir brtan pa'o/ / sem+ba de ni bdud thams cad kyis mi phyed pa'o// sems de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa'i phyir rtag pa'o// sems de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa'i phyir
42b3(dkon brtsegs): mi g.yo ba'o/ / sems de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu gnas pa'o// sems de ni gnyen po med pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o// sems de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nges par phigs pa'i phyir rdo rje
42b4(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'o/ / sems de ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la mi mnyam pa med pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o// sems de ni rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnams par dag pa'o//
42b5(dkon brtsegs): sems de ni shes rab kyis snang bar byed pa'i phyir dri ma med pa'o// sems de ni sems can thams cad la skabs 'byed pa'i phyir rgya che ba'o// sems de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir yangs pa'o//
42b6(dkon brtsegs): sems de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la btang ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'o// sems de ni snying rje chen po ma gcad pa'i phyir thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o// sems de ni mkhas pas bsngags pa
42b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir sngon du 'gro bar bya'o/ / sems de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon du gyur pa'o// sems de ni 'de ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi gnas so// sems de ni tshul khrims kyis smon lam las byang
43a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'o/ / sems de ni bzod par bsnyen par dka' ba'o// sems de ni brtson 'grus thul bar dka' ba'o// sems de ni bsam gtan dag gis nye bar zhi ba'o//
43a2(dkon brtsegs): sems de ni shes rab kyi tshogs kyis gnod pa med pa'o// yang sems de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang
43a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'i phung po'i rtsa ba'o/ / sems de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po'i rtsa ba'o// sems de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang
43a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyi rtsa ba'o// yang shA ri'i bu sems de ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin te/ de'i phyir byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o//
43a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bsams pa dang / byang chub kyi sems de lta bu dang ldan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// sems rgya chen po sems can mchog rab ces bya'o// 'jig rten gsum
43a6(dkon brtsegs): po thams cad las khyad par du gyur pa'i sems can ces bya'o/ / lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ lus kyi las
43a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa yin/ ngag gi las yongs su dag pa yin/ yid kyi las yongs su dag pa yin/ lus kyi las ma g.yos pa yin/ ngag gi las ma g.yos pa yin/ yid kyi las ma
43b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yos pa yin te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis skyong mi nus pa yin/ sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad
43b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis ma gos pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi 'dren par gyur pa yin/ rnam par 'dren par gyur pa dang / yongs su 'dren par gyur pa dang / sgron mar gyur pa dang / stegs su gyur pa dang / zam par gyur pa dang
43b3(dkon brtsegs): grur gyur pa dang / grol bar gyur pa dang / pha rol tu 'gro ba dang / gnas dang / mgon dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen yin no// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi
43b4(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams kyis skyong mi nus pa yin no/ / de ltar na shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ngang ba yin no// dad pa mang
43b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'phags pa rnams mthong bar 'dod pa dang / chos nyan pa 'dod pa yin/ ser sna med cing lhag par gtong ba dang / lag brkyang zhing rnam par gtong ba la dga' ba dang / sbyin pa dgang pa
43b6(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba yin/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems yin// rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / 'khrugs pa med pa'i sems dang / ma 'dres pa'i sems dang / de las dang las kyi rnam par
43b7(dkon brtsegs): smin pa la mngon par dad pa/ / rab tu rtogs cing yid ches pa dang / the tsom med cing som nyi med pa yin no// de nag po dang dkar po'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu mi stor bar shes pas/ srog gi phyir yang
44a1(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i las mi byed pa yin te/ de srog gcod pa spong ba yin/ ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang
44a2(dkon brtsegs): ngag rtsub po dang / tshig 'akyil pa dang / brna sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba spong ba yin te/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag spangs nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams
44a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par len cing spyod do/ / de dad pa dang ldan pas gang dge sbyong dang bram ze dag yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos can dang /
44a4(dkon brtsegs): mang du thos pa dang / thos pa la brtson pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang / dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / brtsod pa'i smra ba med pa dang / mi snyan par smra ba med pa dang
44a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dge zhing mi dge ba'i bsam pa med pa dang / dge ba la yang dag par sbyor ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su spangs pa dang / rgod pa med pa dang / khengs pa ma yin pa dang /
44a6(dkon brtsegs): yang yab po med pa dang / mu cor mi smra ba dang / tshig ma 'dres pa dang / dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang / sems shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa de dag dang / ji ltar srid par 'dren pa gcod pa dang
44a7(dkon brtsegs): zug rngu phyung ba dang / khur bor ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / yang srid pa zad pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
44b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po dag dang / de lta bu'i dge sbyong dang gra zhe dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig nas/ de dag la bsnyen cing bsten te/ bsnyen bkur byed cing mgu bar byed kyi/ yid byung bar mi byed do//
44b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar byed kyi/ mi dga' bar mi byed do// des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mgu bar byas pas/ de dag de la chos kyis phan 'dogs par byed de/ chos kyis gtam gyis yang dag par ston par
44b3(dkon brtsegs): byed/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/ sbyin pas longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyis mtho
44b4(dkon brtsegs): ris su skye ba dang / thos pas shes rab chen por 'gyur ba dang / sgom pas 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes yang dag par rab tu ston to// 'di ni sbyin pa/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i 'bras bu/ 'di ni
44b5(dkon brtsegs): ser sna/ 'di ni ser sna'i 'bras bu/ 'di ni tshul khrims/ 'di ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims/ 'di ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa
44b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni bzod pa/ 'di ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni gnod sems/ 'di ni gnod sems kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni brtson 'grus/ 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa/
44b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni le lo// 'di ni le lo'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni bsam gtan/ 'di ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni sems g.yeng ba/ 'di ni sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa/
45a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni shes rab/ 'di ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab/ 'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni lus kyi legs
45a2(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa/ 'di ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa/ 'di ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni ngag gis legs par spyod pa
45a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni ngag gis legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni ngag gis nyes par spyod pa/ 'di ni ngag gis nyes par spong pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni yid kyis legs par spyod pa/ 'di ni yid
45a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni yid kyis nyes par spyod pa/ 'di ni yid kyis nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni dge ba/ 'di ni mi dge ba/ 'di ni bya ba/ 'di ni mi bya ba/
45a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di byas na yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur/ 'di byas na yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi phan pa dang / mi bde bar 'gyur ro zhes de ltar de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen
45a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston te/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/ snod du gyur par yang
45a7(dkon brtsegs): shes nas/ zab mo'i gtam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi gtam dang / mtshan ma med pa'i gtam dang / smon pa med ba'i gtam dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i
45b1(dkon brtsegs): gtam dang / ma skyes pa'i gtam dang / ma byung ba'i gtam dang / bdag med pa'i gtam dang / sems can med pa'i gtam dang / srog med pa'i gtam dang / gang zag med pa'i gtam dang / rten cing
45b2(dkon brtsegs): 'brel par byung ba zab mo'i gtam rab tu ston to/ / 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pas 'di 'byung / 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ba ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par
45b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/
45b4(dkon brtsegs): sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa// srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi
45b5(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ 'di med na 'di mi 'byung / 'di 'gags pas 'di
45b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gag ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag pa nas/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ 'di la chos gang yang 'grub
45b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med/ ldog pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste/ bdag po med pa/ byed pa po med pa/ tshor ba po med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ste/ 'di la
46a1(dkon brtsegs): chos gang yang 'grub pa med/ ldog pa med/ rjes su 'jug pa med de/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rmongs pas khams gsum 'dogs par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa'i lam dag/
46a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyi lam 'dogs par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rmongs pa'ang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags na/ chos gang yang chos gang gi byed pa po ma yin no// gang la byed pa po med pa
46a3(dkon brtsegs): de la don dam par bya ba'ang mi dmigs te/ de la chos gang yang 'byung ba med/ 'jig pa med do zhes brjod do// des de lta bu'i chos zab mo thos nas the tsom mi za// som nyi med cing chos thams cad la chags
46a4(dkon brtsegs): pab med par 'jug ste/ de gzugs la mi chags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi chags/ mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi chags
46a5(dkon brtsegs): rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o zhes dang ngo // shA ri'i bu de ltar dang
46a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas la lta ba las yongs su mi nyams/ chos nyan pa las yongs su mi nyams/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa las yongs su mi nyams so//
46a7(dkon brtsegs): de gang dang gang du skye ba de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas la lta ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ chos nyan pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkun byed pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom
46b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur te/ de dang de dag tu skyes nas kyang / brtson 'grus rtsom zhing dge ba'i chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson par 'gyur ro// de brtson 'grus brtsams pas
46b2(dkon brtsegs): khyim gyi gnas mi 'dod par 'gyur/ bu po dang bu mo 'dod par mi 'gyur/ bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dag mi 'dod par 'gyur/ yongs su gzung ba thams cad kyi ngor
46b3(dkon brtsegs): lta ba mi 'dod par 'gyur te/ de skyes nas 'dod pa la ma rtses par na tshong gzhon nur sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par myur du rab tu 'byung ngo // de dang
46b4(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu byung nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen mchog dang ldan zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rtogs pas dge ba'i bsam pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// de dge ba'i bsam
46b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i chos rnams nyan cing sgrub pa snying por byed par 'gyur te/ tshig lhur byed pa'i blo dang ldan pa mi 'gyur/ mang du thos pa yongs su tshol bas ngoms par mi 'gyur/ ji ltar thos pa'i
46b6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston te/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la mi re zhing rang gi tshig yongs su mi spong bar gzhan la
46b7(dkon brtsegs): chos ston te/ ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du gzhan la chos ston to// chos nyan pa rnams la byams pa chen po rnyed par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po 'jug par
47a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / de mang du thos pas lus dang srog la mi lta bar 'gyur/ 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes par 'gyur/ rab tu dben pa dang nges par 'gyur/ gso sla ba dang
47a2(dkon brtsegs): dgang sla ba dang / dgon pa la dga' ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la nye bar rtog pa dang / don la rton gyi yi ge la mi rton pa yin/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
47a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi rten du 'gyur/ bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir zhugs pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po bla na med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes
47a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol lo/ / bag yod pa lhur byed par 'gyur te/ de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po yang dag par
47a5(dkon brtsegs): sdom pa'o/ / de la dbang po yang dag par sdom pa gang zhe na/ gang mig gis gzugs mthong nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin// mngon rtags su mi 'dzin/ gzugs la chags pa dang // nyes dmigs dang /
47a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin du rna bas sgra dang / snas dri dang / lces ro dang / lus kyis reg bya dang / yid kyis chos shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ mngon rtags
47a7(dkon brtsegs): su mi 'dzin/ / chos rnams la chags pa dang / zhes dmigs kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu bag yod pa zhes bya
47b1(dkon brtsegs): ba ni/ gang bdag gi sems 'dul ba dang / gzhan gyi sems srung ba dang / nyon mongs pa la dga' ba spong ba dang / chos la dag pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi
47b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa rnams mi 'byung ba dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams mi 'byung ba dang / chags pa'i mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang / zhe sdang gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang
47b3(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang / lus kyis nyes par spod pa dang / ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang / yid kyis nyes par spyod pa mi 'byung ba dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed
47b4(dkon brtsegs): pa mi 'byung ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad mi 'byung ba de ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu gang dag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la rab tu sbyor
47b5(dkon brtsegs): ba ni/ gang yod pa de'ang yod par rab tu shes/ gang med pa de'ang med par rab tu shes so// de la ci yod ci med ce na/ yang dag pa la rab tu sbyor ba la ni/ 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba
47b6(dkon brtsegs): yod do/ / log pa la rab tu sbyor ba la ni/ 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba med do// las kyi rnam par smin pa ni yod do// gang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa de ni mang ngo /
47b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang mig ni yod do// gang gi mig de ni meng ngo // rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni yod do// gang gi yid de ni meng ngo // gzhan yang gzugs mi rtag pa dang / sdug
48a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can de ni yod do// gzugs rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / zer zug pa dang / de bzhin du gnas so zhes
48a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de ni med do/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can de ni yod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
48a3(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug pa dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / yang dag par de bzhin du gnas so zhes bya ba de ni med do// gzhan yang ma rig pa'i
48a4(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams yod kyi/ ma rig pa med na 'du byed med pa nas/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi'i bar du yod kyis/ skye ba med na rga shi med do// gzhan yang sbyin pas longs spyod chen por 'gyur
48a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ni yod do/ / sbyin pas dbul por 'gyur ba ni meng ngo // tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba ni yod do// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba ni meng ngo // thos pas shes rab chen
48a6(dkon brtsegs): por 'gyur ba ni yod do/ / 'chal pa'i shes rab kyis shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ni med do// sgom pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba ni yod do// sgom pas 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba ni mang ngo // tshul bzhin ma yin pa
48a7(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pas kun tu sbyor ba ni yod do/ / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas 'bral ba ni med do// brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni byang chub yod do// le lo can ni byang chub
48b1(dkon brtsegs): med do/ / nga rgyal med pa la ni rab tu byung bar lung bstan pa yod do// nga rgyal can la ni mya ngan las 'da' ba med do// gzhan yang thams cad du song ba'i stong pa nyid ni yod do// 'di ni bdag dang
48b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can dang / srog dang / skyes bu dang / gang za go zhes bya ba de ni med do// de ltar shA ri'i bu bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa ni/ gang yod par 'jig rten gyi
48b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa rnams kyis kun shes pa de la ni yod do zhes 'dogs so/ / gang med par 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams kyis kun shes pa de la ni med do zhes 'dogs so// de yod ces tha snyad du 'dogs pa la'ang yang dag/
48b4(dkon brtsegs): par shes par mi byed/ med ces tha snyad du 'dogs pa la'ang yang dag par shes par mi byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i don yang khong du chung ngo // chos thams
48b5(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pas bsdus te/ chos kyi mdo bzhir 'dus par byas so// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang / 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / chos thams
48b6(dkon brtsegs): cad bdag med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa bzhi pa'o// 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa zhes bya ba ni rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi rtag par 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas
48b7(dkon brtsegs): bshad / / 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba ni bde bar 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde bar 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do// chos thams cad ba dag
49a1(dkon brtsegs): med do zhes bya ba ni bdag tu 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi bdag tu 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do// mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba zhes bya ba ni/
49a2(dkon brtsegs): dmig pas phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi dmigs pas phyin ci log tu gyur pa spang ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do// de 'du byed thams cad mi rtag go zhes thos nas/
49a3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu mi rtag pa nyid la 'jug go/ 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o zhes thos nas/ smon lam dang bral ba skyed do// chos thams cad bdag med pa'o zhes thos nas/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin/
49a4(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sgom mo// mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba zhes thos nas/ mtshan ma med pa yongs su 'dris par byed de/ dus ma yin par yang dag par mtha' mngon sum du mi byed // de lta shA
49a5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu de lta bu'i chos la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i chos las yongs su mi nyams te/ myur du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' la
49a6(dkon brtsegs): brtag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o/ / / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de ltar ngang pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
49a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos bcu la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ the tsom mi za// rgya cher dga' mgu sgo rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyeng ngo // bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
49b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad
49b2(dkon brtsegs): du 'du shes skyed do/ / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang pa/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed pa'i bar du'o// 'di lta
49b3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang //
49b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs
49b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rdza 'phral bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin
49b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de
49b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa
50a1(dkon brtsegs): rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu po 'di rnams kyi phyir brtson 'grus cher rtsom zhing mi zhum
50a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gong / mi skyo ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu po ma thob kyi bar du lus kyi pags pa dang / rgyus pa dang / pri dang / dbugs dang / rus pa dag lta
50a3(dkon brtsegs): zhog la/ lus kyi sha dang khrags bskams kyang bla'i/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi bya'o snyam du de ltar sems skyed do// shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pas mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs
50a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu po 'di rnams la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed do// de nas
50a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// sangs rgyas sku ni bsam mi khyab// chos kyi sku yis rab tu phye// mtshan ma med cing
50a6(dkon brtsegs): snang ba med/ / rgyal ba'i thugs sras dang par byed// 'gro ba tha dad ji snyed kyi// sgra skad bsam gyis mi khyab pa// thams cad du ni sgra sgrog ste// sangs rgyas kyi ni spyod yul dang // ji
50a7(dkon brtsegs): tsam sems can thams cad kyi/ / dus gsum dag gi dbang po kun// sangs rgyas kyis ni rab mkhyen te// bsam mi khyab la rab tu dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od mtha' yas// 'od zer dra
50b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bsam mi khyab/ / zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa// thams cad kyi ni phyogs su khyab// thub pa'i tshul khrims 'jig rten 'das// 'jig rten chos la mi gnas te// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa
50b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam yas pa/ / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dang // sangs rgyas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag/ rnam par thar pa bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni// sems can kun gyis shes
50b3(dkon brtsegs): mi nus/ / chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer med la// gang gi stobs kyis shes 'gyur ba// drang srong chen po ye shes stobs// nam mkha' bzhin du mtha' yas pa// sems can gcig gi don phyir
50b4(dkon brtsegs): yang / / bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas par// 'dul ba'i don phyir bzhugs pas na// de dag snying rje de 'dra'o// sems can thams cad gzhan dang gzhan// dri ba rgya mtsho 'dri byed kyang // dris/
50b5(dkon brtsegs): lan gcig gis tshim byed de// mi 'jigs pa ni bsam mi khyab// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa// chos rnams thams cad thugs su chud// sangs rgyas chos rnams ma 'dres pa// thams
50b6(dkon brtsegs): cad du ni ye shes gzigs/ / dad pa la ni rab gnas pas// sangs rgyas chos kun chos nyid rnams// bsam gyis mi khyab 'di dag la// de dag thams cad dad par byed// @
50b7(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i skubasam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ the tsom mi ba/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas
51a1(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed ce na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa'o// 'di lta ste/
51a2(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang ba dang / mchil ma dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang / khrag dang / bshang ba dang / gci ba dang bral ba/ rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rgyus pa las rnam par grol ba'o// 'di lta ste/
51a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba/ yongs su dag pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma dang bral ba'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'jig rten las 'das
51a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas sems can
51a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi 'tsho ba'o/ / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni tshul khrims dpag tu med pa yongs su bsgoms pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam
51a6(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dpag tu med pa yongs su bsgoms pas yon tan thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'o/ / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni yongs su dag pa'i me long gi dkyil
51a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan lta bu dang chu la zla ba snang ba lta bu'o/ / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni nam mkha'i dbyings su yang dag par 'du zhing chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pas bsam gyis khyab
51b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni zag pa thams cad las log pas zag pa med pa'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'dus byas thams cad dang bral bas 'das ma byas pa'o// /
51b2(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lta bu'i sku'o// mnyam pa med pa'i sku'o// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sku'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni dpe med pa/ zla med pa/ mtshungs pa med pa'i
51b3(dkon brtsegs): sku te/ dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// de ni sngon gyi mthas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ phyi ma'i mthas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ da ltar byung bas rab tu phye ba
51b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ skye ba dang / rus dang / rigs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ mtshan gyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ dpe byad bzang pos rab tu phye ba ma yin/ sems kyis rab tu phye
51b5(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin/ yid kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rnam par shes pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ lta bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ thos pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ dran pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rnam par rig pas rab
51b6(dkon brtsegs): phye ba ma yin/ phung pos rab tu phye ba ma yin/ khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ skye bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ gnas pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'jig pas rab tu
51b7(dkon brtsegs): phye ba ma yin/ 'dzin pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'dor bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ nges par 'byung bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ spyod pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ kha dog gis rab tu phye ba ma yin
52a1(dkon brtsegs): rtags kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ dbyibs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'ong bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'gro bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ tshul khrims yid la byed pas rab tu
52a2(dkon brtsegs): phye ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ shes rab kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rnam par grol bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yid la byed pas ba tu phye ba ma
52a3(dkon brtsegs): yin/ tshan nyid kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ mtshan nyid mi mthun pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ chos kyi mtshan nyid kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ stobs su sgro btags pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ mi 'jigs
52a4(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ snying rje chen pos rab tu phye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par sgro btags pas rab tu phye/
52a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin te/ sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur skye ba'i sku'o// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las byung ba'i sku'o// mi 'gyur ba'i sku'o// mi
52a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa'i sku'o/ / rnam par mi rtog pa'i sku'o// mi gnas pa'i sku'o// mi snyems pa'i sku'o// gnas pa dang / rab tu gnas pa dang / mi g.yo ba thob pa'i sku'o// gzugs mang pa
52a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku'o/ / tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin// rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku'o// byung ba ma yin
52b1(dkon brtsegs): kun du byung ba ma yin/ ma byung ba'ang ma yin pa'i sku'o// rmad du byung ba rmang du byung ba'i chos kyi sku'o// mig las byung ba ma yin/ gzugs su gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ rna ba la
52b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ma yin/ sgrar gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin// snas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin/ drir gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ lces bskyed pa ma yin/ ror gtogs pa
52b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ lus dang ldan pa ma yin/ reg byar gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ sems la 'jug pa ma yin/ yid la 'jug pa mo yin/ rnam par shes pa la 'jug pa
52b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ ldog pa ma yin/ rjes su 'jug pa ma yin/ gnas pa dang mi g.yo ba thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sku ste/
52b5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga'
52b6(dkon brtsegs): mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ de bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas
52b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang 'di skad gsung ngo / / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag med par// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam spyad cing // las rnams gsum ni shin tu yongs dag par// mtshungs med
53a1(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa'i sku tshol lo/ / phyogs bcu 'gro ba kun la byams pa dang // snying rje rgya chen bskyed nas sbyin pa byin// 'dod la log par g.ye pa rtag spong zhing //
53a2(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lta bu mchog gi sku tshol lo// gser ltar dag cing mdzes pa'i gos rnams ni// dpag tu med pa'i gang+gA'i bye ma snyed// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par rab spyod cing // rgyal ba'i sras kyis
53a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mchog la phul/ / g.yag gi rnga ma bzhin du tshul khrims srung // yan lag nying lag bcad kyang dgra la bzod// brtson 'grus kyi ni pha rol phyin spyod cing // sangs rgyas sku la smon pa yongs
53a4(dkon brtsegs): mi skyo/ / shes rab thabs dga' rgya chen bsam gtan pa// bsam gtan spyod yul dga' rgyal rnam par blta// chos dbyings dam pa bde bar gshegs pa'i sku// de 'drar bdag gyur ces ni de la smon//
53a5(dkon brtsegs): srid par 'gro ba dag tu dge byed cing // mi mchog gis ni byang chub mtshungs med thob// dag pa dri med gtsang zhing rdul bral ba// nam mkha' 'dra ba yangs pa'i sku thob bo// rang bzhin stong ste bdag dang
53a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can bral/ / mtshan ma med cing sgra dang bral ba thob// mig gi yul kun las ni rab 'das pa// de 'dra'i sku ni thub pas yang dag thob// gzod ma nas stong ma byas ma byung ba// gzugs dang
53a7(dkon brtsegs): sgra bral yid kyang rnam dag pa/ / de bzhin gshegs sku mi g.yo gang mthong ba// des ni phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa mthong // ji ltar sgyu ma sprul pa sna tshogs lus// rta dang glang po bung
53b1(dkon brtsegs): meming skyes pa'i gzugs/ / byis pa bslu ba brdzun zhing phyin ci log/ de bzhin stobs bcu rnams la lta bar byos// gang dag 'das pa'i bde gshegs dpag med dang // ma byon rgyal ba de bzhin gang
53b2(dkon brtsegs): snang dag/ chos nyid gcig 'gyur mnyam pa med pa'i sku// chos kyi dbyings kyis klas shing nam mkha'i 'dra// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
53b3(dkon brtsegs): sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed ras/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do// shA ri'i
53b4(dkon brtsegs): bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyi mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches pas rab tu rtog pa nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du
53b5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes skyed ce na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin du sgra 'byung ste/ sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i
53b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par byed mod kyi/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du ngas dge slong gi 'khor la ni 'di bshad/ dge slong ma'i 'khor la ni 'di/ dge bsnyen gyi 'khor
53b7(dkon brtsegs): la ni 'di/ bram ze'i 'khor la ni 'di/ rgyal rigs kyi 'khor la ni 'di/ khyim bdag gi 'khor la ni 'di/ lha'i 'khor la ni 'di/ tshangs pa'i 'khor la ni/ 'di lta ste/ mdo'i sde dang
54a1(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i ste dang // gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /
54a2(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang / gtan la phab pa bstan pa'i sde rnams bshad par bya'o snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi
54a3(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang shA ri'i bu 'khor ji ltar 'dus par gyur pa/ tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi bar du 'dus par gyur pa de dag gi dbang po'i rim pa ci 'dra ba dang / sems can de dag la chos kyi mdo ji lta bu thos par bya ba
54a4(dkon brtsegs): dgongs par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i chos kyi mdo thos par bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar yang dag par shes kyang / chos bstan pa de la gcig la gcig nges pa'i tshig gnod
54a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'ang med do/ / thams cad kyang rang gi chos rnam par rig par kun shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par sman pa/
54a6(dkon brtsegs): las mngon par grub pa/ bden pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'jug go// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs de ni 'jam par 'byung // yid du 'ong ba dang / yid dga' ba dang / dag pa dang / dri
54a7(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa dang / snyan pa dang / mnyan par 'os pa dang / shes par bya bar 'os pa dang / mi rtsub pa dang / mi brlang ba dang / lus sim par byed pa dang / sems sim par byed pa dang / snying dga' bar byed
54b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dga' ba dang bde ba skyed pa dang / kun shes par byed pa dang / gsal zhing 'thad pa dang / mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / seng ge'i skad kyi drag shul gyi nga ro'i sgrang
54b2(dkon brtsegs): sprin gyi sgra dbyangs dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang / mi 'am ci'i glu'i dbyangs dang / ka la bing ka'i nga ro'i sgra dbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i nga ro'i sgra skad dbyangs dang / rnga'i sgra dbyangs dang
54b3(dkon brtsegs): dpal dang ldan pa dang / mnyen pa dang / zur phyir pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mgu bar byed pa dang / 'khor thams cad du grags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang
54b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dpyang 'byung ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
54b5(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ the tsom mi za// rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do/
54b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// tshangs pa yi ni sgra dbyangs su// 'dren pa gsung sgra rab 'byin te// tshangs pa rnams ni tshim par byed// 'di
54b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dra'i chos ni phun sum tshogs/ / de yi dbyangs ni byams dang ldan// snying rje las ni yang dag 'byung // btang snyoms dang ni dga' ldan pa// thub pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu 'byung // srog chags kun gyi
55a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags me/ / zhe sdang dug ni zhi byed cing // gti mug mun pa sel ba ste// phun sum tshogs dbyangs 'di 'dra'o// 'dzam bu gling gi sna tshogs phyogs rnams na/
55a2(dkon brtsegs): mir gyur pa yi skad ni mtha' yas pa// kun na de yi sgra rnams sna tshogs pa// dbyangs 'di thos nas rjes su rtogs par gyur// sa bla dang ni de bzhin par snang lha// de dag ci 'dra'i skad la 'jug pa ltar
55a3(dkon brtsegs): de phyir thub dbang dbyangs ni rab zhugs te/ / rnam par nges thos mya ngan 'das reg 'gyur// rkang gnyis dag dang rkang bzhi rnams dang ni// rkang mangs ngag dang rkang pa med pa rnams// thams cad la ni de yi sgra
55a4(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs 'jug/ bskul nas rab tu 'chos shing tshar bcod byed// stong gsum 'di yi sgra rnams ji snyed pa// tha ma dang ni 'bring dang de bzhin rab // de dag rjes su 'jug dbyangs de sgrog ste/
55a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i sems can thar pa reg par byed// rtog pa med cing rnam par mi rtog ste// gzung ba dang ni bcings las byung ma yin// mnyam par gzhag pas 'phags pa'i bden pa 'chad//
55a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thos nas nyon mongs zhi bar byed// sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin dge 'dun sgra// sbyin thos de bzhin tshul khrims bzod pa dag/ mtha' yas sgra ni sems can thos byed de// de bzhin
55a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni de 'dra'o/ / dbyangs kyang mtha' yas ye shes mtha' yas pa// de yi dbyangs kyi tshad ni yod med de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mkhas dad cing // de bzhin
55b1(dkon brtsegs): bshegs pa'i dbyangs la the tsom med/ shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa la
55b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ the tsom mi za// thos nas rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed ce na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu chos thams cad la de bzhin
55b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i chags pa med pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas/ dad pas ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do//
55b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te/ khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o// shA ri'i bu yongs su brtag pa gzung ste/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
55b5(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi rtswa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / chung ngu na sor bzhi'i tshad tsam yan chad ji snyed yod pa/ skyes bu la la zhig gis de dag gcig tu spangs te/
55b6(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu spungs nas mes bsregs te/ tshig par gyur nas thal bar byas so// thal bar byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rgya mtsho chen po gang na yod pa de dag tu blugs te/
55b7(dkon brtsegs): lo stong du dkrugs kyang / shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes de dang ldan pas rgya mtsho chen po de dang de dag
56a1(dkon brtsegs): nas thal ba de blangs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dang de dag tu 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig gi shing 'di 'dra ba zhig gi thal ba'o// 'di ni 'dzi rten gyi khams
56a2(dkon brtsegs): ge mo zhig gi shing che ge mo zhig gi rtsa ba dang / che ge mo zhig gi sdong po dang / che ge mo zhig gi yal ga dang / che ge mo zhig gi lo ma dang / che ge mo zhig gi 'bras bu'i thal ba'o// 'di ni phyogs che ge mo
56a3(dkon brtsegs): zhig gi 'dab ma 'di 'dra ba zhig gi thal ba'o zhes rab tu 'byed do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs te/ de rab tu rtogs nas de bzhin gshegs
56a4(dkon brtsegs): pas 'di ltar 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig gi thal ba'o zhes rab tu mkhyen pa nas rgyas par byas te/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
56a5(dkon brtsegs): ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul cha'o/ / de ltar mthu che'o// 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa ste/ shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di la dang / yid ches rab
56a6(dkon brtsegs): tu rtog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa byams pas yid la byed pa de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i mtha' mthob ba sdug bsngal thar 'byin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin
56a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas chos kyi dbying shin tu rtogs te/ de shin tu rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sems bskyed pa gcig kyang chud mi za'o// shA ri'i bu khyod la dper bya ste/
56b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di la skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig dpes bshad pa'i don rnams kun shes te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na shA ri'i bu skyes bu la la tshe lo brgya pa/ lo brgyar 'tsho ba zhig gis skra'i rtse mo bye ba brgyar btsal bas
56b2(dkon brtsegs): chu'i thigs pa blangs te/ nga gang na ba der 'ongs nas phyin pa dang / 'di skad ces kye go'u ta ma bdag gi chu'i thigs pa 'di khyod la gtams kyis/ nam bdag la dgos par gyur pa de na slar byin cig
56b3(dkon brtsegs): ces zer ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas de blangs te/ rgya mtsho chen por bor nas/ de chu'i rgyun gyis bdas te 'dres nas lhan cig tu mthar gyis rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so// de nas skyes bu tshe lo
56b4(dkon brtsegs): brgya pa de lo brgya lon pa dang / nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas 'di skad ces/ go'u ta ma bdag gi chu'i thigs pa de dgos kyis/ bdag la byin cig ces zer na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
56b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yod de/ ye shes de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sgra'i rtse mo bye ba brgyar btsal bas chu'i
56b6(dkon brtsegs): thigs pa de rgya mtsho chen po de nas chu gzhan dang ma 'dres par blangs te/ skyes bu de la slar byin no// shA ri'i bu 'di ltar don shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dper bstan te/ de gang gi don du blta/
56b7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu skyes bu'i chu'i thigs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i lag tu bzhag pa yun ring po zhig lon yang chud mi za ba de bzhin du/ shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
57a1(dkon brtsegs): mo gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu la dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs cing / de bzhin gshegs pa byams pas yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
57a2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid la dmigs nas/ de'i phyir nam mkha' la me tog 'thor ba de dag thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i mtha' ma thob par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na// 'di ltar
57a3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs te/ de rab tu rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sems gatshig bskyed pa'ang chud mi za'o// de nas
57a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gang rnam par shes pa ma mchis par
57a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ni ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das ye shes ni gang lags/ rnam par shes pa ni gang lags/ shA ri'i bu 'di bzhi ni rnam par shes pa'i
57a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas te/ rnam par shes pa de la gnas so// 'di lta ste/ rnam par shes pa gzugs la nye bar song zhing gnas/ gzugs la dmigs/ gzugs la gnas/ dga' ba la brten pas skye zhing
57a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phel te rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa tshor ba la nye bar song zhing gnas// tshor ba la dmigs/ tshor ba la gnas/ dga' ba la brten pas skye zhing 'phel te rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /
57b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa 'du shes la nye bar song zhing gnas/ 'du shes la dmigs/ 'du shes la gnas/ dga' ba la brten pas skye zhing 'phel te rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa 'du byed
57b2(dkon brtsegs): la nye bar song zhing gnas/ 'du byed la dmigs/ 'du byed la gnas/ dga' ba la brten pas skye zhing 'phel nas rgyas par 'gyur te// shA ri'i bu 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang len
57b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phung po lnga' mi gnas par rnam par shes pa'i phung po yongs su shes pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o/ / gzhan yang rnam par shes pa ni sa'i khams rnam par shes pa dang / chu'i khams dang
57b4(dkon brtsegs): me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams rnam par shes pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang khams bzhi la mi gnas par rnam par shes pa'i chos kyi khams kun
57b5(dkon brtsegs): tu dbye ba shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni gang mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnam par rig pa dang / rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra rnam
57b6(dkon brtsegs): par rig pa dang / snas shes par bya ba'i dri rnam par rig pa dang / lces shes par bya ba'i ro rnam par rig pa dang / sus kyi shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnam par rig pa dang / yid kyis shes par
57b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i chos rnam par rig pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gar nang nye bar zhi zhing phyi rol tu mi rgyu ste// ye shes kyi phyir 'brang zhing chos gang la'ang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ni ye
58a1(dkon brtsegs): shes zhes bya'o/ / rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa las skye'o// rnam par shes pa ni yid la byed pa las skye'o// rnam par shes pa ni yongs su rtog pa las skye ste/
58a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang 'dzin pa med par snyems pa dang / dmigs pa med rnam par rig pa med cing rtog pa med pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i
