58a3(dkon brtsegs): chos la rnam par shes pa gnas shing / gang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos rnam par shes pa de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'dus ma byas la ni rnam par shes pa rgyu ba med de/ gang 'dus ma
58a4(dkon brtsegs): byas shes pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o/ / gzhan yang gang skye ba dang 'jig pa la rab tu gnas pa de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa la gnas pa de ni ye
58a5(dkon brtsegs): shes zhes bya'o/ / de ltar shA ri'i bu 'di ni rnam par shes pa/ 'di ni ye shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab
58a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ the tsom mi za// rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das
58a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// ji ltar gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dpag med pa// de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi rtswa rnams ni//
58b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag skyes bu la las mer bsregs thal bar byas// lo ni brgya stong dag tu rgya mtshor dkrugs pa rnams// de 'dra ba yi stobs bcu'i ye shes phra mnga' bas// thal ba blangs nas 'gro ba dag la
58b2(dkon brtsegs): lung ston pa/ / zhing rnams rab 'byam dag gi shing rigs 'di// de tshig thal ba 'di zhes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen// 'di ltar phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten khams kyi rdul// thams cad rdul
58b3(dkon brtsegs): du byas nas rgyal ba rnams ston te/ / de dag thams cad bgrang yang chags meng the tsom med// de ltar bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes nam mkha' bzhin// ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba rnams kyi
58b4(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rgyud/ / gang dag 'dod chags spyod dang zhe sdang gti mug ldan// spyod pa kun gyi tshul shes bsam pa rnams dang ni// gang gis blo nyams gang gis thar par 'gyur ba mkhyen// 'jig
58b5(dkon brtsegs): rten kun mchog stobs bcu rnams kyi ye shes ni/ / ji snyed phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings su rab zhugs kyang // 'dren pa rnams la rtog dang rnam par rtog mi 'byung // bder gshegs sras
58b6(dkon brtsegs): po dang pa rgyal la dad par byed/ / // bam po bzhi pa// shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin
58b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed cing / ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed ce na/
59a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs te/ de rab tu rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
59a2(dkon brtsegs): khams 'dir mngon par gshegs nas lham ma lhan ne lhang nger mdzad do/ / de 'di lta ste/ dper na sprin med pa'i nam mkha' la nyi ma mngon par shar nas lham me lhan ne lhang nge ba de bzhin du
59a3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mngon par gshegs nas lham ma
59a4(dkon brtsegs): lhan ne lhang nger mdzad do/ / shA ri'i bu srin bu me khyer gyi 'od de bas ni/ gang 'bru mar gyi mar ma'i 'od 'di shin tu 'phags/ shin tu mchog/ shin tu kha dog dang ldan/ shin tu 'od gsal
59a5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rgya che'o/ / 'bru mar gyi mar me'i 'od de bas ni/ rtsig pa chen po'i 'od 'di shin tu 'phags/ shin tu mchog pa nas/ shin tu rgya che ba'i bar du'o// gang rtsig pa chen po'i 'od de bas ni/
59a6(dkon brtsegs): me'i phung po chen po'i 'od gang yin pa dang / sman dang skar ma'i 'od gang yin pa'i bar du rgyas par byas te/ zla ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnam
59a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'od dang / gzhal med khang dang / lus kyi rgyan rnams dang / de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan
59b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang dang / lus kyi rgyan rnams dang / gang tshangs pa rnams dang / tshangs ris pa rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang
59b2(dkon brtsegs): tshangs 'khor ba rnams dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang dang / lus kyi rgyan rnams kyi 'od 'di shin tu 'phags/ shin tu bzang / shin tu mchog/ shin tu kha dog dang
59b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan/ shin tu 'ong gsal/ shin tu rgya che'o// gang tshangs pa rnams dang / tshangs ris pa rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs 'khor pa rnams dang / tshangs chen gyi lha
59b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi 'od kyang rgyas par bya ste/ 'od chen dang / 'ong chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal nas/ dge rgyas kyi bar dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes can dang / 'du shes
59b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong gi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang dang / lus kyi 'od dang / gang 'og min gyi lha rnams
59b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang rnams dang / lus kyi 'od 'di shin tu 'phags/ shin tu bzang / shin tu mchog/ shin tu kha dog dang ldan/ shin tu 'od gsal// shin tu rgya che'o// gang
59b7(dkon brtsegs): 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang rnams dang / lus kyi 'ong bas ni/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od 'di shin tu
60a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags/ shin tu bzang / shin tu mchog/ shin tu kha dog dang ldan/ shin tu 'od gsal/ shin tu rgya che'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin
60a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang / shes rab dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
60a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro/ / de ltar shA ri'i bu ji tsam stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'ong du gdags pas btags pa de thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
60a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de 'di lta ste/ dper na shA ri'i bu 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi nang du gser tha mal pa gzhag na/ snag tsha'i gar bu
60a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'gyur te/ lham mer mi 'gyur/ lhan ner mi 'gyur/ lhang nger mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'od du gdags pas btags
60a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ji snyed yod pa de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi mdun na lham mer mi 'gyur/ lhan ner mi 'gyur/ lhang nger mi 'gyur/ 'od gsal bar mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ni
60a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi nang na mchog ces bya/ dam pa zhes bya/ bla na med pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi tshe ba'i 'od las kyi rnam par smin pa las mngon par grub pa'i 'od des kyang / stong
60b1(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas shin tu khyab par gyur te/ shA ri'i bu zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od kyi snang ba'ang mi 'byung / nyin mor yang mi shes/ mtshan mor yang mi shes/ zla ba phyed pa
60b2(dkon brtsegs): dang zla ba gcig par yang mi shes/ dus dang lor yang mi shes mod kyi/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ 'od 'dom gang tsam du byin gyis rlob ste/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin
60b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhed na/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'od kyis khyab par mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni shes
60b4(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu don de nyid rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan to// shA ri'i bu skyes bu la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen
60b5(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul ji snyed pa thams cad rdul phra rab tu byas nas/ rdul de dag thu bar blugs te shar phyogs su song nas/ rdul phra mo ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/
60b6(dkon brtsegs): rdul phra rab gnyis bor zhing shar phyogs su song na/ shA ri'i bu rdul phra rab de thams cad ni zad par 'gyur gyi/ shA ri'i bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni zad pa med pa'o// de bzhin du
60b7(dkon brtsegs): lho dang / nub dang / byang nas phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du'o// shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi mtha' dang mu gzung bar nus sam gsol pa/ bcom ldan
61a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ni mi nus so/ / bde bar gshegs pa de ni mi nus so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
61a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhed na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad 'od kyis khyab par mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ji tsam 'ong du gdags pas btags pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi mdun
61a3(dkon brtsegs): na brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du mi bzod de// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i
61a4(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od la ni rtsig pa 'am/ shing ngam/ ljon pa 'am/ khor yug gi ri 'am/ khor yug chen po 'am/ ri spos kyi ngang ldan pa 'am/ ri btang
61a5(dkon brtsegs): bzung ngam/ ri btang bzung chen po 'am/ gangs ri 'am/ ri gnya' shing 'dzin tam/ de ma yin pa gzhan ri nag po 'am/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / gang gis kyang sgrib par mi nus te/ de dag
61a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las thal nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par byas kyang / dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams mos par mi 'gyur te/ de la sems can la las
61a7(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od 'dom gang tsam du mthong ngo / / gang de bas rgya che ba de dag gis ni 'od 'dom do tsam du mthong ngo // gang de bas shin tu rgya che ba de dag gis ni 'od rgyang grags tsam du mthong ban/
61b1(dkon brtsegs): gang de bas kyang shin tu rgya chen pos ni 'od stong gsum gyi stong chen po tsam gyi bar du mthong ste/ de ltar shA ri'i bu stong phrag brgya pa'i tshangs pas ni 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya'i bar du 'ong
61b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis khyab par mthong steng rgyas par byas so/ / sa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa'i bar du khyab par mthong ngo // de ltar shA ri'i bu nam mtha'i
61b3(dkon brtsegs): khams ji tsam pa sems can gyi khams kyang de tsam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ de tsam du 'od kyis khyab par mdzad do// de byang chub sems dpas thos nas the
61b4(dkon brtsegs): tsom med/ som nyi mi za/ mngon par dad / yid ches rab tu rtog/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do// 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te//
61b5(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya'o// nyi ma zla ba'i 'od gang dang // brgya byin tshangs 'od gang yod dang // 'og min bar gyi 'od rnams kyis// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// 'og min gyi ni 'od rnams dang /
61b6(dkon brtsegs): gang rnams stong gsum khyab gyur pas// sangs rgyas spu yi 'od zer gyi// bcu drug char yang mi phod ngo // nam mkha' dag ni ji tsam par// de tsam 'od kyis khyab byed pa// blo gros rgya chen
61b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyis/ / de 'dra bar ni 'ong mthong ngo // sangs rgyas 'od ni mtha' yas te// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs mnyam pa// ji ltar 'dul bar 'gyur rnams kyi// de 'dra bar ni 'ong mthong
62a1(dkon brtsegs): / / ji ltar skyes bu dmus long gis// nyi ma'i zer ni de 'dra ba// ma mthong bas ni 'od de la// 'od ni yod pa min zhes smra// de bzhin sems can dman pa dang
62a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i 'od ni mi mthong ste/ / ma mthong bas na rgyal ba yi// 'od ni yod pa min zhes zer// la las 'dom ngo tsam du mthong // la las rgyang grags dpag tshad dang // la las
62a3(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum thams cad du/ / 'od kyis khyab par gyur pa mthong // sa brgyad pa dang dgu pa dang // bcu pa la ni gang gnas pa// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab che// sa chen la ni gang
62a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa/ / de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od// mtha' yas dkyil 'khor 'jug byed cing // bsam yas sangs rgyas zhing rnams su// sangs rgyas dag gi bya ba byed// de ltar sangs rgya
62a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam yas te/ / sangs rgyas 'od zer bsam mi khyad// bsam mi khyab la dang byas na// bsod nams phung po bsam mi khyad// yang shA ri'i bu ji ltar na de bzhin
62a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ the tsom mi za// rgya cher dga' mgu sta rangs pa rnyed nas/
62a7(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang // yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas
62b1(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed ce na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar yang dag par smra bas smra ba/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i sems can 'jig rten du byung ste/ lus kyi las yongs su dag
62b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi las yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi las yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa 'jig rten du byung zhing skyes nas 'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma gos pa/ bram ze sdig pa spang/
62b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ dge sbyong zhi ba bsam gtan pa'i mchog/ ting nge 'dzin dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i sems can 'jig rten du byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa yin par yang dag par nga smra bas smra'o// de ci'i phyir
62b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ shA ri'i bu lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / dge sbyong du bcas pa dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang /
62b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ltar/ tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su dag pa tshad med pa de lta
62b6(dkon brtsegs): bud+ma ma mthong ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'o// shA ri'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs
62b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa'i dpe tsam nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar dge slong dag la/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin
63a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te dpe tsam bshad na/ bcom ldan 'das las ji skad thos pa de bzhin du 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus ni 'di 'gas so//
63a2(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa de'i dus ni 'di lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ sems can gyi khams dang sa'i khams gang mang / gsol pa/
63a3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams ni rab tu mang gi/ sa'i khams ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa
63a4(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin no/ / shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu sems can gyi khams rab tu mang gi/ sa'i khams ni ma yin no// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
63a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can ji snyed sgo nga las skyes pa 'am/ / mngal nas skyes pa 'am/ drod gsher las skyes pa 'am/ rdzus te skyes pa 'am/ gzugs can nam/ gzugs med pa 'am/ 'du shes
63a6(dkon brtsegs): can nam/ 'du shes med pa 'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi sems can rnams ji tsam sems can du gdags pas btags pa de thams cad yongs su brtag pa gzung ste/ skad cig thang
63a7(dkon brtsegs): cig yud tsam cig gis snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ shA ri'i bu mir gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis snga phyi med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
63b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cing yongs su brtag pa gzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang de bzhin gsheg pa de dag jisnyad pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par
63b2(dkon brtsegs): sprul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la'ang dbu stong stong du gyur/ dbu re re la'ang zhal stong stong du gyur/ zhal re re la'ang ljags stong stong du gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad stobs bcu
63b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gyur/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / chags pa med pa// sgrib pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan par gyur
63b4(dkon brtsegs): la/ shA ri'i bu de ltar de lta bu de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsngags pa brjod kyang
63b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po ni de 'dra ste/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po'ang mi zad/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi shes rab dang spongs pa bla
63b6(dkon brtsegs): na med pa'ang mi zad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad de'i bar du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung
63b7(dkon brtsegs): po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi shes rab dang spobs pa bla na med pa dang / de gnyis ni tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs so//
64a1(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta zhog la/ shA ri'i bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji
64a2(dkon brtsegs): snyed pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du phyogs mtshams dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems
64a3(dkon brtsegs): can de dag thams cad skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis mi'i lus thob par gyur pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa'i bar du
64a4(dkon brtsegs): gong ma bzhin du rgyas par byas te/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi shes rab dang spobs pa bla na med pa dang / de gnyis
64a5(dkon brtsegs): tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs te/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'o//
64a6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dpe tsam du bya ba nyid par 'dod dang/ gsol pa/ 'di ltar dge slong rnams/ bcom ldan 'das
64a7(dkon brtsegs): las thos nas de bzhin du 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus 'di lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshod 'di lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
64b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de'i dus de'i tshong 'byung ste/ nyi ma bdun 'jig rten du byung bar gyur nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing
64b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa de'i sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam
64b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ sa phyogs de lag mthil ltar mnyam par 'gyur te/ sa phyogs de ngo mtshar
64b4(dkon brtsegs): dang rmad kyi chos dang po 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa der sa phyogs
64b5(dkon brtsegs): gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gar/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sar/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs de gseg ma dang gyo mo med cing mtho bar gyur pa'i gzugs su gyur te/ sa phyogs de
64b6(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu
64b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas 'tshig pa der/ sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sar// mnal ba'i sa phyogs de de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su longs spod
65a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir yangs shing mnyam par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bus phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos gsum pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khabs
65a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bar kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas/ 'tshig pa der sa phyogs gang da de bzhir gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sa pa/ bzhugs sam/ mnal
65a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sa phyogs der rtswa sngo ba/ 'khyil ba/ 'jam pa/ g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba/ ka tsa lin di ltar reg na bde ba/ dri rab tu zhim pa skye bar gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi
65a4(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'tshig
65a5(dkon brtsegs): pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gapa/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu grang ba/ yang ba/ 'jam pa ngang ba/
65a6(dkon brtsegs): rnyog pa med pa/ rab tu dang ba/ 'thung 'dod pa/ mang du 'thungs kyang nad du mi 'gyur ba dang / yan lag 'di brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar nga
65a7(dkon brtsegs): rbad kyi chos lnga pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas/ 'tshig pa
65b1(dkon brtsegs): @der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sapa/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas rab tu bsil ba'i rlung
65b2(dkon brtsegs): ldang ba de 'di lta ste/ dper na shA ri'i bu sos ka'i mtha' ma'i zla ba tsha bas gdungs pa'i dus na skyes bu la la zhig gang+gA'i klung du zhugs nas lus bsil bar byas te/ rims dang snyoms pa thams
65b3(dkon brtsegs): rkyatud zhi bar byas nas/ gang+gA'i klung nas byung zhing slar byang nas// 'chag cing 'gro ba las da t+yang yang mi ring ba zhig na nags stug po yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma grib ma stug po dang ldan pa chen
65b4(dkon brtsegs): po zhig mthong nas/ de nags stug po gang na yod pa der song ste phyin pa dang / nags stug po'i dbus na khri'i steng du phyar bu bting ba be'u ras kyis g.yogs pa/ ka tsa lir da'i gding ba bting ba'i steng
65b5(dkon brtsegs): dar gyis g.yogs pa/ ya thog ma thog tu sngas dmar po bshams pa zhig mthong nas/ de de la 'dug go/ de de la 'dug ste/ 'greng zhing phyogs bzhir kur nas bsil ba'i rlung ldang bar 'gyur
65b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs der bsil ba'i rlung ldang bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos drug pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig
65b7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas/ 'tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/
66a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der chu las skyes pa'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar po skye bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de b
66a2(dkon brtsegs): atshar dang rmad kyi chos bdun pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur
66a3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ 'tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der thang las skyes pa'i me tog 'di lta ste/ a ti bug tu
66a4(dkon brtsegs): ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / snga ma'i me tog dang / ba ri sha ka dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / skya sngar dang / dong ka'i me tog dang / ta ra ni dang / go ta ra ni la sogs pa thang las skyes pa'i re
66a5(dkon brtsegs): tog sna tshogs kha dog dang ldan pa/ dri dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos brgyad pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi
66a6(dkon brtsegs): khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas/ 'tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sapa
66a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs de sra zhing mi shigs pa sa gzhi rdo rjer 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos dgu pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu
66b1(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lam me/ rab tu las me/ kun tu rab tu kham me 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas/ 'chi
66b2(dkon brtsegs): pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs de ltar bcas pa'i 'jig
66b3(dkon brtsegs): rten dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du
66b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu po 'di dang ldan par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ni ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu po de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
66b5(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings shin tu rtogs te/ de rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji
66b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems la gcig tu bde bar so sor yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du
66b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su 'bri ba med par ngas bshad do// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms gcig gis bskal par gnas sam/
67a1(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa stong phrag brgya'ab/ bskal pa bye ba 'am/ bskal pa bye ba brgya'ang/ bskal pa bye ba stong ngam/ bskal pa bye
67a2(dkon brtsegs): ba stong phrag brgya'am/ / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang bzhugs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
67a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ni pha rol tu phyin pa mchog gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che/ de ltar mthu che/ de ltar dbang che bar grags pa'o// 'di lta ste/
67a4(dkon brtsegs): dper na shA ri'i bu 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha'i nang du lha'i bu skyes pa de dmigs pa gcig la gnas pa'i rnam par shes pas bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'dug ste/
67a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gyis tshe'i mtha' 'chi ba'i dus ma byas kyi bar du rnab par shes pa de las rnam par shes pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du shA ri'i bu gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas bla
67a6(dkon brtsegs): named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi nub mo phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das
67a7(dkon brtsegs): bde'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin las nyams pa med/ sems 'gyur ba med/ sems rgyu ba med/ sems rnam par rgyu ba med/ sems rab tu rgyud med/ sems rgyas pa med/ sems
67b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'dren pa med/ sems g.yeng ba med/ sems mtho ba med/ sems dpa' ba med/ sems kun tu srung ba med/ sems sbed pa med/ sems tshim pa med/ sems mi mthun pa med/ sems
67b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dud pa med/ sems g.yo ba med/ sems rab tu dga' bar byed pa med/ sems zhum pa med/ sems rtog pa med/ sems rnam par rtog pa med/ sems yongs su rtog pa med/ sems kyi rjes
67b3(dkon brtsegs): su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa med/ sems mig la gnas pa med/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas pa med/ gzugs la gnas pa med/ sems sgra dang / dri dang /
67b4(dkon brtsegs): ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la gnas pa med/ sems chos la 'jug pa med/ sems rnam par shes pa la 'jug pa med/ sems 'das pa'ang mi lta/ sems ma 'ongs pa la'ang mi lta/ sems
67b5(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba la'ang mi lta ste/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ sems las chos gang yang bsal ba med
67b6(dkon brtsegs): moyod kyi/ lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad la thog pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go// 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems dang / yid dang / rnam
67b7(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa dang bral mod kyi/ gnas kyang mi 'dor te/ lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad kyang mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
68a1(dkon brtsegs): stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ stor pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo // bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med cing gzhal yas par/ sngon gyi srid pa'i 'gro
68a2(dkon brtsegs): par byang chub spod spad tshe/ tshul khrims dang ni thos dang ting nge 'dzin pag yod dang / bzod pa dag kyang byang chub mchog phyir 'dren pas bsgoms// rgyal ba'i rtog dang 'bras bu dge ba 'di 'dra bas//
68a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims shin tu yongs dag 'jig rten kun gyi mchog/ ji ltar nam mkha' dri med rnam dag spos med ltar// stobs bcu'i tshul khrims dri med nam mkha' bzhin// gang gi nub me rgyal
68a4(dkon brtsegs): bas dang por byang chub rtogs/ / gang gi nub mo tha mar mya ngan 'das gshegs tshe// stobs bcu rnams la sems rgyu rab tu rgyu ba med// de bzhin bsam gtan ting 'dzin nyams pa nam yang
68a5(dkon brtsegs): med/ / stobs bcu rnams kyi tshul khrims phung po nyams med de// rdzu 'phrul stobs dang rnam thar nyams pa'i char 'gyur med// bskal pa brgya phrag stong du sems ni gcig gis gnas//
68a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dred pa la ni rtog dang rnam par rtog pa med// 'dren pa rnams kyi rnam rtog spyod yul nam mkha' 'dra// dus gsum dag la sangs rgyas ye shes thogs med 'jug/ stobs bcu rnams la
68a7(dkon brtsegs): sems yid rnam par rgyu ba dang / rtog dang gtong ba med par sangs rgyas sras rnams dang / de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs
68b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi nga/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang sdad du 'du shes
68b2(dkon brtsegs): skyed do/ / shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu
68b3(dkon brtsegs): tog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed ce na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
68b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyis/ 'di skad du gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni nga'i nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba'i nang na mchog go zhes gsungs te/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul de la
68b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam zhing yongs su dpyod/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul la'ang 'jam zhing yongs su dpyod do// gzhal te yongs su dpyad nas byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang mtshungs shing mnyam par ma
68b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo / / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul la'ang 'jal cing yongs su dpyad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul la 'jal zhing yongs su dpyad do// gzhal te yongs su dpyad nas de bzhin
68b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang mtshungs shing mnyam par ma mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo snyam nas//
69a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir rgya cher brtson 'grus rtsom po// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul las brtsams te dpe tsam du bya ba de
69a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa las khyod nyan par 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus 'di lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshod lags so// 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshes
69a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rdzu 'phrul las brtsams te dpe bshad na/ dge slong rnams bcom lngas 'das las de thos nas/ de bzhin du 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir shA ri'i bu legs
69a4(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do/ / bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal
69a5(dkon brtsegs): to/ / shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ dge slong nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba'i nang na 'di ltar gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni mchog
69a6(dkon brtsegs): go zhes/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du thos te mngon sum du bzung ngo // bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyan thos rdzu 'phrul
69a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po mo'u 'gal gyi bu lta bus 'di lta ste/ dper na bu ram shing gi shing stug po'am/ 'dam bu stug po'am/ 'od ma stug po 'am/ til gyi zhing ngam/ 'bras kyi zhing bzhin du gang bar gyur la/ de ltar gci
69b1(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dus pa'i nyan thos kyi tshogs de lta bus mthu dang / brtson 'grus thams cad dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi stobs thams cad bstan kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul gyi brgya'i char yang
69b2(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gro/ stong gi char yang / brgya stong gi char yang / bye ba'i char yang / bye ba brgya'i char yang / bye ba stong gi char yang / bye ba brgya stong gi char yang / grangs su 'ang / char yang / bgrang bar yang / dper
69b3(dkon brtsegs): yang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul gyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'o// shA ri'i
69b4(dkon brtsegs): bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas sa 'di la yungs kar gyi 'bru gcig gzhag na/ de bzhin gshegs pas yungs kar gyi 'bru bzhag pa de'ang / de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad kyis mthu dang /
69b5(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / drag shul thams cad dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi stobs thams cad bstan kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas bzhag pa'i yungs kar gyi 'bru skra'i rtse mo gcig tsam yang
69b6(dkon brtsegs): skyospyod par mi nus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'o// shA ri'i bu
69b7(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lta zhog la/ shA ri'i bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed yod pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang
70a1(dkon brtsegs): @#dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi byes skyed na sems can ji tsam skong las skyes pa'am/ mngal nas skyes pa
70a2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi bar gyi se mra can de dag thams cad yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na mo'u 'gal gyi khyer po lta bur gyur la/ shA ri'i bu de
70a3(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad kyis stobs dang / mthu dang / drag shul thams cad dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi stobs thams cad bstan kyang / yungs 'bru tsam yang gdeg par mi nus
70a4(dkon brtsegs): te/ tha na skra'i rtse mo cha tsam yang spyod par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu sor pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni de
70a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar rdzu 'phrul che/ de ltar mthu che/ de ltar dbang che bar grags pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis nam 'jig
70a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bskal pa'i dus kyi tsher gyur pa de na kun tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/ rlung de langs pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / ri khor yug gi ri dang /
70a7(dkon brtsegs): khor yug ki ri chen po dang / gling chen po bzhi dang / gling brgyad khri dang / ri chen po dang / rgya mtsho chen po'ang dpag tshad sring du mngon par 'pher cing rab tu 'thor bar 'gyur ba khyod kyis thos sam/ gsol pa/
70b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du thos te/ mngon sum du bzung ngo // bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu nam 'jig pa'i rlung phyung den pa kun tu 'joms pa chen po zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/ stong
70b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong cher po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ri rab dang bcas/ khor yug dang bcas/ ri dang bcas/ rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dpag tshad brgyar mngon par 'phen cing rab tu 'thor/ dpag tshad nyis ba
70b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / dpag tshad sum brgya dang / dpag tshad bzhi brgya dang / dpag tshad lnga brgya dang / dpag tshad stong dang / dpag tshad nyis stong dang / sum stong dang / bzhi stong dang / lnga stong du mngon par 'phen cing rab tu
70b4(dkon brtsegs): 'thor/ dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po dang / dpag tshad stong phrag mang po dang / dpag tshad brgya stong phrag mang por mngon par 'phen cing rab tu 'thor te/ de dag gi rdul yang mi snang na/ ri dang rdo rnams lta ci
70b5(dkon brtsegs): smos/ 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang rnams kyang dkrugs bcom rab tu gtor te/ de dag gi rdul yang mi snang na/ gzhal med khang rnams lta ci smos/ dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul
70b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bdud kyi ris rnams dang / tshangs pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi bar du de bzhin du rgyas
70b7(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ / ji ltar 'thab bral gyi dkrugs bcom rab tu gtor te/ dkrugs bcom rab tu gtor ba de dag gi rdul yang mi snang na/ gzhal med khang dang ra ba rnams lta ci smos/ shA ri'i bu
71a1(dkon brtsegs): gal te de lta bu'i rlung langs kyang / des de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi mtha' ma'i rtse mo tsam yang g.yos par mi nus na/ chos gos sam/ chos gos kyi grwa lta dri sdog
71a2(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spyod lam dang / bsam gyis mi
71a3(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa'i lam dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan no// shA ri'i bu gal te 'di lta bu'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang /
71a4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs mtshams dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rlung mngon par ldang yang / shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par byed pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor de de
71a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhir gshegs pa'i sor mo'i rtse mos bzlog kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul gyi stobs bri ba'ang med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin
71a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dad / yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar
71a7(dkon brtsegs): dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// khams gsum sems can ji snyed
71b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ / gnas brtan mo'u 'gal bu bzhin du// rdzu 'phrul pha rol byin pa yi// nyan thos mkhas par kun gyur pas// rdzu 'phrul thams cad rab bstan kyang // de bzhin gshegs pas sa 'di la/ yungs
71b2(dkon brtsegs): kar gyi ni 'bru bzhag pa/ / g.yo bar bya bar mi nus so// gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams// gang+gA'i yi ni bye ma snyed// rnam 'thor rlung dang kun 'joms pa// rlung rnams phyogs bcur
71b3(dkon brtsegs): langs par gyur/ / de lta bu yi rlung chen des// thams cad gzigs pa'i chos gos kyi// mtha' ma skra yi rtse tsam yang // g.yo bar bya bar mi nus so// thub pa chen po spu gcig gis// rlung de rab tu
71b4(dkon brtsegs): zlog par mdzad/ / sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'di 'dra ba// mtha' yas pa ni nam mkha' bzhin// de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu
71b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / / yid ches pa nas ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do// yang shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa
71b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad
71b7(dkon brtsegs): du 'du shes skyed ce na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ stobs de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gnas su
72a1(dkon brtsegs): dam 'cha' zhing dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor
72a2(dkon brtsegs): ro/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa du ma dang sos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
72a3(dkon brtsegs): khams du ma dang khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyi rim pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / bsam gtan
72a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa
72a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so// shA ri'i bu de bzhin
72a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag ste/ stobs de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du yang dag par seng ge'i sgra sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ba nas/ sus kyang
72a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i bar du'o/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'dil
72b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas/ bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis gnas kyang gnas su// gnas ma yin pa'ang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu
72b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyer to/ / de la gnas gang / gnas ma yin pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu gang lus kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dod pa dang / sdug pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba mngon par 'grub pa ni
72b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas ma yin te skabs med de/ gang lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang / yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / mi dga' ba dang /
72b4(dkon brtsegs): yid du mi 'ong ba mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas te skabs yod do// gang lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang / ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa mi 'dod
72b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas ma yin te skabs med do// gang lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang / ngag gis legs par sdud pa dang / yid
72b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dod pa dang / sdug pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas ma yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs
72b7(dkon brtsegs): med de/ gang ser snas longs spyod chen po mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas ma yin no// gang ser snas dbul por 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/
73a1(dkon brtsegs): gang sbyin pas dngul por 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang sbyin pas longs spyod chen po mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu 'di ni gnas ma
73a2(dkon brtsegs): yin zhing skabs med de/ gang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis lha dang mir skye ba rnyed pa de ni gnas ma yin no// gang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /
73a3(dkon brtsegs): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang tshul khrims kyis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang
73a4(dkon brtsegs): kashin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ / gang tshul khrims kyis lha dang mir skye ba thob pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang gnod sems
73a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis gzugs mdzes pa mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas ma yin no/ / gang gnod sems kyis gzugs mi sdug pa mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin
73a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing skabs med de/ gang 'azod pas gzugs mi sdug pa mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas ma yin no// gang bzod pas gzugs mdzes pa mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri
73a7(dkon brtsegs): bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang le los 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang le los 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te/
73b1(dkon brtsegs): skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang brtson 'grus kyis 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing
73b2(dkon brtsegs): skabs med de/ gang sems g.yengs pas nges par gyur pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang sems g.yengs pas nges par gyur pa la mi 'jug pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i
73b3(dkon brtsegs): bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang sems rtse gcig pas nges par gyur pa la 'jug par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang sems rtse gcig pas nges par gyur pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba de ni//
73b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang 'chal pa'i shes rab kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa de ni gnas ma yin no//
73b5(dkon brtsegs): gang 'chal pa'i shes rab kyis bag chag kyi tsam sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang shes rab kyis
73b6(dkon brtsegs): bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ / gang shes rab kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa de
73b7(dkon brtsegs): deganas yin te skabs yod do/ / shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin ning nang med ge gang srog gcod pa'i skye bu gang zag srog gcod pa'i rgyus tshe rings por 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// yang shA ri'i bu srog gcod pa'i skyes
74a1(dkon brtsegs): bu gang zag tshe thung bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ / shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang srog gcod pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag tshe thung bar
74a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ / yang shA ri'i bu srog gcod pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag tshe ring por 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu ga nas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang
74a3(dkon brtsegs): ma byin par len pa'i skyes bu gang zag longs spyod chen po rnyed pa de ni gnas ma yin no/ / yang shA ri'i bu ma byin par ler ba'i skyes bu gang zag dbul por 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// yang shA
74a4(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag dbul por 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag longs spyod
74a5(dkon brtsegs): chen por 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ / shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa'i skyes bu gang zag chung ma 'gran zla med pa rnyed pa de ni gnas
74a6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no/ / gang shA ri'i bu 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa'i skyes bu gang zag chung ma 'gran zla yod pa rnyed pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang
74a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag chung ma 'gran zla dang bcas pa brnyed pa de ni gnas ma yin no/ / yang shA ri'i bu 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang
74b1(dkon brtsegs): zag chung ma 'gran bla med pa rnyed ma don gnas yin te skabs yod do/ / gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi lam gsum po de dag bstan pa de bzhin du mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
74b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la'ang bya'o/ / gang brdzun smra ba des skur pa 'thob par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gnas so// gang brdzun smra ba spangs pas skur pa 'thob par 'gyur
74b3(dkon brtsegs): bde ni gnas ma yin no/ / gang 'thob par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas so// gang bram ze rabs mi phyed pa'i g.yog rnyed pa de ni gnas ma yin no// gang rnyed par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas so// gang phra ma
74b4(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa'i g.yog byed par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ / gang g.yog mi byed pa rnyed pa de ni gnas so// gang tshig rtsub po smra bas rtag par yid du 'ong ba thos par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma
74b5(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / gang yid du mi 'ong ba thos par 'gyur ba de ni gnas so// gang tshig rtsub po spangs pas yid du mi 'ong ba thos par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang yid du 'ong ba thos par 'gyur
74b6(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni gnas so/ / gang tshig bkyal pa smra bas shin tu gdon mi za ba'i spobs par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas so// gang 'khyal par smra ba spangs pas shin tu
74b7(dkon brtsegs): gdon mi za ba'i spobs par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ / gang shin tu gdon mi za ba'i spobs par 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang brnab sems can longs spyod rab tu nyams par mi gyur
75a1(dkon brtsegs): ba ni gnas ma yin no/ / gang 'gyur ba de ni gnas so// gang brnab sems spangs pa longs spyod rab tu nyams par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang mi 'gyur ba ni gnas sa
75a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gnod sems can sems can dmyal bar mi 'gro ba ni gnas ma yin no/ / gang 'gro ba ni gnas so// gang gnod sems spangs pa bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du mi 'gro ba de ni gnas ma yin no//
75a3(dkon brtsegs): gang 'gro ba ni gnas so// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang log par lta ba'i skyes bu gang zag log par lta ba bzung ba'i rgyus la ma rnyed par 'gyur ba de'i gnas ma yin no// yang shA ri'i
75a4(dkon brtsegs): bu gang log par lta ba'i skyes bu gang zag log par lta ba bzung ba'i rgyus lam mi rnyed pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ / shA ri'i bu gang yang dag par lta ba'i skyes bu gang zag yang dag par lta ba bzung ba'i
75a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyus 'phags pa'i lam mi rnyed pa de ni gnas ma yin te skabs med do/ / yang shA ri'i bu yang dag par lta ba'i skyes bu gang zag yang dag par lta ba bzung ba'i rgyus 'phags pa'i lam rnyed pa de ni gnas
75a6(dkon brtsegs): yin te skabs yod do/ / gang mtshams med pa byed pa'i sems gnas par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas so// gang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i sems gnas par
75a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no/ / gang 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang dmigs par lta bas rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa 'thob pa de ni gnas ma yin no// gang 'thob par mi 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang
75b1(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid la mos pas rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa mi 'thob pa ni gnas ma yin no/ / gang 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gnas so// gang 'gyod pa la gnas pa'i sems shin tu byang ba rjes su 'thob par
75b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no/ / gang mi 'thob pa ni gnas so// kun tu dkris te 'dug pa'i sems la sems shin tu byang bar 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang mi 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang bud med
75b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no/ / gang skyes bu 'gyur pa ni gnas so// gang bud med lha'i dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang skyes bu 'gyur ba ni
75b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas so/ / gang bud med tshangs pa dbang byed du 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang skyes bu 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang bud med sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni gnas ma yin no//
75b5(dkon brtsegs): gang bud med kyi lus pasgyur nas sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni gnas so// gang skyes bu gang zag brgyad pa 'bras bu ma thob par ldang ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang 'bras bu thob nas
75b6(dkon brtsegs): ldang ba ni gnas so/ / gang rgyun du zhugs pa srid pa brgyad po mngon par sgrub pa ni gnas ma yin no// gang phung po de nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ni gnas so// gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba srid pa
75b7(dkon brtsegs): gsum po mngon par sgrub pa ni gnas ma yin ro/ / gang phung po de nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni gnas so// gang phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig rten 'dir 'ong ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang de nyid du yongs
76a1(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni gnas so/ / gang dgra bcom pa mtshams sbyor ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang mi 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang 'phags pa'i gang zag ston
76a2(dkon brtsegs): pa gzhan tshol ba'am/ rgyal mtshan gzhan bzung bas spyod pa ni gnas ma yin no// lha gzhan med par 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang mi skye ba la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phyir ldog pa ni
76a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas ma yin no/ / gang byang chub rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba ni gnas so// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
76a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs ma rgyas par ldang ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ / gang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas ldang ba de ni
76a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas yin te skabs yod do/ / shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba snang ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang yang sangs rgyas
76a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ / shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thogs par 'gyur ba de
76a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas ma yin te skabs med do/ / gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes thogs pa med pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang de
76b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor la las bltar mthong ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ / gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gtsug tor ba ltar mi mthong ba ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA
76b2(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems dang spyod pa snang ba ni gnas ma yin no// yang shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems dang spyod pa mi snang ba
76b3(dkon brtsegs): ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ / shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems dmigs par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no//
76b4(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyam par gzhag pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la mi bden
76b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig 'byung ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ / gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams log par mi gsung zhing gzhan ma yin par gsung ba ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma
76b6(dkon brtsegs): yin zhing skabs med de/ gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'khrul pa dmigs par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'khrul pa med de/ sangs
76b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshig mi 'khrul pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ / shA ri'i bu de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dren pa rnams kyang rgyas par byas te/ shA
77a1(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar byung ba'i dus la chags pa dang sgrib par bcas pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa'i bar du de ni
77a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas ma yin no/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar gyi dus la chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin
77a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas mu med do/ / de ltar shA ri'i bu de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha'
77a4(dkon brtsegs): yas mu med de/ shA ri'i bu gang nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi
77a5(dkon brtsegs): mthar 'dod do/ / byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ som yi med/
77a6(dkon brtsegs): the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs
77a7(dkon brtsegs): bas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo // ji ltar phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' tshad med mtha' yas pa/ de bzhin rgyal ba'i gnas dang gnas min mkhyen mtha' yas 'gro ba'i
77b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang gnas min de bzhin rab mkhyen nas/ ston pa chos mchog rgya chen yang dag rab tu 'chad// mi gang thar pa dag gi lam gyi snod gyur pa// ston pas de dag spyod pa mkhyen nas chos kyang
77b2(dkon brtsegs): 'chad/ / sems can gang dag snod du gyur pa ma yin pa// gnas dang gnas min rig nas de dag btang snyoms 'jog/ nam mkha' 'di g.yos sa la 'bras bu byung yang ni// bde bar
77b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas min gzhan mi 'gyur/ / 'jig rten pa las 'jig rten 'das pa stobs bcu ldan// yon tan mchog 'chang rnams kyi ye shes bsame mi khyab// shA ri'i bu 'di ni//
77b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang po ste/ stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor gyi nang du seng
77b5(dkon brtsegs): ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste/ khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che zhing / tshangs pa 'am/ brgya byin nam/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor
77b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar du'o/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs
77b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las len pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gnas pa dang / rgyu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// ji ltar
78a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen ce na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ gang 'das pa'i las len pa/ dge ba'i rgyu las
78a2(dkon brtsegs): byung ba/ mi dge ba dang bral ba/ gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge ba'i rgyu 'byin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang mi dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba/ dge ba dang bral ba/
78a3(dkon brtsegs): gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi dge ba'i rgyu 'byin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dman pa la rten par 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs
78a4(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu mkhyen to/ / las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na khyad par la rten par 'gyur pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na khyad par la rten la ma
78a5(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa'i dus na dman pa la rten par 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ / las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na dman pa la rten la/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyad par la rten par
78a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ / las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na'ang dman pa la rten la/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang dman pa la rten par 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas
78a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to/ / las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na'ang khyad par la rten la/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang khyad par la rten par 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len
78b1(dkon brtsegs): pab gang 'das pa'i dus na sbyor ba dman la/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sbyor ba rgya chen por 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang rtsom pa chung la khyad par chen por
78b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ / las len pa gang rtsom pa che la khyad par chung ngur 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang nyan thos su
78b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'byin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ / las len pa gang rang sangs rgyas kyi rgyu 'byin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang sangs rgyas
78b4(dkon brtsegs): su 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'byin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ / las len pa gang da ltar sdug bsngal la/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rnam par smin pa bde ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu chen
78b5(dkon brtsegs): to/ / las len pa gang da ltar bde la ma 'ongs pa na rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang da ltar yang sdug bsngal la/ ma 'ongs pa
78b6(dkon brtsegs): na'ang rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ / las len pa gang da ltar yang bde la/ ma 'ongs pa na'ang rnam par smin pa bde ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs
78b7(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu mkhyen to/ / 'di ltar shA ri'i bu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus na sems can thams cad kyi las gang dang / rgyu gang dang / rnam par smin pa gang de bzhin dang //
79a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / gzhan ma yin par rten pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
79a2(dkon brtsegs): chos ston to/ / de ltar na shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi las len pa'i rgyu gang yin/
79a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gnas gang yin pa dang / rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas mu med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na shA ri'i bu nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du/ shA ri'i
79a4(dkon brtsegs): bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i las rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs de'ang mtha' yas mu med do/ / shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
79a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis las rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi mtha' 'dod pa de dag nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do/ / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i las rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs
79a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyad
79a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ngo mtshar rmad du 'du shes skyed do/ / 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu dang smin la mkhas// spyan ldan las rnams
79b1(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi sgrub pa mkhyen/ / dus gsum la ni rgyal ba chags pa med// sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen// 'gro ba lnga yi sems can thams cad kyi// bde dang sdug bsngal rgyur
79b2(dkon brtsegs): ni gang 'gyur dang / / 'jug pa gang dag sdug bsngal rgyur 'gyur ba// de dag de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen// dkar gnag las rnams kyi ni rnam smin dang // rgyu dang rnam smin ji
79b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar 'gyur ba yang / / de dag de bzhin bde gshegs rab mkhyen te// phyag gi mthil na yid bzhin nor bu bzhin// las gang rnam smin chung ngu'i rgyu dag las// 'bras bu dag ni tshad med
79b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byin pa dang / / tshad med gang dag chung ngu'i rgyur 'gyur ba// de dag de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen// nyan thos nyid du 'bras bu smin 'gyur dang // rang rgyal byang chub rgyur ni
79b5(dkon brtsegs): gang 'gyur dang / / bla med ye shes stobs ni sbyin 'gyur ba// de dag ma lus bde gshegs rab tu mkhyen// las kyi rgyu gang sdug bsngal smin byed pa// de yang bde ba'i 'bras bu smin
79b6(dkon brtsegs): byed dang / / las kyi rgyu gang bde ba spyir byed pa// sdug bsngal 'bras bu bya ba thams cad mkhyen// sdug bsngal rgyus ni sdug bsngal nyid gnas dang // bde ba'i rgyus kyang bde ba nyid garas dang /
79b7(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rang bzhin rang bzhin pa yin pa// rgyu ldan 'di bar gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen// 'gro ba lnga yi sems can thams cad kyi// dus gsum sdug bsngal bgrong ba gang 'jug pa/
80a1(dkon brtsegs): nyams med de nyid de bzhin gzhan min par// sangs rgyas mkhyen brgyal pas ra tu mkhyen// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
80a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa ste/ stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing / dge slong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa gang gis kyang
80a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ / // bam po lnga pa/ gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
80a4(dkon brtsegs): pas mos pa du ma dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi mos pa du ma dang mos pa sna tshogs rnams yang dag pa ji lta/
80a5(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// skyes bu gang zag gang 'dod chags la gnas shing zhe sdang la mos pa'ang rgyas par bya ste/ gti mug la gnas shing zhe sdang la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas
80a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to/ / gang zag gang mi dge ba la gnas shing mi dge ba la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// gang zag gang dge ba la gnas shing dge ba la mos pa de dag
80a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / gang zag gang sbyor ba dman zhing rgya chen po la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu
80b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to/ / gang zag gang sbyor ba rgya che zhing dman po la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin ga she pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// gang zag gang sbyor ba dman zhing khyad par la gnas par 'gyur ba
80b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / mos pa gang gis khyab par la sbyor ba dman pa la gnas par 'gyur de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag
80b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / mos pa gang gis log pa nyid du nges pa'i khams thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa
80b4(dkon brtsegs): gang gis yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i khams thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / mos pa gang gis yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i rnam
80b5(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / mos pa gang gis 'dod pa'i khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin
80b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / mos pa gang gis gzugs kyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// /
80b7(dkon brtsegs): mos pa gang gis gzugs med pa'i khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis khams gsum du 'gro bar 'gyur
81a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / mos pa gang gis dman pa la rten cing dman pa nyid gnod pa dang / khyad par la rten cing
81a2(dkon brtsegs): khyad par la gnon pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / mos pa gang gis khyad par du song na dman pa la gnas par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin
81a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / mos pa gang gis skye ba tha dad pa dang / kha dog tha dad pa dang / yongs su longs spyod tha dad pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de
81a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / mos pa gang gis rtse mo las nyams par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen
81a5(dkon brtsegs): to/ / mos pa gang gis rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// de ltar
81a6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas mu med de nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo/ / byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs
81a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs de thos nas mngon par dad / yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi
81b1(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// 'jig rten
81b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di mos sna tshogs dang / / de bzhin blo gros tshad med pa// de dag gi ni mos pa'i sems// thams cad 'dren pas rab tu mkhyer// gang dag 'dod chags mos pa la// zhe sdang la ni gnas 'gyur
81b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / / zhe sdang gnas shing gti mug la/ gang dag mos pa rab tu mkhyen// gti mug gnas shing 'dod chags kyi// sems rgyud bsam gyis mi khyab pa// bar bar du ni 'jug pa dang //
81b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen// gang dag sbyor ba dman gyur la// rgya chen la ni mos pa dang // sbyor ba dam pa de dag gi/ dman par 'gyur ba 'dren pas mkhyen// log pa'i rjes su song ba
81b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / / 'gro ba med par 'byung ba dang // khams gsum las ni rnam grol ba'i// mos pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyen// skye dang kha dog tha dad dang // nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par dang // gang dag smre
81b6(dkon brtsegs): bo las nyams pa/ / rkang gnyis gtso bos rab tu mkhyen// bos pa sna tshogs rab mkhyen nas// 'dren pa chos rnams spyod par dzad// sangs rgyas kyi ni stobs gsum la// rgyal ba'i
81b7(dkon brtsegs): thugs sras rab tu mos/ / shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gsum pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs
82a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che zhing / 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste/ dge slong ngam/
82a2(dkon brtsegs): bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu
82a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma dang khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis 'jig rten rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / khams gang gis 'jig rten bsod na
82a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'du byed sogs pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / khams gang gis bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed sogs pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas
82a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / khams gang gis mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed sogs pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// khams gang gis 'byung ba'i khams su
82a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jog par 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par
82a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ / ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen to// yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams
82b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang rab tu mkhyen te/ ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen to// sa'i khams dang
82b2(dkon brtsegs): chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rab tu mkhyen to// ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ nam mkha'i khams ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams
82b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzugs med pa'i khams rab tu mkhyen to// ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ kun tu rtog pa las byung bar rab tu mkhyen to// 'dus byas kyi khams mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen
82b4(dkon brtsegs): to/ / 'dus ma byas kyi khams ni mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i khams ni phyis 'byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to// rnam par
82b5(dkon brtsegs): byang ba'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ / 'du byed kyi khams ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to// mya ngan las 'das pa'i
82b6(dkon brtsegs): dbyings ni tshul bzhin rig pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gnas pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten gnas pa'i khams gang la gnas pa dang / khams gang la
82b7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su chags pa dang / khams gang la gnas pa dang / khams gang la sbyor ba dang / khams gang gi bsam pa dang / khams gang la nges par sems pa dang / khams gang la rten pa derang
83a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / mkhyen nas kyang chos ston to// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams du ma dang khams
83a2(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas mu med de/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo// byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams du ma dang khams sna tshogs mkhyen
83a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang
83a4(dkon brtsegs): rmad du 'du shes skyed do/ / 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// 'jig rten kun gyi sems can kang // sna tshogs khams la gnas pa dang // khams kya
83a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa ci 'dra ba/ / sangs rgyas kyis ni rab tu mkhyen// bsod nams bsod nams min mi g.yo// 'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang de bzhin te// khams rnams gang la gnas nas su// mya ngan 'das
83a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi la reg/ mig gi khams dang gzugs kyi khams// mig gi rnam par shes nyid dang // rna ba sna dang lce dang lus// yid kyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen// chos kyi khams dang yid kyi ni// rnam par
83a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa nyid kyang mkhyen/ / nang gi khams ni stong pa dang // phyi rol dag kyang stong par mkhyen// sa dang chu dang me dag dang // rlung gi khams kyang de bzhin te// khams rnams bzhi po de dag ni// ram
83b1(dkon brtsegs): mkha' mtshungs par rab tu mkhyen/ / 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams// gzugs med pa yi khams nyid kyang // kun tu rtog las byung bar ni// de ltar sangs rgyas rab tu mkhyen// ji ltar na
83b2(dkon brtsegs): mkha' mtha' yas pa/ / de bzhin khams rnams mu med de// thams cad sangs rgyas rab mkhyen kyang // mkhyen to snyam du rlom sems med// khams ni skye bam yir zhing // rnam pa kun tu 'gag med de//
83b3(dkon brtsegs): khams 'di mya ngan 'das par ni// skyes bu dam pas rab tu mkhyen// ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas pa// sangs rgyas ye shes de 'dra ste// mos pa sna tshogs rab sprul pa// ye shes des ni rab tu mkhyen//
83b4(dkon brtsegs): mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen nas su// sems can bye ba rnam par 'dul// sangs rgyas stobs ni bzhi pa la// rgyal ba'i thugs sras dad par byed// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
83b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bzhi pa ste/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i
83b6(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyi rim pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis/ sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// ji ltar
83b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen ce na/ dbang po rtul ba'ang rab tu mkhyer to// dbang po bar ma'ang rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po rno ba'ang rab tu mkhyer to// dbang po khyad par du 'phags pa'ang rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po
84a1(dkon brtsegs): dman pa'ang rab tu mkhyen to/ / yongs su rtogs pa'i dbang po ji lta bus mthar phyin pa'i 'dod chags skye ba dang / mthar byin pa'i zhe sdang skye ba dang / mthar phyin pa'i gti mug skye ba de'ang
84a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bstan pa skye ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa
84a3(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yang ba skye ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu
84a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to/ / yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus snrel zhi'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug skye ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// yongs su rtog
84a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbang po ji lta bus tshar bcad cing 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug skye ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po gang dag mi dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba
84a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / dbang po gang dag dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang / dbang po gang dag mi g.yo ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang / dbang po gang dag 'byung ba'i rgyu las byung ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba
84a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi dbang po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen pa nas/ gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang
84b1(dkon brtsegs): yid kyi dbang po'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / pho'i dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang / bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang /
84b2(dkon brtsegs): yid bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /
84b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi dbang po'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po'ang yang dag
84b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / dbang po gang mig gi dbang po'i rgyu las byung la/ rna ba'i dbang po la gnas par 'gyur te/ snal ma yin/ lce la ma yin/ lus kyi dbang po la ma yin pa de'ang
84b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / gang rna ba'i dbang po'i rgyu las byung la/ sna'i dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang sna'i dbang po'i rgyu las byung la/ lce'i
84b6(dkon brtsegs): dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang lce'i dbang po'i rgyu las byung la/ lus kyi dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// sems
84b7(dkon brtsegs): gang sbyin pa'i dbang po can yin la/ de'ang tshul khrims la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas de la sbyin pa'i gtam ston to// gang zag gang
85a1(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi dbang po can yin la/ de'ang sbyin pa la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa khyen pas tshul khrims kyi gtam ston to// sems
85a2(dkon brtsegs): can gang bzod pa'i dbang po can yin la/ de'ang brtson 'grus la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas bzod pa'i gtam ston to// sems can gang
85a3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyi dbang po can yin la/ de'ang bzod pa la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas brtson 'grus kyi gtam ston to// sems can gang
85a4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gyi dbang po can yin la/ de'ang shes rab la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas bsam gtan gyi gtam ston to// sems can gang
85a5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi dbang po can yin la/ de'ang shes rab la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas shes rab kyi gtam ston to// gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ byang
