85a6(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad la'ang bya'o/ / sems can gang nyan thos kyi theg pa'i dbang po can yin la/ de'ang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang /
85a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam ston to// sems can gang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i dbang po can yin la/ derang nyan thos kyi theg pa la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas
85b1(dkon brtsegs): dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam ston to/ / sems can gang theg pa chen po'i dbang po can yin la/ de'ang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor ba de la de bzhin
85b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas theg pa chen po'i gtam ston to/ / sems can gang tha ma'i dbang po can yin la/ de'ang theg pa chen po la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs
85b3(dkon brtsegs): pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas dbang po tha ma'i gtam ston to/ / sems can gang skal ba med pa'i dbang po can skal ba med par snang ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pas skal ba med cing
85b4(dkon brtsegs): snod ma yin par rig nas btang snyoms su 'jog go/ / sems can skal ba yod pa'i dbang po can skal ba yod par snang ba dag la/ de bzhin gshegs pas skal ba yod cing snod du rig nas ri mor byas shing
85b5(dkon brtsegs): chos ston te/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su smin pa rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen/ dbang po yongs su ma smin pa rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen/ 'byung ba'i
85b6(dkon brtsegs): dbang po rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen/ 'byung ba ma yin pa'i dbang po rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// sems can gyi dbang po'i rnam pa gang yin pa dang / sbyor ba gang yin pa dang / bsam pa gang yin pa dang / gang
85b7(dkon brtsegs): gi rgyu las byung ba dang / rkyen gang yin pa dang / dmigs pa gang yin pa dang / rgyu 'thun pa gang yin pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po'i mtha' gang yin pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas
86a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas/ ston pa yang 'di skad
86a2(dkon brtsegs): gsung ngo / / 'gro ba'i dbang po de ni dbang po'i pha rol song // sems can rnams kyi spyod dang bsam pa'i cho ga mkhyen// 'gro ba gang dag gi ni dbang po ci 'dra ba// de 'drar mi yi seng ge de la chos bshad do//
86a3(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dag ni rab 'bring tha mar gyur pa rams// de la bder gshegs ye shes rmad du byung ba 'jug/ sems can bsam pa thar pa'i snod du gyur mkhyen nas// spyod pa mkhyen cing mkhas pa
86a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi chos ston to/ / gang dag mthar phyin skye zhing nyon mongs bstan pa dang // mi gang rnams kyi dbang po yang bar gyur pa dang // skyes bu gang gi dbang po snrel zhir gyur pa yi// spyod pa mkhyen nas
86a5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar mthun pa'i chos ston to/ / skyes bu gang gi dge ba'i dbang por gyur pa dang // mi dge'i dbang por gyur pa rnams kyang de bzhin mkhyen// mig nas bzung ste yid gyi bar gyi dbang po dang // yid mi
86a6(dkon brtsegs): bde dang sdug bsngal dbang mkhyen chos kyang ston/ / dang brtson dran dang ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab dang // skyes bu gang la dbang po 'di dag yod pa ni// de la dad pa'i gtam ston de bzhin brtson 'grus dang /
86a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang dam pa'i don du ston// mi yi dbang po rnam pa spod pa bye brag gang // mi gang bsam pa ci 'jug de yi dbang po yang // chos mchog rtog pas de dag gi ni spyod ma khyen nas/
86b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal kun las thar bar byed pa'i chos 'chad do// gang gi dbang po sangs rgyas byang chub phyir nges la// nyan thos shes pa'i rjes 'jug chog mi shes pa// de la byang chub reg 'gyur rgya chen gtam
86b2(dkon brtsegs): rab ston/ / bde gshegs stobs ni mtha' yas thul dka' lnga pa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs lnga pa ste/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun pa
86b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i
86b4(dkon brtsegs): lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ yang dag par nges pa'i sems can gyi khams rab tu mkhyen/ yang dag par ma nges pa'i sems can gyi khams rab tu
86b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen/ log par nges pa'i sems can gyi khams rab tu mkhyen/ ma nges pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang de bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// rgyu'i stobs can sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa zur tsam gyis
86b6(dkon brtsegs): go ba dbang po rno ba'i sems can de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan kyang rung / ma bstan kyang rung / de rnam par grol ba'i skal ba yod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs
86b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas de bzhin du mthun par chos ston to/ / ma nges pa'i sems can gyi khams rkyen gyi stobs can yongs su smin par bya ba'i mtshan nyid can/ gal te mthun par 'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang
87a1(dkon brtsegs): phrad na rnam par grol bar 'gyur gyi/ rjes su ston pa dang ma phrad na rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar rkyen dang rgyu dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag
87a2(dkon brtsegs): par gsung ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa las chos de thos nas/ tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor bas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur te/ de dag gi don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
87a3(dkon brtsegs): ngo / / log par nges pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su sbyang ba ma byas pa/ khye re chung ba/ blun pa/ snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan kyang rung / ma bstan kyang
87a4(dkon brtsegs): rung ste/ rnam par grol ba'i skal ba med pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas snod ma yin par rig nas btang snyoms su 'jog ste/ de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams go gyon to//
87a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod chags kyi lam rnam pa gsum rab tu mkhyen te/ 'dod chags kyi lam sdug pa'i rnam pa las skye ba'ang yod/ 'dod chags kyi lam rjes su chags pa'i
87a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa las skye ba'ang yod/ 'dod chags kyi lam sngon gyi rgyu la skye ba'ang yod do// zhe sdang gi lam rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen/ zhe sdang gi lam khong khro ba'i mtshan ma las skye ba'ang yod/
87a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa las skye ba'ang yod/ sngon gyi bag la nyal ba las skye ba'ang yod/ gti mug gi lam rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen te/ gti mug gi lam ma rig pa'i rgyu las
87b1(dkon brtsegs): skye ba'ang yod/ gti mug gi lam 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu las skye ba'ang yod/ gti mug gi lam the tsom gyi rgyu las skye ba'ang yod de/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
87b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu dbang po rno ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur la sla ba'i lam yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po rtul ba'i phyir mngon par
87b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa phul la dka' ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to/ / dbang po rno ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur la sla ba'i ma la yang rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po rtul ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur la dka' ba'i lam
87b4(dkon brtsegs): yang rab tu mkhyen to/ / dmigs pa bor ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa bul la bul ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to// lam gyi rgyun ma gcad pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur la bul ba'i lam yang rab
87b5(dkon brtsegs): ca mkhyen to/ / yongs su thug pa med par dbugs 'byin pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa bul la myur ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to// de la ma chags pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur la bul ba'i lam
87b6(dkon brtsegs): yang rab tu mkhyen to/ / so sor rtog pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed la/ sgom pa'i stobs la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ sgom pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed la/ so sor rtog pa'i
87b7(dkon brtsegs): stobs la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ sgom pa'i stobs dang so sor rtog pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i lam yang yod/ so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang sgom pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs
88a1(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed pa'i lam yang yod de/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// bsam pa phun sum tshogs la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs
88a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin la sbyor ba'ing phun sum tshogs pa
88a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ bsam pa'ang phun sum tshogs la sbyor ba'ang phun sum tshogs pa'i lam yang yod de/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//
88a4(dkon brtsegs): lus sbyong la ngag la ma yin/ sems la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ ngag sbyong la lus la ma yin/ sems la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod// sems sbyong la lus la ma yin/ ngag la ma yin pa'i
88a5(dkon brtsegs): lam yang yod/ lus la ma yin/ ngag la ma yin la sems kyang mi spong ba'i lam yang yod/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems spong ba'i lam yang yod de/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas
88a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / de ltar shA ri'i bu sems can thams cad kyi 'jug pa'i rgyu dang / ldog pa'i rgyu'i lam ji snyed pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thogs
88a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa 'jug go/ / de ltar sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas kun tu 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs de ni mtha' yas mu med/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo// byang chub sems
88b1(dkon brtsegs): dpas de thos nas mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed cing / nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar
88b2(dkon brtsegs): dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungaso// thams cad lam ni bde
88b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs rab tu mkhyen/ / sems can khams ni nges rgyu bcas pa mkhyen// yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid ma nges dang // de bzhin dbang po rgyu dang ldan pa mkhyen// 'dod chags lam ni rnam
88b4(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum ldan dang / / zhe sdang lam gsum de bzhin gti mug ldan// rnam gsum rgya chen mtha' yas nyon mongs ldan// lam la rkyen dang rgyu ni ston pas mkhyen// dka' ba'i lam la
88b5(dkon brtsegs): rno bar 'gyur ba dang / / de bzhin dbang po rtul zhing bul ba dang // sla ba'i lam la rno bar 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin bul ba'ang 'jig rten mgon pos mkhyen// bul ba'i lam la sbyor ba bul ba
88b6(dkon brtsegs): yod/ / de bzhin bul ba yin la sbyor ba rno// myur ba'i lam la bul bar 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin de la ma chags myur ba'ang yod// lam ni so sor rtog pa skyed byed la// yang dag sgom pa
88b7(dkon brtsegs): skyed pa ma yin dang / / sgom pa dag ni skyed par byed pa dang // gnyis ka khyad par sbyor ldan skyed pa yod// lam ni bsam pa yongs su sbyong byed la// sbyor ba dag ni sbyong bar mi byed yod// res
89a1(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' gnyis ka sbyong bar byed pa'ang yod/ / de dag sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pas mkhyen// lus ni rnam par spyod la ngag mi sbyong // sems kyang rnam par sbyong ba
89a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin dang / / ngag rnams dang ni lus kyang rab sbyong la// sems ni res 'ga' mi sbyong ba yang yod// sems ni rab sbyong dag la ma yin te// lus kyang rnam par spong ba ma yin dang //
89a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang de bzhin sems kyang rab sbyong la// re 'ga' lus ni sbyong bar mi 'gyur yod// lus dang de bzhin ngag sems sbyong lam dang // ji ltar ldog dang 'jug par 'gyur ba rnams//
89a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pas rab mkhyen te// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs kyi stobs drug pa// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs drug pa ste/ stobs de dang
89a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ba nas/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan
89a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldan pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa
89a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang / pha rol gyi bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu
89b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to/ / ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang / rkyen gang yin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu
89b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to/ / sems can rnams kyi rnam par dag pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang / rkyen gang yin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// de la rgyu gang / rkyen
89b3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rkyen ni ma rig pa'o// ma
89b4(dkon brtsegs): rig pa ni rgyu'o/ / 'du byed ni rkyen to// 'du byed ni rgyu'o// rnam par shes pa ni rkyen to// rnam par shes pa ni rgyu'o// ming dang gzugs ni rkyen to// ming dang gzugs ni rgyu'o//
89b5(dkon brtsegs): skye mched drug ni rkyen to// skye mched drug ni rgyu'o// reg pa ni rkyen to// reg pa ni rgyu'o// tshor ba ni rkyen to// tshor ba ni rgyu'o// sred pa ni rkyen to// sred pa ni rgyu'o// len
89b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni rkyen to/ / len pa ni rgyu'o// srid pa ni rkyen to// srid pa ni rgyu'o// skye ba ni rkyen to// skye ba ni rgyu'o// rga shi ni rkyen to// nyon mongs pa ni rgyu'o// las ni rkyen to//
89b7(dkon brtsegs): lta ba ni rgyu'o// sred pa ni rkyen to// bag la nyal ba ni rgyu'o// kun nas ldang ba ni rkyen to// sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni 'di/ rkyen ni 'di yin te/ de dag
90a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ / de la sems can rnams kyi rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang rkyen gang zhe na/ sems can
90a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ gzhan las rjes su mthun pa'i sgra dang / so so bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o// 'di lta ste/ zhi gnas la rtse gcig pa dang
90a3(dkon brtsegs): lhag mthong la mkhas pa'o/ / gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ 'gro ba med par shes pa dang / 'ong ba med par shes pa'o// gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ skye ba med par
90a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtogs pa dang / nges par gyur pa la mi reg pa'o// gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ rkang par ldan pa dang / rig pas rnam par grol ba mngon sum du byed pa'o// gzhan yang
90a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sgom pa dang / rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol bar shes pa'o// gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye
90a6(dkon brtsegs): ba shes pa'o/ / gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ bden pa rjes su rtogs pa dang / bden pa rjes su thob pa'o// rgyu de dang rkyen de dag ni sems can rnams rnam par dag pa 'gyur ba ste/
90a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa'ang tshad med/ rnam
90b1(dkon brtsegs): par dag par dmigs pa'ang tshad med de/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pas kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa la 'jog pa'ang yod do// yang
90b2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pas rnam par dag pas dmigs pa'ang kun nas nyon mongs par dmigs pa la 'jog pa'ang yod/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyi 'dzin pas kun nas nyon mongs
90b3(dkon brtsegs): par dmigs pa la 'jog pa dang / rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa la 'jog pa la'ang yod de/ de la snrel zhi'i rnam grangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug go// shA ri'i bu de bzhin
90b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan pas 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las
90b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so// bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas nas/ 'gog pa las ldang ba dang / 'gog pa la
90b6(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par zhugs nas/ bsam gtan dang po las ldang ba'i bar du'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad la rjes su mthun par snyoms par 'jug go/ mi mthun par yang snyoms par 'jug go/ rjes su
90b7(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi
91a1(dkon brtsegs): rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ / sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa la sdug pa nyid du mos par 'gyur ba de ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// nam
91a2(dkon brtsegs): mkha' mtha' ya sa skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// ci'ang med pa'i
91a3(dkon brtsegs): skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// 'du shes dang tshor ba
91a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ rnam par thar pa brgyad po 'di dag la rjes su mthun pa dang mi mthun par yang snyoms par 'jug/ snrel zhir yang snyoms par 'jug go// ting nge 'dzin la'ang
91a5(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin ston la snyoms par 'jug pas rtogs par ston kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la tha dad par 'gyur ba gang yang med/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa
91a6(dkon brtsegs): las/ ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag par bya ba med/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ting nge 'dzin gcig gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'grub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ting nge 'dzin las ma
91a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhengs par ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems gcig nas gcig tu 'jug pa med do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa la sems mnyam par ma gzhag pa
91b1(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de sus kyang lta mi nus te/ nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin ni rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis zil gyis non to// rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin ni byang
91b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zil gyis non to/ / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis zil gyis non to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni zil gyis
91b3(dkon brtsegs): mnon pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni zil gyis ma non par 'jug go/ gdams pa gang dang / rjes su bstan pa gang gis nyan thos rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa de'ang de bzhin
91b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ / de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// mkhyen nas kyang de
91b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'doms shing de bzhin du rjes su ston to/ / de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas
91b6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs de ni mtha' yas mu med/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo// byang chub sems dpas de thos nas mngon par
91b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za// rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed cing / nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed
92a1(dkon brtsegs): do 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// gang gis sems can nyon mongs shing // gang gis sems can rnam dag 'gyur/
92a2(dkon brtsegs): de yang dpa' bo chen pos mkhyen// mkhyen nas gtam rnams ston par mdzad// gang du ma rig skye 'gyur ba// nyon mongs rgyu ni tshul bzhin min// de yi rkyen ni 'du byed do// sdug bsngal ba
92a3(dkon brtsegs): tu skye bar 'gyur/ / srid pa'i yan lag skyed pa yi// thams cad rtsa ba tshul bzhin min// de nyid sangs rgyas rab mkhyen nas// de bzhin du yang ston par mdzad// las kyi rtsa ba nyon mongs
92a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ / mi mkhas mngon par 'du byed de// sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bar// de yi rkyen ni rnam par shes// gang gis sems can dag 'gyur ba// rgyu gnyis dang ni rkyen gnyis te//
92a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan las rjes su mthun sgra dang // nang du tshul bzhin lta ba'o// tshul bzhin rgyu ni zhi gnas te// lhag mthong yang ni rkyen yin no// sems can gang gis grol 'gyur ba// de yang 'dren
92a6(dkon brtsegs): bas rab tu mkhyen/ / tshul khrims la ni rnal 'byor gnas// chos rnams stong par rab tu rtog/ thar pa'i sgo ni bsgoms pas na// srid pa dog las thar par 'gyur// de
92a7(dkon brtsegs): dag sangs rgyas rab mkhyen nas/ / rnam spyong skyes pa bud med la// stong pa nyid dang mtshan med dang // rnam par thar pa rab tu ston// bsam gtan la ni snyoms zhugs pa// rang rgyal
92b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ni nyan thos rnams/ / de dag rnams kyang dog par bshad// de ni 'gran zla yod par gsungs// sangs rgyas bsam gtan rnam thar la// dgra dang bcas med dog pa med// sangs rgyas kyi ni
92b2(dkon brtsegs): stobs bdun pa/ / pha rol rgol bas thul bar dka'// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bdun pa ste/ stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs
92b3(dkon brtsegs): bakhyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ba nas/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa
92b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i ye shes kyis bdag dang / sems can gzhan rnams dang // gang zag gzhan
92b5(dkon brtsegs): dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no/ / 'di lta ste/ skye ba gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ bcu 'am/ nyi shu 'am/ sum cu 'am/
92b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ skye ba brgya 'am/ skye ba stong ngam/ skye ba brgya stong nas/ skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du rjes su dran no// 'jig pa'i bskal pa'am/ 'chags
92b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bskal pa 'am/ 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa 'am/ 'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma 'am/ 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma 'am/ 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma zhig na/
93a1(dkon brtsegs): nga sngon che ge mo zhig tu byung ste/ ming ni 'di zhes bya/ rus ni 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni 'di zhes bya/ zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za ba/ kha dog ni 'di lta bu/ mtshan
93a2(dkon brtsegs): ma ni 'di lta bu/ dbyibs ni 'di lta bu/ tshe ni 'di tsam zhig thub/ yun ni 'di srid cig gnas gnas/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong ste/ bdag de nas shi 'phos nas
93a3(dkon brtsegs): che ge mo zhig tu skyes so/ / bdag de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes 'di lta bu'i rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas/ gzhi ci las gyur pa bcas par bdag dang
93a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas dum rjes su dran no/ / sems can gang gi sngon gyi rgyu ji lta bu dang / rgyu gang gis sems can du gyur pa'i rgyu de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen te/
93a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// 'das pa'i sems can thams kyi 'das pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to// sems gang gi 'og tu gang la dmigs pa'i
93a6(dkon brtsegs): sems skyes pa dang / dmigs pa gang ma tshang bas 'gags pa de thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// de ltar shA ri'i bu gang sems can gcig gi sems
93a7(dkon brtsegs): gcig nas gcig tu sems 'di lta bu zhig gi 'og tu sems 'di lta bu zhig byung ngo zhes bya ba de ni bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du'ang tshig gis bshad pas ston par mi nus te/ de bzhin
93b1(dkon brtsegs): du sems can thams cad kyi yang thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ / tha ma'i mtha'i bar gyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems rnams
93b2(dkon brtsegs): bshad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthar thugs par mi 'gyur ro/ / de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i
93b3(dkon brtsegs): stobs ni bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/ / tshad med/ grangs med/ brjod du med de/ de'i mtha'i gnas ni bde bar bstan mi nus so// sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu
93b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can de dag la kye sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang de sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'am/ nyan thos la bskyed pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
93b5(dkon brtsegs): la bskyed pa 'am/ chos la bskyed pa de dag dran par gyis shig ces dran par mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus dran par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
93b6(dkon brtsegs): pas de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa de las chos 'di lta 'di lta bur ston te/ ci nas sems can de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing
93b7(dkon brtsegs): mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ la la ni nyan thos kyi theg pas/ la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
94a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do/ / de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa shes pa'i stobs ni mtha' yas mu med de/ nam mkha' dang
94a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs shing mnyam mo/ / byang chub sems dpas de thos nas mngon par dad / yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za ba nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab
94a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas/ ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo // bdag gi dang ni de bzhin
94a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag gi/ 'jig rten sgron mas sngon gyi dran pa ni// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas pa// skyu ru ra lnga lag mthil bzhag pa bzhin// ming rus de bzhin kha dog
94a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog/ tshe dang gnas dang 'chi 'pho 'gro ba dang // gang gi rgyu la sems can brtson ldan pa// dus mkhyen pa ni de la chos kyang 'chad// 'gro ba rnams kyi sems dang sems/
94a6(dkon brtsegs): byung chos// gang dag 'das pa mtha' yas mu med pa// gang gi 'og tu sems gang byung ba kun// rgyal ba ye shes chen po mnga' bas mkhyen// sems can gcig gi sems rgyud
94a7(dkon brtsegs): sngon 'das pa/ / bde bar gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen pa ni// bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed du// shad kyang de yi mtha' mar byin mi 'gyur// sngon gyi spyod pa'i snyed de dag ni/
94b1(dkon brtsegs): phyi ma'i mtha' yi bar dungs bshad kyang // mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes mi bzad de// bcom ldan ye shes rgya mtsho 'di 'dra'o// sngon gyi rgyal la bsti stang gang byas shing //
94b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag dge ba'i bsam gyur pa// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi shugs la gnas// sngon dag dge ba byas pa rnams kyang dran// sngon ni bsod nams ci 'dra byas
94b3(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams/ / de dag rnams kyang ston pa'i mthus dran te// de dag dran na gnas ni gsum la 'khod// thar pa'i gnas las phyir yang mi ldog 'gyur// bde gshegs sngon gyi
94b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba mtha' yas te/ / sems can thams cad kyis ni bsam mi nus// mtha' yas grags pa'i stobs ni brgyad pa la// rgyal sras bdag nyid chen po dad par 'gyur// shA ri'i /
94b5(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs brgyad pa ste/ stobs de dang ldan pas zhes bya ba nas/ chos dang mthun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//
94b6(dkon brtsegs): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i ye shes dang /
94b7(dkon brtsegs): mi'i las shin tu 'das pa'i lha'i mig rnam par dag pas sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bzang po dang / ngan pa dang / kha dog mdzes pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa dang /
95a1(dkon brtsegs): bde 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba rnams gzigs so// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan// ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan
95a2(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba dag ste/ de dag log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste/ shi ba'i
95a3(dkon brtsegs): 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o/ / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang // gshin rje'i 'jig rten du'ang de bzhin no// yang sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis
95a4(dkon brtsegs): legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan te/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par
95a5(dkon brtsegs): lta ba ste/ de dag yang dag par lta ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lhar skye'o zhes sems can rnams kyi las ji ltar bsags pa
95a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams rab tu mkhyen to/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lce'i mig de ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i mtha' chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa/ brjod du med pa/ gang+gA'i
95a7(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma las kyang shin tu 'das pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ji snyed snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni 'tshig pa dang / 'jig pa dang / 'chags par gzigs
95b1(dkon brtsegs): so/ / sems can gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni 'chi 'pho ba dang skye bar gzigs so// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni
95b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ldan gnas nas 'chi 'pho ba dang / ma'i rum du 'jug pa dang / btsa' ba dang / gom pa bdun 'dor ba dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du 'jug pa dang / mngon par 'byung
95b3(dkon brtsegs): bar gzigs so/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gzigs so// chos kyi
95b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo rab tu skor ba dang / tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang gzigs so// nyan thos gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni
95b5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gzigs so/ / ra sangs rgyas gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni rdzu 'phrul ston cing yon spyod
95b6(dkon brtsegs): bar gzigs so/ / sems can gang dag snang bar ma gyur pa phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyi mig lam du mi 'gro ba dang / nyan thos dang
95b7(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig gis gzigs so// yang de bzhin gshegs
96a1(dkon brtsegs): pas shing rta'i pang lo'i tshad tsam la snang bar ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams gzigs pa de dag ni shin tu mang gi/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
96a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi lha dang mi rnams ni de lta ma yin te/ de ltar mi snang bar gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang tshad med do// 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni lha'i mig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/
96a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur zhes sems can gyi khams la gzigs te/ sems can ji tsam sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag gi mdun na de bzhin gshegs
96a4(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhugs shing sems can de dag 'dul yang sems can gzhan gyis mi shes so/ / de ltar na shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i
96a5(dkon brtsegs): stobs ni mtha' yas mu med de/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo// byang chub sems dpas de thos nas mngon par dad pa nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
96a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// bde bar gshegs pa'i lhag
96a7(dkon brtsegs): mig dri med de/ / bskal pa du mar dge ba'i las kyis sbyangs// des ni rgyal bas phyogs bcu sangs rgyas zhing // rgya chen bsam gyis mi khyab rnams kyang gzigs// 'byung ba dang
96b1(dkon brtsegs): ni 'jig pa ji snyed pa/ / kha cig me yis 'khor cing sems can gnas// kha cig sangs rgyas ldan zhing kha cig stong // thams cad rang byung gi ni spyan gyis gzigs// sems can
96b2(dkon brtsegs): khams ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab/ / gzugs can gzugs med gang dag ji snyed dang // gang dag ngan 'gror lhung dang bder 'gro ba// thams cad rang byung gi ni spyan gyis gzigs/
96b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bye ba mang po gang bzhugs dang // rang byung 'dren pa mya ngan gang 'das dang // rang rgyal gang dang nyan thos gang yod pa// thams cad rang byung gi ni spyan gyis gzigs//
96b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' srog chags phan 'dod pa// gang dag byang chub spyod pa mchog spyod cing // la la gzhi med gnas ni rtogs gyur pa// thams cad rang byung 'dren pa dag gis
96b5(dkon brtsegs): gzigs/ / gang gis srog chags shin tu phra mthong ba// bde gshegs migo ni 'di 'dra dri ma med// mig stobs bsam gyis mi khyab dgu pa ste// rgyal sras nges pa rnams ni
96b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dad/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dgu pa ste/ stobs de dang ldan pas khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che zhing 'khor gyi
96b7(dkon brtsegs): nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog pa nas/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa
97a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis zag pa
97a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad zad pas/ bdag skye ba ni zad/ tshangs par spyod pa la ni brten/ bya ba ni byas te/ 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes zag pa med pa/ sems rnam par grol
97a3(dkon brtsegs): ba/ / rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs de ni/ bag chags
97a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'o/ / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i zag pa zad pa ni tshad du byas pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bcom
97a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / rang sangs rgyas kyi zag pa zad pa ni tshad yod pa ste/ snying rje chen po dang bral ba/ spobs pa dang bral ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
97a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa/ snying rje chen pos kun bzung ba/ mi 'jigs pa dang spobs pa la lta ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis
97a7(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis mi non pa ste/ skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la las kyi bag chags med/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags med/ spyod lam 'khrul
97b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bag chags med med do/ / 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu nam mkha' yongs su dag pas rdul dang du ba'i 'khrug pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas pa de bzhin du/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i
97b2(dkon brtsegs): zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyang nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas so/ / de zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa de lta bu la rab tu gnas nas zag pa dang bcas pa/
97b3(dkon brtsegs): len pa dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams la zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// len pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/ kye ma sems can rnams ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog
97b4(dkon brtsegs): pa las byung ste/ zag pa dang len pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khyed kyis rab tu rtogs shig ces de dag la/ de bzhin gshegs pas dpe dang tshul gyis
97b5(dkon brtsegs): ci nas kyang zag pa rnams yang dag pa ma yin pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes par 'gyur zhing / shes nas kyang chos gang yang mi len te/ len pa med par yongs su
97b6(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur chos ston to/ / de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi zag pa rnams rab tu mkhyen to// zag pa kun 'byung
97b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / zag pa 'gag pa dang / zag pa 'gag par 'gyur ba'i lam la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te/ mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// byang chub sems dpas
98a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag pa zad pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs de thos nas mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rdzog/ so ma nyi med cing the tsam mi
98a2(dkon brtsegs): ba nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do// 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// 'dren pa'i zag pa med pa'i ye shes ni//
98a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen sgrib med pa dag tshad med de// stobs bcu'i stobs ni de dang ldan pas na// zhi ba'i byang chub mchog 'di rab tu gsung // nyan thos rnams kyi zag zad ye shes ni// bag
98a4(dkon brtsegs): chags ma bcom tshad dang ldan pa yin/ / mi yi dam pa 'dren pa mchog rab kyi// bag chags bcom zhing tshad dang ldan ma yin// de bzhin rang rgyal byang chub gang reg pa// de la
98a5(dkon brtsegs): snying rje che dang spobs pa med/ / bcom ldan 'das ni zag pa yongs zad pa// snying rje che dang spobs pa tshad med do// sangs rgyas zag zad mkhyen la gnas nas ni// 'gro ba'i
98a6(dkon brtsegs): zag pa yang dag ma yin zhing / / rigs pa'i gnas kyi tshul 'di ma shes pas// chos 'di thams cad log par zhugs mkhyen te// de la rgyal ba snying rje cher bskyed nas// chos
98a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di mi rtag stong pa bdag med chos/ / dngos med gsog ste mchog tu zhi ba yi// sa la rtogs shing ltos shes rab tu ston// 'di la skyes bu srog dang gang zag dang // shed
98b1(dkon brtsegs): skyes shed dbung byed pa po yang med/ / chos 'di thams cad log par chags pas na// ston pa snying rje bskyed nas thar ston kyang // bde bar gshegs la skyo ba yong med de// yang
98b2(dkon brtsegs): dag ye shes rnams kyang nyams pa med/ / de phyir rgyal ba rtag tu rnal 'byor sbyor// 'gro la ba na phyir chos rnams rab tu ston// 'di ni pha rol smrab 'joms pa'i stobs// mtha'
98b3(dkon brtsegs): las nam mkha' 'dra ba bcu pa ste/ / mgon po stobs bcu de la gnas gyur nas/ mtshungs med 'khor lo dam pa rab tu bskor// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
98b4(dkon brtsegs): debazhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu pa ste/ stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che zhing / 'khor gyi rang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs te/
98b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'dir dge slong ngam/ bram ze'i bar du sus kyang chos dang mthun par rab tu ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu rab tu bskor ro// de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
98b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'dra
98b7(dkon brtsegs): shes skyed do/ / / bam po drug pa/ yang shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
99a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad / yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi mi byed/ the tsom mi zab nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du
99a2(dkon brtsegs): shes skyed ce na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ mi 'jigs pa de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang
99a3(dkon brtsegs): du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par grog cing khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun
99a4(dkon brtsegs): bar ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas 'khor
99a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi nang du nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes zhal gyis 'che ba de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod kyis chos 'di mngon par rdzogs par
99a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs ma rgyas so zhes chos dang mthun pas rgol bar byed mi nus so/ / ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos
99a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mi mnyam pa med par yang dag par mngon par sangs rgyas te/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / sangs
99b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos rnams gang yin pa dang / slob pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / mi slob pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
99b2(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos rnams gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / kha na ma tho bar bcas pa dang /
99b3(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas de dag thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon
99b4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// de la mnyam pa nyid gang zhe na/ lta ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid du mnyam mo//
99b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis mtshan ma med par mnyam mo// khams gsum pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis smon pa med par mnyam mo// skye ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis mi skye bar mnyam mo// mngon par 'du byed pa'i ngo bo
99b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis mngon par 'du mi byed par mnyam mo/ / 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis mi 'byung bar mnyam mo// kun gzhi'i ngo bo nyid kyis kun gzhi med par mnyam mo// dus gsum gyi ngo bo nyid kyis ji
99b7(dkon brtsegs): lta ba bzhin du mnyam mo/ / ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / srid pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rig pa dang rnam par grol bar mnyam mo// 'khor ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis mya ngan las 'das par mnyam mo// de ltar shA ri'i bu de
100a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o//
100a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de'ang 'khor thams cad shes par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems
100a3(dkon brtsegs): tshim pa skyed pa/ 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skyed pa/ snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa/ de kho na nyid/ de bzhin nyid/ gzhan
100a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa nyid/ mi 'gyur ba nyid/ mi 'khrugs pa nyid/ 'byung ba med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med
100a5(dkon brtsegs): do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa med pa 'thab pa med pa'o// de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
100a6(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byas ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med pa'o/ / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas 'di lta bu'i chos zab mo phra ba shes par dka' ba/ de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa
100a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du snying rje chen po la gnas nas/ bstan pa sna tshogs dang / rnam grangs sna tshogs kyis sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la chos thams cad yang dag par
100b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu na/ 'i chos de'ang de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par bad pa'i phyir 'byung // gang ston pa ma yin la ston pa'o zhes khas 'tshas/ 'ang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
100b2(dkon brtsegs): yin la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes khas 'che ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pas zil gyis nor nas/ de dag rgyags pa chad de phan tshun du 'bros so// 'di
100b3(dkon brtsegs): wAltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa mtha' yas mu med de/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi
100b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa'ang mtha' yas mu med do/ / shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa ni nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do// byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs
100b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed de/ 'di ni mi 'jigs pa dang thol/
100b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas 'khor gyi nang du gshegs nas nga zag pa zad do zhes zhal gyis 'che ste/
100b7(dkon brtsegs): de la khyod kyis zag pa 'di dag ma zad do zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis chos dang mthun pas rtsod par byed pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag
101a1(dkon brtsegs): bzad pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bas 'dod chags la spyod pa'i bag chags thams cad bcom
101a2(dkon brtsegs): mo/ / srid pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bas zhe sdang la spyod pa'i bag chags thams cad bcom mo// ma rig pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bas gti mug la spong
101a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bag chags thams cad macom mo/ / lta ba'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bas nyon mongs pa la spyod pa'i bag chags thams cad bcom ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi kun
101a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzob bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya'o// don dam par na 'phags pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyi mdur na chos gang yongs su shes pa'am
101a5(dkon brtsegs): spang ba 'am/ bsgom pa'am/ mngon du bya bar 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang mi 'dug go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zad pa zhes bya ba de ni nam du'ang mi zad pa ma yin no// de ni shin tu zad
101a6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid yin gyi/ gnyen pos zad pa zhes mi bya ste/ de ni ji lta ba bzhin du zad pa'o// gang ji lta ba bzhin du zad pa de la zad pa gang yang med do// gang la zad pa gang yang med pa de ni 'dus
101a7(dkon brtsegs): ma byas pa'o/ / de la skye ba med pa/ 'jig pa med pa/ gnas med de/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung ste/ chos nyid chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa
101b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid de/ de bzhin du de la ye shes zhugs so// gang la 'jug pa med cing mi 'jug pa'ang med pa yang de ltar zhugs te/ de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul gyis zag pa dang zag pa spong ba mi dmigs te/
101b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni snying rje chen po la gnas nas zag pa spong ba'i phyir chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de ni 'khor thams cad shes par byed pa/ 'khor
101b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim pa skyed pa/ 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dang
101b4(dkon brtsegs): pabaskyed pa/ snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam/ de kho na nyid/ de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid/ mi 'gyur ba nyid/ mi zhugs pa nyid/ 'byung ba med
101b5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid/ 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa
101b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa 'thab pa med pa'o/ / de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med do// de ltar
101b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ grangs med/ dpag tu med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i sems kyis zag pa spang ba'i phyir
102a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la chos ston te/ / de kar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa mtha' mas pa nas/ gang de bachin
102a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa de nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de
102a3(dkon brtsegs): thos nas mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa gnyis pa
102a4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de
102a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ 'khor gyi nang du gshegs nas bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams la bar du gcod do zhes zhal gyis
102a6(dkon brtsegs): 'che ba de la gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'di ni bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos ma yin no zhes rgol bar byed pa med pa'i bar du'o//
102a7(dkon brtsegs): dengel bar du gcod pa'i chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bag med pa'i sems so// bar du gcod par
102b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i chos gnyis te/ dzatsha mi shes pa dang / khrel med pa'o// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos gsum ste/ lus kyis nyes par spyang ba dang / ngag gis nyes par spya
102b2(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'o/ / bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'grob ma yin par 'gro ba bzhi la 'dun pas 'grob ma yin
102b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba da zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / legs pas 'gro ba ma yin par 'groraro// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
102b4(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / chung 'thung ba'o// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos drug ste/
102b5(dkon brtsegs): drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas la ma gus pa dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / bslab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gtong ba la ma gus pa'o// bar dugacong
102b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i chos bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nga rgyal dang / che ba'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga
102b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal lo// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ log pa'i lta ba dang / log pa'i
103a1(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa dang / log pa'i ngag dang / log pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / log pa'i 'tsho ba dang / log pa'i rtsol ba dang / log pa'i dran pa dang / log pa'i ting nge
103a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin to/ / bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag la gnod pa byas so zhes kun nas mnar sems skyed pa dang / gnod pa byed do zhes kun nas
103a3(dkon brtsegs): mnar sems skyed pa dang / gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro zhes kun nas mnar sems skyed pa dang / bdag gi mdza' bo la gnod pa byas so// byed do// byed par 'gyur ro zhes sems
103a4(dkon brtsegs): la kun nas mnar sems skyed pa dang / bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i don byas so// byed do// byed par 'gyur ro zhes kun nas mnar sems skyed pa'o// bar du gcod par
103a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yin te/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log
103a6(dkon brtsegs): par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig bkyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'o// de ltar
103a7(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i kun tu sbyor ba ji snyed pa'i chos de dag gis ro myang ba la rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang / phyin ci log dang ldan pa dang / 'byung ba
103b1(dkon brtsegs): la kun nas ldang ba dang / sred pa dang lta ba la mngon par zhen pa'i zang zing dang bcas/ phung po dang bcas pa'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las de dag de thams
103b2(dkon brtsegs): cad de bzhin gshegs pas bar du gcod par mkhyen to/ / bar du gcod par mkhyen nas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston to// chos bcu po de dag ni bar du gcod par 'gyur
103b3(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ de dag zhi bar bya ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de'ang 'khor thams
103b4(dkon brtsegs): cad shes par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim pa skyed pa/ 'khor thams cad
103b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skyed pa dang / snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa/ de kho na nyid de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid/ mi
103b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba nyid/ mi 'khrugs pa nyid/ 'byung ba med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do//
103b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa med pa 'thab pa med pa'o// de bzhin nyid dang mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams
104a1(dkon brtsegs): cad la thogs pa med do/ / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa'i chos dang
104a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan zhing / snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i sems kyi bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams zhi bar bya ba dang / spang bar bya ba'i chos ston to// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i
104a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa mtha' yas mu med pa ras/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa de nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de
104a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyid med/ the tsom mi za ba nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du
104a5(dkon brtsegs): shes skyed do/ / shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa gsum pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du gshegs nas zhes bya ba
104a6(dkon brtsegs): nas/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang
104a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas sems can rnams gal la brten pas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba/ 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zang par 'gyur ba'i lam rab
104b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen te/ de la 'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i lam ma yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis chos dang mthun par rgol bar byed mi nus so// nges par 'byung ba'i
104b2(dkon brtsegs): lam gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam ste/ gang sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'o// nges par 'byung ba'i chos gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/
104b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang / lhag mthong ngo // nges par 'byung ba'i chos gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// nges par
104b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i chos bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa dang / tshor bar gtogs pa'i dran pa dang / sems su gtogs pa'i dran pa dang / chos su
104b5(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa'i dran pa ste/ 'di ni nges par 'byung ba bzhi'o// nges par 'byung ba'i chos lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /
104b6(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ 'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i chos lnga'o// nges par 'byung ba'i chos drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di
104b7(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su
105a1(dkon brtsegs): dran pa ste/ 'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i chos drug go/ nges par 'byung ba'i chos 'dun te/ 'dun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
105a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs
105a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ 'di bdun yang gong ma bzhin no//
105a4(dkon brtsegs): nges par 'byung ba'i chos brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i
105a5(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i
105a6(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin te/ 'di brgyad kyang gong ma bzhin no// mchog tu dga' ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa'i chos dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mchog tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang /
105a7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu sbyangs pa dang / bde ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes mthong ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
105b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba ste/ 'di dgurang gong ma bzhin no// nges par 'byung ba'i chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mo// 'di lta ste/ srog
105b2(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa spangs pa dang / ma byin par len pa spangs pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa dang / brdzun du smra ba spangs pa dang / phra ma spangs pa dang / ngag rtsub po spangs
105b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / tshig bkyil pa spangs pa dang / brnab sems spangs pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / yang dag par lta ba ste/ 'di'ang gong ma bzhin no// lam de ni nges par
105b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dge ba ji snyed pa tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ shes rab kyi phung
105b5(dkon brtsegs): po dang ldan pa 'am/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang ldan pa de dag kyang nges
105b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung ba'i lam zhes bya'o/ / gzhan yang nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni yang dag par sgrub pa gang yin pa ste/ gang yang dag par sgrub pa de la ni/ chos gang yang sogs pa 'am/
105b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bri ba 'am/ blang ba 'am/ dor ba 'am/ gzung ba 'am/ spang ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par sgrub pa la zhugs pa ni gnyis la blo mi 'jug ste/ chos thams cad gnyis
106a1(dkon brtsegs): su med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes mthong ba ni nges par 'byung ba'i lam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams la nges par 'byung ba'i lam yang
106a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rab tu ston to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de'ang 'khor thams cad shes par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim
106a3(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim pa skyed pa/ 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skyed pa/ snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis
106a4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa/ de kho na nyid/ de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid mi 'gyur ba nyid/ mi 'khrugs pa nyid/ 'byung ba med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid de/ de
106a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa med pa 'thab pa med pa'o// de bzhin nyid dang mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings
106a6(dkon brtsegs): ngos mnyam pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med pa'o// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal
106a7(dkon brtsegs): du med/ dpag tu med/ brjod du med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying rje chen pos zin pa'i sems kyis sems can rnams la nges par 'byung ba'i lam yang dag par rab tu ston te/ de so sor
106b1(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pas sems can der 'jug pa rnams de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad cing nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs
106b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste
106b3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/
106b4(dkon brtsegs): ro// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi mtha' yas mu med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na shA ri'i bu nam mkha' mtha' yas su med pa de bzhin du
106b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang mtha' yas mu med do/ / sems can thams cad kyis zad par mi 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi
106b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do/ / byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
106b7(dkon brtsegs): de thos nas mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
107a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// chos kun
107a2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid mnyam par/ / rang byung bas ni rjes su rtogs// de phyir yang dag mngon sangs rgyas// de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa gzigs// so so'i skye bo'i
107a3(dkon brtsegs): chos gang yin/ / de dag sangs rgyas chos dang mnyam// slob dang mi slob chos rnams dang // rang rgyal gyi ni chos nyid dang // gang dag 'jig rten chos rnams dang // gang dag
107a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'das chos dang / / dge dang mi dge mi g.yo rnams// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam dang 'dra// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med// smon lam dag ni rnam par spangs//
107a5(dkon brtsegs): ma skyes mngon par 'du mi byed// 'di ni mnyam pa nyid du bstan// 'di dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs nas// thub pa chen po mi 'jigs pa// gang gis sems can grol 'gyur ba//
107a6(dkon brtsegs): / de bzhin du yang rab tu ston// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par grol// rnam par thar pa rab tu ston// mi dbang gi ni mi 'jigs pa// gnyis pa yang dag rab tu bstan// rgyal bas
107a7(dkon brtsegs): gang chos rjes su sangs rgyas pa/ / ma bsten par ni rnam par grol mi 'thob// bag med pa dang khrel ba med gyur dang // gang la ngo tsha ci yang med pa dang // lus dang ngag rnams
107b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ni yid kyis sa/ / gang dag sdom pa rnam yang yod min dang // 'dun dang zhe sdang gti mug 'jigs pa dang / srog gcod pa dang gzhan la 'tsho ba dang // gzhan gyi chung ma
107b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin brdzun dang chang / / nga rgyal mi gus de bzhin bdun pa'o// gang dag log par smra ba brgyad pa ste// thams cad rnam par grol ba'i lam rgyun gcod// gang dag mnar sems
107b3(dkon brtsegs): dgu dang nyes mang dang / / mi dge bcu yi las kyi lam rnams dang // gang dag tshul min zhi ba mi shes pa// de dag la ni nam yang thar pa med// phyin ci log la zhugs par rig gyur
107b4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ / bag med yang dag ma yin smra la chags// rgyal ba rnams kyi mi 'jigs gsum pa ste// chos nyid 'di dag la ni bsnyen par bya// gang dag rnam sbyong sgo ni tshad med la// mi/
107b5(dkon brtsegs): gang ston pa byang chub reg par 'gyur// rgyal ba nyid kyis ma thos thams cad rig/ shes nas mi 'chir 'gro ba'i chos 'chad do// ji tsam dge ba'i chos ni ming yod pa// byang chub
107b6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs dge rgyal bas bsngags pa la/ / bsten pa rnam par thar pa mi 'thob pa// gnas med par ni stobs bcu rnams kyis bshad// tshul bzhin gyis ni nyon mongs mang po zhi//
107b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag chos dge mnyam pa med ldan zhing // chos dang chos ma yin la de mi chags// zhi ba mya ngan med pa rnam grol reg/ gsog gsob nam mkha' 'dra zhing ya ma brla// sgyu ma'i
108a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs 'dra nam mkha' lta bu dang / / dge chos rnam pa gang gis rab shes pa// de ni srid pa'i mtsho las thar par 'gyur// thub pa stobs bcu rnams kyi chos
108a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni/ / 'gro ba gang mos srid par 'gro ba la// snying rje snying brtse byas nas thar byed de// mi 'jigs bzhi pa nam mkha' 'dra ba'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de
108a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi mi byed/ the tsom mi za ba nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
108a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do/ / shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis
108a5(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa la mngon par dad / yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi mi byed/ the tsom mi za ba nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed ce na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
108a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni sems can thams cad rjes su mi gtong zhing rtag tu 'jug pa/ sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba ste// phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o// de bzhin
108a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po de'ang ji ltar ngag gi las kyis kyang khong du chud par bya ba sla ba ma yin pa de ltar tshad med/ de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab/ de ltar mtshungs pa med/ de ltar
108b1(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med/ de ltar brjod du med/ de ltar mi zad cing khong du chud par dka' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub thob pa de ltar sems can la de bzhin
108b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug ste/ byang chub ci 'dra ba snying rje chen po'ang de 'dra'o// de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub ji ltar thob ce na/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa/
108b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas med pa'i byang chub thob bo// de la rtsa ba gang / gnas gang zhe na/ 'jig tshogs ni rtsa ba'o// yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa ni gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pas
108b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir de dag mnyam par mkhyen te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa/ gnas med pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya ste
108b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di dag ni rtsa ba med pa gnas med par mi shes pas/ de dag shes par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go//
108b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub ni zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba'o// de ji ltar zhi / ji ltar nye bar zhi zhe na/ nang zhi ba'o// phyi rol nye bar zhi de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig ni
108b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/ de'i rang bzhin 'di yin pas na/ de'i phyir zhi ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang yid ni bdag dang bdag gis
109a1(dkon brtsegs): stong ste/ de'i rang bzhin 'di yin pas na/ de'i phyir zhi ba zhes byan// de mig stong par yongs su shes nas/ gzugs la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi
109a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ / yid kyi bar du'ang stong par yongs su shes nas/ chos la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// sems can 'di dag ni zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba 'di mi shes te// de dag
109a3(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ngas ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar byang chub mngon
109a4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / ji ltar 'od gsal zhe na/ rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ste nam mkha' lta bu'o// nam mkha' ni rang bzhin no// nam
109a5(dkon brtsegs): mkha' ni rjes su 'brang ba'o/ / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa ste/ de ni rang bzhin gyis shin tu 'od gsal bas na/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba 'di khong du ma chud pas/
109a6(dkon brtsegs): byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams glo bur gyi nyon mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs te/ sems can rnams rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba 'di mi shes pas/ de dag rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba
109a7(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ngas ni blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med par byang chub
109b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / de la blang ba med pa gang / dor ba med pa gang zhe na/ blang ba med pa zhes bya ni chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa'o// dor ba med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad
109b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'dzin pa med pa'o/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pas blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i chu bo mnyam pa nyid du gzigs te/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas tshu rol med pa dang /
109b3(dkon brtsegs): pha rol med par gzigs pa de ltar/ chos thams cad tshu rol dang pha rol dang bral bar de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes
109b4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen
109b5(dkon brtsegs): po 'jug go/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ngas mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa med par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de la mtshan ma med pa gang /
109b6(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa med pa gang zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o// gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni dmigs pa med pa'o// yid kyi rnam par
109b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i bar du mi dmigs pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o/ / chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni dmigs pa med pa'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa med
110a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo/ / 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang zhe na/ khams gsum pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul te/ gang 'phags pa
110a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams spyod yul de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/
110a3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu byang chub ni 'das pa ma yin// ma 'ongs pa ma yin// da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ dus gsum mnyam pa/ 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa'o//
110a4(dkon brtsegs): de la 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa gang zhe na/ gang 'das pa la sems mi 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa la rnam par shes pa rjes su mi rgyug pa dang / da ltar byung ba la yid la byed
110a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mi 'jug pa ste/ de sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pas 'das pa la mi rtog/ ma 'ongs pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ da ltar byung ba la spros
110a6(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed pa 'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin na/ sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can
110a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ / shA ri'i bu ngas byang chub ni lus med pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par
110b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas te/ de ni mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin no// 'dus ma
110b2(dkon brtsegs): byas zhes bya ba ni gang ma skyes pa/ mi 'jig pa/ mi gnas pa de ni 'khor gsum dang bral ba 'dus ma byas zhes bya'o// 'dus ma byas ji lta bar 'dus byas kyang de ltar khong du
110b3(dkon brtsegs): du chud par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de ni dngos po med pa'o// gang dngos po med pa de la gnyis med de/ lus med pa/ mngon par
110b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas pa de sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go//
110b5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bungs byang chub ni dbyer med pa'i gnas su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de la dbyer med pa gang / gnas gang zhe na/ de la de bzhin nyid ni gnas so//
110b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// chos kyi dbyings ni gnas so// tha dad pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnas so// g.yo ba med pa ni dbyer med
110b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / stong pa nyid ni gnas so// dmigs su med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// mtshan ma med pa ni gnas so// rnam par mi rtog pa ni dbyer med pa'o// smon pa med pa'i
111a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas so/ / 'jug pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// sems can med pa ni gnas so// sems can med pa'i rang bzhin ri dbyer med pa'o// nam mtha'
111a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas so/ / mi dmigs pa ni dbyer med pa'o// mi skye ba ni gnas so// mi 'gag pa ni dbyer med pa'o// 'dus ma byas ni gnas so// rgyu ba med pa ni dbyer med pa'o//
111a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ni gnas so// nye bar zhi ba ni dbyer med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa ni gnas so// mngon par mi 'grub pa ni dbyer meng pa'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu dbyer med pa'i gnas
111a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// shA ri'i bu byang chub ni
111a5(dkon brtsegs): lus kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/ sems kyis kyang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus ni bems po g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa med pa/ rtswa dang / rtsig pa dang /
111a6(dkon brtsegs): shing dang / rdo dang / mig yor lta bu'o// sems ni sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla lta bu ste/ gang gis lus dang sems de ltar khong du chud pa de ni byang chub ces bya'o// byang chub ni tha
111a7(dkon brtsegs): snyad tsam du bzung ba ste/ byang chub ni lus sam/ sems sam/ chos sam/ chos ma yin pa 'am/ yang dag pa'am/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'am/ bden pa'am/ brdzun
111b1(dkon brtsegs): pa gang gis kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni chos thams cad kyis brjod par bya ba ma yin te/ byang chub la gang gis kyang tshig gi tha snyad du 'gyur ba'i gnas
111b2(dkon brtsegs): cung zad kyang med do/ / ji ltar nam mkha' gnas med cing tshig med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub kyang gnas med pa brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
111b3(dkon brtsegs): du tshol ba na/ chos thams cad tshig med pa ste/ chos la tshig med/ tshig la'ang chos med do// de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul mi shes shing khong du ma chud pas/ de khong du chud
111b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub ni gzung ba med pa/ kun gzhi med pa'o// de la gzung
111b5(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa gang / kun gzhi med pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig yongs su shes pa ni gzung ba med pa'i// gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni kun gzhi med pa'o//
111b6(dkon brtsegs): yid kyi bar du yongs su shes pa ni gzung ba med pa'o// chos mi dmigs pa ni kun gzhi med pa ste/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas gzung ba med pa/ kun gzhi med
111b7(dkon brtsegs): par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ mig mi 'dzin pa dang / gzugs kun gzhi med pas rnam par shes pa
112a1(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas so/ / yid kyi bar du mi 'dzin cing chos kun gzhi med pas rnam par shes pa mi gnas so// de rnam par shes pa mi gnas pas sems can thamacad kyi sems
112a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi gnas shes so/ / ji ltar shes she na/ sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas ni bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs ni sems kyi gnas so//
112a3(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed ni sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas te/ 'di bzhi ni sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas so// gnas de'ang gnas pa
112a4(dkon brtsegs): med par de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ gnas med pa'i mtha' 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la/
112a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// shA ri'i bu byang chub ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// stong pa nyid gang gis byang chub stong pa/ stong
112a6(dkon brtsegs): ba nyid des chos thams cad stong ste/ de dag stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas mod kyi/ stong pa nyid kyis
112a7(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni ma yin pas/ stong pa nyid dam/ byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni tshul gcig pa'i ye shes so// de la gnyis po gang gis stong pa
112b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang / byang chub tu gnyis su dbye ba'i gnyis gang yang med do// chos de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ ming med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ 'jug pa med pa/ ra
112b2(dkon brtsegs): tu rgyu ba med pa/ spyod pa med pa'o// gang stong pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par chags pa dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'o// don dam par chos gang yang mi dmigs te/ stong pa gang
112b3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de stong pa zhes bya'o/ / ji ltar nam mkha' nam mkha' zhes kyang bya la/ nam mkha' ni brjod par bya ba'ang ma yin no// de bzhin du stong pa stong pa zhes kyang bya la
112b4(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ / 'di lta ste/ ming tsam du tha snyad 'dogs pa 'di ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa ste/ ming de'ang yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas
112b5(dkon brtsegs): so/ / ji ltar ming yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas pa de bzhin du/ chos gang ming gis tha snyad du 'dogs pa'i chos de'ang yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas te/
112b6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mkhyen to// thogs ma nas ma skyes ma byung bar de ltar mkhyen pas de ltar rnam par grol to// bcings pa'ang med// grol ba'ang
112b7(dkon brtsegs): med na/ dbyis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/
113a1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu byang chub ni nam mkha' dang mnyam ste/ nam mkha' ni mnyam pa'ang ma yin/ mi mnyam pa'ang ma yin no// byang chub kyang mnyam pa'ang ma yin/
113a2(dkon brtsegs): mi mnyam pa'ang ma yin te/ de ji ltar chos rnams yang dag par yongs su grub pa med pa de mnyam pa 'am/ mi mnyam pa zhes brjod pa ma yin no// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
113a3(dkon brtsegs): pas chos thams cad mnyam pa'ang ma yin/ mi mnyam pa'ang ma yin par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ji ltar chos rdul tsam yang mnyam par byas pa'ang ma yin//
113a4(dkon brtsegs): mi mnyam par byas pa'ang ma yin pa de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// chos ji snyed pa de dag kyang yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis shes so// yang dag pa'i ye shes
113a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ chos ma byung ba rnams 'byung ba dang / byung nas 'jig par 'gyur ba de dag ni bdag po med par 'byung / bdag po med par 'jig ste/ rkyen gyis 'byung ba dang 'jig
113a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur zhing / 'di la 'jug pa 'am/ ldog pa gang yang med de/ lam bcad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston to// lam bcad pa 'di sems can rnams kyis
113a7(dkon brtsegs): khong du mi chud bas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ shA ri'i bu byang chub de ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas so//
113b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ji lta bar gzugs kyang de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'byung ngo // byang chub ji lta ba bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang
113b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'byung ngo // byang chub ji lta ba bzhin du sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang de bzhin te/
113b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'byung ngo // byang chub ji lta ba bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/ yid kyi khams
113b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnams par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'o// chos rnams kyi btags pa ni 'di tsam du zad de/ de ni phung po dang / khams dang
113b5(dkon brtsegs): skye mched rnams su btags pa ste/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// phyin ci ma log par mngon par rdzogs par
113b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas pas nA/ sngon ji lta bar byis kyang de bzhin/ bar du'ang de bzhin te/ sngon gyi mtha' nas ma skyes/ phyi ma'i mthar mi 'ba'o// bar du'ang dben pa ste/ de ltar
113b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas yin no/ / gcig ji lta bar thams cad kyang de bzhin no// thams cad ji lta bar gcig kyang de bzhin te/ ji lta ba bzhin ni gcig kam/ mang po
114a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro/ / ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas te/ sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs
114a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub ri rnam pa la 'jug pa/ rnam pa med pa la zhugs so// de la rnam pa gang / rnam pa med pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu rnam
114a3(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i chos rnams rtsom pa'o/ / rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o// rnam pa zhes bya ba ni mi gnas pa'i sems kyi gnas so// rnam pa
114a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / rnam pa zhes bya ba ni sems gzhal ba dang / bgrang ba dang / so sor rtog pa'o// rnam pa med pa zhes bya
