114a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ni gzhal ba las yang dag par 'das pa'o/ / gzhal ba las yang dag par 'das pa gang zhe na/ gang na rnam par shes pa'i las med pa'o// rnam pa zhes bya ba ni gang na 'dus byas
114a6(dkon brtsegs): la so sor rtog pa'o/ / rnam pa med pa ni 'dus ma byas mngon sum du byed pa ste/ rnam pa dang rnam pa med pa la 'jug pa 'di byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de
114a7(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub ni zag pa med pa/ len pa med pa'o// de la zag
114b1(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa gang / len pa med pa gang zhe na/ zag pa med pa zhes bya ba ni/ zag pa bzhi dang bral ba ste/ 'dod pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / srid pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang /
114b2(dkon brtsegs): ma rig pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / lta ba'i zag pa dang bral ba'o// nye bar len pa med pa zhes bya ba ni/ len pa bzhi dang bral ba ste/ 'dod pa'i len pa bral ba dang / sring
114b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i len pa dang bral ba dang / lta ba'i len pa dang bral ba dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi len pa dang bral ba'o// de la nye bar len pa bzhi po de dag thams cad ni ma rig
114b4(dkon brtsegs): pas ldongs par byas pa dang / sred pa'i chus g.yogs pa dang / bdag tu mngon par chags pas phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched len to// de la de bzhin gshegs pas
114b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag nye bar len pa'i rtsa ba yongs su mkhyen pa'i phyir/ bdag rnam par dag pas sems can rnam par dag par mkhyen to// bdag rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de la yongs su rtog
114b6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang gis tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed par 'gyur ba'i yongs su rtog pa gang yang med de/ de ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pas ma rig pa kun nas mi spong ngo // ma rig
114b7(dkon brtsegs): pa kun nas mi slong bas srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis kun nas mi ldang ba de ni skye ba med pa'o/ / gang skye ba med pa de ni nges par gyur pa'o// gang nges par gyur pa de ni nges pa'i don du//
115a1(dkon brtsegs): gang nges pa'i don de ni don dam pa'o// gang don dam pa de gang zag med pa'i don to// gang gang zag med pa'i don de brjod du med pa'i don to// gang brjod du
115a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i don de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to/ / gang rten cing 'brel 'byung ba'i don de chos kyi don to// gang chos kyi don de de bzhin gshegs pa'i don to// gang de bzhin
115a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i don de chos kyi don te/ de'i phyir sus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong ngo // sus chos mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ 'di ltar
115a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid du btsal na ci'ang mi mthong ba de ltar mthong ngo / / de la ci'ang zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'o// gang gis mtshan ma
115a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa mthong ba des yang dag pa mthong ste/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mnyam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//
115a6(dkon brtsegs): zag pa med pa dang / len pa med pa 'di byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po
115a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug go/ shA ri'i bu byang chub ni dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o// de la dag pa gang / dri ma med pa gang / nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhen/
115b1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid ni dag pa'o// mtshan ma med pa ni dri ma med pa'o// smon pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// skye ba med pa ni dag pa'o// mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni dri ma med pa'o//
115b2(dkon brtsegs): bar len pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// rang bzhin ni dag pa'o// yongs su dag pa ni dri ma med pa'o// 'od gsal ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// spros pa med pa ni dag pa'o//
115b3(dkon brtsegs): ma spros pa ni dri ma med pa'o// spros pa nye bar zhi ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// de bzhin nyid ni dag pa'o// chos kyi dbyings ni dri ma med pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o//
115b4(dkon brtsegs): go 'byed pa ni dag pa'o// nam mkha' ni dri ma med pa'o// nam mkha' ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// nang yongs su shes pa ni dag pa'o// phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba ni dri ma med pa'o// phyi/
115b5(dkon brtsegs): dang nang mi dmigs pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// phung po yongs su shes pa ni dag pa'o// khams kyi rang bzhin ni dri ma med pa'o// skye mched spong ba ni nyon mongs pa med
115b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / 'das pa la zad pa shes pa ni dag pa'o// ma 'ongs pa la mi skye ba shes pa ni dri ma med pa'o// da ltar byung ba la chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i ye shes ni nyon mongs
115b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa ste/ de ltar dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa gnas gcig tu 'jug par 'gyur ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ zhi ba'i gnas so// gang zhing de ni
116a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu zhi ba/ de ni nye bar zhi ba ste/ thub pa zhes bya'o// de skabs na ji ltar nanam+b+ha mkha'aji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no// byang chub ji lta bar chos kyang
116a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no/ / chos ji lta bar sems can yang de bzhin no// sems can ji lta bar zhing de bzhin no// zhing ji lta bar mya ngan las 'das pa'ang de bzhin no// de bas na chos
116a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ste/ mthar thug pa'i rnam pas gnyen po med do// gnyen po med pa'i rnam pas thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'o// thog
116a4(dkon brtsegs): ma nas dri ma med pa'o/ / thog ma nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar gzugs can dang / gzugs med pa'i chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs
116a5(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can gyi khams la rnam par gzigs shing / sems can rnams la dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pas rnam par rol pa
116a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ / de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med par lhun gyis grub pas rtag tu
116a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug ste/ phyis gtang bar bya ba med cing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus par thogs pa med do// de ltar shA ri'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje
116b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po ni mtha' yas su med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po'i mtha' 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do// byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
116b2(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za ba nas/ nam mkha'i lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar
116b3(dkon brtsegs): pang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// rtsa ba med
116b4(dkon brtsegs): cing gnas med par/ / sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/ ji ltar rtogs pa de bzhin du// srog chags rnams ni kun la ston// nang gi mig ni stong pa ste// phyi rol
116b5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyang stong pa'o/ / zhi dang nye bar zhi ba yi// sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/ zhi dang nye bar zhi ba de// sems can khong du ma chud pas// tshig don rtogs nas
116b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can la/ / de dag la ni snying rje 'jug/ byang chub rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing // rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba de// sems can rnams kyis mi shes pas// de
116b7(dkon brtsegs): dag la yang snying rje 'jug/ chos rnams kun la 'dzin pa dang // rab tu 'dzin pa yod ma yin// blang med dor ba med pa yi// sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/ sems
117a1(dkon brtsegs): can 'di dag mi shes pas/ / de dag la ni snying rje 'jug/ mtshan ma med cing dmigs pa med// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul 'di// byis pa'i spyod
117a2(dkon brtsegs): yul ma yin pa/ / sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/ gang dag mi mkhas bcings pa yi// so so'i skye bos mi shes pas// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la// snying rje
117a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po rab tu 'jug/ rang bzhin gyis ni 'dus ma byas// skye ba med cing 'jig pa med// de la gnas pa yod min te// mtshan nyid gsum las rnam par grol// 'dus byas rnams
117a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin ni/ / byis pas khong du mi chud pas// de dag la yang snying rje 'jug/ tshul 'di gang gis sangs rgyas pa// byang chub lus kyis mi rtogs te// sems kyis kyang ni
117a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang mi rgya/ / lus ni bems po'i rang bzhin te// sems kyang sgyu ma lta bu'o// lus dang sems kyi rang bzhin te// byis pas khong du ma chud pas// tshul 'di khong du chud gyur
117a6(dkon brtsegs): nas/ / de dag la ni snying rje 'jug/ rang byung bas ni byang chub dam pa rgya chen mchog reg ste// shing mchog drung du bzhugs nas sems can khams la rnam par gzigs// 'khor
117a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'khor lor zhugs shing 'gro rgyud sna tshogs 'khyam gyur pa/ / de dag gzigs nas sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi zang 'jug/ nga dang rgyags pa dag la chags shing lta ba'i dra bas
117b1(dkon brtsegs): gzings/ / sdug bsngal bde dang mi rtag rtag dang sdug par 'du shes shing // bdag dang sems can dang ni srog tu lta bar chags pa rnams// gzigs nas de dag la ni sangs
117b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas snying rje mi zad 'jug/ sems can khams ni gti mug ling tog khebs shing bsgribs pa kun// nyi ma sprin khebs bzhin du snang med lam mer mi 'gyur ba// de dag
117b3(dkon brtsegs): gzigs nas ye shes snang ba dri med 'od bya zhes/ / de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi zad 'jug/ ngan tshogs 'gro bar zhugs shing lam stong rab tu 'khyams pa
117b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams/ / sems can sems can dmyal dang dud 'gro yi dgas rgyud lhung ba// de dag gzigs nas sngon gyi rgyal bas bsnyen pa'i lam bsten ces// de dag la yang sangs
117b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi zad 'jug/ de bzhin nyid ltar de bzhin nyid du chos rnams thams cad ni// nam mkha' mtshungs 'dra de dag ma bcings ma grol rab mkhyen te// 'gro ba dag
117b6(dkon brtsegs): cing bzang ba'i chos rnams mi shes gzigs nas su/ / de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi zad 'jug/ de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
117b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ nam mkha' lta
118a1(dkon brtsegs): bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do/ / / bam po bdun pa/ yang shA ri'i bu
118a2(dkon brtsegs): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed ce na/
118a3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di dag ste/ chos de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang
118a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyi 'che ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i
118a5(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir lus kyi 'khrul pa gang las byis pa 'am/ mkhas
118a6(dkon brtsegs): ba chos dang mthun par rgol bar byed pa'i lus kyi 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lus kyi las 'khrul pa med
118a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam mdzes pas kun tu gzigs pa dang / rnam par gzigs pa dang / bskum pa dang / sbyang ba dang / chos gos snam sbyar dang /
118b1(dkon brtsegs): chos gos dang / lhung bzed bsnams pa dang / mngon du gshegs pa dang / slar gshegs pa dang / byon pa dang / bzhud pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang /
118b2(dkon brtsegs): mnal ba dang / grong dang grong khyer du 'jug pa dang 'byung ba na zhabs kyi mthil sa la mi reg ste/ 'khor lo rtsibs stong pas las 'byung zhing / dri yid du 'ong ba'i pad+ma mngon par 'byung
118b3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'jog go// de la gang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la reg na/ de dag zhag bdun
118b4(dkon brtsegs): du rab tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ shi phos nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la chos gos sor bzhi tsam gyis mi reg
118b5(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi/ rnam par 'thor rlung gis kyang bzlog par mi nus so// sku'i 'od kyis mnar med pa'i bar gyi sems can bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i
118b6(dkon brtsegs): sku la 'khrul pa med ces bya'o/ / yang shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir ngag 'khrul pa gang las byis pa 'am/ mkhas pa chos dang mthun pas rgol bar byed pa'i ngag gi 'khrul pa de
118b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus su smra ba/ yang dag par smra ba/ bden par smra ba/ tshigs su smra ba/ ji skad smras
119a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du byed pa'o/ / shin tu nges pa'i tshig go// sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i tshig go// mi zlos pa'i tshig go/ don dang yi ges shin tu brgyan
119a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig go/ skad cig brjod pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ngag gi las 'khrul pa med ces bya'o//
119a3(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu sems 'khrul pa gang las byis pa 'am/ mkhas pa chos dang mthun pas rgol bar byed pa'i sems kyi 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med do// de ci'i
119a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i dngos po mi 'dor zhing sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad byed kyang sems der mi gtong zhing chos thams cad
119a5(dkon brtsegs): la de'i chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sems 'khrul pa med ces bya'o// ji ltar de'i sems 'khrul pa med par de ltar
119a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi sems 'khrul pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang po'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ca co gang las bdud dam/
119a7(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'am/ gzhan mu stegs can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba'i ca co de bzhin gshegs pa la med do// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co'am/
119b1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su ca co 'byin pa med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral ba ste/ de sems can thams cad kyis bkur sti byas kyang mthos par mi sems
119b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyis bkur sti ma byas kyang 'khrug pa med do/ / de gang las 'gyod pa 'am/ rjes su ca co 'byin par 'gyur ba'i bya ba mchog gam/ mthar phyin pa
119b3(dkon brtsegs): ci'ang de bzhin gshegs pa la med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten dang mi rtsod pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni
119b4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa ste/ nga'i ba med/ 'dzin pa med/ len pa med/ mdud pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co med do//
119b5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar de la ca co med pa de ltar sems can thams cad kyi ca co thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang
119b6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu bsnyel ba gang las chos gang la'ang rmongs par 'gyur ba'i bsnyel ba de bzhin gshegs pa la med do/ / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
119b7(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par 'jug pa la thogs pa med cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / g.yo ba la rnam par lta ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la rmongs pa med do// so sor
120a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs par chos ston pa'i phyir kun tu nyams pa med do/ / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar la thog pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i phyir don dang
120a2(dkon brtsegs): chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la kun tu nyams pa med do// ji ltar bdag kun tu nyams pa med cing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang
120a3(dkon brtsegs): da ltar thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba de ltar/ sems can thams cad brjed ngas par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gsum
120a4(dkon brtsegs): par/ gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems mi dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam
120a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs sam/ sanal tam/ the shos gsol lam/ gsung ngam/ cang mi gsung bar gyur kyang rung ste/ rtag tu mnyam par bzhag cing ting nge 'dzin zab mo ngam pa'i mthar
120a6(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na/ sems can gang mnyam par
120a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhag kyang rung / mnyam par ma gzhag kyang rung ste/ su'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems la lta bar nus pa med do// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam par gzha
120b1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar/ ting nge 'dzin la lta bas sems can rnams la chos ston te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bzhi pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu
120b2(dkon brtsegs): de tha dad pa'i 'du shes gang las sems mi mnyam par gnas par 'gyur ba'i tha dad pa'i 'du shes de bzhin gshegs pa la med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' bzhin du zhing
120b3(dkon brtsegs): mi zad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la zhing tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do/ / rang bzhin gyis tha dad pa med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sems can tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do//
120b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings dbyer med cing mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid
120b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la chos tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems can la'ang rjes su chags pa med/ tshul
120b6(dkon brtsegs): khrims 'chal ba la'ang khong khro ba med/ / phan par gyur pa'ang lan du phan 'dogs pa med/ gnod par gyur pa la'ang gnod par byed pa med/ 'dul bar 'os pa la'ang mnyam
120b7(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du ma yin/ log par nges pa'i sems can la'ang smod pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad la mnyam par gnas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
121a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la tha dad pa'i 'du shes med ces bya'o/ / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la tha dad pa'i 'du shes med de ltar/ sems can thams cad kyi tha dad pa'i 'du shes spang
121a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir chos ston te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lnga pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la so sor ma brtags pa'i btang
121a3(dkon brtsegs): snyoms med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni lam bsgoms pa'i yin te/ lam ma bsgoms pa'i ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang
121a4(dkon brtsegs): snyoms ni sems bsgoms pa dang / tshul khrims bsgoms pa dang / shes rab bsgoms pa'i yon te/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa'i ma yin no// de bzhin gshes pa'i btang
121a5(dkon brtsegs): snyoms ni ye shes dang ldan pa'i yin te/ gti mug dang ldan pa'i ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yin gyi/ 'jig rten pa'i rnam par
121a6(dkon brtsegs): lhung ba ma yin no/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba yin la/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// de bzhin
121a7(dkon brtsegs): gshes pa'i btang snyoms ni tshangs pa'i 'khor lo skor ba ste/ sems can la snying rje dang bral ba ni ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni rang gi ngang gis sgrub pa ste/
121b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyen po'i rjes su song ba ni ma yin no// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms de ni mtho ba'ang ma yin/ dma' ba'ang ma yin te/ mtho dman med par gnas
121b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ mi g.yo bar gyur pa/ gnyis dang bral ba/ rtog pa dang sel ba las shin tu 'das pa/ dus la lta ba/ dus las ma yol ba/ mi g.yo ba/ rlom sem
121b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ ma brtags pa/ rnam par ma brtags pa/ ma bsgoms pa/ bstan du med pa/ yang dag pa/ de kho na/ de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/
121b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i btang snyoms phun su tshogs pas/ sems can thams cad btang snyoms yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i
121b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa drug pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med pa'o// de la 'dun
121b6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'o// de'ang gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// snying rje chen po la 'dun pa nyams pa
121b7(dkon brtsegs): med do/ / chos ston pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// sems can 'dul ba la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// rab tu dben pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// byang chub sems par yang dag
122a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzud pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/ / dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi gcod pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin
122a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi/ ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dun pa'o// sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen par 'dun pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos
122a3(dkon brtsegs): ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'dun pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus nyams pa med do// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
122a4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i sems can yal bar mi 'dor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / chos nyan pa la brnyas pa med pa'i brtson 'grus so// gal te de bzhin gshegs pas
122a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sde snod nyan pa/ gang bskal par nyan kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu brnyes na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang chos ston cing zhal zas dang bral ba'i rgyud kyis bskal par yang mi
122a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhengs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la lta bas tha na gang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gcig gi phyir yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'da' zhing bzhud
122a7(dkon brtsegs): de/ de bzhin gshes pa la lu sa ngal ba'am/ ngagangal ba 'am/ sems ngal ba med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa'o// brtson 'grus brtsams pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi
122b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa gsung ba ste/ brtson 'grus kyis yang dag par rab tu sbyor ba/ gang gis sems can 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus de sems can rnams la bsngag
122b2(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad de/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa
122b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi thams cad du dran pa nyams pa med cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa ni bsnyel ba med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
122b4(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag tu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud la rnam par bltas kyang // de la de bzhin gshegs pa la phyis
122b5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dran pa bsnyel ba med do/ / sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes kyang / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes phyis gtang bar bya ba med do// phung po gsum du rnam par gzhag
122b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi bsam par 'jug pa la sems can gyi spyod pa rnam par lta bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa yongs su nyams pa med do// de bzhin
122b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i dran pa ni dran par bya ba dang / bsam par bya ba dang / brtag par bya ba med kyang / sems can rnams la chos ston pa 'bri bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
123a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar de'i dran pa nyams pa med do// de ji ltar dran pas bdag dran zhing mi brjed pa de bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs
123a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa'o// gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de ni chos thams cad
123a3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid de/ chos thams cad mi mnyam pa ma yin no// chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin pa'o// ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin las mi nyams she na/ de bzhin nyid gang dang
123a4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam mo/ / ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa de bzhin nyid kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la zhugs pas de'i phyir mnyam pa zhes bya'o// 'dod
123a5(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa 'dod chags med pa'i mtha' de dang mnyam mo/ / zhe sdang gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa zhe sdang med pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo// gti mug gi mtha' gang
123a6(dkon brtsegs): dang mnyam pa gti mug med pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo/ / 'dus byas kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa 'dus ma byas kyi mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo// 'khor ba'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa mya ngan
123a7(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo/ / mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med ces bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mnyam
123b1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid mi nyams/ yongs su mi nyams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de'ang mig dang ldan pa ma yin/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang ldan pa ma yin
123b2(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin ni sa'i khams la mi gnas/ chu dang / me dang / rlung gi khams la mi gnas/ 'dod pa dang / gzug
123b3(dkon brtsegs): dang gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas te/ mi gnas pas na nyams pa med do// de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med do//
123b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnyed par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o//
123b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab nyams pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad rab tu shes pa ste/ gzhan gyi dring
123b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jog pa'i shes pa'o/ / sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la chos go bar byed pa'i shes pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa'i zad pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa'o// tshig
123b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rab tu dbye ba shes pa'o/ / tshig gcig la 'jug pas bskal pa brgya stong du mi 'chad par ston pa shes pa'o// ji lta bu ci 'dra zhes dris pa ji lta ba bzhin du the tsom gcod pa'i shes
124a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i shes pa'o// theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa bstan pa shes pa'o// sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa brgyad khri zhi stong
124a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su shes pa'i shes pa'o/ / chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ci rigs par yang dag par rab tu ston pa shes pa'o// 'di ni shes rab mi zad pa bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
124a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes rab mtha' yas mu med zad mi shes pa'o/ / gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab ma nyams pa med pa de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi shes rab kyang mi zad par bya ba'i
124a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gcig pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba
124a5(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa med do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha'i rnam par grol ba gang zhe na/ nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'o// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol
124a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ni rkyen khong du chud pa'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni chags pa dang / gnyis su 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral bas rnam par grol ba zhes bya ste/ sngon
124a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi mtha' yang ma bcings/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi 'pho/ da ltar byung ba la'ang mi gnas so// mi dang gzugs la gnyis su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba'o// de bzhin du rna ba
124b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / s+tha dang / sna dang / dri dang / lde dang / ro dang / lus dang / reg bya la gnyis su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol te/ ma 'dzin/ mngon par mchags par gnas pa
124b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'o/ / sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba de bzhin du shes pas/ de'i phyir sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
124b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ / ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams la chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu
124b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gnyis pa'o/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngor du
124b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / / lus kyi las de dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pas kyang sems can 'dul/ gsung bas kyang sems can 'dul/ cang mi
124b6(dkon brtsegs): gsung bas kyang sems can 'dul/ bshos gsol bas kyang sems can 'dul/ spyod lam gyis kyang sems can 'dul/ mtshan gyis kyang sems can 'dul/ dpe byad bzang
124b7(dkon brtsegs): pos kyang sems can 'dul/ gtsug tor bltar mi snang ba dang / bltas pa tsam dang / 'od gtong ba dang / gom pa 'dor ba dang / 'jog pa dang / grong khyer du 'jug
125a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'byung bas kyang sems can 'dul te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyod lam gang gis kyang sems can 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba med do// de'i phyir
125a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
125a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bcu gsum pa'o/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs
125a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa'o/ / phyad par lung ston pa'o// shin tu nges pa'i tshig smra ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag de'ang kun shes par byed pa/
125a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes par byed pa/ mi mtho ba/ mi dma' ba/ ma yo ba/ 'dar 'dar po ma yin pa/ gya gyu med pa/ mi brlang ba// mi rtsub pa/ gzing gzing ba ma yin pa/ mnyen pa
125a6(dkon brtsegs): yid du 'ong ba/ ma 'chal pa/ lag log med pa/ mi 'tshe ba/ mi myur ba/ rag tu myur ba ma yin pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ shin tu nges pa'i tshig/ rab tu mnyen pa/ shin tu
125a7(dkon brtsegs): snyan pa/ dbyangs snyan pa/ rab tu gsal ba bsgrags pa/ des pa/ 'jam pa/ phan pa dang bcas pa/ dga' bar 'gyur ba/ mchod par 'gyur ba/ mdzes pa/ rdul med pa/ rdul
125b1(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba/ thab med pa/ dri ma med pa/ ma rmongs pa/ gsal ba/ thogs pa med pa/ yang dag par sbyor ba/ 'od gsal ba/ drang ba/ 'jungs pa ma yin pa/ dum bu ma yin pa/
125b2(dkon brtsegs): dig rig po ma yin pa/ bde ba skyed pa/ lus sim par byed pa/ sems tshim par byed pa// 'dod chags zhi bar byed pa/ zhe sdang zhi bar byed pa/ gti mug sel ba/ bdud 'jom pa/ sdig
125b3(dkon brtsegs): pa sel ba/ rgol ba 'dul ba/ gau bar byed pa/ rnga'i sgra la mkhas pa/ dga' bar byed pa/ ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangs/ dbang po'i sgra/ tshangs pa'i sba/ rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyi sgra/ sprin gyi sla/
125b4(dkon brtsegs): sa'i sgra dbyangs/ khrung khrung gi sgra/ rma bya'i sgra/ khu byug gi sgra/ shang shang te'u'i sgra/ ngang pa'i sgra skad/ ri dwags kyi rgyal po'i sgra/ khong hu dang / pi wang dang / 'khar rnga dang
125b5(dkon brtsegs): dung dang / sil snyan rab tu bsgrags pa'i sgra kun shes par 'gyur ba/ rnam par shes par 'gyur ba/ zur phyin pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ mnyan par 'os pa/ zab pa/ lkugs shing dag pa
125b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa/ bde ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ tshig dang yi ge ma nyams pa/ shin tu nges par smra ba/ tshig 'bru dang don gyi tshig dang ldan pa/ chos kyi tshig dang ldan pa/ dus dang ldan
125b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ tshong dang ldan pa/ dus las mi 'da' ba/ dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin par shes pas bstan pa/ sbyin pas brgyan pa/ tshul khrims kyis spangs pa/ bzod pas bsgrubs pa/
126a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyis 'bar bar byas pa/ bsam gtan gyis yid du 'ong bar byas pa/ shes rab kyis nges par brtags pa/ byams pas shin tu bsags pa/
126a2(dkon brtsegs): snying rjes mi skyo ba/ dga' bas 'od gsal ba/ btang snyoms nges par brtags pa/ theg pa gsum rnam par 'jog pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gcod pa/ phung po
126a3(dkon brtsegs): gsum 'jog pa/ rnam par thar pa gsum sbyong ba/ bden pa yongs su bsgoms pa/ ye shes yongs su bsgoms pa/ mkhas pas ma smad pa/ 'phags pas bstod pa/ nam
126a4(dkon brtsegs): mkha' tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'o// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag ni de 'dra ste/ de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi las
126a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bzhi pa'o// gzhan
126a6(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems kyis brjod pa ma yin/
126a7(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis ma yin/ rnam par shes pas ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes kyis rab tu phye ba ste/ ye shes kyi dbang du gyur pa'o// gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de'ang sems
126b1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su song ba'o/ / sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi rjes su zhugs pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa la las rab tu dben pa'o// chos thams
126b2(dkon brtsegs): cad la nges par sems pa'o/ / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'o// dmigs pa las shin tu 'das pa'o// rkyen las skye ba dang bral ba'o// srid pa gsum gyi 'gro ba sel
126b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'o/ / nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'o// bdud kyi las thams cad las nges par grol ba'o// sgra dang g.yo thams cad dang bral ba'o// ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa
126b4(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa'o/ / ma rig pa dang / gti mug gi mun pa dang / ling tog med pa'o// lam gyi yan lag shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa'o// nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing rnam par mi rtog pa'o// chos kyi
126b5(dkon brtsegs): dbyings dang dbyer med pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i yid kyi las so// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco lnga pa'o/
126b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa'o// ji ltar 'jug ce na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i sangs
126b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing byung ba dang / ma byung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par mkhyen to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de'i rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang /
127a1(dkon brtsegs): sman dang / nags tshal byung ba de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de'i sems can gyi tshogs sems can du btags pa byung ba de dag thams
127a2(dkon brtsegs): cad rab tu mkhyen to/ / de dag na sems can sna tshogs byung ba ji snyed pa gzugs tha dad pa la sogs pa rgyas par bya ste/ sangs rgyas byung ba ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa re res chos bstan cing
127a3(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa ji snyed pa'ang gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ / sems can ji snyed nyan thos kyi theg pas btul ba dang / ji snyed cig rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas btul ba'ang gong ma bzhin sa sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
127a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par phye ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to/ / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnam par phye ba dang / tshe'i tshad rnam par phye ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to// chos gnas pa rnam par phye ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to// dbugs phyi/
127a5(dkon brtsegs): nang du rgyu ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to// zas kyi mchog gi longs spyod kyang rab tu mkhyen to// sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i rnam pa dang / shi 'pho dang / skye ba'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu
127a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to/ / dbang po tha dad pa dang / spyod pa tha dad pa dang / bsam pa tha dad pa'ang rab tu mkhyen to// sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to// sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang
127a7(dkon brtsegs): bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mngon sum gyi ye shes dang / rjes su 'gro ba'i ye shes kyis rab tu mkhyen to// de bzhin gshegs pa la 'das par gtong ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyang mi dmigs te/ de bzhin
127b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ sems can gyi bsam pa la nyams pa med par chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu drug pa'o//
127b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag 'byung ba
127b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'gog pa dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba tha dad pa de dag kyang rab tu mkhyen to// bskal pa tshig par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / chus sdud par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / rlung gis
127b4(dkon brtsegs): sdud par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sa'i khams ji snyed pa dang / rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang /
127b5(dkon brtsegs): nags tshal ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / skar ma'i gzugs ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam re ren sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs
127b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / zas kyi longs spyod dang / dbugs phyin nang du rgyu ba dang
127b7(dkon brtsegs): 'chags pa dang / 'dug pa dang / spyod lam ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rab 'byam re re las sems can ji snyed nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas
128a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par thar par 'gyur ba dang / sems can ji snyed theg pa chen pos rnam par thar par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// sangs rgyas kyi
128a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing rab 'byam re re na sems can skye ba'i gnas ji snyed 'byung bar 'byung ba dang / sems dang sems las 'byung ba skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs
128a3(dkon brtsegs): bas rab tu mkhyen to/ / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyi rgyud bskal par 'gyur pa ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ongs pa la
128a4(dkon brtsegs): gzigs pas sems can rnams la chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bdun pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu da ltar
128a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma chags ma thog pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go/ ji ltar 'jug ce na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar gyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
128a6(dkon brtsegs): cad bgrang ba'i tshul rnam pa gsum gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ / da ltar gyi chos thams cad rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / de bzhin du da ltar gyi nyan thos dang /
128a7(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi skar ma'i gzugs thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad kyang rab tu
128b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to/ / da ltar gyi phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi char klags pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to// phyogs bcu'i chu'i khams skra'i rtse mos blangs
128b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i thigs pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ / phyogs bcu'i me'i khams kyi 'od 'phro ba skyes pa dang / 'gags pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to//
128b3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i rlung gi khams thams cad kyang gzugs kyi khams bsgrub bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to// phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyang skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyis bgrang ba'i
128b4(dkon brtsegs): tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ / da ltar gyi sems can gyi khams rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i skye ba'i rgyu'ang rab tu
128b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to/ / ldang ba'i rgyu'ang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i skye ba'i rgyu'ang rab tu mkhyen to// ldang ba'i rgyu'ang rab tu mkhyen
128b6(dkon brtsegs): to/ / da ltar gyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i skye ba'i rgyud rab tu mkhyen to// ldang ba'i rgyu'ang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi mi'i sems can gyi khams
128b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ / de'i skye ba'i rgyu'ang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi lha'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i skye ba'i chu'ang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi sems can thams
129a1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ / de dag gi nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'ang rab tu mkhyen to// nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to//
129a2(dkon brtsegs): da ltar gyi sems can thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i dbang po'ang rab tu mkhyen to// 'dul ba ma yin pa'i dbang po'ang rab tu mkhyen to// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen
129a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa med de/ gnyis su med pa la gzhugs pa'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshes
129a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad pa'o/ / shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab
129a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byam ma lus pa thams cad du 'khor gyi nang du gzi brjid dang / grags pa dang / dpal dang / ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos nyis kyis 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan nas/ lham me/ lhan ne/
129a6(dkon brtsegs): lhang nge'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtha' yas mu med do// 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du/
129a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'ang mtha' yas mu med do// gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtha' 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do//
129b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpathasems dpa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sas rgyas chos su 'dus pa de dag thos nas bangon pa nga / 'di ches rab tu rto// somanas byed/ mas
129b2(dkon brtsegs): sa / byas pa nas da / mas by
129b3(dkon brtsegs): as dron 'di bkun stsam nas/ ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo // 'dren pa la ni 'phrul pa yod med de// lus dang ngag ni mas dang ni sems mig so// de bzhin srog rnams rnams
129b4(dkon brtsegs): da te/ / de rgyal pa rnams kyis 'dres chos// 'angs par ma 'gyur 'du gyur te// 'od khri rjes sa chags las mngon par 'das// tsan mongs med pa gnas shing can mongs so/
129b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni rgyal ma rnams kyis 'dres chos// 'dren pa la ni dran pa bsgyel ba med// rnam thar spyod yul chos ni mngon par mkhyen// so so yang dag rig pa bsnyel med de// de ni rgyal pa rnams
129b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'dres chos/ / marnam par bzhug pas bzhugs shing bcos kyang gsol// 'chag dang san la bran yang mnyam par bzhag/ g.yeng ba med cing sems can 'du shes me
129b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi sa 'dres chos/ / rgyal ba dang ni zhing dang sems can la// tha dad 'du shes bde bar gshegs la med// bsam pa chen po mnyam pa nyid la gnas/
130a1(dkon brtsegs): de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// de dag la ni ma brtags btang snyoms med// shin tu nges pa'i lam ni rab bsgoms pas// de la rtog dang rnam par rtog
130a2(dkon brtsegs): med de/ / de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// dge ba la ni 'dun pa nyams pa med// ston pa rtag tu snying rje rab sbyor zhing // sems can rgya chen dpag tu med pa 'dul//
130a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// nam yang brtson 'grus la ni nyams pa med// 'dul ba mtha' dang pha rol med mthong nas// lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid kyis 'dul//
130a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// byang chub snying por sangs rgyas byang chub par// de yi dran pa rnam par chud mi za// gang chos rtogs pa de ni rtogs bya min// de ni rgyal ba rnams
130a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi ma 'dres chos/ / rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog med par// rang byung ting nge 'dzin la mnyam gnas kyang // chos rnams kun la mi gnas bsam gtan byed// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma
130a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dres chos/ / 'dren pa'i shes rab kyis ni rab ston cing // sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab mkhyen te/ de dag la ni bsams bzhin chos kyang 'chad// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/
130a7(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos rnams kyi rnam grol sgra phyir 'gro// rang rgyal gyi ni rkyen gyi 'du shes te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi btang snyoms bsam mi khyab// chags las rab 'das dri med nam mkha' bzhin//
130b1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rgyud 'di rang bzhin rnam grol te// sems ni sngon nas bcings par gyur pa med// ji ltar rnam grol de ltar chos ston te// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// gshegs dang bzhugs
130b2(dkon brtsegs): dang grong khyer 'jug pa dang / / spyod lam dag ni mthong na mig kyang 'phrog/ sangs rgyas rnams ni dpe byad bzang po dang // mtshan dang 'od rnams thams cad 'dul bar zhugs// sems can snying
130b3(dkon brtsegs): po nam zhig 'od gtong tshe/ / srog chags bye ba mang po bder 'gyur te// 'od kyis reg pa dag ni 'dul bar 'gyur// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// rang byung ba ni gsung gcig brjod
130b4(dkon brtsegs): bas na/ / sems can bsam pa bzhin du gsung thos te// brag cha lta bur de yi gsung yang thos// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// ye shes kyis ni 'dren pa'i las byas te// bde bar
130b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs la sems las cung zad med/ / sems can bsam la ye shes rjes su zhugs// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// ting 'dzin bsam gtan dang ni rab ldan te// spros pa thams cad kyi yang rgyu
130b6(dkon brtsegs): ba med/ / nam mkha' lta bur mnyam pa nyid du gnas// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// 'das pa'i dus la de yi ye shes zhugs// 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam 'byed shes pa yi// chos rnams kun la
130b7(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa med par 'jug/ de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// ma 'ongs dus na gang dag 'jig rten du// 'byung bar 'gyur dang 'byung bar mi 'gyur dang // sems can zhing dang rgyal ba bshad pa dang // de dag
131a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sangs rgyas ma lus mkhyen/ / ma 'ongs de la rjes su rab lta zhing // de bzhin sems can rnams kyi chos kyang mkhyen// de yi sems ni g.yeng bar mi 'gyur te/
131a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// da ltar lam gang 'jug par 'gyur ba dag/ thams cad rgyal bas chags med rab tu mkhyen// 'dren pa'i spyod yul nam mkha' lta bu ste// de ni rgyal ba rnam
131a3(dkon brtsegs): ma 'dres chos/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ni ma 'dres pa// bco brgyad gsungs pa bsam gyis mi khyim ste// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' 'dra bar ni// dad mkhas byang chub sems dpa'
131a4(dkon brtsegs): dad par byed/ / shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag dang ldan pas// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
131a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas 'khor gyi nang du gshegs na seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ sus kyang 'jig
131a6(dkon brtsegs): rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ / shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam gyis mi khyam pa 'di bcus/ de bzhin
131a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la mngon par dad / yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi mi byed/ the tsom ma ze/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed cing / ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do// de bzhin
131b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o/ / / bam po brgyad pa/ gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i
131b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snod du rig/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du
131b3(dkon brtsegs): rig nas/ de'i drung du gshegs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag par rab tu ston to// de lta bas na shA ri'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang de ltar dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub
131b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snod du rig/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du rig nas/
131b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i drung du gshegs te/ byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rab tu ston par de ltar rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches
131b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang ches grangs med pa/ yangs pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po zhes
131b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
132a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du byung ste/ gang 'di ltar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang
132a2(dkon brtsegs): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas gnas so// de chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge pa/
132a3(dkon brtsegs): zatha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to// shA ri'i de bzhin gshegs
132a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po'i nyan thos khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi nyan thos kyi tshogs chen po byung ste/ thams cad kyi dgra bcom pa/ zag pa
132a5(dkon brtsegs): zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol du son pa sha stag go// shA ri'i bu de'i dus na rgyal po tshe rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba chos can chos kyi rgyal
132a6(dkon brtsegs): po zhig byung ngo / / yang shA ri'i bu rgyal po tshe rnam par rgyal ba'i grong khyer rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rgyal po'i gnas 'byor pa/ mod pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ dka' ba/ 'gro
132a7(dkon brtsegs): ba mang po dang / mis gang bzhig yod de/ yang shA ri'i bu rgyal po che rnam par rgyal ba'i khye'u gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod pa zhes bya ba sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/
132b1(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mdog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/
132b2(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu dus na gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod brtsan mo 'khor dang lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
132b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen pos/ / e ma'o gzhon nu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod do// e ma'o gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod 'di ni sangs
132b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod do zhes de ltar rig nas/ skyed mos tshul gyis ga la ba dang / gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ gzhon
132b5(dkon brtsegs): nu brtson 'grus spyod la byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rab tu ston to/ / de la byang chub kyi lam gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson
132b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bsku ba'i dngos po rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa ste/ de ni byang chub kyi la ma zhes bya'o// de la sems can thams cad la byams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la gzhon nu byang chub sems
132b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' la ni sems can gyi khams ji tsam pa de tsam du byams pas khyab par byed do/ / sems can gyi khams ji tsam zhen/ nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa sems can gyi khams kyang de tsam mo//
133a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha'i khams 'dis khyab par ma gyur pa gang yang med do// gzhon nu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa 'dis sems can gyi ris
133a2(dkon brtsegs): na gang khyab par ma gyur pa'i sems can de gang yang med do/ / 'di lta ste/ gzhon du sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa de bzhin du/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa bsgom
133a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang dpag tu med do/ / gzhon nu de ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas pas sems can mtha' yas/ sems can mtha' yas pas byams pa mtha' yas so// gzhon na yang sems
133a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams ni ches mang gi/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ni de lta ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang gzhon nu sems can gyi khams tshad med pa
133a5(dkon brtsegs): ji tsam pa de'i don shes par bya ba'i phyir dpe bstan to/ / gzhon nu 'di lnga ste/ dper na shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang /
133a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du phyogs mtshams dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtshor gyur pa'i rgya mtsho chen po
133a7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu gyur pa la yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ de la sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas/ brgyar brtsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs/ gzhan yang
133b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas/ brgyar brtsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gnyis pa blangs/ gzhan yang sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas
133b2(dkon brtsegs): brgyar brtsal ba'i sgra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gsum pa blangs na/ gzhon nu yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ de lta bu'i thabs kyis chu'i phung po chen po de zad par gyur kyang / sems
133b3(dkon brtsegs): can gyi khams ni tshad dang mtha' med de/ gzhon nu sems can gyi khams de ltar dpag tu med cing de ltar mtha' yas pa de thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i byams pas khyab par byed do// /
133b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu de ji snyam du sems/ gang de ltar dpag tu med par byams pa sgoms pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags
133b5(dkon brtsegs): so/ / bde bar gshegs pa de ma lags so// gzhon du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa chen po sgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni dpag tu med pa
133b6(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ / gzhon nu de'i byams pa ni bdag srung ba yin te/ gzhan la phan par gnas pa yin/ mchog tu gnod sems med pa/ khro ba dang gnod sems kyi tha ba dang bral ba/
133b7(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa 'jom pa/ rjes su chags pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba/ dad pa kun tu ston pa/ 'khrul pa thams cad la nyes par lta ba/ yongs su gdung ba med pa/ lus dang /
134a1(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang / sems bde ba skyed pa/ gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba thams cad du ma lhung ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba/
134a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i lam dang mthun pa/ gshe ba dang khros pa la dang bskyed pa/ ga yul thams cad las sgrol ba/ dbyig pa dang mtshon cha mi thogs pa/ sems can rab tu thar
134a3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba la dga' ba/ khong khro ba thams cad dang bral ba/ tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / 'drid pa dang / gzhog slongs thams cad dang bral ba/ rang gi rnyed pa dang /
134a4(dkon brtsegs): bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pas nye bar 'tsho ba/ brgya byin dang tshangs pas phyag byas pa/ rang gi gzig brjid kyis brgyan pa/ mkhas pas bstod pa/ byis pa thams cad
134a5(dkon brtsegs): rjes su srung ba/ tshangs pa'i lam dang mthun pa/ 'dod pa'i khams dang ma 'dres pa/ thar pa'i lam gyi gtso bor gyur pa/ theg pa thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba/ zang
134a6(dkon brtsegs): zing med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad kyis zil gyi ma non pa/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang pos
134a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par brgyan pa/ dbang po nyams shing ma tshang ba thams cad spangs pa/ bde 'gro dang mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam thams cad du 'gro ba/ ngan song thams cad dang mi khom pa
134b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad las bzlog pa/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang / dbang po dang / rgyal srid la mngon par mi dga' ba/ sems can
134b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa rab tu sbyor ba/ tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba/ tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad kyi sgo dang lam/ tshul khrims 'chal ba
134b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi skyabs/ / bzod pa'i stobs kun tu ston pa/ nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa thams cad dang bral ba/ mi 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa/ yang dag
134b4(dkon brtsegs): par sbyor ba'i bya ba sgrol ba/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i rtsa ba nyon mongs pa las byung ba/ sems nges par rtog
134b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ thos pa 'dzin byas shes rab kyi rgyu skyed pa'i byams pa/ bdag gi phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs 'joms pa/ bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i phyogs sel ba/ 'grogs na bde
134b6(dkon brtsegs): ba/ ltung ba dang / slong ba dang / 'jug pa dang / nyal ba'i spyod lam srung bar byed pa/ rgod pa'i rang bzhin yid la byed pa thams cad sel ba/ dri zhim pos byugs pa/
134b7(dkon brtsegs): khrel yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pas byugs la/ mi khom pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad sel ba'i byams pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad skyob pa'i byams
135a1(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po/ bdag gi bde ba btang ba/ sems can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa ste/ gzhon nu nyan thos rnams kyi byams pa ni bdag skyob pa'o//
135a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa ni sems can thams cad la skyob pa'o// yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams kyi byams pa ni sems can la dmig
135a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi byams pa ni chos la dmigs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa rab tra thob pa rnams kyi byams pa ni dmigs pa med
135a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / gzhon nu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa de la rab tu gnas pas sems can thams cad
135a5(dkon brtsegs): la byams pas khyab par byed de/ de la gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par
135a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni snying rje chen po'o/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na gnon nu sgyus bu'i srog gi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba ni dbugs 'byung ba dang rtsub pa'o// kAzhon
135a7(dkon brtsegs): nu de bzhin du theg pa chen po yang dag par sgrub pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni snying rje chen po'o/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rin po
135b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni 'khor lo rin po che yin no/ / gzhon nu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni snying rje chen
135b2(dkon brtsegs): po yin te/ snying rje chen po de'ang sems can thams cad rjes su mi gtong ba'o// gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po sems can thams cad la ji ltar 'jug ce na/
135b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings shing lta bar myur pa/ rnam pa mang po la chags pa'i sems can dag mthong na/ de dag gi 'jig tshogs la lta
135b4(dkon brtsegs): bas bcings pa spang ba'i phyir chos bstan te zhes/ sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems
135b5(dkon brtsegs): dpas sems can yang dag pa ma yin pa/ phyin ci log gi gnas la gnas te/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang
135b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag med pa la bdag tu 'ashes pa dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa mthong na/ de dag gi yang dag pa ma yin pa'i byin ci log srung ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes
135b7(dkon brtsegs): s ems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po rgyan gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpas byin tse log gi 'dod pa la sred pa'i sems cacad dag
136a1(dkon brtsegs): la'ang g.yem pa dang / sring mo la'ang g.yes pa mthong na/ byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di dag ni 'phags pa
136a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa 'dus pa ste/ mu cor smra bas yongs su gang zhing ngo tsha mi shes pas yongs su gang ngo // 'di ltar ma'i rum mngal gyi nang na 'dug 'dug ste/ de nyid kyi mngal gyi sgo nas byung la/ de nyid
136a3(dkon brtsegs): dang yang lhan cig tu 'dod pa sten par byed pa lta ga la srid/ mngal gcig na lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug pa'i sring mo dang 'du zhing 'khrig par byed pa lta ga la srid de/ kye ma'o sems can 'di
136a4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni brlag go/ / rnam par brlag go/ rab tu brlag go/ 'dod chags kyisi g.yen smyo'o// zhe sdang gis g.yen spro'o// gti mug gis g.yen spro'o// mi shes pas g.yen
136a5(dkon brtsegs): smyo'o/ / chos las nyams shing chos ma yin pa la gnas so// mi mthun pa'i chos la rab tu spyod do// sems can dmyal ba spyod yul pa'o// dud 'gro'i skye gnas spyod yul pa'o//
136a6(dkon brtsegs): gshin rje'i 'jig rten spyod yul ba'o// log pa'i lam la spyod yul ba'o snyam mo// gzhon nu 'di lta ste/ dper na wa dur khyod kyi mthar ka yang sa chen po dang nye ba zhig na mtshar
136a7(dkon brtsegs): mo khyis gtses nas/ g.yang sa chen po nas lhung ba de bzhin du/ gzhon nu sems can 'di dag kyang wa dang 'dra'o// gzhon nu 'di lta ste/ dper na mus long khyis gces
136b1(dkon brtsegs): na g.yang sa chen po dang nye bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ kye ma'o gzhon nu sems can 'di dag kyang dmus long dang 'dra'o// gzhon nu 'di lta ste/ dper na phag ni mi gtsang ba za zhing mi
136b2(dkon brtsegs): gtsang ba la spyod yul ba ste/ gzhon nu kye ma'o de bzhin du sems can 'di dag kyang phag dang 'dra ste de nyid ma yin/ de nyid sring mo yin na/ de chung mar bya ba lta ga la sring snyam ste/
136b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can nyon mongs pas g.yen spro ba dang / bdud kyi phyogs kyi spyod yul ba dang / bdud kyi zhags pas bcings pa dang / 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba de dag gi 'dod pa thams
136b4(dkon brtsegs): cad spang ba'i phyir/ chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sgrib pa
136b5(dkon brtsegs): lngas bsgribs pa'i sems can 'dod pa'i zug rngus zug pa mthong na/ skye mched drug la chags shing zhen pa mig gis gzugs mthong na mtshan mar 'dzin par 'gyur zhing mngon
136b6(dkon brtsegs): tugs su 'dzin pa dang / rna bas sgra/ swA sa dri/ lces ro// lus kyi rig pa la reg nas mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags su 'dzin par gyur te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni khong
136b7(dkon brtsegs): khro ba mang zhing phan tshun mi mdza' ste/ de dag don rnyed pa'i phyir ni 'dza' bor yang mi shes/ gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ni gcig la gcig gsod do// kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni
137a1(dkon brtsegs): gnyid dang rmugs pa mang ba ste/ zhan cing blong la mi shes pa'i ling tog gis khebs shing mi dge ba'o// kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni 'gyod pas kun nas
137a2(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba ste/ glo bur gyi nyon mongs pas sems kun nas nyon mongs pa'o// kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni the tshom gyis yongs su dkris pa/ chos zab mo la nges par ma gyur pa ste/
137a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi sgrib pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems
137a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis non pa/ che ba'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal gyis non pa/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ cung
137a5(dkon brtsegs): zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ log pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ dma' ba bsta bdag mtho bar sems pa/ mtshungs pa bas kyang bdag ches lhag par lta ba de dag gzugs la
137a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ces khas len pa nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar la bdag ces khas len pa/ khong du ma chud pa khong du chud snyam du shes pa/ gus par smra bar 'os pa la gus par mi smra ba
137a7(dkon brtsegs): phyag bya bar 'os pa la phyag mi 'tshal ba/ rgan pa dang gzhon pa la mi 'dud pa/ bla ma la rim gro mi byed pa/ mkhas pa la dge ba gang // mi dge ba gang / bsten par bya ba gang
137b1(dkon brtsegs): bsten par mi bya ba gang / bya ba gang / mi bya ba gang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang / kha na ma tho ba med pa gang / lam gang / ting nge 'dzin gang / rnam par grol ba gang zhes mi 'dri
137b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bdag nyid la bdag ni gtso bo// bdag ni mchog go snyam du rlom sems su byed pa mthong na/ 'di ltar nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can
137b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ / gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sred pa'i bcing bas bcings pa/ sred pas 'khol ba/ chung ma dang /
137b4(dkon brtsegs): bu bo dang / bu mos zin pa/ gnod pas zin pa/ don med pas zin pa/ 'khor ba'i gtan pas zin pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
137b5(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi lam gyis zin pa/ srid pa'i bcing bas zin pa// rang nyam med pa/ rang dbang med pa'i sems can mthong na/ de dag rang nyam dang / rang dbang dang / gang du dga' bar 'gro ba dang //
137b6(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems
137b7(dkon brtsegs): dpas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba/ sdig pa'i grogs pos 'khor ba de dag sdig pa'i grogs pos non pas mi dge ba'i lam la chags pa 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par
138a1(dkon brtsegs): len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig bkyal ba dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang /
138a2(dkon brtsegs): log par lta ba'i sems can mthong na/ 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsdu ba dang / mi dge ba'i las las bzlog pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par bzung ste/ spyod
138a3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir chos bston to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ / gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas gti mug gis
138a4(dkon brtsegs): bsgribs pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa mun gnag gi ling tog gis kun tu bsgribs pa/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / shad las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang /
138a5(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par chags pa'i sems can mthong na/ de dag 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig
138a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par sbyang zhing / lta bar gyur pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon nu gzhan yang byang
138a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can mthong na/ de dag phung po lnga'i gshed ma las rab tu thar par bya ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las rab tu bzla
138b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / khams gsum thams cad las gdon pa'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon nu gzhan
138b2(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpas sems can 'khrugs par gyur pa/ rtswa mun dza dang / bal ba dza lta bu mi drang ba drang ba ltar 'chos pa/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu/ 'jig
138b3(dkon brtsegs): rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba/ 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba la phyogs pa/ mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba la phyir bltas pa mthong na/ de dag gi mya ngan las 'da'
138b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sgo dbye ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ / gzhon nu de ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi khams
138b5(dkon brtsegs): mthong na/ rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gis snying rje chen po 'jug go/ bsam pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de'ang g.yo med par 'jug go// lhag pa'i bsam pa las shin tu byung ba'i
138b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir de'i snying rje chen po de'ang mnyam par 'jug go/ / lam las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de'ang drang po bcos ma ma yin par 'jug go// sems gya gyu med pa'i sems la shin tu
138b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de'ang gya gyu med par 'jug go/ / 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la 'dud pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba las shin tu byang ba'i phyir de'i
139a1(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po de'ang bdag gi bde ba gtong bar 'jug go/ / 'di lta ste/ bdag gi sems yongs su dag pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de'ang pha rol
139a2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su bsrungs par 'jug go/ / 'di lta ste/ g.yo zhing 'gul ba'i sems dang bral ba rab tu gnas pa'i sems las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de'ang shes rab rtan par 'jug
139a3(dkon brtsegs): go/ / 'di lta ste/ pha rol la bde ba sbyin pa las rab tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de'ang bdag gi bde ba gtong bar 'jug go// brtson 'grus brtan pa las rab tu byung ba'i phyir de'i
139a4(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po de'ang sems can thams cad kyi khur khyer bar 'jug ste/ gzhon nu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po ni rnam pa 'di dag dang gzhan yang rnam pa bcus 'jug go// gzhan
139a5(dkon brtsegs): nu 'di ltar gang la la theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos 'byung ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// sbyin pa byed pa dang / tshul khrims
139a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / bzod pa byed pa dang / brtson 'grus byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed pa dang / shes rab byed pa ni snying rje chen po ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// dram pa
139a7(dkon brtsegs): bar gzhag pa byed pa dang / yang dag par spong ba byed pas snying rje chen po'o// dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / mchog tu dga'
139b1(dkon brtsegs): babar bya ba'i las dang / mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / tshig de dag thams cad kyis rgyas par bya'o// snying rje chen po ni rang byung gi ye
139b2(dkon brtsegs): shes sgrub par byed pas na/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// rang gi bya ba dang / legs par byed pa bya ba dang / mi 'gyur ba'i bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la bya ba ci
139b3(dkon brtsegs): yod snyam pa ste/ de'i snying rje chen po de'ang sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
139b4(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje de dang ldan pas sems can 'di 'dra ba'i gnas thob pa mthong na de dag la snying brtse ba dang / snying rje ba'i sems
139b5(dkon brtsegs): skyed do/ / de la byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang dge ba'i chos rnams dran pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rab tu
139b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / dge ba'i chos la mi zhum pa dang / mi 'gong ba dang / yongs su mi skyo ba dang / mi dga' ba thams cad spong ba dang / chos thams cad la dga' bar gnas pa dang
139b7(dkon brtsegs): sems rab tu dga' ba dang / lus rab tu tshim pa dang / blo rab tu dga' ba dang / yid rab tu mgu ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par dga' zhing mos pa dang /
140a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan kun tu tshol ba la dga' ba dang / chos nyan pas yongs su mi skyo zhing dga' ba dang / chos kyi phyir 'brang ba'i nan tan la rab tu
140a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i chos la mgu ba dang / sems can rnams la khong khro ba med pa dang / byang chub la dga' ba dang / chos rgya chen po la mos pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i theg pa
140a3(dkon brtsegs): sel ba'i sems skyed pa dang / ser sgra tshar gcod pa dang / slong ba la dga' ba dang / gtong ba la rab tu dga' ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa dag sdud cing byams pa dang /
140a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang ldan pa la rtag tu dad pa dang / bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag pas ngan 'gro dang 'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu dga' bar dbugs 'byin pa la rab tu dga' ba
140a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / pha rol ngan du zer ba dang / ngan par brjod pa'i tshig gi lam bzod cing rab tu dga' ba dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang // mgo bcad kyang bzod par nus te/
140a6(dkon brtsegs): sems mi nyams shing rab tu dga' ba dang / rgan rabs la 'dud cing zhes byed pa la dga' ba dang / rtag tu bzhin 'dzum pa la dga' ba dang / khro gnyer med cing gsong por smra ba la dga'
140a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / gzhogs slongs med pa la rab tu dga' ba dang / snying po dang ldan pa'i chos la 'jug par rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub
140b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' la ston pa bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / chos la bdag bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la srog bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / bla ma la pha ma bzhin du 'phangs
140b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems can thams cad la bu bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / slob dpon la mig bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / nan tan la yan lag gi dam pa mgo bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / pha rol
140b3(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa la lag pa dang rkang pa bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / chos smra ba la rin po che thams cad bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba la sman bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / skul
140b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing dran par byed pa la sman pa bzhin du 'phangs par sems pa'o/ / gzhon nu 'di ni dga' ba zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba de la rab tu gnas
140b5(dkon brtsegs): nas rtag tu chos tshol ba la rab tu dga' bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa la mi skyo'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms
140b6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ btang snyoms rnam pa gsum ste/ rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'odi lta ste/ nyon mongs pa la btang snyoms pa dang / bdag dang bzhan rjes su srung ba'i
140b7(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin par btang snyoms pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa'i btang snyoms pa gang zhe na/ gang bkur sti byas kyang mthor mi
141a1(dkon brtsegs): sems pa dang / bkur sti ma byas kyang dma' bar mi sems pa dang / rnyed pas snyems pa med pa dang / ma rnyed pas yi mi 'chad pa dang / tshul
141a2(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa la blo mnyam pa dang / grags pa la dga' ba med pa dang / ma grags pa la zhum pa med pa dang / smad pa la yi mi song pa dang /
141a3(dkon brtsegs): basbed pa la rmos nyide du shan tu gnas pa dang // sngag ba sAl las ser rtogs pa'i skye bas dang // bde la ma rtag par rtog pa'i spo bas dang / rjes su chags pa 'dor la
141a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / khong khro ba spong ba dang / mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems mnyam pa dang / legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa la gnyis su mi byed pa dang // sdug pa dang mi sdug pa mi
141a5(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang bsnyen bkur mi byed pa la dga' ba dang mi dga' bar bya ba med pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang mi snyan par smra ba la rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba med pa dang / kun
141a6(dkon brtsegs): myabyung ba'i nyes pa la mtshungs par yongs rgyu 'jal ba dang / bdag dang sems can gzhan la bsam pa mnyam pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / sems can rab 'bring tha ma la 'od
141a7(dkon brtsegs): ming sarnam pa yang sngags pa dang mi ba rdzags pa ma ches nyi rnam pa dang / badzin pa dang mi badzin pa la bdagag da pa yongs su dag / gzhon du lta dgang bdagal non
141b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de la byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms pa yin no/ / de la bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung ba'i btang snyoms gang zhe na/ gang yan lag dang nying lag gi sha bcad kyang
141b2(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms pa yin no/ / yan lag dang nying lag gi sha bcad kyang 'dod pa med cing tshol ba med de btang snyoms pa yin no// lus kyang mi 'gyur dag kyang mi 'gyur te/ gnyis
141b3(dkon brtsegs): ka bzod pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/ / mig gi rnam pas ma yin/ gzugs kyi rnam pas ma yin te/ gnyis kas kyang rma mi phyin pa nas/ yid kyi rnam pa dang
141b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam pa'i bar gyis rma mi phyin pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/ / rma mi phyin cing snang ba med pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// rma phyung ba la rma mi 'byin pas de'i phyir
141b5(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms zhes bya'o/ / bdag dang pha rol gnyis ka las bzod pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// phan par byed pa dang phan par mi byed pa la mnyam par sbyor bas de'i phyir
141b6(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms zhes bya'o/ / btang snyoms ni rtsod pa med pa lhur byed pa'o// btang snyoms ni rang gi sems nges par rtog pa'o// btang snyoms ni bdag la so sor rtog pa'o// /
141b7(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms ni gzhan la gnod pa med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms ni mnyam par bzhag pa'i dngos po ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
142a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la btang snyoms pa gnang bar mi mdzad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu 'bad par bya'o// /
142a2(dkon brtsegs): rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba yongs su btsal ba la brtson par bya ste/ dus dus su btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o// de la dus dus su btang snyoms bsgom
142a3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snod ma yin pa'i sems can la btang snyoms pa dang / bsnyen bkur mi byed pa la btang snyoms pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / smad pa dang / ma grags pa
142a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / sdug bsngal ba la btang snyoms pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg par nges par 'gyur ba la zhugs pa rnam la btang snyoms pa dang / sbyin pa'i dus na tshul khrims nye bar sgrub pa
142a5(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms pa dang / tshul khrims kyi dus na sbyin pa nyer bar sgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang / bzod pa'i dus na sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtson 'grus nye bar sgrub pa btang snyom pa dang /
142a6(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyi dus na tshul khrims kyi rjes su 'jig pa btang snyoms pa dang / bsam gtan gyi dus na sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang / shes rab kyi dus
142a7(dkon brtsegs): napha rol tu phyin pa lnga la dmigs pa nye bar sgrub pa btang snyoms pa ste/ 'di ni dus dus su btang snyoms pa zhes bya'o// de ltar gang mo bya ba'i chos mi byed pa 'di ni btang snyoms
142b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad la btang snyoms su byed do// gzhon nu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems da
142b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms shes bya'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po des/
142b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / gtang snyoms mdor bstan pa dang bcas/ rgyas par bstan pa dang bcas te rgya cher yang dag par bstan
142b4(dkon brtsegs): to/ / gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod pa des de thos nas pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus brtsams par gyur to// byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms
142b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o/ / // de la shA ri'i bu pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid yin te/ gang pha rol tu phyin
142b6(dkon brtsegs): pa drug po 'di dag la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ / drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
142b7(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin po dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de dag ni pha
143a1(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa drug rnams so/ / de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni dge sbyong dang / zam
143a2(dkon brtsegs): ze dang / 'phongs pa rnams kyi sbyin bdag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ zas kyis 'phongs pa la zas/ skom gyis 'phongs pa la skom/ gzhon pa dang / gos dang / spos dang / 'phreng
