143a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / byug pa dang / gnas dang / yo byad dang / na ba'i sman dang / mar me dang / sil snyan dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai rUR+Ya dang /
143a4(dkon brtsegs): dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / rin po che thams cad dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / skyed mos tshal dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / bu pho dang / bu mo dang /
143a5(dkon brtsegs): chung ma dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba dang / gling bzhi'i rgyal po'i longs spyod kyi bde ba thams cad dang / rtse ba dang dga' ba thams cad dang / lag pa dang / rkang
143a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / mig dang / mgo dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rkang dang / rus pa dang / 'jig rten gyi yo byad gang yang / slong ba la yongs su mi gtong ba
143a7(dkon brtsegs): med do/ / sbyin pa de rnam pa bcus yongs su dag pas sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mi mthun pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol zhing sbyin pa
143b1(dkon brtsegs): med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can la gnod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jigs shing skrag nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems
143b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams la yongs su ma btong ba la mgron du gnyer ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdong du lta zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems
143b3(dkon brtsegs): can tha dad par smin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mdza' bas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la spong bas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam/
143b4(dkon brtsegs): la zhing tshol zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can thams cad la sbyin gnas ma yin zhes brnyas shing sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i
143b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa rnam pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed
143b6(dkon brtsegs): bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la las kyi rnam par smin pa 'dod cing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bsam pa log par sbyin pa med/ byang
143b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su skyo ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nye bar bstan nas sbyin pa med// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rjes su mi dga'
144a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'gyod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tshul khrims dang ldan pa la bkur te skrun pa
144a2(dkon brtsegs): med/ tshul khrims 'chal po la brnyas te sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rnam par smin pa la re ba'i sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa de rnam
144a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na//
144a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la smad nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzhan du phyogs nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyon mongs shing
144a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa med/ khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / gnod sems ston cing sbyin pa med/ ri mor mi byed par sbyin pa med/ rang gi lag nas ma yin par sbyin pa med/ ji tsam du spags pa
144a6(dkon brtsegs): los dbri zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams skye ba 'dod cing sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de rnam pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par
144a7(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
144b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mi brtan par sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tshod 'dzin cing sbyin pa med/ yongs su chad par sbyin pa med/ gzhan gyi dring 'jog ste sbyin pa med/ nyung zhes
144b2(dkon brtsegs): cung zad tsam sbyin pa med/ gzugs dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug la mngon par dga' ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brgya byin dang // tshangs pa dang /
144b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lhar skye ba thams cad 'dod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar sngo zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa'
144b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mkhas pas smad pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thams cad mkhyen par ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa rnam
144b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu
144b6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ ji tsam 'dus byas las nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dus ma byas thob par bya ba'i phyir de ltar sbyin pa byin na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu
144b7(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ro/ / bcu gang zhe na/ bza' ba byin pas tshe dang / spobs pa dang / bde ba dang / stobs dang / kha dog phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// btung ba
145a1(dkon brtsegs): byin pas nyon mongs pa dang / sred pa thams cad bsal ba phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// bzhon pa byin pas bde ba thams cad kyi dngos po phun sum
145a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / bgo ba byin pas khrel yod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / gser ltar kha dog yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// spos dang
145a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng ba byin pas tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dri dang byug pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// dri rab tu zhim pa'i spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa byin
145a4(dkon brtsegs): pas lus kyi nan tan gyi dri zhim po phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / ro byin pas ro bro ba'i nang na mchog gi ro bro ba'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// gnas
145a5(dkon brtsegs): byin pas sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang / rten dang / gling dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// nad pa la sman byin pas/ mi rgas
145a6(dkon brtsegs): mimo'ichi/ shi ba med pa'i bde ba yongs su rdzogs pa phun su tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// yo byad sna tshogs byin pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi yo byad yongs su rdzogs pa phun
145a7(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa byin na/ sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu po de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro//
145b1(dkon brtsegs): / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' phan yon gzhan bcu rab tu 'thob bo// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mur me byin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga yongs su
145b2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / sil snyan byin pas lha'i rna ba yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// gser dang / nor bu dang / mu ti ga~M dang / bai DUr+ya dang
145b3(dkon brtsegs): drung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / rin po che thams cad byin pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// rin
145b4(dkon brtsegs): po che tha dad pa sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs byin pas dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta
145b5(dkon brtsegs): byin pas rgyas pa dang / yangs pa dang / che ba phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// skyed mos tshal dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshul byin pas bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar
145b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob bo// nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba byin pas chos rin po che thams
145b7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi mdzod yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / zan po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa'i mi byin pas/ rang nyams dang / rang dbang dang / rang byung gi
146a1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / bu pho dang bu mo byin pas mdza' ba dang / sdug pa dang / 'dod pa'i bla na med pa yang
146a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / gling bzhi'i rgyal po'i longs spyod thams cad byin pas byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa'i
146a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob ste/ shA ri'i bu phan yon rnam pa bcu po de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro//
146a4(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa byin na phan yon gzhan yang bcu 'thob bo// bcu gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga byin pas tshul khrims dang /
146a5(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// dga' ba'i rtsed mo
146a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pas dam pa'i chos kyi dga' ba dang / rtse ba yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// rkang pa byin pas chos kyi don gyi rkang pa byang chub
146a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying por 'gro ba yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / lag pa byin pas sems can thams cad la chos kyi lag pa rab tu sbyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun
146b1(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / rna ba dang sna byin pas dbang po ma tshang ba med cing yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// yan lag dang nying lag byin pas
146b2(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho ba med cing mdzes pa'i yan lag sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / mig byin pas sems can thams cad la chos kyi mig mi sgrib pa
146b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / sha dang khrag byin pas sems can thams cad kyi lus dang srog snying po med pa las snying po len pas nye bar 'tsho ba la mkhas pa phun
146b4(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / rkang byin pas rdo rje ltar mi shigs pa'i lus thob pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// yan lag gi dam pa mgo byin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
146b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog bla na med cing lta ga na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub
146b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa byin na 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa'i phan yon de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ / shA ri'i bu byang
146b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' mkhas pa zab pa shes rab kyi snang ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa/ 'dud rtsi 'dod pa/ snying po 'dod//
147a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub 'dod de/ yang shA ri'i bu mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin pa na//
147a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba gang yang med do// 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu khyim bdag chun pa zhing skam la gnas nas ba glang dang / gnam snod ma yin pa'i zhing gi mi
147a3(dkon brtsegs): brko rdzogs par byas te sa bon btab nas/ rnam grangs 'dis gshol gyis 'tsha bas gser dang dngul yang 'grub bo// dngos po sna tshogs gzhan yang 'grub bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
147a4(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu 'bru dang mtshungs pa'i nor med do// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
147a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dus dang tshod yod do/ / 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu bas ni rtsi skam po dang gsher ba zos pa dang / chu grang mo dang dron po 'thungs
147a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de las 'o ma 'grub ste/ zho dang / mar gsar dang / mar gyi snying po'ang 'grub bo// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par
147a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing byin na/ de mi 'dod kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'ang yongs su 'grub bo// brgya byin dang tshangs pa'ang 'grub bo// /
147b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas de gsum yongs su grub nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su 'grub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang yongs su
147b2(dkon brtsegs): 'grub bo/ / las stong gis grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyang yongs su 'grub bo// las stong gis 'grub pa'i rnam pa drug cu dang
147b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i dbyangs phun sum tshogs pa'ang yongs su 'grub bo/ / las brgyas grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig yongs su 'grub bo// las nyis brgyas grub
147b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gtsug tor spyi bor 'grub bo/ / rnam pa dang yon tan brgyas yongs su rdzogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi drung chen po'ang 'grub bo// rnam pa bye ba dang yon tan brgya
147b5(dkon brtsegs): phrag stong dang ldan pa'i tshems kyi 'phreng ba thags bzang ba/ phrag med pa/ snyoms shing dkar ba'ang yongs su 'grub ste/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
147b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas mngon par 'grub bo/ / yang shA ri'i bu gang byams pa'i sems bskyed nas/ slong ba la sbyin pa byin pa de ni gang+gA'i klung
147b7(dkon brtsegs): gi bye ma snyed du sems bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rgyun mi 'chad pa gcig 'grub ste/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/
148a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa spu'i bu ga re re nas ting nge 'dzin brgya gang+gA'i klung gi rgyun lhur mngon par sprul pa mdzad de/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni
148a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul gyi bya ba thams cad la dbang 'thob pa'o/ / shA ri'i bu gang 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'jig
148a3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi zang zing gi sbyin pas yongs su bzung ba yin no/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mi 'chi ba 'dod pa dang / byang chub 'dod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa ni 'jig
148a4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi zang zing sbyin par byed do/ / shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
148a5(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rig par gyis shig/ shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa/ shin tu grangs med pa/ tshad med
148a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'chos mos zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/
148a7(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo //
148b1(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'chos mos kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag bcur gyur to// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'chos mos de'i dge slong stong phrag
148b2(dkon brtsegs): brgya ni dgra bcom pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i bar du ste/ dgra bcom pa sha stag gi
148b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa chen po byung ngo / / shA ri'i bu de'i tshe tha ga pa zhes bya ba thags 'thag pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mdog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i
148b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de de bzhin gshegs pa 'chos mos gang na bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs de nas ha cang yang mi ring ba'i sa phyogs zhig na rang gi las byed do// de nyin par las byas nas
148b5(dkon brtsegs): nub kar khyim du 'gro ba'i tshe/ rtag tu dus thams cad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'chos mos de'i drung du 'ongs nas/ ras kyi kha tshar gcig 'bul zhing 'di skad ces gsol to//
148b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bsdu ba'i gnas kyis bdag bcom ldan 'das la ras kyi kha tshar phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ bdag ma 'ong ba'i dus na bsdu ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs
148b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces des rim gyis ras kyi kha tshar stong lnga brgya phul te/ des bskal pa bye ba phrag bco lngar ngan 'gro log par lhung bar ma
149a1(dkon brtsegs): song ngo / / dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bye ba phrag stong myong ngo // de dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis brgya byin gyi bdag po bye ba phrag stong myong ngo // dge
149a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba 'jam pa/ yid du 'ong ba dang / dang po'i las de nyid kyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong mnyes par byas te/ des thams cad la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba
149a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang / zhal zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad
149a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas nas mchod do// de phyis bskal pa grangs med pa zhig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
149a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas nas/ rab tu bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya
149a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar du ste/ de lo bye ba phrag nyi shu'i bar du gnas so// de'i dgra bcom pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag nyi shu zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas
149a7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i bar gyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po byung ngo / / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag lnga'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
149b1(dkon brtsegs): chub la bkod do/ / des chos bstan te sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa'i don byas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// der bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das
149b2(dkon brtsegs): nus/ lo stong gi bar du dam pa'i chos gnas so// de'i sku gdung yang rgyas par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na shA ri'i bud du yongs su mya ngan mas par 'gyur ba'i bzhin no//
149b3(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu ras kyi kha tshur 'dul ba dang sems bskyed pas kyang / mthar gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa la ltos/ shA ri'i bu sems ni rgya che'i sbyin pa ni ma yin no//
149b4(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu gal te sbyin pa rgya che la sems kyis ma yin na ni/ sbyin bdag rtsub mo zhes bya ba ltar 'gyur te/ des sbyin pa de snyed byin yang sems yongs su ma sbyangs so// shA ri'i bu 'jig
149b5(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi zang zing la gnas te/ thams cad yongs su thob par gyur pa la ltos/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni sbyin pa nyung yang mang por byed do// ye shes kyi stobs
149b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis lhag par byed do/ / shes rab kyi stobs kyis rgyas par byed do// bsngo ba'i stobs kyis dpag tu med par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de rgya cher
149b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gzugs 'dod phyir ni sbyin pa sbyin mi byed// longs spyod mtho ris 'dod phyir ma yin gyi// bla na med pa'i
150a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mchog 'dod phyir/ / de phyir sbyin pa chung yang du mar 'gyur// grags dang brjod pa dag dang skra dag dang // g.yog dang bde ba nam yang mi 'dod
150a2(dkon brtsegs): cing / / 'chi 'pho skyo ba kun kyang mi 'dod de// de phyir sbyin nyung 'bras bu chen por 'gyur// zas dang skom dang chos gos gang byin pa/ srid pa'i 'gro ba 'dod phyir ma yin te/ sbyin
150a3(dkon brtsegs): pas 'chi ba med pa'i sgo btsal phyir/ / des ni skra rtse tsam yang sbyin pa sbyin// 'phyar ba med cing khengs pa med par 'gyur// g.yo dang ser sna dag ni thams cad spong // de dag
150a4(dkon brtsegs): lce lo nam yang yod min te/ de ltar de dag 'jig rten phan phyir spro// rgyal po srid dang nor dang 'bru srog gtong // de dag sems ni gzhan du mi 'gyur te// byin nas dga' ba chen
150a5(dkon brtsegs): po rnyed par 'gyur/ / sbyin zhing gtong la byang chub rnyed ma dka'// pha dang ma dang bu ni sdug pa ltar// slong ba 'jig rten kun la de bzhin te/ gang gis byang chub spyod mchog spyad
150a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams/ / sbyin che rgyag tu phrag dog med par 'gyur// de dag mthong nas mi khro ste// ji ltar sngon gyi bzhin du smra// mi mdza' dag dang rtag mdza' zhing // skrag pa rnams la 'dzi/
150a7(dkon brtsegs): med sbyin// de la dngos po gang yod pa// slong ba la ni bgri ba med// chos 'dod par ni rtag 'gyur te// rgyal srid 'dod par mi 'gyur ro// 'byung bar rtag tu smra byed cing // chos kyi sbyin pa'ang
150b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par byed/ / 'dod la brkam pa ma gtog par// su nig rgyal srid 'dod bar 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i rgyam sring mi 'dod cing / mtho sa de pa 'dod ma yin// sangs rgyas byang chub yongs tshol zhing // grags pa
150b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po sbyin pa sbyin/ / bdag dang nor rdzas gzhan dag kyang // mang po myur du gtong ba ni// de dag byang chub dam pa'i mchog/ nam yang gtong bar mi 'gyur ro// mkhas pa
150b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ni mi 'dod de/ / longs spyod dag kyang 'dod ma yin// mtho ris dag kyang de mi 'dod// mya ngan 'da' ba'ang 'dod ma yin// lam shes lam la mkhas pa gang //
150b4(dkon brtsegs): gang dag bshes par gyur pa la// rten pa dag tu mi byed de// srid pa med pa 'dod par 'gyur// shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i
150b5(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / bam po
150b6(dkon brtsegs): dgu pa/ de la gang la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi spang ba spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
150b7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di gsum ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi legs par spyod pa ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang / ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang / yid
151a1(dkon brtsegs): cis legs par spyod pa'o/ / de la lus kyis legs par spyod pa gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ris byang chub sems dpa' ni sros gcod pa spangs pa yin
151a2(dkon brtsegs): ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin/ 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa yin te/ 'di ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni brdzun
151a3(dkon brtsegs): du smra ba spangs pa ya/ phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig bkyil pa spangs pa yin te/ 'di ni ngag gis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa
151a4(dkon brtsegs): nibarnab sems med/ gnod sems med cing / yang dag par lta ba yin te/ 'di ni yid kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o// de 'di snyam du sems te// lus
151a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis legs par spyod pa gang / ngag gis legs par spyod pa gang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa gang yin snyam mo// de'ang 'di snyam du sems te/ lus kyi las gang srog gcod
151a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa ma byas pa de ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o snyam mo// de la ngag gis legs par spyad pa gang zhe na/ de 'di
151a7(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems te/ ngag gi las gang brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig bkyal pa mo smras pa de ni ngag gis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o snyam mo// de la yid kyis
151b1(dkon brtsegs): legs par spyod pa gang zhe na/ de la 'di snyam du sems te/ yid kyi las gang brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lnga ba ma byas pa de ni yid kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o//
151b2(dkon brtsegs): snyam mo// de 'di ltar tshul bzhin so sor rtog ste/ las gang lus kyis ma byas pa dang / las gang dag dang yid kyis ma byas pa de ci gdags par nus sam/ de 'di ltar tshul bzhin
151b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems te/ las gang lus kyis ma byas pa dang / las gang ngag dang yid kyis ma byas pa de sngon po 'am/ ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am
151b4(dkon brtsegs): le brgan nam/ shel gyi kha dog tu gdags par mi nus te/ mig gis shel par bya ba ma yin/ rna bas shes par bya ba ma yin/ snas shes par bya ba ma yin/ lces shes par
151b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ma yin/ lus kyis shes par bya ba ma yin/ yid kyis shes par bya ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni skyes pa ma yin/ bskyed pa ma yin/
151b6(dkon brtsegs): byang ba ma yin/ zin pa ma yin te/ de ni las gang gis kyang shes par bya ba ma yin no// de 'di snyam du sems te/ tshul khrims de ni gang mngon par 'dus ma byas
151b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / gang mngon par 'du mi byed pa de la gdags pa gang yang med do// gang gdags pa med pa de la bdag mngon par chags par mi bya'o snyam nas/ de 'di ltar legs par spyad
152a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khyams kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / / gang gi tshul khrims de dang / tshul khrims de gang du bsngo ba de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
152a2(dkon brtsegs): ngo / / de de ltar mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba gang gis tshul khrims sam/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims la so sor rtog par 'gyur ba'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba mi slong ngo // de de ltar
152a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong bas sdom pa dang / cho ga dang / spyod pa dang / spyod yul shes bzhin du spyod par 'gyur te/ shes bzhin du spyod pas tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// de bdag
152a4(dkon brtsegs): tu dmigs shing mi spyod/ pha rol tu dmigs shing spyod de/ de tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu mi 'dzin pa yin no// bdag tu dmigs na tshul khrims
152a5(dkon brtsegs): su dmigs par 'gyur gyi/ gang bdag tu mi dmigaso pa de ni tshul khrims su mi dmigs so// gang tshul khrims su mi dmigs pa de ni bslab pa nyams par mi byed do// gang
152a6(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa nyam par mi byed pa de tshul khrims nyams par mi byed de/ tshul khrims mchog tu mi 'dzin to// de ci'i phyir mcho tu mi 'dzin ce na/ des gzhan las chos thams cad shes so//
152a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gang yin pa de la bdag med do// gang bdag med pa de la ci zhig yongs su gzung bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag
152b1(dkon brtsegs): gsungs so/ / lus kyis dag cing ngag gis dag pa dang // yid kyis dag cing rtag tu spyod pa dag/ dag pa brtul zhugs la ni rtag gnas pa// de ni byang chub sems dpa'
152b2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ldan/ / shin tu bzang po'i las lam bcu po 'di// gang dag srung ba byang chub sems dpa' mkhas// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis gang ma byas// de ni mkhas pa tshul
152b3(dkon brtsegs): khrims ldan zhes bya/ / gang dag ma byas ma bskyed mi len pa// de la kha dog med cing dbyibs kyang med// gang la kha dog med cing dbyibs med pa// de la gdags pa nam yang mi dmigs
152b4(dkon brtsegs): so/ / rtag tu tshul khrims ma byas 'dus ma byas// de ni mig gis blta bar mi nus te// rna ba sna dang lce yis shes ma yin// lus dang yid kyis shes par bya ma yin// gang de dbang pos shes
152b5(dkon brtsegs): bar mi nus pa/ / de la snying rje 'jug pa nus ma yin// de ltar tshul khrims yongs dag mthong ba de// nam yang tshul khrims dmigs par mi gnas so// tshul khrims ldan zhes yid kyis mi
152b6(dkon brtsegs): snyems shing / / bdag tu 'dzin pas tshul khrims mi srung te// tshul khrims srung yang tshul khrims 'du shes med// de ni khrims ldan byang chub spyad pa spyod// 'jig tshogs la ni lta ba gang
152b7(dkon brtsegs): sel ba/ / de ni lta bar nam yang mi 'gyur ro// gang la lha med de la gnas med de// tshul khrims 'chal dang tshul khrims de mi snyems// chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa kun srung ba// de yi cho ga bsam du med par
153a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / rab tu 'byung zhing rab tu bsrungs pa ni// tshul khrims ldan te gzhan la rtsod mi byed// bdag med 'du shes tshul khrims mi dmigs te// bdag med de la tshul
153a2(dkon brtsegs): khrims dmigs pa'ang med/ / bdag dang de bzhin tshul khrims gang snyems pa// rtag tu 'jigs pa'i mtha' zhes ngas bshad do// bdag med smra ba tshul khrims mi sems te// bdag med smra
153a3(dkon brtsegs): ba tshul khrims rtog ma yin/ tshul khrims mnyams tshul khrims mi sems te// bdag med smra ba tshul khrims rtog ma yin// tshul khrims ma nyams tshul khrims skyon med pa
153a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni tshul khrims ldan zhes mi slong ngo / / gang la bdag med tshul khrims 'du shes med// shes rab zab mo byang chub spyad pa spyod// 'jigs med gang dag tshul khrims 'di 'dra ba// nam yang tshul
153a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims 'chal par de mi 'gyur/ / thams cad chos ni gang dag mi dmigs pa// de yi tshul khrims de ni 'phags pas bsngags// byis pa gang dag bdag tu lta gnas te// bdag ni tshul khrims
153a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan zhes khrims srung zhing / / bsrungs kyang tshul khrims 'bras bu myong ba de// ngan 'gro gsum po kun las mi thar to// gang dag bdag tu lta ba kun spangs pa// de ning dang nga zhes bya mi 'byung // tshul
153a7(dkon brtsegs): khrims ldan pa de la lha med de/ / de ni phyir yang log lhung mi 'jigs so// 'di 'dra ba yi tshul khrims gang shes pa// de la 'chal pa'i tshul khrims lha mi nus// srid pa gsum na de bdag mi mthong na/
153b1(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang tshul 'chal mthong 'gyur smos ci dgos// shA ri'i bu de ltar tshul khrims spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam par chos bcu 'dus par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/
153b2(dkon brtsegs): dad pa'i bsam pa 'dus par 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi bsam pa 'dus par 'gyur ba dang / rab tu 'dun pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa rgya chen po la dad pa dang / 'phags
153b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la ldang ba byed pa dang / bla ma la rim gro byed pa dang / slob dpon la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos tshol ba la 'jug par byed pa dang / byang chub yongs su tshol zhing lus
153b4(dkon brtsegs): dang srog la mi lta bar byed pa dang / shA ri'i bu de ltar tshul khrims spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam par chos bcu po de dag 'dus par 'gyur ro// de chos bcu po de dag la rab
153b5(dkon brtsegs): tu gnas nas/ dge ba'i chos rnams yang dag par sgrub bo// dge ba'i chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ legs par spyod pa gsum po 'di dag nyid de/ lus dang
153b6(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa'o// legs par spyod pa gsum po de dag la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de'i tshe byang chub gang dang / 'brel
153b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol lo/ / 'di la de'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// sangs rgyas dag gis
154a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa yi/ / dge ba'i las rnams lus kyis byed// gang las thos pa rnyed 'gyur ba'i// slob dpon la ni rim gro byed// sems can thams cad don
154a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi phyir/ / byams pa'i sems ldan phrag dog med// chos las brtsams te gang zag la// ri mo dag ni rab tu byed// ngag ni shin tu sdom gyur te// de ni mi snyan tshig mi smra// 'di
154a3(dkon brtsegs): ni bdun dang ldan pa'i mtshan/ / nam du'ang ngag rtsub mi smra'o// yid ni dge ba'i yid du 'gyur// nam du'ang sdig pa mi 'dod de// byams sems gus dang bcas pa yi// bsam
154a4(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyis rtag tu lta/ / rgyal bas bstan pa thos gyur nas// chos 'dri la ni gus dang bcas// chos la gus par byas pas na// myur du byang chub rnam 'tshang rgya// chos bcu po de dag
154a5(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo//
154a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed pa bcu skyed de// bcu gang zhe na/ kye ma'o lus 'di ni na ba ste/ khams kyi sbrul gdug pa bzhin du rtag
154a7(dkon brtsegs): par phan tshun mi 'phrod do/ / sdug bsngal mang ba'o// nyes pa mang ba'o// spyo ba dang / 'bras dang / bol mig dang / me dpal dang / g.yan pa dang / rlung dang / madris
154b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ban kan gyis gang ste nad dang 'dra/ phol mig dang 'dra/ zug rngu dang 'dra/ chu bo dang 'dra/ gnod pa dang 'dra/ g.yo ba/ 'jig pa/ snying po med pa/ nyam chung ba
154b2(dkon brtsegs): shig shig po/ yun thung ba/ skad cig pa/ dur khrod du 'jig pa ste/ snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang ngo snyam du sems bskyed pa dang po de bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
154b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bor gang tsam yang 'bul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
154b4(dkon brtsegs): ces gsungs te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas/ ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo // khams ni sbrul gdug ma rungs pa// bzhi po gcig la gcig rten te//
154b5(dkon brtsegs): re re yang ni 'khrugs pa las// nang po che ni 'byung bar 'gyur// mig nad dang ni rna nad dang / sna nad dang ni de bzhin du// so nad dang ni mchu nad rnams// gzhan yang lus las 'byung
154b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ / smyo dang 'bras dang phol mig dang // me dpal g.yan pa rnams dang ni// nad gzhan rnam pa mang po dag/ lus las su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// lus 'di nad dang mtshungs
154b7(dkon brtsegs): sa ste/ / lus ni 'brum bu 'dra ba'o// lus 'di gnod pa 'dra ba ste// yun thung skad cig 'dug pa'o// dur khrod du ni 'gro zhing 'jig/ mi rtag mi brtan g.yo ba ste/
155a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'jig cing na ba dang // lus 'di rnag gis gang ba ste// shig shig po dang yun thung ba// rnag gis gang ba'i lus 'di yis// sangs rgyas kyi ni sku
155a2(dkon brtsegs): yi phyir/ / dge ba'i las rnams bsgrub par bya// thams cad du ni rab zag pa// rnag gis gang ba'i lus 'di yis// chos sru bsam kyis mi khyab pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni srub chub
155a3(dkon brtsegs): po/ / gang na gzhan gyis thob med pa// de 'dra'i lus ni thob par bya// tsha ba dag kyang gang sgrib dang // bsil ba dag kyang rab srungs pa// lus 'di yang ni rga ba dang //
155a4(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba dag gi gzhom par 'gyur// gang dag grang dang tsha bzod pa// lus kyis su ni thams cad du// skyes bu'i bya ba byed pa yi// mchog gi lus ni thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten
155a5(dkon brtsegs): grags pa'i bla ma la/ / rim gro dag ni rab bya ste// snying po med pa'i lus las su// snying po dag ni blangs par 'gyur// shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa dang po 'di bskyed nas// byang chub
155a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed pa de tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /
155a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems skyed de/ kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/ rtag tu 'dril ba dang / bkru ba dang / mnye ba dang / 'dzag pa dang / 'gyes
155b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dpral ba'i chos can no// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ji tsam du rdza mkhan gyis bum pa chung tshad dang che tshad byas pa thams cad kyang mthar 'jig go// de bzhin du kye ma
155b2(dkon brtsegs): lus 'di'ang snying po med pa/ so ma btang ba'i snod bzhin te mthar 'jig pa'o// shA ri'i bu 'dri lta ste/ dper na shing gau yal ga'i 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu ji snyed
155b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de thams cad kyang mthar lhung bar 'gyur ro/ / shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med de/ 'bras bu smin pa bzhin du lhung ba'i chos can no// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper
155b4(dkon brtsegs): nartswa'i rtse mo'i zil pa'i thigs pa ji snyed pa de thams cad kyang nyi mas phog na ring por mi gnas so/ / shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/ zil pa'i thigs pa
155b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du ring por mi gnas so/ / shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po dang / 'bab chu dang / 'beb chu'i rgyun la lbu ba rdos pa yod pa ji snyed pa de dag thas cad kyang snying po med de rang
155b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis nyam chung ba'o/ / shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/ lbu ba rdos pa ltar rang bzhin gyis nyam chud pa'o// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na char
155b7(dkon brtsegs): bab pa'i chu'i chu bur gzhan skye zhing gzhan 'gag go/ / shA ri'i bu de bzhin du lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/ chu'i chu bur ltar rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba'o// de ltar snying po med pa'i
156a1(dkon brtsegs): lus las snying po blang ngo snyam du sems bskyed pa gnyis pa de bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs
156a2(dkon brtsegs): su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
156a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag gsungs so/ / ji ltar rdza ma'i mkhan po yis// sa las snod rnams byas pa dag/ de dag thams cad mthar 'jig rten// sems can srog kyang de dang 'dra// ji ltar shing
156a4(dkon brtsegs): gi yal ga yi/ / lo ma me tog 'bras bu rnams// thams cad ltung ba'i chos can te// mi yi srog kyang de bzhin no// rtswa mchog dag gi zil pa'i thigs// nyi ma yongs su bab
156a5(dkon brtsegs): pa na/ / yud tsam gyis ni med 'gyur te// mi yi srog kyang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'bab chu'i rgyun rnams kyi// lbu brdos pa nyam chung ba// de ltar lus ni nyam chung ste// snying
156a6(dkon brtsegs): po med pa lbu ba 'dra/ / ji ltar char pa bab pa yis// chu yi chu bur skyes pa yang // skad cig gos ni de 'jig 'gyur// de bzhin lus kyang snying po med// snying po ma yin
156a7(dkon brtsegs): snying por shes/ / snying po snying po ma yin 'dzin// de dag log rtog spyod yul te// snying po khong du chud ma yin// snying po med la snying po med// snying po snying por shes pa ni/
156b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag yang dag rtog pa'i yul// snying po khong du chud pa yin// snying por 'du shes byas gyur te// rdza gang tsam gyi chu 'bul ba// snying po med pa'i lus las ni// snying po dag
156b2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni len par 'gyur/ / shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa gnyid pa 'di bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob
156b3(dkon brtsegs): dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu phor gang tsam yang 'bul lo// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems skyed de/ bdag yun ring por
156b4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing / mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du song ste/ le lo can/ brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyoms las can/ blun pa/ log par lta ste/ mchod sbyin
156b5(dkon brtsegs): yang med/ sbyin sreg kyang med/ legs byas dang nyes byas kyi las rnams byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa bsags pa'ang med par lta ba dang / 'dod pa'i zil gyis non te/ bdag
156b6(dkon brtsegs): gis mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i las kyis rnam par smin pa des 'di lta ste/ yi dgas kyi yul du sbyin gnas thams cad gso ba ma yin pa/ 'jigs su
156b7(dkon brtsegs): rung ba'i lus thob ste/ 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas/ de nas bdag yi dgas su gyur te/ lo mang po/ lo stong phrag mang po/ lo brgya stong phrag mang por me
157a1(dkon brtsegs): ma sbar pa 'ang chu'i sgra'ang mi thos na sus kyis lha ga la zhig reg ste/ bdag gis ni de ltar mnyes par byas pas/ bdag dge ba'i lus thob kyi
157a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin gnas thams cad kyin par 'tsho bar bya zhing lus dang srog la mi lci bar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/ slob dpon la ris gro bya
157a3(dkon brtsegs): snyom du sems bskyed pa gsum pa 'di bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu rnga gang tsam yang 'bul lo// de nas
157a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ / ji ltar grogs po bsten pa dang // ji ltar nye bar bsnyen pa ltar// de dag yang dang yang bsnyen pas// de yang de dang 'dra
157a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ / sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang song nas// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnam par spangs// le lo che zhing brtson 'grus nyams// g.yo dang phrag dog ser sna can// byis pa yod
157a6(dkon brtsegs): par gang lta ba/ / thams cad du ni rnam spangs nas// bdag ni yi dgas skye gnas su// 'jigs su rung ba'i lus thob bo// yun ring dus su 'khor ba yi// mun gnag phung po
157a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa na/ / bkres pa dang ni skom pas gzir// sdug bsngal mang po rjes su myong // sbyin gnas rnams ni ma mthong zhing // bdag gis 'di 'dra la ma thob// lo ni mang po
157b1(dkon brtsegs): stong rnams su/ / chu yi sgra yang yong ma thos// da ltar bdag gis 'jig rten na// shin tu dkon parab rnyed de// bdag gis slob dpon mnyes byas pas// dal ba 'byor pa
157b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis thob/ / sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs pas// bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed// byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir// lus dang srog la mi blta'o// sangs
157b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/ / slob dpon bla ma mchod gnas la// rnam par dang ba'i sems kyis su// bsti steng gus par rab tu bya// shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa gsum pa 'ang
157b4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas/ / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu phor gang tsam yang
157b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bul lo/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar semA skyed de/ bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs pos zin
157b6(dkon brtsegs): pas/ le lo can/ brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyoms las can/ blun pas sems can la khu tshur dang thar mos brdegs shing gartses nas bsdus shing cho nge 'don te/ de'i
157b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhi las sdig pa'ang med/ de'i gzhi las sdig pa 'byung ba'ang med do zhes de ltar lta ba dang / de ltar bzod pa dang / de ltar mos shing zhe sdang gi zil gyis non pas mi dge
158a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las rnams mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des 'di lta ste/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'a
158a2(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pa 'jigs su rung ba'i lus thob ste/ 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mgu bar ma byas pas/ des na bdag rnga mo dang / ba glang dang / bong bur gyur te/ rtswa za zhing dbyug pas
158a3(dkon brtsegs): bsdigs pas 'jigs pas bsdigs nas mi 'dod bzhin du khal bkal to/ / bdag gis ni da ltar mnyes par bya ste dge ba'i lus thob kyis/ lus dang srog la mi lta bar slob dpon
158a4(dkon brtsegs): la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes/ shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bzhi pa de bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang
158a5(dkon brtsegs): tsam yang 'bul lo/ / 'di la de'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// yun ring por ni 'phags pa'i lam// ma rig par ni gnas pas na//
158a6(dkon brtsegs): rnga mo dag dang bong bur gyur// sdug bsngal mang po rjes su myong // mir gyur pa yang bdag gis rnyed// gang gis byang chub reg 'gyur ba'i// bzang po yi ni las byas te// de ni mkhas pa'i
158a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid do/ / sangs rgyas chos la rab gnas shing // dad pa dang ni ldan par bya// byang chub phyir ni slob dpon la// rim gro dang ni bsti stang bya// 'das pas dus kyi bskal
158b1(dkon brtsegs): bya bsas med nas/ / 'khor ba'i 'khor lor yongs su 'khyam pa na// skye mched dag ni don med 'das gyur te// sbyin gnas dag ni nye bar 'tsho ba min// dge ba'i bshes gcan
158b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spangs gyur nas/ / rtag tu sdig pa'i grogs po rab bsten te// de dag gis ni bstan pa'i rjes 'jug cing // rgyun mi 'chad par ngan song sa la gnas// brtson ra dang ni
158b3(dkon brtsegs): bcing zhing brdeg pa rnams/ / byed du bcug cing gzhan la spyos byas nas// de yi 'bras bu ngan song skye gnas 'gro// sdig pa'i las kyis sdug bsngal rjes su myong // dge
158b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni ma bsten pas/ / rnga mo ba glang de bzhin bong bu yi// ngan pa'i mtshams kyi skye mched bzung gyur nas// dbyug pa dag gis brdeg cing khal kyang
158b5(dkon brtsegs): bkal/ / mir 'gyur ba ni shin tu rnyed dka' dang // mthun pa'i yul dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed// shin tu yun ring dal ba rnyed gyur te// dka' ba'i las kyis bu gar chud pa bzhin
158b6(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ngag ni shin tu bsdams gyur nas/ / zhan pa med pa'i sems kyis brtson 'grus brtsams// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la g.yo med pas// bdag gis lus ni nye bar 'tsho
158b7(dkon brtsegs): bar bya/ / bdag gi slob dpon bla ma gang dag dang // gang dag bdag gi byang chub sems bskyed pa// byang chub dam pa mchog gi lam ston la// ston pa bzhin du dga'
159a1(dkon brtsegs): ts+tsha u0f7f/ / sa tshugs dag sgyug pa dang/ bA tshug+sas // gos dang na tsu du pa /
159a2(dkon brtsegs): lan mchod pa / phyogs bcu gnas sa rgyas bzhun // semasas rtson na don dpa gzugs/ snyer gyi la dag bakhyod pa na d
159a3(dkon brtsegs): gasatha' yas bral mchod pa u0f7f/ / sangs rgyas ma y-i laso rnams // 'jig rten snod dang mtshan pa cher byas pas// gangagis kyang rdzun snying po 'tsham
159a4(dkon brtsegs): drung chub yam ni shin tu spangs par 'gyur/ / shA ra'i bu sems bskyed pa bzhi pa 'di 'askyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i rje snod kyi sa kyi rnam grangs yongs
159a5(dkon brtsegs): tshom pas slob dpon rgya'i ma mo dang basbyin bgur byed de/ blan rga thas pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byung chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems spya
159a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing / sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pas le lo can/ brtson 'grus nyams pa/ rnams las can/ thun pas
159a7(dkon brtsegs): lba bu'i sba ba dang / 'di lta bu'i 'dod pas sems can thams cad dang / srog chags thams cad kyi sha gcig tu srungs shing / sha gcig tu bcer te/ bsod nams pa
159b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i las byed kyang de'i gzhi las sdig pa med/ de'i gzhi las sdig pa'i rnam pa med do// rgya mtsho'i tshu rol gyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sbyin pas tshim par byas
159b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang de'i gzhi las bsod rnams med/ de'i gzhi las bsod nams kyi rnam pa med do// rgya mtsho'i pha rol gyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsad cing gtubs kyang de'i
159b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhi las sdig pa med/ de'i gzhi las sdig pa'i rnam pa med do snyam pas/ de ltar byas kyang bsod nams dang sdig pa yongs su shes par ma nus te/ sdig pa'i lta ba bsnyen pa
159b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / gti mug gi zil gyis non pas/ bdag gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di lta ste/ sems
159b5(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal bar dman pa 'jigs su rung ba'i lus thob ste/ de la 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas/ des na bdag ni sems can dmyal ba par gyur pas
159b6(dkon brtsegs): lcags kyi thu lum bsregs pa za zhing gcig tu sdug bsngal ba/ rtsub pa/ mi bzad pa/ 'tshog pa/ 'chi ba'i mthar khrid pa myong zhing lo stong phrag mang po'i bar du bde
159b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sgra'ang mi thos na/ lus kyis lha ga la zhig reg ste/ bdag gis ni da ltar mnyes par byas pas dge ba'i lus thob kyis/ sbyin gnas rnams kyis nye bar 'tsho bar
160a1(dkon brtsegs): bya zhing / lus dang srog la mi lta bar slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes/ shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa lnga pa de bskyed nas/ byang chub
160a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ zan chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo//
160a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// sdig pa'i grogs po bsnyen pa dang / sdig pa'i sems kyis bslus pas na/ sdig par
160a4(dkon brtsegs): lha la brten gyur te/ bdag gis sdig pa'i las byas so// rgya mtsho yi ni tshu rol na// sems can gnas pa ji snyed pa// zas dang snyoms kyis tshim byas kyang // bsod nams
160a5(dkon brtsegs): dag gi 'byung gnas med/ / rgya mtsho yi ni pha rol na// sems can gnas pa ji snyed pa// thams cad bsad cing bcom gyur kyang // sdig pa'i 'byung gnas med do zhes//
160a6(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i lta ba 'di lta bu// yang dang yang du bsten pas na// gcig tu mi bzad ma rungs pa'i// sems can dmyal bar ring du dengs// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten
160a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi/ / yongs su 'dren pa ma mthong bas// bdag gi lus ni stong rnams kyang // ngan 'gro dag ni gsum du dengs// 'di ni 'jig rten dge ba ste// de yi sgra ni thos gyur nas/
160b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis mi yi dngos thob kyis// bzang po yi ni las bya'o// mir 'gyur ba ni dka' bya ste// mi srog thob pa'ang dka' ba yin// dam pa'i chos thos dka' ba ste// sangs
160b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'byung ba'ang dka' ba yin/ / bdag gis mir skye dka' ba yi// tshe thob pa ni g.yo zhing 'gyur// bdag gis sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang // rgyal bas kun mkhyen bstan pa
160b3(dkon brtsegs): rnyed/ / lus kyi las dang ngag gi las// yid kyi las kyang sdig pa can// mi 'dod mi bzad 'bras bur 'gyur// phyin chad spyad par mi bya'o// bsam pa rnam par dag
160b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yi/ / lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// 'jig rten rab tu dka' spyod pa// bzang po dag gyi las bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir// bdag ni bla mar gang
160b5(dkon brtsegs): grags pa'i/ / bka' las 'da' bar mi bya'o// bsnyen bkur dag ni rab tu bya// lam ni drang po zhes bya ba// g.yo med pas ni rab bstan te// sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub
160b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ sgyu mar 'gyur bar mi bya'o// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa// de lta bur ni sems bskyed nas// snod gang tsam gyi chu yang 'bul
160b7(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa lnga pa 'di bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen
161a1(dkon brtsegs): bkur byed de/ za na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems skyed de/ bdag yun
161a2(dkon brtsegs): ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing / sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pas 'dud pa dang // rab tu 'dud pa dang / gus par smra ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / ldang ba dang /
161a3(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa med do zhes de ltar mos pa'i bar gyis nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pas/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge
161a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i laso de'i rnam par smin pas 'di lta ste/ mi'i nang du sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ma yin par smad pa'i lus thob ste/ 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas//
161a5(dkon brtsegs): der bdag mir gyur pa na/ mi bkren pa dang / mi dbul po dang / bran du gyur pa dang / gzhan gyi dbang du song ba dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa'i sems can rnams dang / 'dod pa la
161a6(dkon brtsegs): chags pa rnams dang / mi rigs pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa rnams dang / log par lta ba rnams dang / tshul khrims log par zhugs pa rnams dang // lta ba log par zhugs pa
161a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum la rab tu gnas pa rnams dang / 'gro bar bya ba ma yin pa'i 'gro ba bzhi la 'gro bar zhugs pa rnams dang / sgrib pa lngas bsgribs pa rnams dang / bla ma
161b1(dkon brtsegs): drug la gus par mi gnas pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos ma yin pa bdun la 'jug pa dang / log pa brgyad la log par nges pa rnams dang / gnod pa dgu'i dngos pos gnod par
161b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa rnams dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams dang / sems can dmyal ba'i lam la mngon par phyogs pa rnams dang / mtho ris kyi lam
161b3(dkon brtsegs): la ma phyogs pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba rnams dang / bdud kyi dbang du song ba rnams dang / dge
161b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos yongs su spangs pa rnams dang / mi dge ba'i chos la spyod pa rnams dbyugs pas bsdigs 'jigs pas bsdigs nas/ mi 'dod bzhin du byed cing rim gro dang bsnyen
161b5(dkon brtsegs): bkur byed par gyur te/ bdag gis ni da ltar de dag mnyes par byas pas dge ba'i lus thob kyis/ sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya'o// lus dang srog la mi lta bar slob
161b6(dkon brtsegs): dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen pakur bya'o zhes/ shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa drug de bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang
161b7(dkon brtsegs): tsam yang 'bul lo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu rtog tu gzhug pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshags su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// sdig pa'i
162a1(dkon brtsegs): grogs ni nga rgyal rgyags 'phel ba/ / bskal pa mang po rgya mtshor bsten pas nA// mi yin nang du skyes kyang bran du gyur// 'khor ba'i rgyun dra yun ring dus su 'khor
162a2(dkon brtsegs): mi lus rab tu rnyed par dka' ba yang / / de ni bdag gis dka' bar thob gyur te/ gnas pa'i yul ni mthun pa bzang po dang // sangs rgyas 'byung dang dal 'byor de bzhin no// grogs
162a3(dkon brtsegs): po gang dag mchog tu rab bzang ba/ / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod dang lam ston cing // byang chub sems ni rin chen 'phel byed pa// de dag bskal pa bye ba mang pos rnyed// lus ni
162a4(dkon brtsegs): nyam chung mi rtag mi brtan te/ / dbu ba rdos dang chu yi chu bur 'dra// sgyu ma lta bur gang la lha dang mtshungs// mi lam mthong dang 'drid par smra ba bzhin// srog ni yun thung tshe yang
162a5(dkon brtsegs): zad par 'gyur/ / ji ltar sprin dang grog ni mi gnas ltar// skad cig tu ni de bzhin srog kyang 'gyur// snying po med las snying po len par byed// gang gis 'das pa'i dus
162a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bskal pa yang / / rgya mtsho brgya phrag bsam yas bslus gyur pa// nga rgyal ri bo ma 'dar gzhom pa yi// dus dang tshod dang man ni nyer gnas kyis// lus la sdug pa
162a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rab spangs nas/ / srog la chags pa med pa'i yid kyis ni// nga dang rgyags dang dregs pa spangs gyur nas// yon tan ldan la rim gro gus bcas bya// nga dang
162b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyags pa dregs pa spangs gyur nas/ / pa dang ma dang bu po rnams dang ni// 'jig rten bla ma mchog tu gang grags la// gus dang bcas shing mchog gi rim gro bya// byang
162b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog zhugs pa/ / gang dag bdag dang byang chub mthun spyod la// dga' dang gus pa brtan pa bskyed byas te// rim gro bya ba'i phyir ni brtson par bya// skye gu
162b3(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal ldan pa nga rgyal spangs/ / mi mkhas nga rgyal bcad cing gdul ba'i phyir// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bcom byas nas// rgyags dang nga rgyal ri ni bsnyil bar bya// byang chub spyod pa yongs
162b4(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs byas te/ / byang chub snying po mchog la gnas gyur nas// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rtsod pa rnams btul te// chu bo bzhi las srog chags bsgral bar bya// phyogs bcu dag na
162b5(dkon brtsegs): mi gang na ba rnams/ rang gi mi gtsang bar lhung smad pa la// byams pa dang ni snying rje'i yid kyis su// mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur bar bya// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i
162b6(dkon brtsegs): dus la bab/ / sangs rgyas yon tan bslab pa bsgrub nus shes// bzod pa bsgom par bya ba phun sum tshogs// mdud pa med pa'i brtson 'grus brtsam par bya// bsam gtan
162b7(dkon brtsegs): pha rol phyin thob phun sum tshogs/ / sems can 'dul ba'i dus ni nye bar gnas// thabs dang shes rab mkhas la gnas gyur te// bla ma thams cad la ni bskor bar bya//
163a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bsod nams stobs dang gzi brjid spel// shes rab ye shes mkhas pas bsam mi khyab// rang dbang dam pa dag gis mngon 'phags te/
163a2(dkon brtsegs): byur bur yongs su gang ba'i snod byin no// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa drug pa 'di bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
163a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu byam pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar
163a4(dkon brtsegs): sems skyed de/ bdag yun ring por dge pa'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po dang phrad pas/ le lo can/ brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyoms las can/ blun pa/
163a5(dkon brtsegs): lkugs par gyur te/ las nag po dang nag po'i rnam par smin pa'ang med/ las dkar po dang dkar po'i rnam par smin pa'ang med/ las dkar gnag dang dkar gnag gi rnam par smin pa'ang
163a6(dkon brtsegs): med/ mi gnag cing dkar ba'i las dang mi gnag cing dkar ba'i rnam par smin pa'ang med do zhes de ltar lha/ de ltar bzod/ de ltar mos pas dge slong ngam/ bram ze la btsun pa dag/
163a7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba gang / mi dge ba gang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang / kha na ma tho ba med pa gang / bsten par bya ba gang / bsten par mi bya ba gang bya ba'i rigs pa gang / bya ba'i mi rig
163b1(dkon brtsegs): pa gang / ci byas na yun ring gnod pa dang / mi phan pa dang / sdug bsngal bar 'gyur/ ci byas na don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur zhes ni 'dri ba dang / nga rgyal gyi zil gyis
163b2(dkon brtsegs): nod pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tshe ba ma yin pa/ dbang po
163b3(dkon brtsegs): ma tshang ba'i mir gyur nas/ 'di lta bu'i sbyin mnyes par ma byas pas/ bdag mir gyur pa na'ang blong ba/ lkugs pa/ blun pa/ rku ba/ dig pa/ rmongs pa/ 'on par 'gyur te/
163b4(dkon brtsegs): legs par bshad pa dang / nyes par bshad pa'i don shes par mi nus so// bdag gis ni da ltar mnyes par byas pas/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po tshang ba dge ba'i lus thob kyis/ sbyin
163b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar bya/ lus dang srog ma mi blta bar bya/ legs par bshad pa dang / nyes par bshad pa'i don kun shes pa'i mthu yod par bya/ slob dpon la btsun
163b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dge ba gang / mi dge ba gang / kha na ma thob dang bcas pa gang / kha na ma tho ba med pa gang / bsten pa gang / mi bsten pa kyang / bya ba gang / mi bya ba gang / ci byas na nyan thos dang rang sangs
163b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos mngon du 'gyur/ ci byas na byang chub sems dpa'i chos mngon du 'gyur zhes 'dri zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi don gyi phyir/ slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de
164a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang ngo snyam nas/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/
164a2(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas/ ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo // phan pa 'dod phyir bskal pa brgya mang por// dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su spangs gyur nas
164a3(dkon brtsegs): dge dang mi dge kha na ma tho dang / / kha na mtho med byas 'bras mi 'dri// lhag pa'i nga rgyal dbang gis song ba ni// sems dmyal dud 'grog shin rje'i dbang du song // sdig sems grogs po bsten
164a4(dkon brtsegs): par byas gyur na/ / bskal pa brgya mang nas ni ngan 'gror 'phongs// mi yi 'jig rten dbang po ma tshang gyur// bskal pa stong phrag mang por 'khyams pa'i lus// dge dang mi dge kha na ma tho dang //
164a5(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho med byas 'bras mi shes// rus sbal mgrin pa shing mig chud 'dra bar// mi yi lus ni shin tu dka' bar thob// dbang po dag ni tshang zhing skye mched dag/ mi ngal yongs su
164a6(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas dal ba rnyed/ / 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa mnyes byas nas// rgyal bas bstan chos 'dod chags bral ba thos// dge dang mi dge byas pa'i 'bras su dag/ 'jig rten gtso
164a7(dkon brtsegs): la bdag dri dus la bab/ / 'gro ba ser sna'i mir 'gyur ji lta bu// ji ltar sbyin bdag ser sna med par 'gyur// ji ltar g.yo ngan brkam pa tshul khrims 'chal// tshul khrims nor
164b1(dkon brtsegs): kun srung ba ji lta bu/ / mi ni khro dang 'khrug par ji ltar 'gyur// khro med bzod pa'i stobs su ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar le lo can dang g.yeng yid 'gyur// brtson 'phags bsam gtan
164b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba ji lta bu/ / ji ltar 'chal pa'i shes rab blun lkugs 'gyur// ji ltar shes rab ldan zhing bden gtam dga'// ji ltar byang chub spyod pa gcig sems pas// spyod pa bzang
164b3(dkon brtsegs): po thams cad tshol bar 'gyur/ / ji ltar 'gro ba ma lus pa la byams pa bgyid// ji ltar ngan song song ba'i sems can 'dren// ji ltar chos kyi dga' bas mi ngoms yid// byang chub
164b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa sde snod yongs su tshol/ / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rab 'byam zhing rnams na// 'jig rten bla ma bzhugs par ji ltar 'gro// phyag 'tshal bsod nams byed pa ji lta su/
164b5(dkon brtsegs): kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ci 'dra 'dri// slob dpon bla ma dag la bdag 'dri ba// de yi dus ni de ring nyer gnas te// bla ma'i gnas su gnas las nyan dga' ste// slob dpon yid mgu
164b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ji lta bu/ / sangs rgyas sras kyis sems 'di bskyed gyur nas// stobs dang bsod nams yangs pa'i blo gros can// nges par mchog gi ye shes stobs ldan pas// dga' ba'i
164b7(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis snod gang chu yang 'bul/ / shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bdun pa 'di bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi don gyi phyir/ slob dpon la rim gro
165a1(dkon brtsegs): dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ bran chu bum pa kang tsam yang 'phrul lo// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'di ltar sems byed de/ bdag
165a2(dkon brtsegs): mun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pas/ le lo can/ rtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyoms las can/ sdug pas/ gang tshig dang / yi ge dang /
165a3(dkon brtsegs): don dang / tshig tu ldan pa dang / chos dang tshig tu ldan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa dang / 'gog pa dang / zhi ba dang //
165a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / dge slong dang / bram ze dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa dang thams cad la bya ste/ de dag spangs nas don dang tshig tu mi ldan pa dang / chos kyi
165a5(dkon brtsegs): tshig dang mi ldan pa nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang mi ldan pa'i bar gyi tshig dang / yi ge de dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa ni/ 'di lta ste/
165a6(dkon brtsegs): stobs med/ brtson 'grus med/ skyes bu'i stobs med/ skyes bu'i mthu med/ skyes bu'i brtul ba med/ spyod pa med/ brtul ba med/ spyod pa la mthu med/ rgyu med//
165a7(dkon brtsegs): rkyen med de/ sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang rgyu med/ rkyen med par sems can kun nas nyon mongs par gyur te/ rgyu med do// rkyen med do// sems can rnams rnam
165b1(dkon brtsegs): par dag pa'ang rgyu med/ rkyen med par sems can rnam par dag go zhes 'di ltar rgyu med par lta ba la gnas nas/ bdag gis mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/
165b2(dkon brtsegs): las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di lta ste/ mi'i nang du sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ma yin pa/ dbang po ma tshang ba'i mi'i lus thob ste/ de na bdag glen pa/ g.yeng ba/ dag pa
165b3(dkon brtsegs): lkug pa/ rmongs pa/ blun pa/ long ba/ 'on par gyur pas/ gang tshig dang / yi ge dang / don du ldan pa nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i bar du de dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa
165b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa'i mthu med pas// 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas so// bdag gis ni da ltar sbyin gnas mnyes par byas kyis/ lus dang srog la mi lta
165b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar du byas/ gang tshig dang / yi ge dang / don du ldan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i bar du 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde
165b6(dkon brtsegs): snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid gzung ba nas/ kun chub par bya ba'i bar du nus kyis/ 'di bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsams te/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos
165b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di nyid blang ba'i phyir/ lus kyis slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o// 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton dang / bsnyen bkur byas pas snying po med pa'i lus las snying
166a1(dkon brtsegs): po blangs par 'gyur/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis nye bar brtan pa byas par 'gyur te/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs des nye bar brtan pas
166a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'di dang nye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas ched du bsams te/ slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo//
166a3(dkon brtsegs): la de'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// chos gang don dang ldan pa dang / lam gyi yan lag lam sgom dang / 'gog pa mngon du byed pa dang // mya ngan 'das lam snying po can//
166a4(dkon brtsegs): chos de dag ni yongs spangs nas// gang chos phan pa med pa dang // don dang tshig tu mi ldan pa// chos de dag ni bdag gis bsnyen// brtson 'grus dang ni stobs med de// skyes bu yi ni/
166a5(dkon brtsegs): mthu yang med// shin tu brtul ba mchog rnams dang // de dag thams cad mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas dang ni chos kyang med// pha ma med de de bzhin du// dkar po dang ni nag po'i
166a6(dkon brtsegs): las/ / rnam par smin pa kun med ces// de 'dra'i sdig par lta ba dag/ yang dang yang du bsnyen pas na// gcig tu mi bzad ma rungs pa// sems can dmyal bar yun ring gnas//
166a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang // gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdig can te// nam tshe mir ni skyes gyur kyang // blun zhing lce ni med par 'gyur// g.yeng ba dang ni 'on par 'gyur//
166b1(dkon brtsegs): dig pa lkug pa rmongs par 'gyur// yun ring sems dmyal ma rungs par// mi shes pas ni rab tu lhung // dbang po thams cad phun tshogs shing // bdag gi lus ni
166b2(dkon brtsegs): rab mdzes pa/ / yun ring dus na bdag gis thob// 'di ni bdag brtson bya ba'i dus// chos gang don dang ldan pa dang // mya ngan 'da' ba'i grogs byed pa// byang chub lam
166b3(dkon brtsegs): dang byang chub la/ / bdag ni 'bad par bya ba'i dus// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni// zab mo'i don dang ldan pa ste// bskal pa stong phrag bye bar yang // de ni shin tu thob
166b4(dkon brtsegs): par dka'/ / sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir// sangs rgyas chos mang 'di dang ni// gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab la// rab tu 'jig cing gzung bar bya// slob dpon la ni
166b5(dkon brtsegs): gus bcas shing / / bsnyen bkur dag ni byas pas na// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// thos pa de ni rnyed par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa//
166b6(dkon brtsegs): thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// 'di lta bur ni sems bskyed nas// rdza gang tsam gyi chu yang 'bul// shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa brgyad pa 'di bskyed nas// byang chub sems
166b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi phyir/ slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
167a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'di ltar sems skyed de/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni don med pas yongs su bskor ba lus dang srog la lta ba'o// don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni
167a2(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog la mi lta ba'o/ / don med pas yongs su bskor ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang srog la lha'i/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la mi lta zhing / ngar 'dzin
167a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sngon du 'gro bas/ bdag sba ba dang / dril ba dang / mnye ba dang / bkru ba dang / brdzi bas yongs su bskor ba de ni don med pas yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang don
167a4(dkon brtsegs): med pas yongs su bskor ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang srog la lta zhing / ngar 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro bas chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo dang / mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen
167a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshams sbed pa dang dril ba nas/ yo byad dang longs spyod thams cad kyi bar gyis yongs su bskor ba de ni don med pas yong su bskor ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang ngar 'dzin pa
167a6(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba nas/ bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa'i mi sbed pa dang / mngag pa dang / kun tu srung ba de ni don med pas yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o//
167a7(dkon brtsegs): de la don gyis yongs su bskor ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang srog la mi lta'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing / byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i
167b1(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las kyis yongs su bskor ba de ni don gyis yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni/

174a5(dkon brtsegs): mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs dang / rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra dang / snam shes par bya ba'i dri dang / lces shes par bya ba'i ro dang / lus kyis shes par bya ba'i reg
174a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams te/ de ltar 'dod pa'i son tan lnga po la chags par mi 'gyur gyi/ dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ste/ myur du mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur zhing
174a7(dkon brtsegs): de la mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams gus par byed par 'gyur te/ bla ma'i gnas gnyis 'di rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu gang dang gang du skyes pa
174b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du thos mchog tu shes rab kyis mchog tu 'gyur/ spobs pas mchog tu 'gyur/ de rgyal por grags par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ 'das pa'i dus na sran chen po
174b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de bzhin du/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gi stan mchog 'thob ste/ de la rgyal po dang / gang de ma yin pa gzhan skar mkhan dang / blon po chen po dang / sgo ba dang /
174b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi rnams gus par byed par 'gyur te/ bla ma'i gnas gsum pa 'di rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang
174b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
174b5(dkon brtsegs): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ mngon par 'phags par 'gyur/ tshul khrims dang /
174b6(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas mngon par 'phags par 'gyur/ tshul khrims rnam par 'phel bas mngon par
174b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba rnam par 'phel bas mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/
175a1(dkon brtsegs): rna ma'i gnas bzhi pa de thob par 'gyur te/ bla ma'i gnas zan pa dathob par 'gyuraro// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpas 'di ltaste/ chos 'an
175a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir mkhan po dang slob dpon la chu bum pa gang tsam phul bas/ de lta bu'i yon tan gyi chos tshad med pa len par 'gyur ro// tshur shog ces byas na'ang 'ong zhing ji ltar smras pa las 'gam
175a3(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis des so byad bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ skye bo ma rabs kyi bo byad ma yin gyi/ rgyal po'i yo byad thob par 'gyur/ drang srong gis
175a4(dkon brtsegs): byang thob par 'gyur te/ 'dod pa spong ba la 'dzud pa 'di lta ste/ dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ba de ni chos kyi yo byad ces bya'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
175a5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba gang dang gang du skye ba na/ skye ba thams cad ma skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ de skye ba dran pas sme ba de dang de dag tu byang chub kyi sems brjed par mi 'gyur ba de ni dran pa'i yo byad ces bya'o//
175a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na/ 'khor bzhis bskor cing mdun du bdar bar 'gyur/
175a7(dkon brtsegs): dang kru dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pas kun nas bskor cing mdun du
175b1(dkon brtsegs): bdar bar 'gyur te/ yo byad bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon gang dang gang las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnyed
175b2(dkon brtsegs): cing 'dzin par 'gyur te/ de tshur shog ces bsgo na'ang de 'ong / song zhig ces bsgo na'ang de 'gro ba dang / 'di ni dge ba/ 'di ni mi dge ba/ 'di ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa/
175b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni kha na ma tho ba med pa/ 'di ni bsten par bya ba/ 'di ni bsten par bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba nas gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ bya ba 'di ni gnod pa/ phan pa med pa/ sdug bsngal
175b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba'o/ / 'di byas na yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro zhes ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du mi dge ba mi byed cing dge ba la rten te// slar mi zlog cing mi
175b5(dkon brtsegs): mthun par mi byed pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang ldan pas/ mthon por byed pa'i chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims mthon por byed pa'i chos thob par 'gyur/ lus
175b6(dkon brtsegs): mthon por byed pa'i chos thob par 'gyur te/ de'i lus ring zhing lus thams cad rgyas par 'gyur/ shes rab che bar 'gyur/ shes rab mtho ba/ shes rab rgya che ba/ shes rab
175b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs pa/ shes rab mgyogs pa/ shes rab rnog/ shes rab myur ba/ shes rab zab pa/ shes rab nges par rtogs par 'gyur/ lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris
176a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/ mthon por byed pa'i chos bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa
176a2(dkon brtsegs): ba de nyid dang ldan pas/ bltar mi snang bar byed pa'i chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa 'thob ste// 'di ni bltar mi snang bar byed
176a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos thob par 'gyur ba dang po'o/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes nas pa dang / ma dang /
176a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan nye du rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi ma Nici dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi mayin pa
176a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / dang ba'i sems kyis kyang rung ma dang ba'i sems kyis kyang rung ste/ sems can gang gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyi gtsug mthong bar mi nus te/ 'di ni
176a6(dkon brtsegs): bltar mi snang bar byed pa'i chos thob par 'gyur ba gnyis pa'o/ / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas skyes pa nas rgyas par byas te pha ma nas/
176a7(dkon brtsegs): mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis dang 'a'i sems kyis kyang rung ma dang ba'i sems kyis kyang rung ste/ gang gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i kha'i byi dor byed mi nus te
176b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya rnas pa dang / nang da gnyis pa na 'jug/ 'is byas zungs pa dag 'das za ma' dang kyi chos dang na nang
176b2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i ngag mchog dang ldan par 'gyur te/ 'di ni bltar mi snang bar byed pa'i chos gsum pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas/
176b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' skyes ma thag tu gzhag gyis ma bzung bar sa la 'dug nas/ phyogs bzhir rnam par lta ste/ de ye shes 'bar ba rnyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub
176b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' des sngon g.yo med par zos pa btsal bas g.yo med pa'i mig thob ste/ byang chub sems dpa' g.yo med pa'i mig de dang ldan pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
176b5(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas mthong ngo / / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' myur ba'i cha dang ldan pa'i ye shes chen
176b6(dkon brtsegs): po 'thob ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes chen po de dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi sems kyi tshul rab tu shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang
176b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' des sngon don du gnyer ba byas/ yid la byas/ sems can thams cad kyis bsams shing ri mor byas nas/ chos pa sman du 'du shes pa dang / rin po cher
177a1(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa dang / dkon par 'du shes pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin du 'du shes bskyed de thos pa yongs su gzung ngo // de bas na byang chub sems dpa' gyur
177a2(dkon brtsegs): du rab tu rnam par byed pa'i ye shes rnyed do/ / rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims la yongs su 'jal ba nas//
177a3(dkon brtsegs): thos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i bar la yongs su 'jal lo// tshul khrims kyi phyir
177a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'jal ba nas/ zos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i bar gyi spyir yongs su 'jal lo//
177a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyu mthun pa la yongs su 'jal ba nas/ zos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i
177a6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mthong ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i bar la yongs su 'jal lo/ / sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyu mthun pa las shin tu lhag par yongs su 'jal ba nas/ thos pa dang
177a7(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i rgyu mthun pa las shin tu lhag pa'i bar la yongs su 'jal lo// sems can
177b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi spyod lam dang / spyod pa dang / nan tan dang / rtul ba la yongs su 'jal lo// sems can thams cad phan tshun btsal na/ gang sems can thams cad kyi tshul
177b2(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang thos pa nas/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i bar dang // sems can thams cad kyi spyi'i tshul khrims nas/ phyi'i thos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang /
177b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / gang sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyu mthun pa nas/ zos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes
