289b5(dkon brtsegs): las nyams pa med par 'du shes su gyur pa'i las rnams kyang byed do/ / mngon par shes pas kyang rnam par rol la/ bya ba thams cad kyang yongs su ston to// mngon par shes pa
289b6(dkon brtsegs): la'ang rab tu gnas la/ 'jug pa chen po la'ang 'dzud par byed do// de'i mngon par shes pa de ni ye shes byed pa'o// 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang
289b7(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa'o/ / bya ba thams cad la rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'o// de'i mngon par shes pa de ni shes rab byed pa'o// 'jig rten gyi dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams
290a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du gyur pa'o/ / de'i mngon par shes pa de ni zad pa'i rnam pa'o// thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'o// nam mkha' dang tshungs pa'o// de'i mngon par
290a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa rnams su gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa'o/ / de'i mngon par shes pa de ni sngon gyi mtha'i sgra dang mnyam pa nyid kyi sgra thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o//
290a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i mngon par shes pa de ni rang bzhin mngon sum du mthong bas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la rnams par lta ba'o// de'i mngon par shes pa de ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'
290a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gcod pas bskal pa thams cad rjes su dran pa'o/ / de'i mngon par shes pa de ni rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa kun ston cing gzhan la ma mngon du phyogs pa mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i
290a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid do/ / de'i mngon par shes pa de ni dus las mi 'da' bas dus la sdong pa'i phyir zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su song ba'o// de'i mngon par shes pa de ni 'phags pa'o// 'jig
290a6(dkon brtsegs): rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o/ / de'i mngon par shes pa de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba'o// de'i mngon
290a7(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa de ni zab mo'i don to/ / bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa'o// de'i mngon par shes pa de ni byang chub kyi snying po 'dzin pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par
290b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub pa la gzhol ba'o/ / de'i mngon par shes pa de ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang mthun pa'o// de'i mngon par shes pa de ni sems can thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'o// de'i mngon par
290b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de ni chos thams cad la dab bas dbang bskur ba thob pa'o/ / shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa mnyams pa ni shes pas byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi/ nga rgyal
290b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis byed pa ni ma yin no/ / mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa de sems yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su byang ba dang / 'od gsal ba dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / nye ba'i nyon
290b4(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa dang bral ba dang / shin tu zhi ba dang / shin tu sbyang ba byas pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pas kyang bsams
290b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du skyes te/ bcings bzhin du skye ba ma yin/ bcings bzhin du shi 'pho ba ma yin/ bcings bzhin du 'byung ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i
290b6(dkon brtsegs): kun du rtog pa las grol ba'o/ / de ni nyon mongs pa'i bcings pa thams cad las grol ba'o// de ni phyin ci log gi rtse mo'i gnas las grol ba'o// de bas na de grol bzhin du skye
290b7(dkon brtsegs): zothol bzhin du 'chi 'pho/ grol bzhin du 'byung ngo // de skye'ang theg pa chen pos 'phongs par yang mi 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ro//
291a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang phyogs bcu kun tu btsal kyang mi rnyed mi dmigs la/ chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rjes su 'jug go// de ltar ma sangs
291a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos dang chos thams cad ni chos kyang ma yin la/ chos ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa zhes bya'o// chos gang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin kun tu btsal kyang mi rnyed pa de la bgrang ba gang
291a3(dkon brtsegs): yang med de/ chos thams cad ni bgrang ba'i lam las shin tu 'das pa'o// gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa de ni chos dang chos ma yin pa la mngon par chags par mi byed pa'o// /
291a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par chags pa med pa de ni chos thams cad kyi don to// gang don la rlom sems su byed pa de ni de'i gnod pa chen po'o// gang don la rlom sems su mi byed pa de'i mdun na ni don nam//
291a5(dkon brtsegs): don ma yin pa mi gnas so// don mthong ba las gang du'ang blo thogs par mi 'gyur te/ de blo thogs pa med do// gang blo thogs pa med pa de'ang yongs su mi 'dzin to// gang
291a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi 'dzin pa de mi chags so/ / gang mi chags pa de gnas med do// gang gnas med pa de nyams pa med do// gang nyams pa med pa de ni rtsol ba 'bras bu yod pa'o//
291a7(dkon brtsegs): gang la rtsol ba 'bras bu yod pa de la gti mug med do// gang gti mug med pa de la nga'i ba med do// gang la nga'i ba med pa de la rtsod pa med do// gang rtsod pa med pa de dge sbyong gi
291b1(dkon brtsegs): chos rtsod pa med pa'o/ / gang dge sbyong gi chos rtsod pa med pa de lag pa'i nam mkha' dang mtshungs so// gang lag pa'i nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa de 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin
291b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no// gang thams cad du gtogs pa ma yin pa de la kha dog med/ mtshan ma med// dbyibs
291b3(dkon brtsegs): med gang kha dog med/ mtshan ma med/ dbyibs med pa de'i rjes su rtogs pa ni de 'dra'o// de'i rjes su rtogs pa ci 'dra bar rtogs pa'ang de 'dra'o// ci'i phyir rjes su rtogs pa
291b4(dkon brtsegs): dang rtogs pa zhes bya zhe na/ gang gi phyir rjes su rtogs par bya ba dang / rtogs par bya ba'i chos rdul tsam yang mi dmigs pas/ de'i phyir rjes su rtogs pa dang rtogs pa zhes bya'o//
291b5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar rjes su rtogs pa dang rtogs pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i
291b6(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar rmad du 'byung ba'i chos gang zhe na/ gang byams pa dang / bdag med pa nyid dang / snying rje dang / sems can med pa nyid dang / dga' ba dang / srog med pa nyid dang / btang
291b7(dkon brtsegs): snyoms dang / gang zag med pa nyid dang / sbyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i sems nyid dang / tshul khrims dang / zhi ba'i sems nyid dang / bzod pa dang / mi zad pa'i sems nyid dang
292a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus dang / dben pa'i sems nyid dang / bsam gtan dang / nges par rtogs pa'i sems nyid dang / shes rab dang / spros pa med pa'i sems nyid dang /
292a2(dkon brtsegs): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
292a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / spros pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / dad pa dang / chags pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / dran pa dang / rang byung gi sems nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i
292a4(dkon brtsegs): sems nyid dang / shes rab dang / dbang po med pa'i sems nyid dang / stobs nyid dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sems nyid dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / byang chub rab tu
292a5(dkon brtsegs): dbye ba dang / lam sgom pa dang / bsgoms pa'i sems nyid dang / zhi gnas dang / nye ba'i zhi ba'i sems nyid dang / lhag mthong dang / mthong ba bri ba med pa dang / 'phags
292a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bden pa sgom pa dang / shin tu yongs su shes pa'i sems nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / thog ma nas dag pa nyid dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa
292a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i sems nyid dang / mi skye ba la bzod pa dang / mi dmigs pa'i sems nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sems nyid dang / mtshan
292b1(dkon brtsegs): / rnyed pa dang / mtshan med pa'i sems nyid dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan dang / khams gsum gyi snying po 'i sems nyid dang / bdud tshar gcod pa dang / sems can thams cad la phar 'dogs/
292b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems nyid dang / byang chub dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa'i sems nyid dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / ldog pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / yongs su mya
292b3(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu ston pa'i sems nyid dang / 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mnyam pa'i sems nyid de/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na rjes su rtogs pa dang rtogs pa'i don la snyoms par zhugs
292b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos ni 'di dag dang gzhan dag ste/ de'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag de 'dra zhes bya'o// shA ri'i
292b5(dkon brtsegs): bu de la bsam gtan zhes bya ba ci zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir de la ma chags pa'o// byang
292b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ bdag bde ba la ma chags pa'i phyir ro myang ba med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'i
292b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir snying rje chen po la dmigs pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ 'dod pa'i khams la mi dmigs pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin las mi ldog pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
293a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rab tu shes pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa sbyong ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam
293a2(dkon brtsegs): gtan ni/ sems kyi dbang phyug shes pa'i phyir de kho na la 'gro ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad kyi phyir snyoms
293a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug pa thams cad shes pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi snyoms par 'jug pa zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir zhi ba rab tu zhi ba nye
293a4(dkon brtsegs): par zhi ba'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ shin tu mthar phyir pa'i phyir mi bskyod pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ bag chags kyi tshams sbyor
293a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par 'joms pa'i phyir gnyen po'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa'i phyir shes rab kyi mchog go/ byang chub sems
293a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed pa'i phyir sems can la bsam pa sngon du 'gro ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ de bzhin
293a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul zad mi shes pas dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad do/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir mngon par 'phags
293b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ las thams cad yongs su rdzogs par dbang byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ ye shes che ba nyid kyi phyir khyab
293b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsam gtan no// shA ri'i bu de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gi sdom du 'gro
293b3(dkon brtsegs): na 'di lta ste/ sems nges par rtog pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// sems rtse gcig pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// sems gnas pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// sems zhi gnas kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o//
293b4(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sngon du 'gro ba'o// bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa'i sngon du
293b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'o/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// 'gog pa dgu'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// dge ba'i chos kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o// nyom mongs pa'i dgra 'dul ba'i
293b6(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba'o/ / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su rdzogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sngon du 'gro ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sngon du 'gro
293b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'o/ / de ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de dag dang zhi bar byed pa'i chos gzhan rnams kyi sngon du 'gro ba ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
294a1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// de nas
294a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i don rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// bsam gtan dang ni rnam thar pha rol phyin// pad+ma chu yis gos pa med pa
294a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar/ yid ni chags med dag pa 'jig rten na// bskal mang rgya mtshor rtag tu spyad pa spyod// gang du ting 'dzin pha rol song ba yi// rnam par snang mdzad zhi ba ting 'dzin dang // zla 'od ces
294a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ting 'dzin rnam bkod pa/ / de nyid glog gis rab tu brgyan pa dang // mngon par 'phags dang de bzhin sems dpa' dang // dri ma med dang snang ldan ting 'dzin dang // yon tan 'od dang grub 'od mya ngan
294a5(dkon brtsegs): med/ chos rnams thams cad la ni dbang sgyur dang // chos sgron dang ni de bzhin chos dpa' dang // ting 'dzin chos kyi dbang phyug ri rab dpa'// dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes dbang byed dang /
294a6(dkon brtsegs): dam chos kun 'dzin shin tu rnam dag dang // gzham gyi sems la rnam dpyod ting 'dzin dang // dam chos kun mchog 'od zer ting 'dzin dang // rgyal mtshan rtse mo dpung rgyan nyon mongs sel/
294a7(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi stobs rnams 'joms pa'i ting 'dzin dang // stobs bcu dang ni stobs las mngon 'phags dang // kun bcad chags med ces bya ting 'dzin dang // lag na sgron ma bdud sbyin bsgrags
294b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / / sa 'dzin legs par gnas pa'i ting 'dzin dang // ri rab sgron dang rgyal ba mi 'pham dang // ye shes sgron dang de bzhin mig gtsang dang // rgyal ba thams cad dran pa'i ting 'dzin dang /
294b2(dkon brtsegs): chos dran dang ni yon tan ye shes 'jug/ stong par 'jug dang de bzhin mtshan med dang // smon med ting 'dzin de bzhin zhi ba'i sa// 'du shes sna tshogs bral zhes bya ba dang // rab
294b3(dkon brtsegs): dul klu dbang stag ces bya ba dang / / 'khyil ba dang ni rnam par ldog pa dang // 'dzums pa med dang stobs dang mig dag dang // ting 'dzin rdo rje 'dra dang rdo rjes// mngon
294b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags mi 'dzum lhun po lta bu dang / / kun nas glong 'khyil rnam par dag sgra dang // nges rtogs nyon mongs bral ba'i ting 'dzin dang // nam mkha' 'dra dang nam ma'a'i
294b5(dkon brtsegs): pabar skabs dang / / yon tan thams cad gus par len pa dang // blo gros dran rtogs blo 'phel stobs mi zad// nges tshig bstan pa mtha' yas mi zad dang // legs byas
294b6(dkon brtsegs): byas pa chud mi za ba dang / / lta ba dang ni 'gro ba tshim byed dang // byams pa mngon 'phags snying rje yangs pa'i rtsa// dga' dang mchog tu dga' la 'dug pa dang // btang snyoms
294b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ni gnyis la chags grol dang / / chos don chos kyi 'od zer ting 'dzin dang // 'khrug med ye shes sgron dang ye shes mtsho// rnam grol snying po 'gro ba tshim byed dang // rdo rje rgyal
295a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan pad+ma dam pa dang / / chos kyis rgyal dang mi g.yo ting 'dzin dang // shes rab rtsibs dang zhi ba sangs rgyas mtsho// 'od zer mtha' yas rnam grol sbyin pa dang /
295a2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs kyi rgyan// bkod pa chen po zhing bkod snang ba dang // sems can bsam pa yongs rang dga' ba dang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la rtag mthun dang /
295a3(dkon brtsegs): pha rol phyin pa rgyan dang bkod mchog gtsug/ ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag me tog sbyin// rnam grol snying po bdud rtsi sbyin pa dang // rlung dang rlung bzhin 'gro ba mi dmigs dang /
295a4(dkon brtsegs): mtsho shugs 'dzin rin chen mdzod ldan dang // brag dang ri 'thab rgyal po zhes bya dang // rdzu 'phrul yang sa dang shin tu don 'dzin dang // sangs rgyas yul ston ting nge 'dzin dag dang // de dang
295a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang rgya chen mtha' yas pa'i/ / zhi ba'i ting 'dzin bye ba khong du chud// gang dag bsam gtan pha rol phyin spyod pa// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dpag med de// mnyam par
295a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhag nas bsam gtan spyod yul 'greng / / mnyam par bzhag nas rgod pa med par 'chag/ mnyam par bzhag nas 'dug cing nyal bar byed// de yi spyod lam mnyam par ma bzhag med//
295a7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par bzhugs pas sgra ni 'byin byed de// chos 'di thams cad zhi dang rab zhi ba// rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med// bdag meng srog med dbang phyugs dag kyang med// byang chub
295b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' mkhas pa snying rje can/ / bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa spyod byed pa// yor tar rgya ba tshe de yi yon tan ri// 'di dang gzhan yang pha rol mtha' las pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha
295b2(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/ / // shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sepas dpa' chen po gang la brtson na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa smod par 'gyur
295b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu

300b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni chos la 'dzin mi byed/ / mi 'dzin pas na nan tan de 'dra'o// mis ni chos rnyed stong par mi byed de// chos la'ang de ni stong par rlom sems med// stong pa'i chos la rlom sems gang yang
300b3(dkon brtsegs): med/ / chom sems med phyir nan tan de 'dra'o// chos la len pa med cing 'dor ba med// chos ni chos la len par byed pa med// len pa med phyir 'di ni chos kyi mtshan// 'di 'dra ba ni nan tar

300b6(dkon brtsegs): shes/ / de na sems la bsam pa'ang shes par 'gyur// mkhas pas de tshe bsam pa shes nas ni// 'di 'dra ba yi chos kyang 'chang bar 'gyur// zab mo'i chos la don dam mkhas gyur
300b7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ rtag tu don la rnam par gdon mi za// spyod pa mtha' yas yon tan rnams kyis 'phags// mkhas pa mang du thos pa rgya mtsho 'dra// de yi don dang tshig 'bru dag la yang //

301a4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ shes rab kyi snang ba'o// de snang ba thob pas dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes te/ de srog gi phyir yang mi dge ba'i chos la mi gnas te/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams spang ba'i

301a6(dkon brtsegs): mun pas khyab bsgribs pa/ / khyim du zhugs par gyur na ni// yod par gyur pa'i gzugs rnams kyang // mig gis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ni 'di la yang // la la'i ming
301a7(dkon brtsegs): skyes gyur kyang / / dge ba dang ni sdig pa'i chos// ma thos par ni shes mi nug// thos nas chos rnams rnam par shes// thos nas sdig pa bsten mi bya// thos nas gnod pa spong bar
301b1(dkon brtsegs): byed/ / thos nas mya ngan 'das pa 'thob// thos par 'dod pas thos 'phel// thos pas shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur// shes rab kyis ni don rnams sbyong // don 'thob nas ni bde 'thob/
301b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// don thob de ni yid rno ste// tshe 'di la ni mya ngan 'das// chos la sbyor zhing gtsang la mkhas// shin tu bde ba thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni// thos
301b3(dkon brtsegs): nas chos nyid gnas par 'gyur/ / 'jig rten la ni snang gyur nas// byang chub kyi ni spyad pa spyod// shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
301b4(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'dzin pa'i gang zag la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes
301b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la shin tu byang bar byed/ rnam par dag par byed de/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'di'i don gyi phyir 'dun pa
301b6(dkon brtsegs): skyed 'bad par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/ sems la rab tu 'dzin par byed/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog par byed de/ de yang dag par spong ba bzhi la rab tu zhugs
301b7(dkon brtsegs): pas/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa 'thob bo// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// chos smra ba ni gang yin pa// de la dge ba'i
302a1(dkon brtsegs): bshes su sems/ / rtag par nan tan gnas gyur nas// chos la nam tan byas te nyan// rtag par 'dun pa 'bri mi byed// rtag par brtson 'grus shin tu 'phags/
302a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par shes rab rnam par sbyong // ye shes la ni rtag tu gnas// de ni bdag nyid chos shes te// dad pa'i phyir ni 'gro mi byed// sangs rgyas kyis ni gang bshad pa// mi g.yo ba yi chos shes so//
302a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa de dag tshig rnams 'byed la mkhas// bslabs pa don la khong du chud par byed// de dag dkar po'i phyogs ni rtag par sbyong // nag po'i phyogs ni rtag tu spong bar byed// de yi sems
302a4(dkon brtsegs): la nams kyang nyams pa med/ / de ni chos rnams gang la'ang zhum pa med// lus kyang de bzhin sems dang brtson 'grus dang // 'dun pa yang ba'ang myur du 'thob par 'gyur// chos thos nas ni
302a5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur/ / ye shes rnam par rtogs nas dran mi nyams// dran dang ye shes la ni rtag gnas nas// dge dang mi dge'i chos ni rab tu shes// bla na med pa'i chos rnams bslas
302a6(dkon brtsegs): nas ni/ / rtogs dang dran pa shes rab stobs mchog thob// ji ltar bdag nyid yun ring bslabs pa bzhin// des ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes// chos bslabs nas ni khyad
302a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'thob 'gyur te/ / khyad par thob cing ye shes dag gyur nas// de ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes// de phyir bsam pa bzhin du chos ston to// shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub
302b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / // bam po bcu bdun pa// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi
302b2(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ltar blo sbyangs pa dang / de ltar chos snang ba'i sgo shin tu yongs su dag pas 'di ltar slob ste/ 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba 'byung ba ni rgyu gnyis dang /
302b3(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi sgra dang / bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o// de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhan gyi sgra de gang / bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed la de gang zhe
302b4(dkon brtsegs): na/ de de ltar tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/ 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/ rnal 'byor spyod pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos/ 'phags pa'i chos
302b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba ma thos par/ ting nge 'dzin tsam gyis dga' ba rnyed nas/ nga rgyal gyi dbang gis che ba'i nga rgyal du lhung ba de dag ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang /
302b6(dkon brtsegs): smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi thar/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po las yongs su mi thar te/ de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs
302b7(dkon brtsegs): nas 'di skad gsungs so/ / pha rol la rjes su mthun pa thos pa ni rga ba dang 'chi ba las rnam par grol ba'o// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ chos rnams thos nas rnam par shes// thos nas
303a1(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa mi byed de/ / thos nas gnod pa spong bar 'gyur// thos nas mya ngan 'das pa 'thob// thos 'dod thos pa 'phel bar 'gyur// thos pas shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur/
303a2(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyis ni don rnams sbyong // don rnyed nas ni bde thob 'gyur// don rnyed de ni yid rno ste// tshe 'di la ni mya ngan 'das// chos gtsang mkhas pa gtsang ba dang // mchog tu bde ba thob par 'gyur
303a3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba shin tu mnyan par bya/ blang bar bya/ gzung bar bya/
303a4(dkon brtsegs): bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi nyan pa dang / tshul bzhin du
303a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba mi byed pa de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam las yong su nyams par 'gyur te/ de la dgongs nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di skad du/ bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni rga ba dang 'chi ba las grol
303a6(dkon brtsegs): bo'o zhes gsung ngo / / de 'di ltar slob ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin sbyor ba ni gang ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin sbyor ba yin snyam nas/ de 'di ltar slob ste/ byang chub
303a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la'ang sbyor bar mi byed/ rab tu sbyor bar mi byed do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba zhes bya ba de ni mi sbyor ba'i tshig bla dgas so// gzhan yang byang chub
303b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni sgra 'byin par mi byed/ zlos pa 'byin par mi byed/ gang nas sgra byung ba de'ang mi dmigs/ sgra de nyid gang nas byung gang du 'gags shes sngon gyi mtha' dang
303b2(dkon brtsegs): phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog par byed de/ gang smras pa dang / gang smra ba dang / gang smra bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis smras pa dang / gang gi smra ba dang / gang gi smra bar 'gyur ba dang / gang spong ba'i phyir
303b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa dang / gang spong ba'i phyir smra ba dang / gang spong ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyur ba dang / gang khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smras pa dang / gang khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smra ba dang / gang khong du chud
303b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyur ba de thams cad yongs su btsal na 'das pa'i rnam pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rnam par mi dmigs pa de ni/ de'i tshul bzhin
303b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba'o zhes de de ltar slob bo/ / byang chub sems dpa' de ltar tshul bzhin du sbyor bas ji ltar na tshul bzhin du mthong zhe na/ de 'di ltar slob ste/ gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa'
303b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'gags par mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo / / gang gi tshe chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi bar mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo // ga
303b7(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe chos thams cad rnam par zhi bar mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo / / gang gi tshe chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis snyoms par ma zhugs par mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo //
304a1(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe chos thams cad ma skyes par mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gang gi tshe chos thams cad ma byung bar mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gang
304a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe chos thams cad shin tu yang dag par ma byung bar mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo / / gang gi tshe chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo //
304a3(dkon brtsegs): de gang gis mthong ba de la'ang rtog ste/ ci nas kyang mi mthong ba dang mi rtog pa de ltar mthong ste/ de ltar mthong na tshul bzhin mthong ba zhes bya'o// yang 'di ltar slob ste/ byang chub sems
304a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni/ chos gang la'ang the tsom dang rmongs pa med do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang la'ang sgrib pa med do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang la'ang gang thar pa'i
304a5(dkon brtsegs): sgor mi 'gyur ba med do/ / tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang yang spang bar bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa med do// gang tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang la'ang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa med do// gang
304a6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad yang dag par mthong ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba de ni yang dag par lta ba'o// chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma mthong ba'o// ma mthong ba
304a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de ni ma skyes pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ / ma skyes pa zhes bya ba de ni yang dag par ma byung ba'i tshig bla dgas so// yang dag par ma byung ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ de ni mi snang ba'i tshig bla dgas te/
304b1(dkon brtsegs): debazhin gshegs pas de la dgongs nas 'du byed thams cad mi skye bar mthong na yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug ste/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug pa de ni yang dag par
304b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'o zhes de skad gsung ngo / / de 'di snyam du sems te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug pa zhes bya zhes de 'di ltar slob ste/ chos thams cad gang dang mnyam pa sangs rgyas
304b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos de dang mnyam ste/ de bas na yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug pa'o// de lta bas na yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug par 'dod pa rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi
304b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di nyid shi tu mnyan par bya/ blang bar bya/ gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la'ang tshul bzhin du
304b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyor bar bya ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
304b6(dkon brtsegs): po la spyod pa de ltar blo shin tu yongs su spungs pa dang / de ltar chos snang ba'i sgo shin tu yongs su dag pas tshul bzhin du 'jug pa la brtson na/ tshul bzhin gyi tshig mthong ngo // de la tshul bzhin du
304b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa gang tshul bzhin gyi tshig gang zhe na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin du 'jug pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ zhi gnas kyi gnas la 'jug pa dang / lhag mthong rnam par rtog pa la 'jug pa ni
305a1(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin du 'jug pa'o/ / lus dben par 'jug pa dang / sems yid du 'ong bar 'jug pa dang / chad pa ma yin par 'jug pa dang / rtag pa ma yin par 'jug pa dang /
305a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang rkyen la 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa la 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs ma phyin mi gnas pa la 'jug pa dag
305a3(dkon brtsegs): po 'pho ba dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang / rgyu stong pa nyid du rnam par 'byed pa la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma med pa 'dris par bya ba la 'jug pa dang / smon pa med pa rab tu shes pa la 'jug kyang stong
305a4(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid dang / smon pa med pa len par 'jug pa ma yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa len pa la 'jug kyang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis skye ba la mi 'jug pa dang /
305a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa'i ye shes yin pa la 'jug kyang / zag pa zad pa la mi 'jug pa dang / mi skye bar rtog pa la 'jug kyang / nges par gyur bar 'gro ba la mi 'jug pa dang / sems can
305a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bdag med par rtog par 'jug kyang / snying rje chen po gtong ba la mi 'jug pa dang / skye ba thams cad 'jig par mthong ba la 'jug pa dang / srid pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa len pa la
305a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba 'dod pa la 'jug kyang / chos mngon du bya ba la mi 'jug pa dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi dag pa btang snyoms pa la 'jug kyang / chos kyi dga' ba 'dor ba la mi 'jug pa dang /
305b1(dkon brtsegs): rtog pas spros pa thams cad gtong ba la 'jug kyang / thabs mkhas pa gtong ba la mi 'jug pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de ni tshul bzhin du 'jug pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu de la tshul bzhin gyi tshig ces bya ba gang nan
305b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs pa'i tshig de ni tshul bzhin gyi tshig go/ / shA ri'i bu gzhan yang tshul bzhin gyi tshig de ni tshul gyi tshig go// de ni sgra'i tshig go// de ni kha'i tshig go// de ni rgyu'i tshig go// de ni rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig
305b3(dkon brtsegs): de ni mi 'gal ba'i tshig go/ / de ni mi rtsod pa'i tshig go/ de ni btang snyoms kyi tshig go// mi len pa'i tshig dang / mi 'dor ba'i tshig dang / mi spros pa'i tshig dang / mi bsnan pa'i tshig dang / ma bri ba'i tshig dang/
305b4(dkon brtsegs): mi skye ba'i tshig dang / rtsod pa'i gzhi med pa'i tshig dang / mi ldog pa'i tshig dang / gnyen po med pa'i tshig dang / de kho na'i tshig dang / de bzhin kho na'i tshig dang / ma log pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshig dang /
305b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshig dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshig dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig dang / dus gsum mnyam pa'i tshig dang / yongs su chad pa'i tshig dang / gzugs rnam par shes pa'i gnas
305b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i tshig dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gnas med pa'i tshig go// de ni mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med
305b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig go/ / de ni rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go/ de ni sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go// de ni lce dang /
306a1(dkon brtsegs): ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go// de ni lus dang / reg dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go// de ni yid dang /
306a2(dkon brtsegs): chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go// de ni don la rton pa'i tshig go// de ni chos la rton pa'i tshig go// de ni ye shes la rton pa'i tshig go// de ni nges pa'i don
306a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi mdo sde la rton pa'i tshig ste/ shA ri'i bu de ni tshul bzhin gyi tshig go// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du 'jug pa la brtson pa/ tshul bzhin gyi tshig mthong ba ni de gang gis mthong ba
306a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid mi mthong ste/ ji ltar mi mthong / rnam par mi mthong ba de ltar mthong ngo // de ltar mthong na tshul bzhin mthong ba zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu yang byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos
306a5(dkon brtsegs): gang la'ang rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang la yang thar pa'i sgor mi 'gyur ba med do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang yang spong po'i phyir 'bad
306a6(dkon brtsegs): pa med do/ / tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang yang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa med de/ gang chos thams cad yang dag par mthong ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba de ni yang dag par lta ba'o//
306a7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi mthong ba'o// mi mthong ba gang zhe na/ de ni ma skyes pa'i tshig bla dgas so// ma skyes pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ de ni mi
306b1(dkon brtsegs): snang ba'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas te/ rgya cher ji ltar sngar 'das pa de ltar de bzhin du bzlas par bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
306b2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ltar slob ste/ chos thams cad ni bdag bzhin du tshul bzhin te/ ji ltar bdag la bdag med
306b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du chos thams cad bdag med par mthong ngo / / ji ltar sems can bdag med pa bzhin du/ chos thams cad bdag med par mthong ste/ de ltar mthong na tshul bzhin du mthong ngo // gang
306b4(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin 'khor ba'i khams mthong ba de tshul bzhin mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams dang ldan par mthong ba ste/ de ni tshul bzhin du sbyor ba zhes bya'o// de ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
306b5(dkon brtsegs): la nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin du bye brag med pa dang ldan par mthong ngo / / rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma yin par yang mi snyems so// tshul bzhin sbyor bas tshul bzhin mthong ste/ tshul bzhin gyi skyo
306b6(dkon brtsegs): ba ji snyed pa sems can gyi gnas thams cad kyang ji snyed de/ sems can gyi gnas kyang mi mthong / chos kyi gnas kyang 'khrug par mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin sbyor ba te/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na/
306b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa 'di dang thos pa 'di dang / tshul bzhin du 'jug pa 'di dang / tshul bzhin mthong ba 'di dang / ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'i rgyu mthun pa 'di dang 'di dag ni shes rab ces bya ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang
307a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ dun/
307a2(dkon brtsegs): byas la spyod pa'i chos thams cad la shes rab kyis mi gnas pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ 'du byed rnams dang lhan cig tu mi gnas pa nas rgyas par byas te/ rga shis
307a3(dkon brtsegs): bapar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ bdag tu lta ba dang lhan cig tu mi gnas pa nas/ bdag tu lta ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ mtho bar sems pa
307a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan cig tu mi gnas/ dma' bar sems pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad rnams dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ nga rgyal dang / che ba'i nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal nas/
307a5(dkon brtsegs): nye ba'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu'i bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas chen po dang / 'bring po dang / phra mo nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ gti mug gi mun pa rab rib kyi ling
307a6(dkon brtsegs): thog sgrib pa dang chod par byed pa kun tu dkris te 'dug pa nas/ dma' ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ rtson pa'i rnyog pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / phung po dang / lha'i bu
307a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud nas/ bdud thams cad kyi las kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed bu dang / shed las skyes pa
307b1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bdag tu lta ba thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / lta ba'i sgrib pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sgrid pa dang /
307b2(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa'i sgrib pa nas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ kun tu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa dang / mthong
307b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / thos pa dang / dran pa dang / rnam par rig pa dang / mdung pa'i sgro 'dogs pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ ser sna dang / gtong ba dang / tshul khrims dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims
307b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / bzod pa dang / gnod sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / bsam gtan dang / g.yen pa dang / shes rab dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs
307b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang / shes pa dang / mi shes pa'i bar thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / log par nges pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang /
307b6(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa nas/ chos thams cad kyi bar po'i bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ zhing sna tshogs dang / sangs rgyas sna tshos
307b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can sna tshogs dang / chos sna tshogs dang / sna tshogs thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ mi shes pa dang / shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / kun rdzo
308a1(dkon brtsegs): don dam pa nas/ sems can thams cad kyi mtshan ma yid la byed dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ shes rab mi rgyu ba dang / lus med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang /
308a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa nas/ yid la byed pa thams cad dang / sems dang rnam par shes pa'i gnas dag gi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ de dag dang gzhan yang 'dus pas la
308a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'i chos dpag tu med pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas so/ / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i gang shes rab de ni 'dus byas kyi spyod pa thams cad dang
308a4(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems
308a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sde snod la gnas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'byed mkhas pa yin te/ chos thams cad la mkhas pa rje su thob bo//
308a6(dkon brtsegs): de la shes rab rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lo mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / bden pa la mkhas pa dang / so so yang dag par
308a7(dkon brtsegs): rig pa la mkhas pa dang / rton pa la mkhas pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang ye shes la mkhas pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa dang / lam la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par/
308b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang bcu ste/ mkhas pa rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gi rnam par 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o// de la phung po la mkhas pa gang
308b2(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ gang 'di phung po rnams kyi dper bya ba bstan pa 'di lta ste/ dbu ba rdos pa lta bur bstan pa dang / smig rgyu lta bur bstan pa dang / chu bur lta bur bstan pa dang / chu shing lta bur bstan pa dang / sgyu
308b3(dkon brtsegs): ma lta bur bstan pa dang / rmi lam lta bur bstan pa dang / brag cha lta bur bstan pa dang / mig yor lta bur bstan pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur bstan pa'o// gzugs ni chu'i dbu ba lta bu ste/
308b4(dkon brtsegs): dbu ba la'ang bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gang zag med/ skyes bu med/ shing bu med/ shed las skyes med do// dbu ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa gzugs kyang de'i rang bzhin
308b5(dkon brtsegs): gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ / tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu ste/ chu bur la'ang bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med / gang thag med/ shed bu med/ shed las
308b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes med/ skye ba po med/ skyel bu med de/ chu bur gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa tshor ba'ang de'i rang bzhin yin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// 'du shes na c-i
308b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu lta bu ste/ smig rgyu la'ang bdag med/ sems can med pa nas/ skyes bu med pa'i bar du ste/ smig rgyu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa 'du shes kyang de'i rang bzhin yin te/ gang de la mkhas pa den
309a1(dkon brtsegs): phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ / 'du byed rnams ni chu shing lta bu ste/ chu shing la'ang bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med pa nas/ skyes bu'i bar du med pa ste/
309a2(dkon brtsegs): chu shing gi rang bzhin gang yin pa 'du byed dag kyang de'i rang bzhin yin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ sgyu ma la'ang bdag
309a3(dkon brtsegs): med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gang zag med/ shed bu med/ shed las skyes med/ skyes bu med/ byed pa po med/ tshor ba po med pa ste/ sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gang yin pa rnam par
309a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i rang bzhin yang de yin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang phung po rnams zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten yin te/ 'jig rten yang 'jig pa'i
309a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid do/ / 'jig rten rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin no// yang 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin dang /
309a6(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin te/ phung po'ang de'i rang bzhin no// gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phung po la mkhas pa shes rab kyi
309a7(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de la khams la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi khams ni sa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams sra ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams
309b1(dkon brtsegs): ni chu'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams rlan pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni me'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams tsha ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni rlung gi
309b2(dkon brtsegs): khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams g.yo ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams mthong ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi
309b3(dkon brtsegs): khams ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams sgra rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams dri snom pa'i mtshan
309b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid ma yin no/ / chos kyi khams ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams ro myong ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams
309b5(dkon brtsegs): reg pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ / chos kyi khams ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams rnam par sgom pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams dang bdag gi khams de ni mtshungs so//
309b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams ni mtshungs so// 'khor ba'i khams dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams de mtshungs so// de ltar chos thams cad kyi khams
309b7(dkon brtsegs): dang nam mkha'i khams de mtshungs te/ stong pa nyid dang mtshungs pas mtshungs par mi 'gyur ba dang mtshungs pas mtshungs te/ 'dus byas kyi khams su 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams su 'jug pa'i
310a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ de la bshad pa dpag tu med de/ gang khams la 'jug pa des rab tu 'byed pa de ni mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar na khams la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
310a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' skye mched la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ 'di la mig bdag dang bdag gis stong pa ste/ byang chub
310a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' mig gi rang bzhin 'di lta bu'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o// gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin du rna ba dang /
310a4(dkon brtsegs): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bdag dang bdag gis stong pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' yid kyi rang bzhin ni 'di lta bu'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ dge ba sogs pa'i phyir gang
310a5(dkon brtsegs): skye mched la kun sogs pa dang / sna tshogs sogs pa de dag sogs par mi byed cing / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams la 'du shes gnyis su mi 'jug ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la
310a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'o/ / 'di ni mig gi skye mched do// 'di ni gzugs kyi skye mched do zhes de ltar mig dang gzugs rnams la 'dod chags med par mthong yang / 'dod chags med pa mngon du mi byed pa
310a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o/ / rna ba dang sgra/ sna dang dri/ lce dang ro// lus dang reg/ yid dang chos/ gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i yid dang chos
310b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bar du 'dod chags med par mthong mod kyi/ 'dod chags med pa mngon du mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o// skye mched ces bya ba de'ang 'phags pa'i skye
310b2(dkon brtsegs): mched dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched de/ de la 'phags pa'i skye mched ni gang lam sdud par byed pa'o// 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched ni gang la ma gtong bar byed pa 'di lta ste/
310b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa ni sems can lam la brtson pa bor zhing gnas pa la snying rje chen po thob cing / lam mi skye mched kyang mi gtong ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems rapa'i skye
310b4(dkon brtsegs): mched la mkhas pa'o/ / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye mched la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa 'amakhas pa ga/
310b5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la 'jug pa mkhas pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes
310b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'o/ / de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/ gang phung po rnams la mi skye bar shes pa de ni sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o// de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/ gang sred pa 'joms
310b7(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba de ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o/ / de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang mi 'byung mi 'jig par shes pa de ni 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o// de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/
311a1(dkon brtsegs): gang mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i chos rnams la sgro mi 'dogs pa de ni lam shes pa zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas bden pa 'di bzhi de ltar shes rab
311a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis shes kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mngon du mi byed pa de ni bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ / gzhan yang bden pa la mkhas pa rnam pa gsum ste/ 'di lta ste/ kun rdzob kyi
311a3(dkon brtsegs): bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi bden pa'o// de la kun rdzob kyi bden pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad ji snyed pa dang / yi ge dang / sgra dang / brdar bstan pa ste/ de ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes
311a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / de la don dam pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/ gang la sems kyi rgyu ba'ang med na yi ge lta ci smos te/ de ni don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// de la mtshan nyid kyi bden pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid thams
311a5(dkon brtsegs): cad mtshan nyid gcig la/ / mtshan nyid gcig pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'chad pas mi skyo// don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du byed par mi ltung / mtshan nyid kyi
311a6(dkon brtsegs): bden pa mtshan nyid med pas rtogs par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ / gzhan yang bden pa ni gcig pu/ gnyis ma yin pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'gog pa'i bden pa'o// /
311a7(dkon brtsegs): de la bden pa gcig pu la gang sgro mi 'dogs pa dang / sems can sgro 'dogs par ltung ba rnams la bden pa sbyor bar byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang phung po lnga
311b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang phung po lnga rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid de ni sdug bsngal zhes bya'o// sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pa de ni sdug bsngal 'phags
311b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/ / gang phung po lnga rnams kyi bag la nyal rgyu sred pa las byung ba'i lta ba de ni kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'o// gang sred pa'i rgyu lta ba de la'ang sgro mi 'dogs mi len mi snyems pade
311b3(dkon brtsegs): ni kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/ / gang phung po lnga rnams shin tu zad pa'i phyir 'gog pa sngon gyi mthar ma byung ba/ phyi ma'i mthar mi 'pho ba/ da ltar byung bar mi gnas pa de ni 'gog pa
311b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/ / gang lam la brten nas sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa la'ang reg par byed la// rjes las rtogs pa'i shes pa'ang thob par
311b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/ / gang bden pa shes pa de la rnam par rtog pa dang / sems can yongs su brtag pa la rtog par byed pa de ni byang chub sems
311b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ / gzhan yang tshor ba thams cad sdug bsngal ba ste/ de la tshor bar bya ba rnam par 'byed pa dang / blos rig pa nyid de/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// rgyu gang
311b7(dkon brtsegs): gis kun 'byung bar shes pa'i rgyu de ji lta ba yang dag par rab tu shes pa de ni kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/ / gang tshor ba gtong zhing ma tshor ba tshor bar byed pa dang / 'gog pa'ang so sor rtog
312a1(dkon brtsegs): la/ tshor ba 'gog pa'ang mngon du mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// tshor ba gang gis gzings dang 'dra ba'i lam
312a2(dkon brtsegs): sdud par byed la/ tshor bar dgos pa'ang ma yin/ lam gyi dgos pa'ang ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// de ltar rtogs
312a3(dkon brtsegs): nas bden pa de bzhi la mnyam par mthong zhing / mthong ba shin tu dag pa'ang ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang skye ba sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang mi skye ba
312a4(dkon brtsegs): la so sor rtog pa shes pa de ni sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o/ / srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba ste/ gang srid pa 'jig par shes pa de ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o// skye ba thams cad gang gis mi skye bar
312a5(dkon brtsegs): shes la/ de la 'gog pa gang yang med cing / gang mi 'gog par shes pa de ni zad pa 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o// gang de ltar tshor ba dang / 'jal ba dang / yongs su tshol ba dang / rnam par rtogs
312a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'jug pa'i shes pa de ni lam shes pa zhes bya ste/ gang bden pa'i shes pa de la gzhog par byed kyang / bden pa'i shes pa de la mi gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa/
312a7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la byang chub sems dpa'i so so dag par rig pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ bzhi po 'di dag ni
312b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa
312b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o// de la don so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gang chos rnams la don dam pa'i tshig tu shes pa dang / gnyis su med pa'i rgyu
312b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / rkyen shes pa dang / 'dus pa shes pa dang / mtha' med pa'i rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang / rten pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa dang / de bzhin
312b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i mi gnas pa shes pa dang / stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / mtshan ma med pa rtogs pa shes pa dang / smon pa med
312b5(dkon brtsegs): pa la smon pa med par shes pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa la mngon par 'du mi byed par shes pa dang / tshul gcig tu 'jug pa shes pa dang / sems can med par 'jug pa shes pa dang /
312b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag med par 'jug pa shes pa dang / srog med par byed pa shes pa dang / gang zag med par don dam par shes pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags par shes pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la
312b7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' med par shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la thams cad du shes pa dang / phung po rnams la sgyu mar shes pa dang / khams rnams la sbrul gdug pa lta bur shes pa dang / skye mched rnams la stong//
313a1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du nges par rtog pa shes pa dang / nang zhi ba shes pa dang / phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba shes pa dang / yul la yul med par shes pa dang / dran pa la gnas su shes pa dang /
313a2(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa la khong du chud par shes pa dang / blo gros la mngon sum du shes pa dang / bden pa la rab tu rtogs par shes pa dang / sdug bsngal la mi 'byung bar shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba la mngon par
313a3(dkon brtsegs): 'du mi byed par shes pa dang / 'gog pa la mtshan nyid med par shes pa dang / lam la sgrol bar shes pa dang / chos la tshig rab tu tha dad par shes pa dang / dbang po rnams la 'jug par shes pa
313a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / stobs rnams la mi brdzi bar shes pa dang / zhi gnas la gnas su shes pa dang / lhag mthong la snang bar shes pa dang / sgyu ma la bsgrub par shes pa dang / smig rgyu la 'khrug par shes
313a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rmi lam la mi bden pa mthong bar shes pa dang / brag cha la rkyen la 'jug par shes pa dang / mig yor la 'pho bar shes pa dang / mtshan nyid sna tshogs la mtshan nyid gcig tu shes pa dang //
313a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du ba la 'bral bar shes pa dang / rab tu spangs pa la phyir mtshams sbyor ba med par shes pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la sgra'i rjes su 'gro bar 'jug pa shes pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
313a7(dkon brtsegs): la rten pa la 'jug pa shes shing dben pa la mchog tu shes pa dang / theg pa chen po la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa thams cad shes pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i don so so
313b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ / gzhan yang don so so yang dag par rig pa ni gang don la rton pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kun gyi don la rton pa nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o// de ci'i
313b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ma lus par stong pa ste/ stong pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos thams cad ma lus par mtshan ma med pa ste/ mtshan ma med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no//
313b3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ma lus par smon pa med pa ste/ smon pa med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos tha ma na ma lus par rnam par phye ba ste/ rnam par phye ba'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos
313b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ma lus par sems can med/ srog med/ gang zag med pa ste/ gang zag med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// gang de lta bu'i don rnams rtogs pa de ni so so yang dag par zhes bya
313b5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ gang don ston pa de ni gnas med pa ston pa'o// de ni mi zad pa ston pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa ni rtogs pa'i don ston pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gnang ba/
313b6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su yi rang ba/ yang dag pa/ de kho na/ gzhan pa yin pa/ shes rab kyis shin tu rtogs pa/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes pa'o//
313b7(dkon brtsegs): de la chos so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gang dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
314a1(dkon brtsegs): zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i cha/
314a2(dkon brtsegs): dang mthun pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro ba'i chos rnams la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid shes pa dang / byang chub mnyam pa nyid shes pa dang /
314a3(dkon brtsegs): khams mnyam pa nyid shes pa ste/ de ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni/ gang 'dod chags spyod pa rnams la sems 'jug pa
314a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / bcos pa'i 'dod chags spyod pa rnams dang / 'dod chags brtan par spyod pa rnams dang / 'dod chags chung ngu spyod pa rnams dang / rnam par mi ldang ba'i 'dod chags spyod pa
314a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / mtha' ma rtag tu med pa'i 'dod chags spyod pa rnams dang / da ltar byung ba la rkyen gyis 'dod chags spyod pa rnams la 'jug pa ste/ sems can gang dag nang du 'dod chags la//
314a6(dkon brtsegs): phyi rol tu 'dod chags med pa dang / phyi rol tu 'dod chags la/ nang du 'dod chags med pa dang / nang du'ang 'dod chags med/ phyi rol tu'ang 'dod chags med pa dang / nang dang phyi rol tu 'dod
314a7(dkon brtsegs): chags pa dang / nang dang phyi rol tu 'dod chags med pa dang / gzugs la 'dod chags la/ sgra la 'dod chags med pa dang / sgra la 'dod chags la/ gzugs la 'dod chags med pa dang/
314b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang sgra la 'dod chags med pa dang / dri la 'dod chags med pa dang / dri la 'dod chags la/ reg la 'dod chags med pa dang / reg la 'dod chags la/ ro la 'dod chags med pa
314b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ro la 'dod chags la/ gzugs la 'dod chags med pa dang / dri la 'dod chags med pa de ni 'dod chags spyod pa rnams kyi 'jug pa ste/ 'jug pa de'i sgos 'dod chags spyod pa rnams
314b3(dkon brtsegs): la nyi khri chig stong / zhe sdang sprod pa rnams la nyi khri chig stong / gti mug spyod pa rnams la nyi khri chig stong / cha mnyam par spyod pa rnams la nyi khri chig stong ste/ gang de dag gi spyod pa brgya dri
314b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi stong gi sems 'jug pa shes pa dang / ji ltar rigs par bstan pa shes pa dang / mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa shes pa dang / 'dod pa las yang dag par 'da' bar shes pa dang / snod
314b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi khyad par shes pa dang / 'bras bu yod par bstan pa shes pa de ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// de la nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gang skad
314b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la skad med par 'jug pa shes pa dang / lha'i skad dang / klu'i skad dang / gnod sbyin gyi skad dang / dri za'i skad dang / mi 'am ci'i skad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad dang / mi dang mi ma
314b7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i skad dang / 'gro ba sngar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad dang / sgra dang dbyangs rnams las skad des de dag la chos 'chad pa ste/ de ni nges pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o//
315a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar chos de dag brtag par bya'o// de ltar chos de dag bsdu bar bya'o// de ltar chos de dag rjes su rgyun chags par bya'o// de ltar chos de dag yi ge rnams kyis/
315a2(dkon brtsegs): sbrel bar bya'o// de tshig gcig gi bla dgas shes/ tshig gnyis pa'i bla dgas shes/ tshig mang po'i bla dgas shes/ bud med kyi tshig shes/ skyes pa'i tshig shes/ ma ning gi tshig shes//
315a3(dkon brtsegs): bsdus pa'i tshig shes/ rgyas pa'i tshig shes/ smad pa'i tshig shes/ bstod pa'i tshig shes/ 'das pa'i tshig shes/ ma 'ongs pa'i tshig shes/ da ltar byung ba'i tshig shes/ yi ge gcig
315a4(dkon brtsegs): gis sgro btags pa shes/ yi ge mang pos sgro btags pa shes te/ de ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// yang de'i nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'khrul pa
315a5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ zlos pa ma yin/ brtags pa ma yin/ don gsal ba'i ye shes yongs su byang ba ste/ ci nas kyang 'khor yang dag par dga' ba sna tshogs pa zab pa/ zab par snang ba/ kun rdzob
315a6(dkon brtsegs): dang don dam pas brgyan pa/ bdag gi sems mthong ba'i shes pa la rag lus pa/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba/ sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa'i
315a7(dkon brtsegs): tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gang tshig bzang ba/ mi gnas par lung bstan pa ston
315b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rgyun mi 'chad pa/ spobs pa myur ba/ spobs pa mgyogs shing myur ba/ spobs pa ma rmongs pa/ spobs pa ji ltar dris pa bzhin pa/ spobs pa yongs su ma nyams pa/ spobs pa mi/
315b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gal ba/ spobs pa rtsod pa med pa/ spobs pa chos la rab tu dga' ba/ spobs pa bzod pa la gnas pa/ spobs pa zab pa/ spobs pa sna tshogs/ kun rdzob dang dom dam pa la spobs pa/ sbyin pa dang //
315b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab thams cad la gnas pa'i spobs pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
315b4(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong la spobs pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug
315b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa thams cad shes pa'i spobs pa/ theg pa thams cad la spobs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la spobs pa/ tshig mi lkug pa'i spobs pa/
315b6(dkon brtsegs): tshig mi rtsub pa'i spobs pa/ tshig mi 'chal ba'i spobs pa/ tshig rtsub mo ma yin pa'i spobs pa/ tshig mnyen pa'i spobs pa/ tshig dag pa/ tshig grol ba/ tshig ma chags/ tshig btsun pa/
315b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'brel ba/ tshig ldan pa/ tshig ma nyams pa/ tshig snyan pa/ tshig 'jam pa/ tshig ma spang ba/ tshig 'phags pa thams cad kyis bstod pa ste/ zhing mtha' yas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rjes
316a1(dkon brtsegs): su song ba'i sgra/ tshangs pa'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs dang 'dra ba/ rtogs par byed pa'i sgra gcig pa/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i spobs pas sems can gzhan dang gang zag
316a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la chos ston to/ / de'i ros bstan pa de'ang 'byung bar byed pa/ de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa so so yang dag par rig
316a3(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o/ / de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa la mkhas pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
316a4(dkon brtsegs): de la byang chub sems dpa'i rton pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rton pa 'di bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don la rton gyi/ tshig 'bru la ma yin pa dang //
316a5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes la rton gyi/ rnam par shes pa la ma yin pa dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde rnams la rton gyi/ drang ba'i don rnams la ma yin pa dang / chos nyid la rton gyi/ gang zag la ma yin no//
316a6(dkon brtsegs): de la don gang / tshig 'bru gang zhe na/ tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gang 'jig rten gyi chos kyi bya ba la 'jug pa'o// don ces bya ba ni gang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rtogs pa'o// tshig
316a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bru zhes bya ba ni smin pa dang / dul ba dang / sdom pa dang / nges pa bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni dul ba dang / zhi gnas dang / gsar pa ma yin pa dang / snying pa ma yin par shes pa'o// tshig
316b1(dkon brtsegs): 'bru zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba yongs su bshed pa sgrogs pa'o/ / don ces bya ba ni mi dmigs pa la rton pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan yongs su sgrogs pa'o//
316b2(dkon brtsegs): don ces bya ba ni chos rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni theg pa ji ltar rnam par gzhag pa bzhin du 'chad pa'o// don ces bya ba ni/
316b3(dkon brtsegs): chos tshul gcig pa rtog par shes pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad mi gtong bar bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni
316b4(dkon brtsegs): lus dang / ngag dang / yid sdom zhing bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par len par bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid mi dmigs shing
316b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du mi byed pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gnod sems kyi tha ba dang / khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa 'jom zhing bzod pa dang nges pa bstan pa'o//
316b6(dkon brtsegs): don ces bya ba ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtson 'grus rtsom pa thams cad bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni mi len mi gtong ba la gnas pa'i
316b7(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus so/ / tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa
317a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'o/ / tshigs 'bru zhes bya ba ni thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// don ces bya ni brjod du med pa'i don pa'i don to// tshig 'bru zhes
317a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams rab tu bstan pa'o/ / don ces bya ba ni gang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams nan tan du byed pa'i 'bras
317a3(dkon brtsegs): bu mngon sum du byed pa'o/ / tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / lam rab tu bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni 'gog pa mngon du byed pa'o// tshig 'bru
317a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa la sogs te/ rga shi'i bar du bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni ma rig pa 'gog pa nas/ rga shi'i bar du 'gog pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang
317a5(dkon brtsegs): lhag mthong gi tshogs bstan pa'o/ / don ces bya ba ni rig pa dang rnam par grol ba shes pa'o// cho ga 'bru zhes bya ba ni gang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / cha mnyam par
317a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa rnams la chos bstan pa'o/ / don ces bya ba ni sems rnam par grol ba mi 'khrugs pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni sgrib par byed pa'i chos thams cad rab tu ston pa'o// don ces bya ba ni
317a7(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes rnam par thar pa'o/ / tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan bsngags pa mtha' med pa yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni gang chos 'dod
317b1(dkon brtsegs): chags med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i dge 'dun gyi yon tan bsgrub pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gang byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma sems bskyed nas/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du
317b2(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa dang yon tan rtsom pa bstan pa'o/ / don ces bya ba ni sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o// mdor
317b3(dkon brtsegs): na chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du bstan pa de ni tshig 'bru zhes bya'o/ / sgra dang / yi ge dang / tshig 'bru thams cad brjod du med pa'i don ni don to// de la drang ba'i don
317b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi mdo sde gang zhe na/ gang tshig 'bru bshad pa ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rgya cher khong du chud par bya ste/ 'di dag ni drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde dag go// nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde gang zhe na/ don gang bshad pa
317b5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rgya cher khong du chud par bya ste/ de dag ni nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde dag go// de ji ltar na chos la rton gyi/ gang zag la ma yin zhe na/ gang drang ba'i don de ni gang zag gi don
317b6(dkon brtsegs): yin pas de la mi rton gyi/ gang nges pa'i don de ni chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin pas de la rton pa ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i rton pa bzhi pa'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
317b7(dkon brtsegs): po rton pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / // bam po bco brgyad pa// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig 'bru
318a1(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos gnyis la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// chos gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
318a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa la mkhas pa dang / ye shes la mkhas pa yin no// de la rnam par shes pa gang / ye shes gang zhe na/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par
318a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i gnas pa bzhi'o/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ gzugs la zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa yongs su gnas shing gnas pa dang / tshor ba la zhugs pa dang / 'du shes la zhugs pa dang / 'du byed
318a4(dkon brtsegs): la zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa yongs su gnas shing gnas pa ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// de la ye shes gang zhe na/ gang len pa'i phung po lnga rnams la gnas pa/ rnam par shes
318a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phung po yongs su shes pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o/ / gang sa'i khams rnam par shes pa dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rnam par shes pa de ni rnam
318a6(dkon brtsegs): par shes zhes bya'o/ / gang yang ye shes khams bzhi la mi gnas pa/ chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa shes pa de ni ye shes bya'o// gzhan yang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni gang mig gi
318a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang / lce'i rnam par
318b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pas shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i reg rnams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i chos rnams shes pa de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//
318b2(dkon brtsegs): gang yang nang gi skye mched rnams la nye bar zhi zhing / phyi rol gyi skye mched rnams la rgyu ba med pa ye shes la rton pas/ chos gang yang gzhog par mi byed pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rnam par
318b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa las rnam par shes pa skye ba dang / yongs su rtog pa las rnam par shes pa skye ba ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang yang mi 'dzin pa/ mi snyems pa/ mi
318b4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa/ rnam par mi rig pa/ mi 'khrugs pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos rnams la rnam par shes pa gnas kyi/ 'dus ma byas pa la rnam par shes pa rgyu ba
318b5(dkon brtsegs): med de/ gang yang 'dus ma byas shes pa de ni ye shes so// gzhan yang skye ba dang 'jig pa la gnas pa de ni rnam par shes pa'o// gang mi skye mi 'gag mi gnas pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// de la ngas
318b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don gyi mdo sde gang / drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde gang zhe na/ mdo sde gang dag lam la 'jug par byed pa de dag ni drang ba'i don ces bya'o// mdo sde gang dag 'bras bu la 'jug par byed pa de dag ni nges pa'i
318b7(dkon brtsegs): don ces bya'o/ / mdo sde gang dag kun rdzob sgrub par byed pa de dag ni drang ba'i don ces bya'o// mdo sde gang dag don dam pa bstan pa de dag ni nges pa'i don ces bya'o// gzhan yang mdo sde gang dag las kyi bya ba
319a1(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa de dag ni drang ba'i don ces bya'o/ / mdo sde gang dag las dang nyon mongs pa zad par bstan pa de dag ni nges pa'i don ces bya'o// gzhan yang mdo sde gang dag kun
319a2(dkon brtsegs): nas nyon mongs pa yongs su bshad pa'i phyir bstan pa de dag ni drang ba'i don to/ / mdo sde gang dag rnam par byang ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir bstan pa de dag ni nges pa'i don to// mdo sde gang dag 'khor bas skye
319a3(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa de dag ni drang ba'i don to/ / mdo sde gang dag 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su mi 'jug pa de dag ni nges pa'i don to// mdo sde gang dag yi ge dang tshig sna tshogs su bstan pa de dag
319a4(dkon brtsegs): ni drang ba'i don to/ / mdo sde gang dag zab pa/ lta dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba de dag ni nges pa'i don te/ mdo sde gang dag tshig 'bru mang ba sems can rnams kyi sems rangs par byed pa de
319a5(dkon brtsegs): dag ni drang ba'i don to/ / mdo sde gang dag tshig dang tshig 'bru nyung la nges par rtog par byed pa de dag ni nges pa'i don to// gzhan yang mdo sde gang dag bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / skye bu
319a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang zag dang / shed bu dang / shed las skyes dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po'i sgra sna tshogs bdag po med pa bdag po yod pa bzhin du bstan pa de dag ni drang ba'i don to// mdo sde gang dag
319a7(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mi 'byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / yang dag par mi 'byung ba dang / sems can med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / dus gsum
319b1(dkon brtsegs): las rnam par thar pa'i sgo bstan pa de dag ni nges pa'i don ces bya'o/ / de la chos gang / gang zag gang zhe na/ gang gang zag tu lta ba la gnas te/ chos kha cig la rtsom pa de ni gang zag ces
319b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / gang zag tu lta ba rtsom pa de'i gang chos gnas pa chos kyi dbyings de ni chos zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang zag ni so so'i skye bo'i gang zag dang / so so'i skye bo dge ba'i gang zag dang /
319b3(dkon brtsegs): da pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i gang zag dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i gang zag dang / brgyad pa'i gang zag dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i gang zag dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i gang zag dang /
319b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi 'ong ba'i gang zag dang / dgra bcom pa'i gang zag dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gang zag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gang zag dang / skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la
319b5(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir gang zag gcig 'jig rten du skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/
319b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/ gang zag gi sgra de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob kyi gnas kyis sems can rnams gzud
319b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir bstan pa'o/ / de la gang mngon par chags pa de dag ni rton pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o// de dag rtog pa la dgod pa'i phyir chos nyid la rton par bya'i/ gang zag la sa yin do
320a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ de la chos nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'gyur ba/ sgom btags pa/ mi byed pa/ rnam par mi byed pa/ mi gnas pa/ gnas
320a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ rtsa ba med pa/ thams cad du mnyam pa/ mnyam pa la mnyam pa/ mi mnyam pa la mnyam pa/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa la mnyam pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ mi rtsom pa/ nges par
320a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa thob pa/ chos thams cad shin tu ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid de ni chos nyid ces bya ste/ gang dag chos nyid la rton par byed pa de dag ni khams gang la'ang rton par mi byed de/ de bas na chos kyi
320a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul gyi sgo la 'jug pa 'dis chos thams cad la rton pa'i phyir chos thams cad de lta bu'i chos nyid yin no/ / de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rton pa bzhi zhes bya ste/ de ni byang chub
320a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i rton pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rton pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la byang chub sems dpa'
320a6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs ni 'di gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshogs so//
320a7(dkon brtsegs): de la bsod nams kyi tshogs gang zhe na/ sbyin pa la byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod
320b1(dkon brtsegs): nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa'i sems la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / snying rje'i sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brtson pa dang / bdag dang pha rol gyi sdig pa 'chags pa dang /
320b2(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad dang / slob pa thams cad dang / mi slob pa thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems dang po bskyed pa rnams dang / spyod pa la
320b3(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa thams cad dang / phyir mi ldog pa rnams/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
320b4(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa thams
320b5(dkon brtsegs): cad la chos gsol ba 'debs pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / dge ba thams cad byang chub tu bsngo ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / sems can byang chub tu
320b6(dkon brtsegs): sems ma bskyed pa rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam ston pa dang / dbul po rnams la longs spyod kyis sdud pa dang / nang
320b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la smon sbyin pa dang / gus par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / mthu chung ba rnams la bzod cing dang du len pa dang / ltung ba rnams mi 'chab pa dang / sdig pa 'tshogs pa dang / sangs
321a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams la bsnyen bkur dang ri mo thams cad byed pa dang / slob dpon dang mkhan po rnams la ston
321a2(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin du ri mo byed pa dang / chos la rin po che rin thang med pa bzhin du yongs su tshol ba'i brtson 'grus dang / chos smra ba la dga' zhing dpag tshad brgyar yang song ste/ chos nyan pas chog
321a3(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa dang / zang zing med par chos 'chad pa dang / pha dang ma la rim gro byed pa dang / byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa ges pa dang / 'gyod pa med pa dang / bsod nams bsags pas chog mi shes pa
321a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / lus bsdams shing tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / ngag bsdams pa'i ngag la tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / yid bsdams pa'i yid la tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
321a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mchod rten btsugs pa'i phyir tshangs pa'i bsod nams yongs su 'dzin pa dang / mchod sbyin gtan pa med pa bsags pas mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs sna tshogs
321a6(dkon brtsegs): bsags pas dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang / nga rgyal med pas lus brgyan pa dang / ngag gi nyes pa thams cad spangs pas ngag brgyan pa dang / blo thogs pa med pas sems brgyan
321a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mngon par shes pa sprul pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / ye shes yongs su dag pas chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi rgyan dang / phra ma dang / zhe gcod pa dang / dbye ba'i tshig yongs su spangs pas
321b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor mang po'i rgyan dang / chos 'dzin pas 'dod chags med pa'i chos kyi rgyan dang / rab tu dga' nas legs so bya ba byin pas chos kyi gtam mi 'jigs par byed pa dang / sgrib pa dang chod pa rnam
321b2(dkon brtsegs): par spangs shing gus par chos nyan pas 'bras bu yod par chos 'chad pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams la dka' thub kyi nags tshal phul bas byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
321b3(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro zhing byang chub kyi sems mi gtong bas byang chub kyi snying po'i rkyen dang / las dang nyon mongs pa mi dmigs pas tshe dang shi 'pho yongs su dag pa dang / rin po che 'phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad
321b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gtong bas lag na rin po che dang / mi zad pa'i smon lam thob pas longs spyod mi zad pa dang / khro gnyer med pas mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams dad cing bzhin 'dzum pas gsong por smra ba
321b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can thams cad la 'od zer snyoms pas mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan thob pa dang / ma lobs pa la mi brnyas pas 'od mang po gtong ba dang / tshul khrims kyi bsod nams bsags pas skye ba
321b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa dang / ltung ba la mi rtsod pas mngal yongs su dag pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las yongs su dag pas lha dang mir skye ba dang / rjes su bstan pa thams cad la rab tu rtog pas gdon mi
321b7(dkon brtsegs): za bar gnon pa dang / chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pas chos kyi dbang phyug dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas 'jig rten thams cad la mngon sum pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i spyod pa mi
322a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas rgya chen po'i chos la dad pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mi 'dor bas bsod nams thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang / dad pa sngon du 'gro bas nor
322a2(dkon brtsegs): bdun yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa nyams su len par byed pas 'jig rten thams cad mi slu ba dang / dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su
