346a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / mos pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dal ba phun sum tshogs pa
346a5(dkon brtsegs): rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags chung ste/ 'dod chags bdo ba ma yin la/ de shin tu 'dod chags kyi gdung bas yongs su mi gdung ba
346a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang bzhin gyis zhe sdang chung ste/ zhe sdang bdo ba ma yin la/ de shin tu zhe sdang gi gdung bas yongs su mi gdung ba dang / rang bzhin gyis gti mug chung ste/ gti mug bde ba ma yin la/
346a7(dkon brtsegs): de shin tu gti mug gdung bas yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin yang yon tan gyi lan yon bcu 'thob
346b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab ngo mtshar du 'gyur/ shes rab myur bar 'gyur// shes rab rno bar 'gyur/ shes rab mgyogs par 'gyur/ shes rab rgya
346b2(dkon brtsegs): che bar 'gyur/ shes rab zab par 'gyur/ shes rab nges par 'byed par 'gyur/ shes rab ma chags par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du mthong zhing mthong nas
346b3(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la tshul bzhin gyi zhu ba yongs su zhu zhing tshul bzhin gyi zhu ba zhus nas lan ldon par 'gyur ba ste/ yon tan
346b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi phan yon bcu po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / de gzhan yang yon tan gyi phan yon bcu 'thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad
346b5(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par byas par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi bcing ba thams cad lhod par byas par 'gyur ba dang // des bdud thams cad tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad smad par
346b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / 'du byed thams cad du gtogs pa las yid bskyod par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba ngan par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'das par
346b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i lam mngon du 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba thams cad las sgrol ba'i sbyin pa byin par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi cho ga'i rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ba dang /
347a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bka'i rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ba ste/ yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu
347a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu mnyan/ blangs/ bzung / bklags/ kun chub par byas/ gzhan la'ang bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan na/
347a3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gyi phan yon 'di snyed 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs
347a4(dkon brtsegs): so/ / gang dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa// mkhas pa de dag shes rab mtha' yas 'gyur// chos dang don rnams la yang mkhas par 'gyur// tshig kyang khyad par 'phags shing
347a5(dkon brtsegs): yi ge rdzogs/ / gang zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa// de ni rab dga' shin tu mgu skyes nas// dge slong de ni 'dir yang chos 'chad de// rtag tu chos kyi sbyin pa byed par 'gyur//
347a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams ni mang du chos thos nas// kye ma'o yon tan chen po 'chang byed pa// nam zhig bdag cag 'di 'dra'i chos ston cing // mdo sde 'di 'dra 'dzin par 'gyur zhes zer//
347a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag de 'dra shes rab ldan mchog rnams// chos rnams gang la'ang zhum par mi 'gyur te// dran dang ye shes kyis ni 'phags pa dang // bla na med pa'i ye shes tshig ston 'gyur//
347b1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa// de ni 'phags pas rtag bsngags rgyal bas gnang // chos tshig legs par bshad pa tshol bar byed// de ni thos pas rtag tu 'phags par 'gyur//
347b2(dkon brtsegs): thos nas don ni nye bar 'dzin par byed// shes rab ldan pa 'bru la mi snyegs te// don la lta bas rtogs pa 'phel bar 'gyur// de yi ye shes rtag tu tshad med do// ye shes mtha' yas don kyang
347b3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas te/ / sems pa mtha' yas dam pa'i don la mkhas// de yi yon tan phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro// de yi thos pa'i yon tan 'di dag go/ de yi 'dod chags chung la zhe sdang chung //
347b4(dkon brtsegs): de yi gti mug shin tu rab tu chung // sems kyang shin tu dag pa rnyed par 'gyur// de yi thos pa'i yon tan 'di dag go// longs spyod rnyed nas rgyags par mi 'gyur te// 'di la snying po ci
347b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes don la rtog/ longs spyod snying po med par rab shes nas// de ni longs spyod mi lta rab tu 'byung // mngon par byung ste dgon par gnas// rtag tu yel ba med pa dang // chos rnams
347b6(dkon brtsegs): thos pas mi ngoms te/ / chos sbyin pa la ser sna med// 'jig rten mgon po'i drung nyid du// song ste zhu ba zhu byed pas// de phyir de yi ye shes 'phel// de la dkar po
347b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bri ba med/ / shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de la brtson pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do//
348a1(dkon brtsegs): de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o// de la bsdu ba'i dngos po'i rjes su 'jug pa gang zhe na/ 'di bzhi ni byang chub sems
348a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi bsdu ba'i dngos po ste/ bsdu ba'i dngos po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' yun ring por sems can rnams yang dag par sdud par byed do// bzhi gang zhe na// 'di
348a3(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don byed pa dang / don mtshungs pa ste/ de dag ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi zhes bya'o// de la sbyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
348a4(dkon brtsegs): zang zing sbyin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / chos sbyin pa ste/ de ni sbyin pa'o// de la snyan par smra ba gang zhe na/ slong ba dang / chos nyan pa la snyan par smra ba'o// de la
348a5(dkon brtsegs): don byed pa ni bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ / don mthun pa ni theg pa gang la yon tan du 'du shes pa'i theg pa dang / chos de dag la 'dzin par byed pa'i
348a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams gzhog pa'o/ / gzhan yang sbyin pa ni gang slong ba la yid dang bar byed pa ste/ de ni sbyin pa zhes bya'o// snyan par smra ba ni gang slong ba rnams la rim gro byed pa'o//
348a7(dkon brtsegs): don byed pa ni gang gis slong ba rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba'i don de yongs su thob par byed pa'o// don mtshungs pa ni gang slong ba la don mtshungs pa'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa ni bsam pas
348b1(dkon brtsegs): btang ba'o/ / snyan par smra ba ni sbyor ba yongs su chad pa'o// don byed pa ni lhag pa'i bsam pa 'gyod pa med pa'o// don mthun pa ni theg pa chen po la bsngo ba'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa
348b2(dkon brtsegs): ni byams pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'i sems kyi gtong ba'o/ / snyan par smra ba ni dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba la zhugs pa'i sems mi gtong ba'o// don byed pa ni snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos
348b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyis sems can gyi bya ba la brtson pa'o/ / don mtshungs pa ni btang snyoms la mtho dman med cing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bsngo ba'i sems so// gzhan yang
348b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa ni gang chos kyis btsal ba'i longs spyod yongs su gtong ba'o/ / snyan par smra ba ni gang la sbyin par byed pa de chos la 'dzud pa'o// don byed la ni gang ba dag gi don dang gzhan gyi don
348b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par skyed pa'o/ / don mtshungs pa ni gang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems skyed pa'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa ni gang nang dang phyi'i chos
348b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o/ / snyan par smra ba ni gang chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyi ye shes la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa'o// don byed pa ni gang gis bdag gi don
348b7(dkon brtsegs): btang ste gzhan gyi don myong bar byed pa'o/ / don mtshungs pa nyid ni byang chub lag tu 'ongs pa la bltas nas gzhan la sbyin pa ni yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba'o// de la chos sbyin pa gang zhe na/
349a1(dkon brtsegs): gang ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams ston pa'o// de la snyan par smra ba gang zhe na/ gang zang zing med par chos ston pa'o// don byed pa ni gang pha rol la lung 'bog pa dang
349a2(dkon brtsegs): kha ton byed pa dang / 'chad pa dang / ston pa la mi skyo ba'o// de la don mtshungs pa gang zhe na/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang ma bral bar chos la 'dzud pa'o// gzhan yang sbyin
349a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni chos nyan par 'ongs pa rnams la mi g.yeng bar ston pa'o/ / de la snyan par smra ba ni gang rgyang ring por yang song ste dam pa'i chos ston pa'o// de la don byed pa ni gang chos 'dod la sa rmes
349a4(dkon brtsegs): smra ba rnams gos dang bral bar gyur tam/ bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang bral bar gyur tam/ ci dgos par gyur pa de thams cad
349a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par byed pa'o/ / don mtshungs pa nyid ni lhag pa'i bsam par zhugs pa'i rgyud kyis chos ston pa'o// gzhan yang chos sbyin pa ni gang sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na mchog tu shes
349a6(dkon brtsegs): nas chos sbyin par byed pa'o/ / de la snyan par smra ba ni gang phan pa'i dngos po'i phyir ston pa'o// don byed pa ni gang don la rton gyi tshig 'bru la mi rton pa'o// de la don mtshungs pa ni
349a7(dkon brtsegs): gang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bskang ba'i phyir chos ston pa'o/ / gzhan yang sbyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// snyan par smra ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
349b1(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// don byed pa ni gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// don mtshungs pa ni gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
349b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang sbyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams kyi'o// snyan par smra ba ni byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi'o// don byed pa ni gang byang chub sems
349b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi'o/ / don mtshungs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi'o// gzhon yang sbyin pa ni byang chub kyi rtsa ba'i gnas so// snyan par smra ba
349b4(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub kyi myu gu yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ / don byed la ni byang chub kyi me tog yongs su grub pa'o// don mtshungs par byed pa ni byang chub kyi 'bras bu mngon par grub pa ste/ de dag ni byang chub
349b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi'o/ / bsdu ba'i dngos po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yun ring por sems can rnams yang dag par sdud cing
349b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu spyod de/ de ni bsdu ba'i dngos po'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya'o// de lta bas na tshad med pa de dag dang / pha rol tu phyin pa de dag dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po de dag ni byang chub kyi la
349b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ / de ltar na shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po des brtson 'grus spyod la
350a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi lam de'ang bshad/ 'das pa dang // ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstabs pa'ang brjod do// shA ri'i bu de nas gnon
350a2(dkon brtsegs): nubartson 'grus spyod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po las byang chub kyi lam de thos 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
350a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan yang thos nas dga' ba dang mgu ba rgya chen po rnyed par gyur to/ / de dga' ba dang mgu ba rgya chen po de rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
350a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu 'di lta ste/ na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang /
350a5(dkon brtsegs): mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas nas byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang / bcom ldan
350a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/ / shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod ces bya
350a7(dkon brtsegs): bapab de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod the tsom dang yid gnyis za na de ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe de'i dus nang gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod ces bya bar gyur te/ ngas
350b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 'phung po chen po nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad
350b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gro byas mchod pa byas nas byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang / nga la bcom ldan 'das kyis
350b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung ma bstan to// shA ri'i bu de lta
350b4(dkon brtsegs): bas na bcom ldan 'das 'od 'phro'i phung po chen po de tshun chad bskal pa grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog yan
350b5(dkon brtsegs): lag ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du'o// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag gi nyan thos bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i nyan thos
350b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po byung ste/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag la zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam
350b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pha rol tu son la sha stag go/ / shA ri'i bu yang de'i tshe na rgyal po mdzes par snang ba zhes bya ba mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ 'khor los sgyur ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po
351a1(dkon brtsegs): yul gyi mthu dang brtson pa thob pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de'i rin po che sna bdun byung ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che nas/ blon po
351a2(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i bar du bdun te/ mngon par btul nas gnas pa'i bar du'o// shA ri'i bu rgyal po mdzes par snang ba de'i pho brang ni grong khyer 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser zhes bya ste/ shar phyogs
351a3(dkon brtsegs): nas nub phyogs su chur ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ lho phyogs nas byang phyogs su zheng du ni dpag tshad bdun yod de/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / dga' ba dang /
351a4(dkon brtsegs): skye bo mang po dang mis gang bar gyur to// yang de'i tshe na tshong dpon shes rab bzang zhes bya ba phyag pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba nas/ mdzod dang bang bas yongs su gang ba'i bar du rgyas par byas
351a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bya ba byas pa zhig byung ngo // shA ri'i bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag des
351a6(dkon brtsegs): tshong dpon shes rab bzang gi bsam pa la brtags nas/ kye ma'o tshong dpon shes rab bzang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rung ngo // kye ma'o tshong dpon
351a7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab bzang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur to snyam du dgongs te/ snod du gyur par mkhyen nas/ tshong dpon shes rab bzang ga la ba der gshegs te phyin nas
351b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul gyis steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung du bzhugs nas byang chub kyi lam yang bshad/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
351b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa'ang brjod do/ / shA ri'i bu de nas tshong dpon shes rab bzang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam 'di'ang thos/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
351b3(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa'ang thos nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob par gyur to// de dga' ba dang / mgu
351b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog yan lag nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
351b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa de la lo stong du 'di lta ste/ na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad kyis bsnyen bkur byas bla mar byas/ bsti stang byas
351b6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag des/ bla na med pa yang dag
351b7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/ / shA ri'i bu yang de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon shes rab bzang zhes bya ba gzhan zhig yin snyam du the tsom dang yid gnyis za na de ltar mi blta'o//
352a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus nang tshong dpon shes rab bzang zhes bya bar gyur te/ ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
352a2(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa de la lo stong dun bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ bsti stang byas/ mchod pa
352a3(dkon brtsegs): byas te byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag des nga la khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
352a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/ / shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog yan lag tshun chad bskal pa
352a5(dkon brtsegs): grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // yang de'i tshe rgyal po dgra thul zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ shA ri'i bu rgyal po dgra thul gyi grong khyer pad+ma can
352a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba 'byor pa/ bde ba/ rgyas pa/ lo legs pa/ dga' ba/ skye bo mang po dang / mis gang ba zhig yod do// shA ri'i bu rgyal po dgra thul gyi bram ze mar me bdag ces bya ba shing sA la
352a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po lta bu phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba nas/ mdzod dang bang ba'i bar du yongs su gang ba zhig byung ba de/ rgyal po dgra thul la dben cing 'phangs/ sdug cing yid du 'ong
352b1(dkon brtsegs): ste/ mthong na mi mthun pa med de/ shA ri'i bu bram ze mar me bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu la rgyal srid phyed byin no// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ rgyal po mar me'i bdag po rgyal po'i
352b2(dkon brtsegs): phyed byed pa chos kyis byed de/ chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no// yang shA ri'i bu dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po mar me'i bdag po las bu gzugs bzang po// mdzes pa
352b3(dkon brtsegs): blta na sdug pa/ shin tu bzang ba/ kha dog rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ de'i lus thams cad las
352b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od byung ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba bzhin te/ de'i ming mar med mdzad du btags so// shA ri'i bu de nas rgyal po mar me bdag gis bram ze mtshan mkhan
352b5(dkon brtsegs): ltas shes pa rnams bsogs nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me mdzad bstan pa dang / de dag gis de byang chub tu lung bstan to// de ltar rgyal po mar me'i bdag pos rgyal bu gzhon nu
352b6(dkon brtsegs): mar me mdzad ma ma dag la gtad do/ / shA ri'i bu de nas ring po ma lon par rgyal bu mar me mdzad gzhon nu mkhas par gyur to// shA ri'i bu de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu
352b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'og min gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad la bskor ba byas nas
353a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mar me mdzad la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang der ni// yon tan 'byung gnas gyur pa
353a2(dkon brtsegs): med/ / drang srong rgyal mtshan gnas nas ni// byang chub dam pa rtogs par 'gyur// lang cho myur du 'gro ba ni// rlung gi shugs pas lhag par mgyogs// rga ba de ni gzugs 'jig
353a3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'jig rten yid du mi 'ong ba// grogs po rgas pa mthu nyams ni// rab tu 'byung bar dka' ba ste// khyod ni shin tu dar la bab// khyod ni brtsal ba'i dus yin no//
353a4(dkon brtsegs): legs so legs so shes rab che// legs so legs so blo gros che// myur du mngon par byung na legs// thub brtan byang chub rtogs par gyis// // bam po
353a5(dkon brtsegs): nyi shu pa ste tha ma'o/ / shA ri'i bu de nas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mar me mdzad la bskul ba dang / dad pas khyim nas
353a6(dkon brtsegs): khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ de nyid kyi nub mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de nyid kyi nub mo de ltar bcom ldan 'das mar me
353a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du gyur par che ba dang
353b1(dkon brtsegs): dge bar grags pa'i sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa mngon par byung nas/ rgyal po dgra thul gyis/ rgyal po mar med bdag gis bus ma bslabs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
353b2(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de nyid kyi nub mo rgya cher sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur pa'i bar du che ba dang / dge bar grags pa'i sgra dang / tshigs su bcad la thos so/
353b3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de nas rgyal po dgra thul gyis/ rgyal po mar me bdag la khyod kyi sras rab tu byung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bdag
353b4(dkon brtsegs): gis thos te/ bdag ni khyod kyi sras mar me mdzad mthong bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gi drung du gshegs su gsol/
353b5(dkon brtsegs): de ste mi gshegs na bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang bcas te mchi'o zhes pho nya btang ba dang / de nas shA ri'i bu rgyal po mar me bdag gis rtsis pa dang / blon po dang / sgo ba
353b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'khor rnams bsogs te/ de ltar gyur pa dag bzlas pa dang / de dag gis lha de ltar na bcom ldan 'das de nyid la gsol na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni thugs rje che bas thugs rjer dgongs te/
353b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dgra thul gyi drung du gshegs par 'gyur te/ rgyal po ngag thul kyang 'dir mi mchi bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang / shA ri'i bu de nas rgyal po mar me bdag blon po dag dang 'grogs te
354a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de ltar gyur pa de dag gsol to// de skad ces
354a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis/ rgyal po mar me'i bdag po la de bas na rgyal po chen po thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ rgyal po dgra thul gyi drung du gshegs so//
354a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad lha rdzas mchog gi rgyal po'i lo brang du ji srid dgyes par bzhugs nas/ dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag brgyad
354a4(dkon brtsegs): cu dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang thabs cig tu yul rgyu zhing gshegs so// rgyal po mar me'i bdag po'ang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang bcas te zham ring thog
354a5(dkon brtsegs): thag tu 'brang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa la na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bkur sti byed cing /
354a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi yul gyi bar du zham ring byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor te mchi ma blags nas slar log pa dang /
354a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang thabs cig tu rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can du gshegs
354b1(dkon brtsegs): par rgyal po dgra thul gyis thos so/ / de nas rgyal po dgra thul gyis rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can brgyan te/ sa gzhi dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag la gseg
354b2(dkon brtsegs): ma dang gyo mo dag sel du btsud de bsal nas/ phyag bdar dang chag chag 'debs su btsud do// spos chu'i chag chag 'debs su btsud do// me tog bkram pa sa lus mo nub pa tsam du phyin
354b3(dkon brtsegs): par byed du btsud do/ / bdug pa'i snod nas kyang bdug pa byas so// gos rin po che sna bdun gyi bla re bres/ sil snyan sna tshogs kyang dkrol du btsud do// de nas rgyal po dgra thul gyis rgyal
354b4(dkon brtsegs): po'i pho brang pad+ma can brgyan nas/ gang rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can kun na me tog dang / dri dang / byug pa yod pa rnams sus kyang ma spyad cig/ ma btsong zhig/ de thams cad bcom ldan 'das
354b5(dkon brtsegs): mar me mdzad la dbul zhing mchod pa'i las su gyis shig/ la la zhig spyod dam 'tshong na de ni chad pa chen pos gcad do zhes sgra bsgrags so// de nas rgyal po dgra thul gyis/ bcom ldan
354b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang bcas te/ me tog dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
354b7(dkon brtsegs): bza' dang / gdugs dang // rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dkrol ba dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen pos rgyal po'i lo brang pad+ma can nas phyir
355a1(dkon brtsegs): byung ngo / / pad+ma can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de'i
355a2(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / dri dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
355a3(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa byas/ blon po dang / 'khor dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag de dag gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa
355a4(dkon brtsegs): byas te zham ring du 'brang ba dang / rgyal po dgra thul sems dga'/ sems mgu/ sems la sgrib pa med/ sems rangs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'brang ngo //
355a5(dkon brtsegs): yang de'i tshe na gangs kyi ri'i ngos la bram ze rin po che zhes bya ba g.yog bram ze gzhon nu lnga brgya yod pa klog tu 'dzud pa'i mkhan po sngags 'chang ba/ rig byed gsum po sgra nges
355a6(dkon brtsegs): par sbyor ba dang bcas pa dang / shes gsal dang bcas pa dang / yi ge rab tu dbye ba dang bcas pa dang / sngon byung ba lnga pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ tshig re zhing lung ston pa dang / 'jig rten
355a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyang 'phen pa dang / mchod sbyin gyi rgyu dang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rjes su rtogs pa/ rang gi tshig rabs la gsum rigs pa dang / slob dpon du gyur par yongs su shes pa zhig gnas te/ shA ri'i bu
355b1(dkon brtsegs): yang bram ze rin po che de la/ bram ze gzhon nu sprin ces bya ba zhe gnas byed pa/ klog tu 'jug pa/ sngags 'chang ba/ rig byed gsum po sgra nges par sbyor ba dang bcas pa dang / shes gsal dang
355b2(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa dang / yi ge rab tu dbye ba dang bcas pa dang / sngon byung ba lnga pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ tshig re zhing lung ston pa dang / 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa dang / mchod sbyin gyi rgyu dang skyes bu
355b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i mtshan rjes su rtogs pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa/ rang gi tshig rabs la gsum rig pa dang / slob dpon du gyur par yongs su shes pa zhig yod do// shA ri'i bu de nas bram ze gzhon nu smin
355b4(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba rig byed lobs nas/ mkhan po la kye mkhan po bdag gis rig byed lobs te bdag ni yul du mchi na/ bdag gi bgyi ba ci mchis zhes de skad smras pa dang / kye bu gzhon nu sprin slob dpon la nor
355b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gron bu lnga brgya byin cig ces nges de skad smras so/ / de nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis mkhan po'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor nas/ mkhan po'i drung nas song ste/ de grong dang /
355b6(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dag na rgyu zhing slob dpon la dbul ba'i slob dpon gyi nor btsal te/ de slob dpon gyi nor bsdus nas/ mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can du phyin te/
355b7(dkon brtsegs): bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can kun brgyan pa mthong ngo // mthong nas mi zhig bos te/ kye skyes bu rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can 'dir ci'i dga' ston cig g.yos par gyur ces smras
356a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / des gzhon nu khyod kyis mi shes sam/ de ring bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar ma mdzad dgra
356a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang thabs cig tu rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can du gshegs te/ de'i phyir rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can 'di kun brgyan
356a3(dkon brtsegs): to/ / de la mi dag sbyin pa'ang sbyin par byed/ bsod nams dag kyang byed do zhes de skad smras pa dang / de nas kyang bram ze sprin gzhon nus sangs rgyas kyi sgra thos nas dga' ba dang / dad pa dang /
356a4(dkon brtsegs): mgu ba cher skyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dkon te/ shin tu dkon/ u dum wa ra'i me tog 'dra/ mchod sbyin gyi shing gcig pu'i tshul lta bu yin pas/ gang
356a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis kar sha pa Na lnga brgya po 'dis me tog nyos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la me tog gtor la/ slob dpon gyi nor gud nas btsal lo snyam mo//
356a6(dkon brtsegs): yang de'i tshe na bu mo zhig me tog ut+pa la bdun khyer te lam gyi srang nas song ba dang / de nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis bu mo de la/ kye bu mo chu nas byung ba'i me tog gang nas rnyed par
356a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur ces de skad smras pa dang / des phyogs che ge mo zhig na 'phreng ba byed pa'i khang pa nas bdag gis kar sha pa Na lnga brgyas nyos so zhes smras so// de nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis/ bu mo
356b1(dkon brtsegs): de la me tog chu nas skyes pa 'di dag ji tsam gyis nyos pa bzhin du nga la chongs shig/ de skad ces smras na/ des de ltar mi rung ngo zhes smras nas/ des 'o na gnyis khyod la zhog la/ nga la kar
356b2(dkon brtsegs): sha pa Na lnga brgyas nyor byin cig ces smras nas/ des 'di dag gis ci bya zhes smras pa dang / des bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad la gtor bar bya'o zhes smras so// des gal te khyod srid pa'i
356b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba 'chi 'pho thams cad du bdag gi khyim thabs tu 'gyur bar dam bca' na sbyin no/ / des bu mo thong khyod de skad ma zer cig/ ci'i phyir zhe na khyod ni g.yeng zhing rgod pa'o// bu mo bla na med la'i ye
356b4(dkon brtsegs): shes sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med pa ni bskal pa grangs med pas sgrub dgos te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ 'gron bu dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai nuR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang /
356b5(dkon brtsegs): b+hu ru chen po dang / gser dang / dngul dang ldan pa dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / bong bu dang / ba glang dang / lug dang / rgyal srid kyang yongs su gtang ba dang / shing rta yongs su gtang ba dang
356b6(dkon brtsegs): slas yongs su gtang ba dang / bu pho dang bu mo yongs su gtang ba dang / lag pa yongs su gtang ba dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / gtsug pud yongs su gtang ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang
356b7(dkon brtsegs): mig dang / yan lag mchog yongs su gtang ba'i sbyin pa sbyin par byas te/ mdor na bu mo nang ngam/ phyi'i dngos po gang yang bdag gis yongs su mi gtang bar bya ba med de/ bu mo gang bdag gis khyod
357a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang yongs su gtang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ba'i dus dang tshong du 'gyur na/ khyod ni g.yeng zhing rgod kyis/
357a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod nga'i sbyin pa'i bar chad ma byed cig ces de skad smras pa dang / des gal te khyod lus las sha yung kar gyi 'brum bu tsam du gcad de nga la byin du zin kyang / ngas khyod kyi sbyin pa'i bar chad mi bya'o zhes
357a3(dkon brtsegs): smras nas/ des de la de ltar gyur cig/ chu las skyes pa'i me tog dag nga la byin cig ces smras pa dang / des kyang byin no// de nas bram ze gzhon du sprin gyis me tog ut+pa la de
357a4(dkon brtsegs): dag blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste/ bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya ston
357a5(dkon brtsegs): du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar ba mthong ste/ spyod lam mdzes pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// de bcom ldan 'das la sems dang bar gyur to// de sems dang bar gyur nas shin tu dga' ba dang
357a6(dkon brtsegs): dad pa dang / bkur sti bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste/ bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis mi mang po dag gis gos bzang po bzang ba dag/ bcom ldan 'das mar
357a7(dkon brtsegs): me mdzad kyi drung du bkram pa mthong nas/ des bdag la gos med kyis/ gang bdag gis ri dgas kyi pags pa 'di gding ngo snyam nas// des ri dgas kyi pags pa de bting ba dang / de na
357b1(dkon brtsegs): mi ngengag 'di 'dra ba'i sems can dkon mchog gi drung du ri dgas kyi pags pa bting ngam zhes 'phya zhing bting ba'ang brtul bar byed do/ / de nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin phyogs kyi mtha' ga la ba
357b2(dkon brtsegs): der song ste phyin nas/ ri dgas kyi lags pa bting ste dgongs shig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kun nas spyan ri dgas kyi pags pa 'di la zhabs gzhag par
357b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzod cig ces sems bskyed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis dgongs nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyi ri dgas kyi lags pa la zhabs gzhag go// de des
357b4(dkon brtsegs): bram ze gzhon nu sprin dga' mgu rangs rabs tu dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la me tog ut+pa la lnga gtor ba dang / lha'i bu brgya phrag du mas lha'i me
357b5(dkon brtsegs): tog man da ra ba dang / lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la mngon par gtor/ lha'i sil snyan rnams
357b6(dkon brtsegs): / dkrol/ lha'i glu dbyangs blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la bsti stang bya ba'i phyir me tog ut+pa la de dag ut+pa la stong phrag du mar byas te/ me tog gi bla re 'dab
357b7(dkon brtsegs): mthur du lta/ sdong bu gyen du lta bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la mngon par gtor to// 'di lta ste/
358a1(dkon brtsegs): bram ze gzhon nu sprin sems dang nas/ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad kyi spyan sngar lo bcu gnyis su ral pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu bting nas bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus
358a2(dkon brtsegs): na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dbugs dbyung bar mdzod cig/ bdag la phyag
358a3(dkon brtsegs): gis drang bar gsol zhes yi dam brtan par byas so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad bdag gi ral pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i steng du zhabs mi 'jog cing / bdag la
358a4(dkon brtsegs): dbugs phyin par mi mdzad cing / bdag la byang chub tu lung yang mi ston na// de'i phyir bdag 'di nyid du lus bskams par bgyi'o zhes yi dam yang bcas so// shA ri'i bu de nas
358a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kun nas mkhyen pa/ dus gsum gang yang mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ba des//
358a6(dkon brtsegs): bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyi bsam pa mkhyen nas/ bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyi ska ral pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu la zhabs bzhag ste/ g.yas phyogs nas glang po'i gzigs pas gzigs te
358a7(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun de la/ dge slong dag ral pa rnams la rkang pa ma bzhag cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag bram ze'i khye'u sprin 'di ni bskal pa grangs med pa na/ de bzhin
358b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro nas bka' stsal to/ / shA ri'i bu de ltar bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyis/ bcom ldan
358b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad las lung bstan pa thos nas/ dga' zhing mgu nas steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig
358b3(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong phrag brjod du med pa mngon sum du byed do/ / de la mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis/ shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa
358b4(dkon brtsegs): dag gis/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur
358b5(dkon brtsegs): ro zhes lung ston pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / de bzhin du shar dang lho'i mtshams nas/ steng dang 'og gi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
358b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bas lhag pa dag gis/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

359a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de'i drung du dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod do// shA ri'i bu khyod de'i tshe
359a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u sprin ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du de ltar dogs shing the tsom za na de ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u sprin ces
359a3(dkon brtsegs): bya bar gyur pa de yin te/ ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de la me tog ut+pa la lnga gtor te ral pa'ang bting ngo // shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lung
359a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa myur du thob par 'dod pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnams grangs shin tu mnyan par bya/ blang bar bya/ gzung bar bya/ gzhan dag la'ang brjod par bya/

359a6(dkon brtsegs): mar me mdzad kyi pha rol na ngas dkar po'i chos kyi spyod pa gang la ma spyad pa de gang yang med de/ 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis lung ma bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
359a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar nga mtshan ma dang bcas pas spyod par gyur to/ / gang gi tshe gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnams grangs mtshan ma med par spyod pa/ dmigs pa med par spyod pa/
359b1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar thos pa bzhin du bsgrubs pas gnas pa/ de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i bye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

359b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong ma thag tu spyod pa thams cad las 'das te/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du
359b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba khong du chud do/ / mthong ma thag tu chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes par shes so// de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad des bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus
359b5(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// lung bstan ma thag tu mi skye ba'i
359b6(dkon brtsegs): chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo/ / bzod pa rab tu thob pa ji lta bu zhe na/ gang 'di gzugs rab tu mi rnyed par bzod pa rab tu thob pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang
359b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa rab tu mi rnyed par bzod pa rab tu thob pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi chos thams cad rab tu mi rnyed par bzod pa rab tu thob bo// yang bzod pa
360a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu thob pa zhes bya ba 'di ni bzod pa med pa'i chos rab tu thob pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i chos de la ni 'jig rten gyi
360a2(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kun tu mi 'byung ngo / / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ma yin/ slob pa'i chos rnams ma yin/ mi slob pa'i chos rnams ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams ma yin/
360a3(dkon brtsegs): te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo // chos thams cad mi 'byung bas de'i phyir bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya'o// chos thams cad thob pa med cing mi dmigs pas de'i phyir
360a4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya'o/ / bzod pa de'ang mtshan ma thams cad dang / dmigs pa thams cad kyis skad cig pa yin te/ de'i phyir bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya ste/ de la ni mig
360a5(dkon brtsegs): med do/ / mig la smras pa med do// gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rna ba med/ sna med/ lce med/ lus med/ yid la smas pa med de/ mi zad pa'i yul de ni bzod pa/ 'gro ba med pa'i
360a6(dkon brtsegs): yul de ni bzod pa ste/ de'i phyir bzod pa rab tu thob po zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa myur du thob par 'dod pa dag gis gang 'di byang chub sems
360a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs mtshan ma med par spyod pa/ lhun gyis grub par spyod pa/ dmigs pa med par spyod pa/ shin tu mnyan par bya/ blang bar bya/ gzung bar bya
360b1(dkon brtsegs): kun chub par bya/ gzhan la'ang brjod par bya/ rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya/ nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya'o// yang de'i tshe 'khor de nyid du tshong dpon gyi bu
360b2(dkon brtsegs): mis byin zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das las byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / byang chub sems
360b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i yon tan rnams thos nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
360b4(dkon brtsegs): thal mo spar ba btung de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan ma 'gags pas bdag la/ khyim bdag dgra bcom pa thob ste/ 'di ni rga/
360b5(dkon brtsegs): shi'i tha ma'o zhes de ltar 'jug par bgyis/ de skad rjes su bstan mod kyi/ bdag bcom ldan 'das las byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / sangs rgyas
360b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi yon tan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams thos nas/ 'di snyam du gang 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub theg pa chen po 'di ni mchog/ gtso bo/ dam pa/
360b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog rab gya nom pa/ bla na med pa'o snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das las kyang bdag gis rab tu rnam par phye ba'i chos rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de bskyed par bya'o zhes mngon
361a1(dkon brtsegs): sum du thos/ mngon sum du bzung nas/ bdag 'di snyam du rab tu rnam par phye ba'i chos bzung ba ma mchis pa/ nga'i ba ma mchis pa/ yongs su bzung ba ma
361a2(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa rnams kyis chos gang yang mchog/ gtso bo// mchog rab/ gya nom pa/ bla na med pa'i chos de yang dag par bsgrub ste 'jug go snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di
361a3(dkon brtsegs): snyam du theg pa thams cad kyi nang na ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med par gnas pa lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa ni theg pa gang ji snyed pa de dag gi mchog tu brjod pa nas
361a4(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa'i bar du brjod pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang /
361a5(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i slad du de slan chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i
361a6(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa bcas pa la'ang bslab par bgyi'o snyam bgyid do/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin la 'di skad ces bka'
361a7(dkon brtsegs): stsal to/ / mis byin bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni yid ches par dka' ba bslab dka' ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
361b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yid ches par dka' zhing sgrub par dka' lags kyang / bcom ldan 'das de dang mthun par brtson 'grus brtsams te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub par bgyi'o//
361b2(dkon brtsegs): ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te sems bskyed pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
361b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus par gyur la/ sems bskyed pa re re'ang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur la/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa lan re zhing yang
361b4(dkon brtsegs): mgo gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed chad par gyur kyang / de ltar bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su mi gtang ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rnam grangs 'dis
361b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar spro na/ gang bde ba'i yo byad kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lta smos kyang ci 'tshal de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
361b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni ji ltar bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du tshig gis kyang khong du chud par sla ba ma lags te/ de ltar rgya che ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos
361b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag kyang de ltar rgya che ba'o/ / de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// de ltar mtshungs pa ma mchis so// de ltar dpag tu ma mchis so// de ltar grangs ma mchis so// sangs rgyas
362a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mkhyen pa'ang de ltar chags pa ma mchis so/ / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcang ba 'di dag smras so//
362a2(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// bdag ni byang chub sems bskyed cing // sdug bsngal kun gyis gtses gyur kyang // sems can rnams ni mi gtong ngo // sems bskyed pa ni lan
362a3(dkon brtsegs): re zhing / / mgo yi phung po ri rab kyi// 'phang tsam mthon por gyur pa dag/ thams cad gcod par spro bar bgyi// srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// byang chub 'di la bdag
362a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dug go/ / de bzhin gshegs pa khyod ci 'drar// de 'dra kho nar gyur par shog/ theg pa chung ngu theg pa dman// nyan thos theg pa spangs nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod
362a5(dkon brtsegs): ci 'drar/ / de 'dra kho nar gyur par shog/ theg pa 'di ni theg pa che// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mchog ces bsngags// gzung bar 'os pa gzhan ma mthong // de bas
362a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni byang chub mos/ / gnod par gyur pa rnams la skyob// ngan 'gro gsum las thar lar bgyi// de yi phyir ni sangs rgyas dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ngo //
362a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po 'di lta bu dag shes la/ gang bu dang chung ma dag chos 'di
362b1(dkon brtsegs): ngag yang dag par 'dzin du ma bcug na/ 'di ni bdag gi mi cha'o snyam nas/ de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas
362b2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ rings shing myur ba'i gzugs kyis rang gi khyim ga la ba der song ste/ chung ma bdun dang / khye'u bdun dang / bu mo bdun dang / bran pho bdun dang / bran mo bdun dang lhan cig tu
362b3(dkon brtsegs): ras bcos bu zung stong thogs te/ rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das la lta bar 'dod pas rings shing myur ba'i gzugs kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khye'u chen po
362b4(dkon brtsegs): nas byung ba dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi mi dang mi ma yin pa rab tu mang po dag gis tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin g.yog dang bcas te rangs shing myur ba'i gzugs kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
362b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po nas byung bar mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces/ mis byin khyod g.yog dang bcas te rings shing myur ba'i gzugs kyis gar cha zhes 'dzer ba dang / smas pa// skyes
362b6(dkon brtsegs): bu khyed cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas bskor te mdun du bdar nas/ rnam grangs
362b7(dkon brtsegs): dums sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag yang dag par rab tu ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag gi don dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med
363a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir bdag g.yog dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga la ba der song ste/
363a2(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed la mi shes pa lta/ gal te khyed sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag yongs su sgrub par 'dod na tshur shog
363a3(dkon brtsegs): 'deng ngo / / bcom ldan 'das de'i gan du dong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya che ba rgya che ba dag gi don gyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o// de ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams mis byin
363a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshig de thos nas/ srog chags khri phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin chung ma bdun dang / khye'u bdun dang / bu mo bdun dang / bran po bdun dang
363a5(dkon brtsegs): bran mo bdun dang lhan cig tu ras bcos bu zung stong thogs nas/ srog chags stong phrag bcu po de dag dang / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang lhan cig tu me tog dang
363a6(dkon brtsegs): spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rnga dang / rol mo sil snyan dkrol te
363a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ ras bcos bu zung stong po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra la gsol nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smas so// sems
363b1(dkon brtsegs): can dam pa mi mchog gang lags pa/ / byang chub mchog tu rnam par dag par spyod// mtha' yas gzigs pa rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog/ de la de ring bdag ni mchod par bgyi//
363b2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig sngon gyi bskal pa mang por spyad// srog chags rnams la lan phyir byang chub btsal// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyis dbang mchog brnyes// de la de ring ba dag gis
363b3(dkon brtsegs): mchod par bgyi/ / bu dang bran bcas nye du'i tshogs dang bcas// srog chags rnams la phan phyir byang chub tshol// srog chags stong po 'di dang lhan cig tu// sangs rgyas dang ni chos la
363b4(dkon brtsegs): skyabs su mchi/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// /
363b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das sems can ji snyed pa de bdag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du mchis pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs
363b6(dkon brtsegs): pa sha stag lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas kyang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
363b7(dkon brtsegs): b dag gis bcom ldan 'das las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa gang lags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
364a1(dkon brtsegs): ba de ltar de dag la chos bstan du gsol/ / 'di lta ste/ da ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang chos 'di dag thos par gyur cig ces
364a2(dkon brtsegs): nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo bdun po de dag dang / khye'u bdun dang / bu mo bdun dang / bran po bdun dang bran mo bdun dang / srog
364a3(dkon brtsegs): chags khri po de dag dang / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sangs rgyas dang / chos
364a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spong ngo //
364a5(dkon brtsegs): skyabs su mchis so// mngon par dad do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/
364a6(dkon brtsegs): da ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khyod bzhin du bdag cag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la
364a7(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan par bgyi'o/ / 'di lta ste/ da ltar bcom ldan 'das tshogs la gdams ngag mdzad pa de bzhin du tshogs la gdams par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
364b1(dkon brtsegs): da ltar bcom ldan 'das sems can sdug bsngal gyis zhen pa rnams thar par mdzad pa de bzhin du bdag cag kyang sems can sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams thar par bgyi'o// de nas rol
364b2(dkon brtsegs): mo mkhan lnga brgya po de dag gis sil snyan sgra chen pos bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed do/ / srog chags khri po de dag dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin chung ma bdun
364b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / khye'u bdun dang / bu mo bdun dang / bran po bdun dang / bran mo bdun dang / g.yog thams cad dang / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan
364b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so//
364b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dad pa skyed nas sangs rgyas kyi
364b6(dkon brtsegs): mthus rol mo'i cha byad de dag thams cad bor ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag ma gzung bar steng gi bar snang la gnas shing sgra 'byin te/ sgra 'byin bzhin du de bzhin
364b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa bar snang la bzhugs pa la lan gsum skor bar byed do/ / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin g.yog dang bcas pa dang / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang /
365a1(dkon brtsegs): srog chags khri po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul 'di mthong nas dga' mgu yi rangs te/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas thams
365a2(dkon brtsegs): cad thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// steng gi bar snang dpag tshad gcig khor yug tu'ang sil snyan stong phrag du ma yongs su ma gzung ba dag gis khyab par
365a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ dper na sbrang rtsi'i sbrang ma'i tshad bzhin du steng gi bar snang la rnga dang rol mo'i sil snyan gyi sgra 'byung ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin g.yog dang bcas pa dang / rol mo
365a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhan lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / srog chags khri po de dag dang / chos nyan du sngar lhags pa las srog chags drug stong tsam zhig dang / dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu po de dag
365a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la khang pa brtsegs pa lnga lnga byung ngo // rol mo mkhan gyi
365a6(dkon brtsegs): khang pa brtsegs pa bzhis bdun gyis bltas pa'i rol mo mkhan gyi khang la brtsegs pa thams cad na chos ston to/ / bar snang la gnas pa'i lha stong phrag bye ba du ma dag gis lha'i me tog man
365a7(dkon brtsegs): dar ba dag gtor to/ / me tog de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad cur gyur to// de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po sdong gi bar snang la gnas pas
365b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / gus pa dang / rjes cher byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i
365b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs chen po de'i dad pa mkhyen/ tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// dbu'i gtsug tu
365b3(dkon brtsegs): mi snang bar gyur ces bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong nas/ chos
365b4(dkon brtsegs): gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la pa de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
365b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang
365b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin 'dis chung ma bdun dang / khye'u bdun dang
365b7(dkon brtsegs): bu mo bdun dang / bran pho bdun dang / bran mo bdun gyis nga la mchod pa byas te/ bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du log par ltung bar mi 'gro ste/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar
366a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / de bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgya 'das nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ded dpon zhes bya ba mnyes
366a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed par 'gyur ro/ / mnyes par byas nas bsti stang du byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu bskal
366a3(dkon brtsegs): pa nyi shur log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo de la tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin gyi chung ma bdun dang / bu pho bdun dang / bu mo bdun dang / bran pho bdun dang /
366a4(dkon brtsegs): bran mo bdun gang yin pa dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi lus las gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' mis byin dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i
366a5(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro/ / de dag bskal pa gcig la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems
366a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mis byin ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems snyoms zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' mis byin
366a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi zham ring ba gang yin pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'tha dad par 'gyur ro/ / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag ni bskal pa grangs med par logs par ltung bar mi 'gro
366b1(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bye ba phrag stong byed par bgrang bas smra ste/ bar skabs der sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu mnyes par byas nas bsti stang byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed
366b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyang bskal pa gcig la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
366b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs 'jam zhes bya bar thams cad kyang ming mthun par 'gyur
366b4(dkon brtsegs): srog chags khri bo de las srog chags bzhi brgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa mnyes par byas nas/ de'i tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro//
366b5(dkon brtsegs): lhag ma rnams ni bskal pa gang+gA'i bye ma snyed du log par ltung bar mi 'gro ste/ tshul 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong mnyes par byas nas bsti stang byed par 'gyur/ bla mar
366b6(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyang bskal pa gcig la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
366b7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngo mtshar ces bya bar thams cad kyang ming mthun par 'gyur
367a1(dkon brtsegs): ro/ / srog chags drug stong po de dag las srog chags stong ni nga mya ngan las 'das te dam pa'i chos nub nas mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma ni 'das de bzhin
367a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa byams pa ni ma byung ba'i dus der/ sems can rnams kyi tshe 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i dus de na rang sangs rgyas brgyad khri 'byung bar 'gyur te/ srog chags stong po
367a3(dkon brtsegs): dag gis rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad mnyes par byas nas bsti stang du byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par
367a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / gang zag gi mchog byams pa de'ang mnyes par byas nas bsti stang du byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod par
367a5(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur ro/ / de'i 'og tu bskal la bye ba khrag khrig phrag nyi shur log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas lus kyi tha ma bdag gi lus kyi tha ma thob nas dge ba'i rtsa
367a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis bskul te/ dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// srog chags khri po las srog chags mthong ba skyes pa
367a7(dkon brtsegs): stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / lha'i bu khrag khrig phrag drug cu ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa skyes so//
367b1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo byis pa rnams ma gtogs par/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la su zhig dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / gus pa dang / rjes skyed par mi byed// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
367b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus 'di lta bu'i che ba nyid thob cing mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang reg go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//
367b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la ni gus byas nas// 'di 'dra ba yi dpal thob ste// de phyir gang la byin pa ni// 'bras bu che ba'i ston la mchod// gang yang bzhugs la mchod pa dang /
367b4(dkon brtsegs): gang yang mya ngan 'das pa yi// ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod pa// de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bar mthong // gang yang bzhugs la mchod pa dang // gang yang mya ngan
367b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa yi/ / ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod pa// sems kyang mnyam la 'bras bu mnyam// mnyam pa'i sems su byas nas ni// gang zag mchog la mchod byed pa//
367b6(dkon brtsegs): de yi rnam par smin pa mnyam// mtshungs par byang chub 'tshang yang rgya// bde bar gshegs pa'i lam bzung ste// ngan par 'gro ba'i lam yang bcad// mya ngan 'das par
367b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i lam/ / de yang de la mi dkon no// sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa dang // sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin mchog gis// de phyir mchog la dang byas nas// de bzhin gshes
368a1(dkon brtsegs): @#pa mchog tu 'gyur/ / mchod 'dam ma byas nas ni// myur du mchog tu 'gyur ba yin// chos kyi ngam pa son mdzad pa// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog tu 'gyur
368a2(dkon brtsegs): mi gang mkhas pa sangs rgyas kyi/ / chos la rten par 'dod pa de// 'dun pa drag po bskyed par bya// mang du thos nas tshul bzhin no// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang // tshangs pa
368a3(dkon brtsegs): dbang byed gyur nas ni/ / yon tan mang po'i 'byung gnas dang // mya ngan 'das par nges par 'gyur/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la
368a4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
368a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'dun pa drag po bskyed de shin tu mnyan par bya/ blang bar bya/ gzung bar bya/
368a6(dkon brtsegs): bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ gzhan dag la brjod par bya/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i
368a7(dkon brtsegs): sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu mnyan tam/ blangs sam/ bzung ngam/ kun chub par byas sam/ gzhan dag la brjod dam/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab
368b1(dkon brtsegs): tu bstan na/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no// tshad med pa bzhi dang mi 'bral ba yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson pa yin no//
368b2(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams sdud par brtson pa yin no// shA ri'i bu gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub kyi lam yin no// de
368b3(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs dang 'brel to// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nor
368b4(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi nang du bcug go/ / shA ri'i bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bslabs nas yang dag par
368b5(dkon brtsegs): chad pa rjes su thob bo/ / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi pha rol tu son pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
368b6(dkon brtsegs): pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la nges par byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mdzad pa rgyun ma bcad pa rnam pa thams cad kyi tshad med pa'i sa rjes su thob pa// de bzhin gshegs
368b7(dkon brtsegs): pas dpag tu med pa rjes su thob pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad rjes su thob pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la shin tu gnas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su
369a1(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ / lus kyi las dang rnam smin gyis// rnam par smin pa shes par bya// las min rnam smin ma yin kyang // de bde ba ni mya ngan
369a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ / gang la shes pa med pa yi// 'dus byas thams cad sdug bsngal te// de phyir shes pa bskyed nas ni// 'dus byas kun las rnam par grol// bcom
369a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/

369a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang / shI len dra bo d+hi dang / lo tsa ba chen po zhang d+harma tA shI las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// // bod

369b1(dkon brtsegs): bam po gcig pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das

372a1(dkon brtsegs): bo 'di lta ste/ dper na rtswa sngon po dang / ba glang gi lci ba dang / rgya shug dang / zho la brten nas so so nas srin bu skye bar 'gyur ba'i re re'i nang du srin bu mi dmigs

373b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal myong bar byed pa la'ang ngas bsngags pa rjod par mi byed na/ yun ring por srid pa rnams su 'khor bar gyur pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di lta ste/ dper na mi gtsang ba ni

373b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo 'di ltar lus de ma'i mngal na gnas pa'ang zhag bdun phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad lon nas gdod 'byung bar 'gyur te/ zhag bdun phrag dang po la ma'i mngal na gnas pa gta
373b4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni mer mer lo zhes bya ste/ lus kyi mtshan ma dang por snang ba yin pas 'di lta ste/ dper na zho ma chags pa dang 'dra bas zhag bdun gyi bar du nang du btsos rab tu btsos

373b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni kun sdud ces bya ste/ rlung shin tu phra mo des ma'i rtsib logs g.yon pa dang g.yas pa bus te/ mer mer po lus kyi mtshan ma rims kyis snang bar byed pas de'i
373b7(dkon brtsegs): dbyibs zho ska ba 'am/ mar 'khyags pa 'dra ste/ nang du btsos rab tu btsos pas nur nur po'i lus su gyur nas 'di ltar 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag mthar gyis mngon par grub
374a1(dkon brtsegs): par byed do/ / zhag bdun phrag gsum pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni mdzod ka zhes bya ste/
374a2(dkon brtsegs): rlung de'i stobs kyis nur nur po gang yin pa de mthar gyis 'khyags shing ltar ltar bor byed pas/ de'i dbyibs ni sman rdung ba'i gtun bu 'dra la thung zhing chung ste/ mngal gyi nang
374a3(dkon brtsegs): du btsos rab tu btsos pas 'di ltar 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag mthar gyis 'phel bar byed do/ / zhag bdun phrag bzhi pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung
374a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni nad rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis ltar ltar po gang yin pa de ni mkhrang par byed pas/ de'i dbyibs ni mchig gu 'dra ba ste/
374a5(dkon brtsegs): nang du btsos rab tu btsos pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag mthar gyis 'phel bar byed do// zhag bdun phrag lnga pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub
374a6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mkhrang 'gyur gang yin pa de rkang lag rgyus pa bsgyur bar byed pas// gor gor po gang yin pa de ni rnam par phye
374a7(dkon brtsegs): nas brla gnyis dang / dpung pa gnyis dang / mgo bo'i mtshan ma mngon du byung bar byed do// 'di lta ste/ dper na dbyar gyi dus su char pa 'bab pa'i tshe/ ljon shing rnams yal ga dang 'dang
374b1(dkon brtsegs): ma skyed par byed pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis kyang lus kyi mtshan ma rnams snang bar byed do/ / zhag bdun phrag drug pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par
374b2(dkon brtsegs): grub pa gang yin pa de ni zas zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma bzhi 'byung bar byed do// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pus mo gnyis dang dpung pa gnyis gang yin pa de ni mtshan
374b3(dkon brtsegs): ma rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o/ / zhag bdun phrag bdun pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni 'khyil bar byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs
374b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi 'byung bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ lag mthil gnyis dang rkang mthil gnyis te/ de'i mtshan ma ni shin tu mnyen pas dbu ba 'dus pa 'dra'o// zhag bdun phrag
374b5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tshe/ las kyi rlung mngon par grub la gang yin pa de ni bzlog cing bsgyur bar byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma nyi shu 'byung bar
374b6(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ 'di lta ste/ lag pa dang rkang pa'i sor mo'i mtshan ma nyi shu 'byung bar byed pa gang yin pa'o// de ni 'di lta ste/ dper na dbyar char 'bab pa'i tshe/ ljon shing rnams kyi
374b7(dkon brtsegs): yal ga dang 'dab ma mthar gyis skyes shing 'phel bar byed pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis kyang mtshan ma rnams mngon du snang bar byed do/ / zhag bdun zhag dgu pa la ma'i mngal
375a1(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma rnam pa dgu 'byung bar byed do//
375a2(dkon brtsegs): dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig gnyis dang / rna ba gnyis dang / sna gnyis dang / kha dang / bshang ba dang / gci ba'i gnas gang yin pa de dag ni mtshan ma rnam
375a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dgu zhes bya'o/ / zhag bdun phrag bcu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni sra bar byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis
375a4(dkon brtsegs): sra zhing brtan par byed do/ / gzhan yang de'i tshe kun nas sgo zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ des mngal na gnas pa'i lus bus pas lus kun tu rgyas shing gang bar byed de/ 'di
375a5(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na rgyal ba gang ba ji lta ba bzhin no// zhag bdun phrag bcu gcig pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje zhes bya ste/
375a6(dkon brtsegs): rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ de steng dang 'og gi phyogs su 'gro zhing lus kyi bug rnams 'byin par byed do// gzhan yang rlung de'i stobs kyis ma de res 'ga' dag
375a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang mi dga' ba'ang byed/ 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal na'ang de'i rang bzhin 'gyur zhing rkang lag skyod par yang byed pas mngal na gnas pa'i bu ga rnams
375b1(dkon brtsegs): mthar gyis skye zhing 'phel bar yang byed la/ de'i kha nas khrag nag po'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ sna nas kyang chu mi gtsang ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rlung nges dbang po rnams bzlog nas de
375b2(dkon brtsegs): nas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / zhag bdun khrag bcu gnyis pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni yon po'i sgo zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i
375b3(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis rtsib logs g.yas g.yon gyi nang khrol gyi rgyu mche chung rnams skyed par byed de/ de ni 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma'i rtsa ba shad shad po 'am/ skud la grims las
375b4(dkon brtsegs): la bzhag pa lta bur lan bco brgyad 'khor bar lus la brten te gnas so/ / de'i tshe gzhan yang spu brgyu pa'o zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung de'i dbang gis tshigs kyi yan lag
375b5(dkon brtsegs): sum brgya nyi shu dang / gnang brgya rtsa gcig lus la gnas par 'gyur ro// zhag 'dun phrag bcu gsum pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub
375b6(dkon brtsegs): ba gang yin pa de ni bkres shing skom par byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal gyi lus de nyam chung zhing bkres pa dang skom pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed pas/ de'i mas
375b7(dkon brtsegs): zos shing 'thung ba'i ro ji snyed pa dag lus kyi gnang dang / lte ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su 'dzin cing lan 'dogs par byed do// de nas de'i tshe'i bcom ldan 'das
376a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bu ni ma mngal gnas pa na// mngal gnas de la phan 'dogs pa// des na lus srog rab gnas shing // rim gyis/
376a2(dkon brtsegs): skye dang 'phel bar byed// mas ni zos shing 'thungs pa dag/ mngal na gnas la phan 'dogs pas// rim gyis skye dang 'phel bar byed// zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi pa la
376a3(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni skud pa'i sgo zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis rtsa rgyus dgu brgya bskyed nas/ lus kyi mdun
376a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyab dang / g.yas g.yon snol mar g.yog par byed do// zhag bdun phrag bco lnga pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par bsgrub pa gang yin pa
376a5(dkon brtsegs): de ni pad+ma zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis rtsa rgyu ba nyi shu bskyed nas/ bzal ba dang btung ba'i ro gang yin pa rtsa 'dir zhugs nas/ lus la phan 'dogs par byed do// nyi
376a6(dkon brtsegs): shu gang zhe na/ lus kyi mdun dang / rgyab dang / g.yas g.yon re re la'ang rtswa lnga lnga yod de/ rtsa 'di dag re re la'ang rtswa phra mo'i yan lag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod do// rtsa
376a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag re re la'ang yan lag brgya brgya yod do/ / lus kyi mdun na yod pa nyi khri ni sa ka zhes bya'o// lus kyi rgyab na yod pa nyi khri ni stobs zhes bya'o// lus kyi g.yon phyogs na yod pa
376b1(dkon brtsegs): nyi khri ni brtan pa zhes bya'o/ / lus kyi g.yas phyogs na yod pa nyi khri ni mthu dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar na rtsa'i yan lag che phra brgyad khri lus de la skye bar 'gyur ro// rtsa de dag
376b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan te/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / mar dang / zho dang / 'bru mar gyi kha dog go/
376b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa brgyad khri po de dag re re la'ang rtsa ba re re yod de/ rtsa ba re re la'ang bu ga sna tshogs yod de/ bu ga gcig dang / bu ga gnyis nas/ bu ga bdun gyi bar dang ldan te/
376b4(dkon brtsegs): re re'ang spu'i bu ga dang phan tshun 'brel te/ de ni dper na pad+ma'i rtsa ba la bu ga mang po yod pa ji lta ba bzhin no// zhag bdun phrag bcu drug pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/
376b5(dkon brtsegs): yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni bdud rtsi zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / kha'i sgo dang / ming pa dang
376b6(dkon brtsegs): snying gi snying po kho ra khor yug gi bu ga dgu po dag rnam par phye nas/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba steng dang 'og tu rgyu zhing thogs pa med pa dang / bza' ba dang btung ba zos shing 'thungs pa
376b7(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de dag kyang lus la phan 'dogs shing bsags pa'i gnas yod pa dang / legs par zhugs nas 'og gi phyogs su 'byung bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na
377a1(dkon brtsegs): rdza mkhan nam/ de'i slob ma mkhas pa 'jim pa legs par sbyar te/ 'khor lo'i steng du gzhag nas/ 'og dang steng du bsgyur zhing snod rnam pa mngon par
377a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas nas/ mngon par grub pa de bzhin du 'di'ang rlung gi stobs dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyis mig dang rna ba la sogs pa rims kyis yong su rdzogs par byed do//
377a3(dkon brtsegs): zhag padun phrag bcu bdun pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni 'bri gdong zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i mig gnyis
377a4(dkon brtsegs): kun tu dang pa dang / rna ba dang sna'i dbang po la sogs pa'ang rims kyis yongs su smin par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor rdul gyis g.yogs pa sa'i
377a5(dkon brtsegs): phye ma dang / 'bru mar dang / thal ba blangs te byi dor byas na yongs su gsal bar 'gyur ba ji bzhin du/ las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis mig la sogs pa bus nas/ mig la
377a6(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa kun tu dang bar byed pa'ang de bzhin du rig par bya'o/ / zhag bdun phrag bco brgyad pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni
377a7(dkon brtsegs): brtan par 'gyur ba zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i dbang po rnams mthar gyis yongs su smin cing gsal ba dang yongs su dag par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma dang zla
377b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dkyil 'khor sprin dang khug rna rnams kyis bsgribs shing khebs par gyur pa glo bur du rlung drag po langs te bus nas phyogs bzhir gtor bar gyur na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shin tu
377b2(dkon brtsegs): gsal bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ 'di ltar las kyi rlung gi dbang gis dbang po rnams bus pas ches shin tu gsal zhing yongs su dag par byed pa de bzhin du rig par bya'o// zhag bdun phrag
377b3(dkon brtsegs): bcu dgu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ snga ma'i rlung gi stobs mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce'i dbang po bzhi po dag yongs su smin par byed do// dang po mngal du
377b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa'i tshe ni dbang po gsum dang ldan te/ lus kyi dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po ste/ de ltar na dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed
377b5(dkon brtsegs): do/ / zhag bdun khrag nyid shu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni shin tu sra ba zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i lus
377b6(dkon brtsegs): las rus pa sna tshogs skyed par byed de/ rkang pa g.yon pa la brten te rus pa nyi shu ba skyed do// rkang pa g.yas pa la brten te rus pa nyi shu bskyed do// gzhan yang rkang pa'i
377b7(dkon brtsegs): rting pa'i rus pa bzhi dang / / rje ngar gyi rus la gnyis dang / lha nga'i rus pa gnyis dang / brla'i rus pa gnyis dang / rkang pa dang dpyi'i rus pa gsum gsum dang /
378a1(dkon brtsegs): sgal tshigs kyi rus pa bco brgyad dang / rtsib ma'i rus pa nyi shu bzhi dang / brang gi rus pa sum cu dang / lag pa g.yas g.yon re re la rus pa nyi shu nyi shu
378a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / lag ngar gyi rus pa bzhi dang / dpung pa'i rus pa gnyis dang / 'gram pa'i rus pa gnyis dang / mgo'i rus pa bzhi dang / so'i rtsa ba'i rus pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang
378a3(dkon brtsegs): skyed par byed do/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na gzugs mkhan nam/ gzugs mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas sngar shing sra ba blangs te/ phyis srang bus bcings nas gzugs rnams
378a4(dkon brtsegs): byas pa 'jim pa ma bskus mod kyi/ 'on kyang de'i tshe rus pa'i mtshan nyid ces brjod pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis rus pa rnams bskyed pa'i dus kyi tshe'ang de bzhin te/ de lta
378a5(dkon brtsegs): bas na zhag bdun po de dag tu rus pa phra mo ma gtogs par rus pa chen po bskyed pa'i grangs ni nyis brgya yod par rig par bya'o/ / zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gcig pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i

378a7(dkon brtsegs): zhal mkhan nam/ zhal zhal gyi slob mas 'jim pa legs par sbyangs nas/ rtsig pa rnams la zhal zhal byed pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi dbang gis de'i lus kyi sha skyed pa'ang de bzhin
378b1(dkon brtsegs): du rig par bya'o/ / zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gnyis pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni kun tu rgyal ba zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis
378b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i lus kyi khrag skyed par byed do/ / zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gsum pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su dag par 'dzin

378b5(dkon brtsegs): yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni grong khyer 'dzin ces bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa de lus la sha dang khrag 'phel zhing rims kyis rab tu ngang bar byed
