412b6(dkon brtsegs): yang med do/ / gal te sman dang zas kyis gsos nas tshe ring por 'gyur na'ang / mthar 'chi ba dag gi rgyal pos gsod cing yul stong du skye bar 'gyur pas// de'i phyir skye ba
412b7(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba ci'ang med par rig par byas nas/ nan tan brtson 'grus kyis ma 'ongs pa'i tshogs bsags pa la bag yod par bya ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa la
413a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson zhing le lo mi bya ba dang / don gyi spyod pa dang / chos kyi spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi spyod pa dang / dge ba 'ba' zhig spyod pa la rtag par
413a2(dkon brtsegs): mos pas bsgom par bya'o/ / rtag par bdag nyid kyis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las rnam pa gnyis la so sor brtags nas/ sems la gtad de ma 'ongs pa na 'gyod pa chen po med
413a3(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ / rjes su chags par bya ba'i dngos po thams cad ni mthar bral bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las ji lta ba bzhin du tshe phyi ma len par 'gyur ro//
413a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo tshe lo brgya thub pa de'ang gnas skabs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur te/ dang po ni byis pa'i gnas skabs te/ nyam chung zhing gan kyang du nyal bar byed do//
413a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa ni gzhon nur gyur pa ste/ byis pa'i rtsed mo la dga' bar byed do// gsum pa la ni lang tshol bab pa ste/ 'dod pa'i bde ba rnams myong bar byed do// bzhi pa ni mthu
413a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa yin no// lnga pa ni dar la bab pa ste/ shes rab kyi spobs pa dang ldan par gyur pa yin no// drug pa ni yongs su
413a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa ste/ legs par dpyod pa la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin no// bdun pa ni mthar gyis rgas pa ste/ chos kyi gzhung lugs rab tu shes pa yin no// brgyad pa ni
413b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'gyur te/ bya ba mang po rnams la mthu chung bar 'gyur ba yin no// dgu pa ni shin tu nas pa te/ tsa'ang mi nus pa yin no// bcu pa na lo brgya ba te/
413b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas skabs gang yin pa'o// dga' bo gnas skabs chen po de dag kyang mdor bsdus te bstan na/ 'di ltar zla ba bzhi zhing dus gcig tu byas nas/ lo brgya la
413b3(dkon brtsegs): dus sum brgya yod par 'gyur te/ dpyid dang / dbyar dang / dgun gyi dus re re la'ang dus brgya brgya yod pas so// lo gcig la zla ba bcu gnyis yod pas/ zla ba'ang
413b4(dkon brtsegs): brgya phrag bcu gnyis yod par 'gyur la/ de'ang zla ba phyed phyed bgrangs na zla phyed kyang brgya phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod par 'gyur bas/ dus gsum po re re la'ang zla ba byed brgyad brgya brgyad
413b5(dkon brtsegs): brgya yod pas/ mdor bsdus na nyin mtshan stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig la lan gnyis su za bas/ mdor bsdus na zas ni len stong phrag bdun
413b6(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gnyis za bar 'gyur te/ rkyen gyis bar chad byas nas ma zos pa'i grangs kyang der gtogs so// zas ma zos pa'i rkyen ni/ 'di lta ste/ khros nas ma zos pa dag
413b7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal myong nas ma zos pa dang / btsal te ma rnyed nas ma zos pa dang / gnyid log ste ma zos pa dang / sdom pa blangs pa dang rtse bas myos te ma zos pa dang / brel te
414a1(dkon brtsegs): ma zos pa dang / zos pa dang ma zos pa gcig tu bsdus na grangs de snyed yod de/ ma'i nu zho 'thungs pa dang grangs med gtogs so// de ltar na ngas mi rnams
414a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'tsho ba'i tshe lo brgya pa'i lo dang / zla ba dang / nyin mtshan dang / bza' ba dang btung ba zos pa dang 'thungs pa'i grangs yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa yin gyis/ khyod kyis
414a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di la yongs su skyo ba bskyed pa bya'o/ / dga' bo de ltar btsas shing cher skyes pa'i lus la'ang nad mang po 'di lta ste/ klad pa na ba dang / mig na ba dang /
414a4(dkon brtsegs): rna ba na ba dang / snan pa dang / ldan pa dang / son pa dang / lkog man pa dang / snying na pa dang / lton pa dang / lag pa na pa dang / rkang pa na bas
414a5(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa dang / ga yan pa dang / mdze dang / smyos pa dang / skrangs pa dang / lud pa dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan la sogs pa nad mang po rnams kyis
414a6(dkon brtsegs): yan lag dang nying lag na zhing sdug bsngal myong bar byed de/ dga' bo mi'i lus la 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs yod do// gzhan yang rlung nad brgya rtsa gcig
414a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / mkhros pa'i nad brgya rtsa gcig dang / bad kan gyi nad brgya rtsa gcig dang / 'dus pa'i nad brgya rtsa gcig yod pas/ mdor bsdus na nad bzhi rtsa bzhi nang gi
414b1(dkon brtsegs): lus las skye bar 'gyur bas/ dga' bo lus 'di ni 'bras dang 'dra zhing zug rngu dang 'dra bas nad mang po las mngon par grub pa skad cig tsam du'ang mi gnas shing skad cig mar 'gyur ba/
414b2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par gyur pa/ 'chi ba dang nye zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can yid brtan du mi
414b3(dkon brtsegs): rung ba yin no/ / dga' bo 'di ltar sems can rnams ni gzhan yang skye ba'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ lag pa gcad pa dang /
414b4(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa gcad pa dang / ming phyung ba dang / rna ba gcad pa dang / sna gcad pa dang / lce gcad pa dang / mgo gcad pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag
414b5(dkon brtsegs): gcad pa'i sdug bsngal dang / gzhan yang go ra ra 'jug pa dang / gag shing dang / lcag gis gzhu ba dang / btag pa dang / bcing ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngag
414b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / ngal ba'i sdug bsngal dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / rlung dang / char pa dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang
414b7(dkon brtsegs): sha sbrang dang / gcan gzan dang / sdig sbrul la sogs pa'i reg pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med dpag tu med pa brjod kyis mi rdzogs pa dag rjes su myong bar
415a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ sems can rnams ni rtag tu 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba laganas shing rjes su chags pa dang / bying bar gyur pa
415a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pas 'dod pa rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi rtsa bar gyur pa yin yang de spang bar bya ba yin par mi shes shing / yang yongs su gnyer bar byed pas nyin mtshan du lus dang sems
415a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gdung ba dang / nang sreg cing tshig par byed pa la'ang rgyun 'chad pa med de/ de bzhin du skye ba'ang sdug bsngal yin no// rga ba'ang sdug bsngal yin no// na ba'ang sdug bsngal
415a4(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / 'chi ba'ang sdug bsngal yin no// sdug pa dang bral ba'ang sdug bsngal yin no// mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'ang sdug bsngal yin no// gang 'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed pa'ang sdug
415a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal yin no/ / nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'ang sdug bsngal yin no// 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba'i spyod lam bzhi po dag kyang sdug bsngal yin pas/ gal te
415a6(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu 'gro zhing 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bar ma gyur na'ang sdug bsngal myong zhing bde ba med par 'gyur ro// gal te rtag tu 'greng zhing 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bar gyur tam/
415a7(dkon brtsegs): gal te rtag tu 'dug la 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / nyal bar ma gyur tam/ gal te rtag tu nyal la 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug par ma gyur na'ang / thams cad sdug bsngal mi bzang
415b1(dkon brtsegs): pa myong zhing bde ba thob par mi 'gyur bas/ dga' bo 'di dag thams cad sdug bsngal ma spangs nas/ sdug bsngal yongs su gnyer bar byed pa yin pas/ sdug bsngal kho na skye zhing / sdug
415b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal kho na 'gag par gyur pas/ 'du byed rnams kyi rgyu dang rkyen rgyun chad pa med pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'di dag thugs su chud pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams
415b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'khor ba'i chos 'du byed pa rnams mi rtag cing yang dag pa'i mthar phyin pa ma yin pa/ rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yid brtan du mi rung ba yin pas chos shes pa yongs su btsal nas
415b4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu skyo ba bskyed de/ nan tan brtson 'grus kyis rnam par grol ba yongs su gnyer bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no// dga' bo bde 'gror skyes pa'i sems can skye gnas mi
415b5(dkon brtsegs): gtsang ba dag sdug bsngal mi bzad pa yang dag pa ma yin pa rnam pa sna tshogs myong ba'ang brjod kyis mi rdzogs na/ ngan song gsum po yi dgas dang / dud 'gro dang /
415b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyis myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa// bzod par dka' ba yongs su rdzogs par brjod pa lta smos kyang co dgos// /
415b7(dkon brtsegs): / bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// // gzhan yang dga' bo ma'i mngal du 'jug pa rnam pa bzhi yod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can kha cig
416a1(dkon brtsegs): ni yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug/ yang dag par shes bzhin du gnas/ yang dag par shes bzhin du 'byung ba'ang yod/ kha cig ni yang dag par
416a2(dkon brtsegs): shes bzhin du 'jug/ yang dag par shes bzhin du gnas la/ yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'byung ba'ang yod/ kha cig ni yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug la/
416a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par mi shes bzhin du gnas shing / yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'byung ba'ang yod/ kha cig ni mi shes bzhin du 'jug/ yang dag par mi shes bzhin du gnas//
416a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'byung ba'ang yod do// su zhig yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ ji ltar 'di ni so
416a5(dkon brtsegs): so'i skye bo'i sems can kha cig rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims bsrung ba la dga' zhing yang nas yang du dge ba'i phyogs la goms par byed pa dang / dngos po mchog la mos shing bsod nams rnams
416a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du byed pa dang / shin tu yang dag par sdom pa dang / rtag par drang por sems shing bag med par mi byed pa dang / shes rab chen po dang ldan pas 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe 'gyod
416a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med par skye ba yang dag par len par byed pa rgyun du zhugs pa skye ba lan bdun pa 'am/ rigs nas rigs su skye ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ bar chad gcig pa dag
416b1(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ gang zag de dag gis sngar dge ba spyad pa'i phyir/ 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe sdug bsngal nye bar 'ongs shing na ba dang tsha ba nyams su myong bar gyur kyang / sems la g.yeng ba med par
416b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par dran pa bzhin du 'tsho ba'i dus byas te/ yang dag par dran pa bzhin du ma'i mngal du zhugs nas chos rnams las kyi dbang gis skye ba dang / thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las
416b3(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur bas/ rtag tu bdud kyi gnas byas par gyur to zhes rab tu shes so// dga' bo lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba thams cad kyi khyim yin pas rang bzhin rtag par
416b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ma yin pa dang / glen pa'i dngos po yin pas rmongs pa dag la slu bar byed pa yin no snyam du rig par bya'o// lus 'di ni rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor rtsa rgyus rnams pan
416b5(dkon brtsegs): tshun 'brel ba/ bu ga dang gnas rnams dod par gyur pa/ sha dang / tshol dang / rus pa dang / rkang phan tshun dgros shing pags pas g.yogs pa yin
416b6(dkon brtsegs): yang gyon du ma mthong bas/ rab tu gdungs pa'i phug tu mi gtsang bas yongs su gang ba/ swa dang / spu dang / sen mo dang/ so'i gnas skabs tha dad pa la bdag
416b7(dkon brtsegs): dang bdag gi re bzung ba'i phyir rtag tu rang dbang med par khrid pa/ rtag tu mchil ma dang / snabs dang / mi gtsang ba dang / kha chu dang / rdul dang / mdzes pa dang /
417a1(dkon brtsegs): bad kan 'byung zhing zhag dang tshil rul zhing rgyags pa dang / mkhal ma dang / mcher ba dang / mchin pa dang / gro ba dang / rgya mche phra mig tsa
417a2(dkon brtsegs): bas gang zhing skyug thob/ srin bu'i rigs mang pos kun tu khyab par gang ba/ steng dang 'og gi bu ka rnams su rtag tu mi gtsang ba 'dzag pa/ zhu ba dang ma zhu ba'i gnas
417a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pags pa srab mos g.yogs pas/ / 'di ni snam phyi sa dang 'dra ba yin no snyam du khyod kyis so sor brtag par bya'o// ji tsam du bza' ba dang bca' ba zos 'chos shing
417a4(dkon brtsegs): bldan pa na mtshal snabs su gyur nas med par 'jud cing rkang pa dang glad pa phan tshun 'dres nas lto bar 'bab par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na khyi rus pa skam po bldad pa lta bur
417a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa yin yang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i sems kyis zhim pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed pas/ zas rked par phyin nas gyen du smon par byed kyang slar med par byed do// dga' bo lus 'di
417a6(dkon brtsegs): ni dang po mer mer po dang / nur nur po dang / ltar ltar po dang / mkhrang 'gyur dang / rkang lag 'grus pa mi gtsang ba'i dngos po cher skyes nas byis pas tshe 'khor bar gyur
417a7(dkon brtsegs): pa nas/ rgas pa'i bar du 'khor zhing bcings par gyur pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na mun pa'i g.yangs dang 'dra'o// khron pa mnam po dang 'dra ba/ rtag tu lan tshwa dang / bska ba dang
417b1(dkon brtsegs): tsha ba dang / sbyar ba la sogs pa'i zas kyi ros yongs su gsos pa/ gzhan yang ma'i mngal gyi mes lus kyi dbang po rab tu btsos pa/ mi gtsang ba'i snod du rtag par rab tu gdung
417b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba/ gal te ma 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam/ nyal bar gyur pa na bcing ba lngas bcings pa 'am/ mes gdungs pa bzhin du shin tu bzod par
417b3(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur bas/ dper byar yang mi nus so// dga' bo mngal na gnas pa de de ltar mi gtsang ba'i 'dam du gnas shing sdug bsngal mang pos nyon mongs par
417b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang dbang po rno ba'i phyir sems g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang sems can bsod nams chung ba kha cig ni me'i mngal la 'phred du nyal ba 'am/
417b5(dkon brtsegs): log par 'dug par yang gyur te/ de'ang sngon gyi las kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyi stobs kyi phyir ram/ yang nams kha zas ma snyoms pa shin tu grang ba 'am/ shin tu tsha ba 'am/ shan
417b6(dkon brtsegs): tu sbyar ba 'am/ shin tu mngar ba 'am/ shin tu kha ba zos pa'i phyir ram/ yang na tshad las 'das par skom bathungs sam/ 'dod chags mang du spyad dam/ nad bu can
417b7(dkon brtsegs): du gyur tam/ mya ngan mang pos non tam/ brdeg 'chos sam brdegs par gyur na'ang / rkyen 'di dag gi dbang gis ma'i lus kyang yongs su gdung bar 'gyur la
418a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gdungs par gyur pa'i phyir/ mngal na gnas pa'ang yongs su gdung bar 'gyur ro// yongs su gdung bar gyur pa'i byor ni sdug bsngal mang po
418a2(dkon brtsegs): pabar 'gyur ro/ / sdug bsngal mang po myong bar gyur pa'i phyir ni g.yo bar 'gyur ro// g.yos par gyur pa'i phyir ni lus log par 'phred du nyal zhing 'byung bar mi nus pa la bud med
418a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas mar ram 'bru mar gyis lag pa bskus nas ma'i mngal du 'jug ste/ bags kyis pags kyis mngal la myangs nas/ sngar ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du 'jog par byed pas
418a4(dkon brtsegs): lag pas reg par gyur pa na mngal na gnas pa de sdug bsngal chen po mi bzad pa dag myong bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na khye'u 'am/ bu mo shin tu gzhon pa'i lus la
418a5(dkon brtsegs): la la zhig gis mtshon rnon pos pags pa dang sha gcad nas/ de'i steng du thal bas gtor na de'i rkyen gyis sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ mngal na gnas pa'i sdug
418a6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa'ang de dang 'dra ste/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur kyang dbang po mchog tu rno ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i dran pa dang ldan pas rnam par g.yeng bar mi 'gyur te/
418a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo de ltar na mngal na gnas pa de ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang btsas su nye ba'i tshe na sdug bsngal dang bcas bzhin du 'byung
418b1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/ las kyi rlung gi dbang gis de'i lag pa bsnol nas/ yan lag dang nying lag bcu ma ste/ sdug bsngal chen po mi bzad pa myong nas/ ma'i mngal nas byung bar gyur
418b2(dkon brtsegs): pas lus kyi yan lag thams cad sngon por gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na gsar du spangs pa la reg par mi bzod pa bzhin du bkres skom gyis gdungs pa dang / snying 'phyang zhing gdung
418b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang bcas pa bzhin du las kyi rlung gi rgyu dang rkyen gyis bus nas mngal nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / mngal nas byung nas kyang phyi rol gyi rlung gis reg par gyur pa na 'di lta ste/ dper na mtshon
418b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis gcad nas thal bas bskus pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro/ / lag pa dang gos kyis reg par gyur pa'i tshe na'ang thams cad du sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong bar 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i
418b5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba myong bar gyur kyang / dbang po rab tu rno ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i dran pa dang ldan pas rnam par g.yeng bar mi 'gyur te/ ma'i mngal du shes bzhin du 'jug pa dang /
418b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang / byung ba thams cad kyang sdug bsngal ba yin na/ dga' bo mkhas pa su zhog 'di 'dra ba'i mngal du 'jug pa la mos par byed// dga' bo su zhig ma'i
418b7(dkon brtsegs): mngal du yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug cing gnas la/ yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ dga' bo ji ltar 'di ni so so'i sems can kha cig rang bzhin gyis
419a1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims bsrung ba la dga' zhing yang nas yang du dge ba'i phyogs la goms par byed pa dang / rtag tu dngos po mchog la mos shing bsod nams mngon par
419a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed pa dang / de'i sems drang zhing bag med par mi byed pa dang / shes rab chung ngu dang ldan pas 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe 'gyod pa med par gyur pa rgyun du zhugs pa skye ba la na bdun pa
419a3(dkon brtsegs): 'am rigs nas rigs su skye ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / bar chad gcig pa dag yin te/ gang zag de dag gis sngar dge ba spyad pas 'chi ka'i dus kyi
419a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe sdug bsngal nye bar 'ongs shing na ba dang tshe ba nyams su myong bar gyur kyang / sems la g.yeng ba med par yang dag par dran pa bzhin du ma'i mngal du zhugs nas chos rnams las
419a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbang gis skye ba dang / thams cad rgya dang rkyen las skye bar rab tu shes so zhes bya ba nas/ ma'i mngal nas byung nas shes bya ba'i bar du'ang snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/
419a6(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i sdug bsngal mo ba zad pa tsha zhing rtsub pa rnams myong bar gyur kyang dbang po 'bring dang ldan pa'i phyir yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug cing gnas la yang dag par mi shes
419a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mkhas pa su zhig 'di 'dra ba'i mngal du 'jug pa la mos pas byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'ang snga ma bzhin du/ rgyas par sbyar ro//
419b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo su zhig yang dag par shes bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug la/ yang dag par mi shes bzhin gnas shing 'byung bar byed ce na/ dga' bo 'di ltar 'di naso
419b2(dkon brtsegs): so'i skye bo'i sems can kha cig ni rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims bsrung ba la dga' zhing yang nas yang du dge ba'i phyogs la goms par byed pa dang / rtag tu dngos po mchog la
419b3(dkon brtsegs): mos shing bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa zhes bya ba nas/ / 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe 'gyod pa med par gyur pa rgyun du zhugs pa skye ba la na bdun pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
419b4(dkon brtsegs): bar du'ang snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro/ / 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe sdug bsngal nye bar 'ongs shing na ba dang tsha ba nyams su myong bar gyur kyang / sems la g.yeng ba med
419b5(dkon brtsegs): par yang dag par dran pa bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug par byed de/ dbang po rnon po ma yin pa'i phyir shes bzhin du mngal du 'jug par byed kyang mi shes bzhin du gnas shing
419b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar byed do/ / mkhas pa su zhig 'di 'dra ba'i mngal du 'jug pa la mos par byed ces bya ba la sogs pa'ang snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// dga' bo su zhig yang
419b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par mi shes bzhin du 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung bar byed ce na/ ji ltar 'di na so so'i skye bo'i sems can kha cig tshul khrims yongs su dag pa 'dra
420a1(dkon brtsegs): ba la dga' zhing / dge ba'i phyogs sgrub par mi byed pa rtag tu dngos po ngan pa la mos shing sdig pa rnams spyod pa/ sems kyi rang bzhin mo drang zhing
420a2(dkon brtsegs): bag med pa mang ba/ shes rab dang mi ldan pa dag longs spyod la mngon par zhen cing ser sna byas pa dang / rtag tu lag pa bskums nas gzhan dag la rkyong zhing gtong bar mi byed
420a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rtag tu re ba dang bcas shing sems rab tu dul bar ma gyur pa dang / lta ba dang spyod pa phyin ci log tu gyur pas/ 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe 'gyod pa dang bcas shing sdig pa mi dge
420a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las rnams mngon du gyur pas/ / 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / rtsub pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba dag gis rab tu gzir cing /
420a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i sems rnam par g.yeng bar byed pas// sdug bsngal gyi dbang gis bdag ni su zhig/ gang nas 'dir 'ongs// da gang du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes rab tu mi shes pas/
420a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo 'di ni dus gsum du yang dag par shes bzhin med pa zhes bya ba ste/ rgyas par gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro// dga' bo sems can de dag mir skyes nas de lta bu'i sdug bsngal
420a7(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur mod kyi 'on kyang de dag ni gnas mchog tu gyur pa yin pas bskal pa bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa snyed du'ang mi lus shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin no/ /
420b1(dkon brtsegs): gal te mtho ris su skyes par gyur na rtag tu lhung bas 'dzegs pas sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan te/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lha gzhan rnams kyis 'di skad du khyod bde 'gro'i
420b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig/ bde 'gro'i 'jig rten gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de ni mo'i 'gro ba gang yin pa'o zhes zer bas/ mi'i 'gro ba ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin la/
420b3(dkon brtsegs): khom pa dang ldan pa ni de bas kyang ches shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'o// ngan 'gro gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngan song gsum po dag gang yin pa'o// sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro
420b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ni rtag tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa shin tu yid du mi 'ong ba rab tu tsha zhing rtsub pa dag myong bar 'gyur bas dpe byar yang mi nus so/ / yi dgas kyi 'gro ba ni rang bzhin gyis zhe sdang mang ba
420b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mnyen zhing dul ba'i sems med pa/ g.yo spu dang bcas pa/ gsod cing gnod par byed pa/ lag pa khrag gis bskus pa/ byams pa dang snying rje med pa
420b6(dkon brtsegs): byad bzhin mi sdug pa/ mthong na 'jigs su rung ba/ gal te mi dang nye bar gyur na'ang/ bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar byed pas/ rtag par sgrib
420b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bcas shing thogs pa dang bcas pa yin no/ / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'gro ba ni tshad med dpag tu med de/ don gyi spyod pa dang mi ldan pa/ bsod nams
421a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa dang mi ldan pa/ chos kyi spyod pa dang mi ldan pa/ dge ba'i spyod pa dang mi ldan pa/ drang po'i spyod pa dang mo ldan pa/ phan tshun gcigal
421a2(dkon brtsegs): gcig za ba dang / mthu dang ldan pa rnams mthu chung ba dag la za bar byed pa dag yin no// dud 'gro'i skye gnas kha cig ni mun par skyes mun par nas/ mun par 'chi ba'i
421a3(dkon brtsegs): dus byed cing / mi gtsang ba'i gnas gcin rkyag gi nang du gnas nas res 'ga' snang ba dang bcas pa'ang yod de/ 'di lta ste/ bye ma leb dang / spang ma dang / sro shig dang
421a4(dkon brtsegs): tre la ta lta bu rnams so/ / gzhan yang rtag par mun pa'i nang du skyes// mun pa'i nang du rgas par gyur pa tshad med dpag tu med pa dag yod de/ de ni tshe rabs snga ma la mir gyur pa
421a5(dkon brtsegs): na glen zhing gti mug pas chos yang dag par ma mnyan pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid thal rangs su gtong zhing 'dod pa lnga la mngon par zhen par gyur pa/ sdig pa mi dge
421a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas pas/ de'i rigs su skyes nas glen zhing rmongs pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dag yin no// dga' bo gzhan yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i
421a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can chu'i nang du skyes nas chu'i nang du rgas/ chu'i nang du dus byed par 'gyur ba tshad med dpag tu med pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ nya dang / rus sbal dang / sbal pa dang /
421b1(dkon brtsegs): sbal pa dkar po dang / ba lug lta bu rnams te/ thams cad kyang tshe rabs snga ma la lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las mi dge ba'i dbang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'ang gong ma bzhin
421b2(dkon brtsegs): du rgyas par sbyar ro/ / dga' bo gzhan yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can bshang ba dang gci ba'i dri tshor na/ myur du der song nas bza' ba dang btung bar byed pa tshad med dpag tu med pa
421b3(dkon brtsegs): snyed yod de/ 'di lta ste/ phag dang / lug dang / khyim bya dang / khyi dang / wa dang / bya rgod dang / bya rog dang / sbrang bu dang / skur pa dang / gcan
421b4(dkon brtsegs): gzan rnams te/ thams cad kyang tshe rabs snga ma'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis de lta bu'i rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rtag tu rtsa dang
421b5(dkon brtsegs): shing dang / mi gtsang ba'i dngos po rnams za zhing 'thung bar byed pa tshad med dpag tu med pa snyed yod de/ 'di lta ste/ glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / ba glang dang / bong bu
421b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / dre'u la sogs pa lta bu rnams te/ thams cad kyang tshe rabs snga ma'i las mi dge ba'i dbang gis ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du de lta bu'i rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ro// gzhan
421b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dga' bo kye ma kyi hud srid par 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'di ni 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ mchog tu 'bar ba/ shin tu mchog tu 'bar ba yin pas/ sems can 'ga' tsam yang des ma bsregs
422a1(dkon brtsegs): shing ma btsos pa med de/ de'ang mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi mi rab tu 'bar ba'i 'dod pas mngon du snang ba'i yul
422a2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos yongs su gnyer ba'i dbang gis de ltar gyur pa yin no// dga' bo 'bar rab tu 'bar bar byed pa'i me gang zhe na/
422a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi me dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i me dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
422a4(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i me dag gis rtag tu bsregs shing 'bar bar byed pas 'ga' tsam yang de las thar pa med do// dga' bo le lo la rab tu gnas pa dag ni sdug
422a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal mang po myong zhing nyon mongs pas kun tu dkris nas sdog pa mi dge ba'i chos mngon par 'dus byas pas/ 'khor bar 'khor ba'ang nye bar zhi zhing rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus
422a6(dkon brtsegs): brtsams pa gang yin pa de dag ni bde ba mang du myong zhing brtul ba'i sems skyed par byed pas nyon mongs pa yongs su bsal nas/ dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i bar du brtson pa mi gtong ba la rgyun
422a7(dkon brtsegs): 'chad pa med do/ / de ltar bas na deng khyod kyi lus 'di'i pags pa dang / sha dang / chu ba dang / rus pa dang / khrag dang / rtsa rgyus dang / rkang rnams ni ring por mi thogs par
422b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis shing 'jig par 'gyur ro snyam du so sor brtags nas/ rtag par sems rtse gcig tu le lo mi byed par mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i byor nan tan brtson 'grus kyis de ltar
422b2(dkon brtsegs): bslab par bya'o/ / dga' bo nga ni 'jig rten pa rnams dang rtsod par mi byed na/ 'on kyang 'jig rten pa rnams ni nan tan gyis nga dang rtsod par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang chos shes
422b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams ni gzhan dang rtsod par mi byed de/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba yin na su dang lhan cig rtsod par byed/ 'on kyang mthong ba dang shes pa med pa dag yang dag pa ma yin pa'i
422b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir ngas yang dag par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di skad du nga ni chos rnams gang yang mi shes pa med do zhes smras pa yin te/ dga' bo ngas de skad
422b5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de la tha dad du gyur pa yod dam/ dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pas de skad gsungs pa la gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis so//
422b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so// dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la gdon mi za bar tha dad du 'gyur ba med pas de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag par
422b7(dkon brtsegs): gsung ba/ bden par gsung ba/ de bzhin nyid du gsung ba/ tha mi dad par gsung ba/ bslu ba med par gsung ba/ 'jig rten pa rnams la yun ring por phan pa dang / bde ba dang
423a1(dkon brtsegs): phan pa chen po thob par mdzad pa/ lam mkhyen pa/ lam rig pa/ lam ston pa/ lam 'byed pa/ lam 'dren pa/ de bzhin shegs pa dgra bcom
423a2(dkon brtsegs): pab yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi
423a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur pa yin no/ / 'jig rten pa rnams ni shes pa med pa/ mngon par yid ches pa med pa/ rtag par dbang po rnams kyi dran pa med pa//
423a4(dkon brtsegs): lag mthil na yod pa kho na mthong zhing don chen po la mi lta ba/ sla ba'i dngos po mi sgrub par gang bya dka' ba rgyun du byed pa yin no// dga' bo shes rab dang ldan pa'i spyod yul 'di ltar re zhig
423a5(dkon brtsegs): zhog la/ deng khyod kyis sha'i mig gis lta bas shes pa dang mthong ba ji snyed pa dag yang dag pa ma yin par so sor brtags na/ de nyid rnam par thar pa zhes bya bas/ dga' bo khyod nga la
423a6(dkon brtsegs): da pa'i phyir ma 'gro zhig/ nga la 'dun pa'i phyir 'brang bar ma byed cig/ nga'i tshig la rton par ma byed cig/ nga'i mtshan la rtog par ma byed cig/ dge sbyong gi lta ba dang shes pa'i rjes
423a7(dkon brtsegs): su ma 'brang zhig/ dge sbyong la gus pa ma skyed cig/ 'di skad du dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni bdag gi ston pa chen po yin no zhes ma zer bar/ ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos
423b1(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de gcig pu dben par song la yid la bsams te 'jal bar gyis shig/ so sor rtogs shig/ rtag par mang du sgoms shig/ sems rtse gcig tu chos rnams so sor
423b2(dkon brtsegs): brtags te/ chos de dag las bsgom pa'i 'du shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ yang dag pa'i dran pa la gnas nas bdag nyid kyi grong byos shig/ bdag nyid kyi gnas dang skyabs byos
423b3(dkon brtsegs): shig/ chos kyi gling byos shig/ chos kyi gnas dang skyabs byos shig dang / de las gzhan pa'i gling dang / gnas dang / skyabs med do// dga' bo ji ltar na dge
423b4(dkon brtsegs): slong bdag nyid gling du gyur pa dang / bdag nyid gnas dang skyabs su gyur pa dang / chos gling du gyur pa dang / chos gnas dang skyabs su gyur cing / de las gzhan pa'i gling dang / de las
423b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan pa'i gnas dang skyabs med par gyur pa yin zhe na/ dga' bo 'di ltar dge slong gang la la zhig bdag nyid kyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba la rab tu gnas nas brtson 'grus kyi dran pa rtse
423b6(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu byas pas/ yang dag pa'i shes pa thob nas/ 'jig rten pa'i khong khro ba ji snyed pa dag rtag tu yid la sems shing dul bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi lus la sdug bsngal
423b7(dkon brtsegs): yin par rjes su lta ba zhes bya ste/ gang gis phyi rol gyi lus dang / nang dang / phyi rol gnyis ka'i lus la rjes su lta ba'ang de bzhin no// dga' bo de'i 'og tu kun tu 'byung ba'i chos la
424a1(dkon brtsegs): lus su bltas nas rab tu gnas pa dang / 'gog pa'i chos su bltas nas rab tu gnas par yang byed la/ gzhan yang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa'i chos gnyis la lus
424a2(dkon brtsegs): su lta zhing rjes su gnas par byed pa nyid kyi lus 'di la yang dag par dran par byed pas/ res 'ga' ni shes pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni mthong ba kho na dang ldan par 'gyur/ res
424a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' ni dran pa kho na dang ldan 'gyur zhing rten pa med par gnas par 'gyur bas/ 'jig rten 'di la blang bar bya ba ci'ang med par rab tu shes par 'gyur te/ de ltar na dga' bo 'di ni dge
424a4(dkon brtsegs): slong bdag nyid kyis nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ phyi rol gyi lus dang phyi nang gnyis ka'i lus la lta ba de bzhin no// de'i 'og tu nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi rol gyi
424a5(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba dang / nang dang phyi rol gnyis ka'i tshor bar lta ba la rab tu gnas pa dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi rol gyi semA dang / nang dang phyi rol gnyis ka'i sems su lta ba la gnas pa dang //
424a6(dkon brtsegs): nang gi chos dang / phyi rol gyi chos dang / nang dang phyi rol gnyis ka'i chos su lta ba la rab tu gnas nas/ brtson 'grus kyis dran pa rtse gcig tu byas pas yang dag pa'i shes pa thob nas
424a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa'i khong khro ba ji snyed pa dag rtag tu yid la mi sems shing rab tu dul bar gyur nas/ kun 'byung ba'i chos su bltas nas rab tu gnas pa dang / 'gog pa'i chos su bltas nas rab tu
424b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas par yang byed la/ gzhan yang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa'i chos gnyis la chos su bltas nas rab tu gnas par byed pa nyid kyis lus 'di nyid la yang dag par dran par byed pas
424b2(dkon brtsegs): res 'ga' ni shes pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni mthong ba kho na dang ldan par 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni dran pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur bas/ 'jig rten 'di la blang bar bya ba
424b3(dkon brtsegs): ci'ang med par rab tu shes par 'gyur te/ de ltar na dga' bo 'di ni dge slong bdag nyid gling du gyur pa dang / bdag nyid gnas dang skyabs su gyur pa dang / chos gling du gyur pa dang / chos gnas/
424b4(dkon brtsegs): dang skyabs su gyur cing / de las gzhan pa'i gling med pa dang / de las gzhan pa'i gnas dang skyabs med pa zhes bya'o// dga' bo skyes bu rang bzhin drang zhing g.yo sgyu spangs pa gang la la zhig snga dro'i
424b5(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi tshe nga'i thad du 'ongs pa la/ ngas dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i chos de la rjes su bstan nas/ de phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe bdag nyid thob pa dang ldan par smras par gyur la/ phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe
424b6(dkon brtsegs): chos rjes su bstan pa'ang bdag nyid thob pa dang ldan par smra bar byed pas na/ dga' bo ngas legs par bstan pa'i chos ni mthong ba'i chos la mngon sum du rtogs pa/ rab tu gdung ba sel bar
424b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ dus dang / dbang po dang / rab tu 'tsham par 'gyur ba/ thabs dang ldan pa/ rang gis rig pa'i chos legs par skyob par byed pa yin pas/ gang gis nga'i mngon sum du chos bstan
425a1(dkon brtsegs): pa thos par gyur na/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su 'thun par 'gyur zhing byang chub la gzhol bar byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni nga'i mkhyen pa yin te/ de lta bas na de
425a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis bdag gi don dang / gzhan gyi don dang / gnyis ka'i don de lta bu mthong nas chos 'di la rtag par yang dag par bslabs te/ rab tu 'byung ba'i chos bag yod par bsgrubs nas chud mi
425a3(dkon brtsegs): gzan cing 'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba thob par byas nas/ gzhan gyis byin pa'i chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman la
425a4(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa blang bar bya zhing / sbyin bdag rnams bsod nams kyi phan yon chen po thob pa dang / 'bras bu rnam par smin pa khyad par du 'phags pa yangs shing rgya che ba dag thob par 'gyur bar de ltar
425a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/ / gzhan yang dga' bo gzugs 'ga' tsam yang rjes su chags par bya 'am/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jog par mi 'gyur ba gang yang med de/ de ni
425a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas med do/ / gang yang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / nyon mongs pa mi skyed pa gang yang med de/ de'i gnas med do// dga' bo ji snyam du sems/ gzugs de rtag pa zhig yin
425a7(dkon brtsegs): nam/ 'on te mi rtag pa zhig yin/ btsun pa de ni rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa lags so// dga' bo gal te rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa yin na/ ci ste bde ba zhig yin nam/ 'on te sdug bsngal ba zhig yin na/ btsun
425b1(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni sdug bsngal ba lags so/ / gang mi rtag cing sdug bsngal ba de ni rnam par 'gyur zhing 'dzag pa'i chos can yin na/ nga'i nyan thos 'phags pa mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dag cigazugs 'di ni bdag
425b2(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / bdag ni gzugs rnams dang ldan no// gzugs ni bdag gi ba yin no// bdag ni gzugs la gnas so zhes khas len par byed dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//
425b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa de dag rtag pa zhig yin nam/ 'on te mi rtag pa zhig yin/ btsun pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis mi rtag
425b4(dkon brtsegs): pa lags so/ / dga' bo gal te rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa yin na/ ci bde ba zhig yin nam/ 'on te sdug bsngal ba yin/ btsun pa sdug bsngal ba la sogs so// gang mi rtag cing sdug bsngal ba de
425b5(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin na/ nga'i 'phags pa nyan thos mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dag ci tsher ba la sogs pa 'di dag ni bdag yin no// bdag ni tshor ba la sogs pa dang ldan no// /
425b6(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba la sogs pa ni bdag gi ba yin no// bdag ni tshor ba la sogs pa la gnas so zhes khas len par byed dam/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// de lta bas na ji tsam du gzugs su gyur pa 'das
425b7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi ba 'am/ phyi rol gyi 'am/ rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am/ bzang po 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ zag ring ba 'am/ thag nye ba'ang rung ste/ ji tsam
426a1(dkon brtsegs): du gzugs su gyur pa thams cad kyang bdag ma yin la/ bdag kyang gzugs dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / gzugs kyang bdag ma yin la/ bdag kyang gzugs la gnas
426a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin par rig par bya'o/ / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji tsam du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par gyur pa 'das pa'am
426a3(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am/ phyi rol gyi 'am/ rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am/ bzang po 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ thag ring ba 'am/ thag nye ba'ang rung ste/ de dag
426a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang bdag ma yin la/ bdag kyang de dag dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / de dag kyang bdag gi ba ma yin la/ bdag kyang de dag la gnas pa ma yin par legs par so sor brtag par
426a5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ngas nyan thos 'phags pa mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dag ni 'di ltar gzugs la so sor brtag nas yongs su skyo ba skye ba dang /
426a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la so sor brtag nas yongs su skyo ba skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te skyo bar gyur na mngon par zhen par mi byed do// mngon
426a7(dkon brtsegs): par zhen pa med pas rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ro/ / rnam par grol nas bdag rnam par grol lo snyam du shes pas 'di skad du bdag gi skye ba ni zad do// tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyad do//
426b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba byas pa'ang srid pa phyi ma len par mi 'gyur ro zhes sgrog par 'gyur ro snyam du so sor brtag par bya'o// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal ba na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag
426b2(dkon brtsegs): po rdul spangs shing dri ma dang bral nas chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to/ / dge slong lnga brgya po rnams ni zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol ba thob par gyur to//
426b3(dkon brtsegs): nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yang tshigs su bcad de dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ gang la mnyam gzhag sems med pas// rnam dag ye shes med pas na// zag pa rnams ni spong mi 'gyur// /
426b4(dkon brtsegs): de bas khyod kyis nan tan sgrubs// khyod kyis rnal 'byor rtag sgoms la// phung po skye 'gag shes par gyis// rnam dag gal te rdzogs gyur na// lha rnams kun gyis dga' bar 'gyur// mdza' bshes
426b5(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig 'brel dga' zhing / / phan tshun 'drul zhig chags pa dang // thob dang grags pa mngon zhen pas// dga' bo khyod kyis kun spongs shig/ khyim pa dang ni rab byung la// brten cing bshes no mo
426b6(dkon brtsegs): byed par/ / 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'das soms la// sdug bsngal mthar ni phyin par byos// dang po mer mer po las ni// sha yi chu bur skye bar 'gyur// chu bur las ni ltar ltar skye// ltar ltar po las
426b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhrang bar 'gyur/ / mkhrang ba rnam par gyur nas ni// mgo dang yan lag bzhi skye bas// rus pa 'dus nas lus grub pa// thams cad las kyi rgyu las byung // mgo thod rus pa dgu 'dus shing // 'gram
427a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rus pa gnyis 'brel te/ / so ni sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan// de yi rtsa ba'ang de bzhin no// rna rtsa gnya' ba'i rus pa dang // rkan dang sna yi rus pa dang // thung dang mid pa'i
427a2(dkon brtsegs): rus pa ni/ / bsdus nas rus pa nyi shu yod// mig la rus pa bzhi yod do// phrag pa byin pa zung gnyis yod// lag pa gnyis dang sor mo rnams// bsdus na rus pa lnga bcu yod// ltag
427a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyab rus pa brgya yod de/ / skal tshogs la ni sum cu gnyis// 'di dag kun las rtsa yod pas// de yi grangs ni cha bzhir 'gyur// rtsib logs g.yas pa'i rus pa ni// phan tshun 'brel ba
427a4(dkon brtsegs): bcu gsum yod/ / rtsib logs g.yon 'brel skye ba yi// rus pa dag ni bcu gsum yod// rus pa'i lu gu rgyud 'di dag/ gsum gsum dag ni phan tshun 'brel// gnyis gnyis dag ni tshig
427a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan te/ / lhag ma gzhan ni 'brel ba med// g.yas g.yon brla ni gnyis po la// bsdus na rus pa lnga bcu yod// lus dang 'brel pa'i rus pa ni// bsdoms na sum cu rtsa drug yod// rus tshigs
427a6(dkon brtsegs): phan tshun 'brel na no/ / sems can lus ni grub yin zhes// yang dag sangs rgyas mkhyen pa yis// bden tshig tu ni gsungs pa yin// rkang mthil nas ni mgo yi bar// mi gtsang 'dres shing mi ban
427a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ / de dag lhan cig lus bsgrubs pa// nyam chu 'dam bu'i khyim dang 'dra// rus pa 'ba' zhig gzer bu med// sha khrag kun tu bskus pas na// shing mi'i 'khrul 'khor rab 'dra zhing // sgyu mas
427b1(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan 'dra/ / lus 'di rtsa rgyus dkris nas ni// pags pa gsher bas g.yogs pas na// gnas dgu rma yi sgo yod pas// de lta bur ni blta bar bya// kun nas gtson rgyag mi
427b2(dkon brtsegs): gtsang bas/ / rtag tu gang zhing 'dzag pas na// dper na bang ba dong rnams su// 'bru rnams sna tshogs bkang ba ltar// lus 'di yang ni de bzhin te// mi gtsang sna tshogs rab tu gang // rus pa'i 'jub
427b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor g.yo bas na/ / nyam chung snying po ci yang me// byis pa skye bo rtag tu chags// mkhas pa dag ni zhen mi byed// mchil snabs rdul ni rtag tu 'bab// rnag khrag dag ni rgyun du gang // zhag sera'o
427b4(dkon brtsegs): ma lhan cig 'dres/ / klad rgyas dag ni klad pa gang // snying khar bad kan rgyun du 'byung // nang gi zhu dang ma zhu'i gnas// klad rgyas dang ni pags pa dang // snying dang nang 'khrol glo mchin dang // 'di
427b5(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa'i rul myags dang / / mi gtsang rnams dang lhan cig gnas// sdig pa'i lus ni 'jigs rung bas// 'di nyid bdag gi dgra yin na// shes med 'dod la zhen pa yi// blun po rtag tu 'phangs par byed/
427b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'dra'i mi gtsang lus 'di ni// grong khyer rnying pa 'dra bas na// nyin mtshan nyon mongs rab gzir cing // skad cig mi gnas kun tu 'khyab// rus pas grong khyer rtsig par byed// sha dang khrag gis zhal zhal bskus//
427b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod sdang gti mug tshon bgyi nas// ci rigs par ni brgyan par byed// rus pa'i grong khyer skyug bro ba// sha khrag 'brel cing 'dus pas na// rtag tu sdug pa'i grogs po yis// phyi nang sdug bsngal gdung
428a1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ / dga' bo khyod kyis shes par byos// ngas ni ji skad bstan pa yin// nyin mtshan rtag tu dran byos la// 'dod pa'i yul la sems ma byed// gal te 'dod pa spong 'dod/
428a2(dkon brtsegs): na// rtag tu de bzhin rab sgoms la// rnam grol yongs su tshol bar gyis// myur du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'da'// bcom ldan 'das kyis mngal du 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na// tshe dang
428a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dga' bo dang / / dge slong lnga brgya po de dag rab tu dga' bar gyur pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo
428a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'brog dgon pa las yang dag par 'das te/ / mthar thug pa'i bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas su phyin nas/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pas/ bdag nyid shin tu
428a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gus sems khrus ni bstan pa dang / chu gtsang byug spos phul ba dang // bsod nams rnams ni bsgrubs pa na/
428a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam smin mchog 'di thob pa yin// de nas 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal ba thos pas thams cad the tsom du gyur nas/ the tsom gcod pa'i phyir ston pa chen po la 'ang
428a7(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'das sngon sug las ci bgyis na/ de'i rnam par smin pa lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur la/ mtshan sum cu dang ldan pas bdag nyid
428b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyan cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi sku bas sor bzhis thung bar gyur/ ci'i slad du 'dod pa'i yul la shin tu mngon par zhen pa las ston pa chen pos thugs brtse bar dgongs nas/ mthus 'khor
428b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral te/ thabs kyis shin tu mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la rnam par gzhag pa bkas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge
428b3(dkon brtsegs): slong dga' bo sngon las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yongs su smin pas na/ thams cad mngon du gyur pa yin no zhes gzhan nas bstan pa bzhin du rgya cher bka' stsal nas//
428b4(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gal te bskal pa brgya lon kyang // las byas chud zar mi 'gyur te// rgyu dang rkyen ni tshogs pa na// lus can nyid la 'bras bur smin// dge
428b5(dkon brtsegs): slong dag khyod nyon cig/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon rol na/ skye dgu rnams tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
428b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
428b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ dge slong gi dge 'dun stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang thabs cig tu ljongs chu zhing grong khyer mnyen ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du
429a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs nas/ mnyen ldan gyi tshal na bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i g.yas khyim gyi gcung zhig yod pa de 'dod pa'i yul la shin tu mngon par zhen cing
429a2(dkon brtsegs): chags pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs des 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yongs su 'da' ba'i phyir rab tu 'byung bar bskul
429a3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ thabs kyis mthar thugs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rnam par gzhag go// de'i tshe na yul de'i bdag po mnyen ldan zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ 'di ltar
429a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyis mi rnams 'dul ba/ mi dang skye bo mang po rgyas pa/ lo legs shong bde ba/ g.yo sgyu dang chom rkun med cing nad dang bral ba/ ba glang dang / ra lug dang / sA lu dang / bu ram
429a5(dkon brtsegs): shing kun tu gang zhing rgyas par gyur te/ rgyal po de'i g.yas khyim gyi nu bo zhig yod pa'ang shin tu 'dod pa la mngon par zhen cing chags par gyur to// rgyal po des bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas
429a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ mnyen ldan gyi tshal na bzhugs par thos pas/ btsun mo dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / skye bo mang po'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan
429a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das des rgyal po'i 'khor dang bcas pa la shin tu gya nom pa'i chos kyi gtam kun tu bstan cing gzengs bstod
429b1(dkon brtsegs): pas/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa thob par gyur to// de'i nu bo 'dod pa la zhen cing khyin nas 'byang du ma btub pa dang / de'i tshe de la blon po'i bu dang gzhan yang snga nas lhan cig rtse rtse ba'i grogs po dag gos
429b2(dkon brtsegs): kye grogs po shes rab gyis shig/ 'di ltar rgyal po'i gzhon nu dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / blon po dang / skye bo mang po dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs ga la ba der dong ste/
429b3(dkon brtsegs): gus pas dam pa'i chos mnyan pas khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar khyod kyang mi lus shin tu thob par dka' ba las deng thob par gyur na/ ci'i phyir 'dod pa la mngon par zhen
429b4(dkon brtsegs): cing chags nas sgor yang 'byung du mi btub ces smras pa dang / des kyang de skad du spyo ba thos pas shin tu ngo tsha bar gyur nas/ de dag gi rjes su 'brang ste lhan cig dong ngo // de'i tshe bcom
429b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de'i gcung dge slong des mang po de dag lhan cig 'grogs te dong bar mthong nas/ kye khyed ci'i phyir mi 'di gcig pu khrid nas lhan cig 'grogs te 'gro zhes dris pa dang / de dag gos kyang ji ltar
429b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa zhib tu smras so/ / dge slong des smras pa/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung yin te/ sngon khyim na gnas pa'i tshe 'dod pa'i yul rnams la shin tu mngon par zhen cing chags pa las/ ston pa
429b7(dkon brtsegs): chen pos thugs rjer dgongs nas mthus 'khor ba las 'das te/ mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa yin no// gzhan yang skyes bu glen pa dag dang 'dra ba 'di lta bu yod pa las
430a1(dkon brtsegs): khyed kyis snying brtse nas lhan cig khrid de 'ongs pa shin tu legs so/ / deng bla na med pa'i ston pa chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der khrod cig dang / gdon mi za bar shin tu dang
430a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pas/ de dag kyang lhan cig 'grogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das des kyang de dag la gzigs nas/ dbang po dang
430a3(dkon brtsegs): mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bstan pas/ de dag gis thos par gyur nas/ shin tu dang ba skyes pas 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te thal mo sbyar
430a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ston pa chen po 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang gi gdugs la bdag gi sdum par bsro khang du khrus la
430a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa cig nang zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang cang mi gsung bar gshegs par zhal gyis bzhes so// des kyang zhal gyis bzhes par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
430a6(dkon brtsegs): phyag byas te song ngo / / de nas rgyal po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rgyal po la lus gus pas phyag byas nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bdag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
430a7(dkon brtsegs): der mchis nas chos thos pas/ shin tu dang ba skyes nas 'dod pa'i yul rnams la yongs su skyo ba'i sems skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par sang gi gdugs la bdag
430b1(dkon brtsegs): gi sdum par bsro khang du khrus la gshegs par gsol ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa chen pos kyang thugs rtse bar dgongs nas gshegs par zhal gyis bzhes te/ bcom ldan 'das
430b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod par bgyi ba'i 'os su gyur pa lags na/ lhas kyang grong khyer gyi shul dang srang rnams phyag bdar byas nas chag chag btab ste/ mdzes par bgyi ba'i rigs so zhes
430b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa dang / rgyal pos 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs na bdag gis grong khyer mdzes par bya mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag go nu bo 'dod pa la mngon par zhen nas bzlog par
430b4(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba las/ deng bcom ldan 'das kyis thul bar gyur pa ni yang dag par ngo mtshar che'o snyam du bsams nas/ nu bo shin tu legs kyis/ khyod song la khrus kyi yod byed ci dgos pa sbyor cig/
430b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / ngas kyang ci nus kyis grong khyer brgyan par bya'o zhes smras pas/ rgyal po'i nu bo'ang shin tu dga' bar gyur te/ rgyal po la phyag byas te sa las langs te song ngo // de
430b6(dkon brtsegs): nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ kye khyed cig deng la grong khyer du dril chen po bsgrags te/ phyogs su 'di skad du sang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs kyis/ grong khyer na gnas
430b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / yul so so nas lpags pa'i skye bo rnams so so nas ci nus kyis grong khyer mdzes par gyis la/ lam dang srang rnams phyag bdar byas te chag chag btab nas me tog dang / spos dang /
431a1(dkon brtsegs): dri rnams thogs te/ ston pa chen po gshegs pa bsus shig ces skos shig/ blon po rnams kyis kyang lha de bzhin 'tshal lo zhes rgyal po'i bka' khyer nas phyogs su
431a2(dkon brtsegs): go bar bsgo zhing dril chen gyi sgra bsgrags pas/ skye bo rnams grong khyer de'i rdo ba dang / gyo mo dang / bong ba rnams bsal te/ spos kyi chus kun tu khyab par chag chag btab nas/ bdug pa
431a3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa rnams kyang bsregs/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang po'ang bcugs te/ me tog rnams mngon par gtor bas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi skyed mos tshal dga'
431a4(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin du byas so/ / de'i phyir rgyal po'i nu bos kyang spos chu dang / spos mar la sogs pa sbyar te/ bsro khang mdzes par byas nas khri bshams nas gdan yang bting ngo // de bzhin
431a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnam par gzigs mthar gyis grong khyer du gshegs su nye ba dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po dang / btsun mo dang / slas dang / skye bo mang po rnams grong nas byung ste/
431a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa bsus nas/ rgyang nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te zhabs 'brang byas nas grong khyer du gshegs pa dang / de'i tshe rgyal po'i nu bo des kyang bcom ldan 'das bsro khang du
431a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs par spyan drangs te/ spos chu la sogs pa phul nas sku bsil bar gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gser gyi kha dog can mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus
431b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su brgyan pa mthong ba dang / rab tu dga' nas shin tu dang ba'i dad pa skyes par gyur to// sku bsol nas na bza' mnabs pa dang / des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bo phyag
431b2(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ 'di skad du deng bdag gis bsod nams kyi zhing mchog dam pa la mchod pa cung zad bgyis pa 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa bas/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'di dang tha dad pa med
431b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gser gyi kha dog can gyi lus thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di'i gcung 'dod pa'i yul la mngon par zhen cing chags pa las mthus yongs su bzlas te/ shin
431b4(dkon brtsegs): tu mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gcung du gyur nas/ gser gyi kha dog can gyi lus
431b5(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar bdag 'dod pa'i yul la mngon par zhen cing chags par gyur na'ang mthus srid pa'i chu bo zab mo las yongs su bzlas te/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la gzhol
431b6(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/ / dge slong dag khyed kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po mnyen ldan gyi nu bo 'dod pa la mngon par zhen par gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam du sems na de
431b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar mi blta ste/ de ni dge slong dga' bo 'di nyid yin no// 'di sngon 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs bsro khang du gshegs par gsol nas/ spos chu la sogs pas sku bsil
432a1(dkon brtsegs): te/ shin tu dang ba'i dad pas smon lam btab pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyus deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i gcung du gyur nas/ lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur pa dang / 'dod
432a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yul la mngon par zhen cing chags pa las ngas mthus phyung ste/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa shin tu bde ba'i gnas su phyin par gyur pa
432a3(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / de nas 'khor mang po rnams the tsom du gyur nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos sngon las ci bgyis na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
432a4(dkon brtsegs): sum cu mngon par grub lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'dis las mngon par 'dus byas pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher snga ma bzhon te/ sngon 'das pa'i
432a5(dkon brtsegs): dus su ri brag gi grong gzhan zhig na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang ba/ yo byad kyis brel pa med pa zhig gnas pa de la skyed mos tshal me tog dang 'bras bu rgyas shing / chu mig dang / 'bab chu dang /
432a6(dkon brtsegs): ljon shing dang ldan pa rab tu 'byung ba'i dben gnas su 'os pa zhig yod de/ de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'jig rten du byung nas/ dben pa na gnas pa yod pas/ nam
432a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'di 'ba' zhig bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur te/ de nas rang sangs rgyas gzhan zhig ljongs rgyu zhing ri brag gi grong der phyin nas/ phan tshun kun tu brtag
432b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ gnas btsal ba las de'i skyed mos tshal du phyin pa dang / skyed mos tshal de srung ba'i mis 'phags pa de mthong nas/ bde bar gshegs sam/ mnyel bso ba'i slad du 'phags pa 'dir
432b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs su gsol zhes smras so/ / des nam gyi gung thun la me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mis mthong nas/ 'di snyam du btsun pa chen po 'di ni 'di lta bu'i
432b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa mchog grub bo snyam du bsams nas/ de nas nub mo langs te khyim bdag ga la ba der song nas/ 'di skad du khyim bdag chen po deng dga' ba chen po skyed cig/ skyed mos tshal na 'phags
432b4(dkon brtsegs): po zhig bdag gi thad du gshegs nas mtshan mo gnas pa las/ de ni spyod pa gya nom pa dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul chen po phun sum tshogs pa zhig pas/ 'od zer chen po bkye nas skyed mos tshal
432b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi nang kun tu gsal bar byas so zhes smras pa khyim bdag gis thos nas myur zhing rings par skyed mos tshal du song te/ rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas/ 'di skad du 'phags pa ni bsod
432b6(dkon brtsegs): snyoms bzhed pa lags la/ bdag ni bso nams 'tshal ba lags na/ thugs brnye par dgongs te skyed mos tshal 'dir bzhugs su gsol/ bdag gos rtag pa rna bsod snyoms sbur rdo zhes
432b7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa dang / des kyang des gus par gsol ba btab par mthong nas khas blangs te/ skyed mos tshal de'i nang du gnas nas/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa mchog la snyoms par zhugs te/
433a1(dkon brtsegs): bde ba rjes su myong bar gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na de 'di snyam du bdag gi lus rul ba 'di ni 'khor bar 'khor ba las bdag gis gang bya ba de ni thob par gyur pas mya ngan
433a2(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa zhi ba'i dbyings su zhugs nas/ gtan du mi skye ba mngon sum du bya ba'i rigs so snyam nas/ nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdzu 'phrul
433a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams mngon par bstan te/ 'od zer chen po bkye nas/ steng du 'bar ba dang / tsha ba dang / 'og tu chu 'bab pa la sogs pa bstan bstan te/ lus 'di spangs nas rnam par shes pa skye bar mi
433a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas khyim bdag des de'i rus bu blangs nas/ dri'i shing thams cad kyis bsregs te/ 'o/
433a5(dkon brtsegs): mas med bsad nas rus pa lhag ma ma lus pa bsdus te/ bum pa gsar pa'i nang du bcug nas/ mchod rten brtsigs te/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams btsugs nas
433a6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dang ba'i dad pas dro'i chu gya nom pa sum cu gtor te/ mtshan bzang po rnams grub par shog cig ces smon lam chen po btab bo// dge slong dag legs par nyon la
433a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta ste/ de ni dga' bo 'di nyid yin no// 'dis mchod pa mchog byas pa dang / gus pa dang / shin tu dang ba bskyed
433b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las kyi dbang gis deng 'dir mchog khyad par du 'phags pa sum cu mngon par grub pa'i rnam par smin pa myong bar gyur pa yin no/ / de nas 'khor mang po rnams yang the tsom skyes nas
433b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos las ci bgyis na/ gal te 'di rab tu ma byung zhing khyim na gnas par gyur na/ gdon mi za bar stobs kyis 'khor
433b3(dkon brtsegs): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dis bgyis par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dga' bos tshe rabs snga ma la las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam
433b4(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa yongs su smin par gyur pa'i tshe/ gdon mi za bar bdag nyid kyis myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa'ang rgyas par gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang
433b5(dkon brtsegs): po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams tshe lo stong phrag nyi shu thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs zhes bya ba mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa 'jig
433b6(dkon brtsegs): rten du byung ste/ yul wA rA NA si drang srong lhung ba'i gnas/ ri dgas byin pa'i tshal na bzhugs so// de'i tshe na grong khyer de na rgyal po kr-i kr-i zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ 'di ltar chos kyis 'jig rten 'dul
433b7(dkon brtsegs): par byed pas/ chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yang rgyas par gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro// rgyal po de la bu gsum yod de/ 'di lta ste/ rab dang / 'bring po dang / tha chungs so//
434a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin pa shegs pa datha com pa yang da/ byar rdzogs pa'i snas rgyas 'od srungs sangs cas A pam par ldan nas spyong zad pa'i ma bzhin du gam med pa'i du
434a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i dbyas su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / rgyal po des gus pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mug cung thus te/ rdo klong nan dan dang / kor shor sha dang / ba sa
434a3(dkon brtsegs): tsa shong la sogs pas thegs te/ 'oms me bsad nas rang bsrel bsdus te/ rin po che'i bum pa'i nang du bcug nas/ mchod rten chen po rin po che sna ba ni las byas pa/ khor khor lu
434a4(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad gcig/ 'phang du dpag tshad phyed yod pa brtsigs nas/ 'khor lo 'jugs pa'i tshe/ rgyal po'i bu bzang po des bdag nyid steng du 'dzegs nas 'khor lo bar ma btsugs so//
434a5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i bu 'bring por gyur pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta ste/ dga' bo 'di nyid yin no// 'dis sngon 'das pa'i dus su gus pa'i
434a6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis mchod pa byas pa dang / 'khor lo bar ma btsugs pa'i dge ba'i las des tshe rabs nyis stong lnga brgya'i bar du rtag par gling gcig la dbang ba'i stobs kyis 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal
434a7(dkon brtsegs): po byas so/ / tshe 'di la gal te rab tu 'byung bar ma gyur na/ de bzhin du stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po la dbang sgyur ba byed par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor
434b1(dkon brtsegs): mang po rnams the tsom du gyur nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos sngon las ci bgyis na/ nyan thos kyi nang na dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom
434b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mchog tu bka' stsal lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni smon lam gyi stobs las gyur pa yin te/ dge slong dag dga' bo 'di sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
434b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa las/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba las/ de'i mkhan po bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa las dbang po'i sgo rab
434b4(dkon brtsegs): tu sdom pa'i mchog tu bsngags pa brjod par gyur to/ / des ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du tshangs par spyad kyang / tshe de nyid las mngon par rtogs pa ci'ang thob par ma gyur pas/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe//
434b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las/ ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du tshangs par smad kyang / tshe 'di nyid la mngon par rtogs pa ci'ang med pas/ bdag gis 'dir tshangs
434b6(dkon brtsegs): par spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'das/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ zam ze'i khye'u tha ma zhes bya ba 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
434b7(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar 'gyur te/ mtshan yang shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pas/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das 'di'i bstan pa las/ khyim nas khyim med par
435a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu blu / / nyon mongs pa rnams spangs nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/ ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das 'da'o gas
435a2(dkon brtsegs): pab las dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa las dbang po'i sgo sdom pa'i mchog tu gyur cig ces smon lam btab
435a3(dkon brtsegs): pas na/ smon lam de'i stobs dang 'dir nga'i bstan pa las nyan thos kyi nang na dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin no// 'di ltar dge slong dag gang gcig tu
435a4(dkon brtsegs): gnag pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu gnag go/ / gang gcig tu dkar ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu dkar ro// las 'dren ma gang yin pa de ni rnam par smin
435a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang 'dren ma myong bar 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed kyis gcig tu gnag pa dang 'dren ma'i las spongs la/ gcig tu dkar ba'i las bsgrub par bya'o// 'phags pa dkon
